input: My cats hate this food. If they like it, others will love it, and you have to put it in a separate container. I am stuck with 10 pounds of food that is too expensive for the cat to eat! Save your money. There are much less expensive, healthier foods out there.

The story was ok, the characters were interesting, but I think it would be helpful if there had been more detail on what happened when people died, or to whom they went, etc. in other parts of the book. In addition, some editing seemed amiss. For example, "she could smell fresh meat." (should have been, "She did not taste any meat that day," etc.
Not one of her best. I am a HUGE Mary Higgins Clark fan. Some other authors are really worth reading.

I bought this book with some high expectations. After being a fan of the series for several months now, my expectations were high. However, although I feel that they got to be too high, these books are much darker than in earlier ones (I think it was about the fifth book, "Midnight Riot") and that's hard because as others have mentioned there is nothing funny here... Well, just read the first pages, it's all dark already. It really gives you idea how dark this new one will be.

The only thing comfortable here is the color of this shirt, so if that's all you're after, you'll enjoy this. Otherwise, find another. You need something light weight for summer. This one runs large, even after washing. Order 2 sizes smaller than you are.

This was my first attempt at a diet or exercise book. I bought it in paperback for the price of only $3.99 and thought I'd give it a try. The format itself is easy to follow, though there isn't enough detail on each recipe -- if you don't know where to start, as I didn't, it's pretty difficult getting back around to it. The actual recipes themselves are not that exciting. I've made them several times since receiving it; they taste alright, but nothing too special.

I received this unit via Amazon today, and upon turning it on, the right speaker is blown. This shouldn't happen in what should be a good quality product. As of now, I'm currently trying to contact Yamaha support. Hopefully we can resolve the problem, but it's not looking good. I wish I'd read reviews before buying this stereo. There seems to be some serious design flaws with this...and unfortunately I'll have to start researching an alternative.
These tumblers are well made. For everyday use they would get 5+ stars, however for formal or special occasions, I'd give 3.5.

Very good quality and great to use while baking in the oven. I did notice that some of the mats were not cut well for my bread but all together very good. Would buy them again if needed. It appears they would make nice gifts too. The color is also a beautiful green.

It's a nice looking product. The two small bars that hold up the doors were not able to support our weight but it still worked. We had to use duct tape along the top of each bar so we couldn't move it. Other than that, it's good quality.
This grinder does the job.

It seems as though the author went nowhere with this story. No new ideas here, just an excuse to have sex for a cheap thrill for everyone. The most romantic book I ever read was "Shades of Grey." This is almost laughable. My copy might turn up in a charity shop. Do not waste your money on it.

i was a fan of this game until patches popped up that rendered it worthless. now all updates are useless. too bad- the good news is there will be no more patches, at least until the next version comes out, and you'll have an excellent zombie game.

This little speaker packs a punch! I didn't expect it to sound so clear considering its size. It's the perfect size for carrying around, and has excellent bass. Very well priced as well. Would absolutely recommend buying this. No downside, if you are on a budget these speakers might be too expensive but they do exactly what they're supposed to.
The stories kept me up reading into the night. Good characters! If you're tired looking for something interesting pick one of these up. It won't disappoint.

In her book, "Living With AIDS: The True Story of the Man in My House," Betty White does not give an adequate history about HIV/AIDS. If such was necessary, than she could tell us what HIV was. She didn't do that. This book has way too much information for a single person to read, including pages and pages of background on AIDS that did little to further understanding. I think that's why it took 15 years for me to understand it. I'm glad my daughter recommended this book.

The item arrived quickly and was what it said online. I've been using this type of shaver on all types of beard from back to head for a long time. I ordered the item as part of my father's Father's Day gift, which he did not open due to some kind of illness. He didn't care about how well the product worked just that IT WAS HIS FAVORITE KIND SO HE COULD FIND IT IN A TIME OF NEED.

I've bought this and the regular version of it, both are just a little too much. It takes me about 2 hours to drink each cup (about 30 min on one side, then half an hour with another side) so I think I'll stick to the plain tea flavors. I'm really happy because now my coffee is caffeinated whenever we want! However, the taste isn't as good as it used to be, even though it's decaf. It's still great though.

I have owned this keyboard for two years so it is worth saying that I'm impressed. The keys are all flat except the top row of buttons which act as programmable functions if you press down on them. It's very nice not having a split layout. It has many features over competing keyboards such as: a volume control to get rid of unwanted noise from your computer, an audio input so you're ready to listen to music via speakers or headphones, and even a media card reader.
Easy order,great price, received it very quick. Quality product that performs exactly as advertised.

I recently received a Roku 2XS so I could cut my cable service. The device is very easy to set up but the setup disc did not work. It would ask for authorization several times before it allowed me to. After 2 hours, and lots of frustration, resetting all settings as if on the tv screen, etc. finally finished with just using the TV remote.

This product is perfect for a dorm room or just to put stuff in it if you need to. I've had mine outside (folded up) on my screened porch while I was working inside. It has held up nicely so far. The only downside that others have commented on, and it's true. The bottom comes unstaked from the top, but once we added rope across several nails, no problem. I'm glad I bought this. It's easy enough for me to set up, with one adult plus myself, without help.

I've tried in vain to find a good book on the subject of learning and teaching Japanese. This one is not it. It has no index, so your first stop for any words or notes might have different meanings if you wanted them -- that is, they can refer back to prior chapters, but it's impossible for this reader to find them. No matter where I go through the book, it requires multiple readings to finish all the entries.
Loved this series when it came out years ago, so happy it's on Prime now! We like silly humor, so a bit different than what you see today on TV, but very enjoyable...good story lines too.

Good starter for a first introduction to how the human mind works. Unfortunately, since this is an audio book, you are unable to read or listen to much of it. As far as I'm concerned, it's just annoying to have commercials interrupting part way through even when you're relaxing and listening to your favorite book. The story itself was fun though, so I wouldn't say don't buy it; I'll take a little distraction sometimes. But buyer beware. It's not really worth purchasing. You can find free samples on most sites like Amazon.

This album brings back memories when music were fun not like now... But it always makes you want too see them live.. So if your not happy with today's pop try this album! They are even more awesome live then on CD.
This does nothing to make an old Panasonic DVD-VCR obsolete - this seems more like a "scam". Don't buy it, spend some money and get something that works.
Really not worth even reading. Glad it was a free purchase. The writer should have saved his time if he had done any research on this subject. Very poorly written. And a very unconvincing story.
I bought this to replace our old charger for the Garmin nuvi GPS. It is working great and came quickly. Thanks..

I have owned various versions of the IPOD since they first came out. This is by far the worst version yet. The device freezes all the time, often after I've completed 1 song. If you hit pause, it does not let go until the song has been played 5 times. Often when I'm sitting in my car listening to music and I stop because it's time out, or whatever reason- there are times that the screen says "error" and continues the track.

This was not easy to install. It took 2 professional people over 9 hours to set up the system with a new DirecTV receiver. Since we have only had for 1 year, it's too soon to tell. My original problem is still in there. But I don't think it will be fixed. When the receiver first goes cold when watching DVR, DVD player, and sound all come on at once which means you can't run anything else. We tried different HDMI cables, etc, etc.
The concept is nice but don't let anyone tell you otherwise.

Ordered these lamps in March, received them very quickly. However, when installed and fully charged overnight, they did not work. We tried several other outlets around our home with no success. Had someone try switching outlets, different sockets, etc, without any luck.

This case does not fit in the iTouch at all. Its a tiny bit too small. The front cover doesn't even lay flat and is crooked. Not satisfied. I want my money back. Would give 0 stars. Buyers be aware. It's false advertising! Do NOT waste your money. I'm very irritated on getting this!! If it wasn't for this it's being returned to seller. My son would have lost his money! DO NOT BUY THIS. It will not fit! False advertising.

This is a book by a guy who spent years trying to live life his way. Its message for anybody with any sense of humor is simple: Stop worrying. Accept that money sucks, and get over it. It's what I did. The advice in this book has been summarized many times over. There's much useful information here if you can be bothered digesting the writing style. It reads like it came straight out of someone's dissertation. If you're into getting up early on Saturday mornings, go ahead and read this.

I was looking forward to the arrival of these sheets for years and finally broke down 2 months ago at a local retailer because they had been on display all summer. They were only $30.00! If your thinking about ordering these, be sure to go with something else. After many washings we now have patches where threads are ripped off every piece. They're coming apart in several places. Some pieces don't fit well. At this point, we've gone through 6 sets.

the book was great and gave very useful information that I needed to learn things about chickens and care them better. It also made me realize there are so many types of chickens some more well known than others when it comes to care, feed etc. This is the second one in my house being read which tells us they all vary a bit as far if it's worth getting another book.

The movie is okay but it has a great message to it. If you liked the book, you'll probably like the movie. It's not my favorite Stephen King writing but definitely worth watching. I think it's important for people in power to see that. He's one of the best writer ever. It goes without saying that this movies can be quite controversial. I'm actually surprised he released it on HBO and made it so openly. I'd recommend it, especially if you're a King fan.
The history is fascinating.
First of all, I've bought from this vendor before - this set came promptly after ordering (not Prime).

These are cheap and don't work well at all. I gave them a shot, and as some of the other reviews stated, they do work, however there is no noticeable difference when you turn or activate them. The button must be depressed in order for it to work. Also after about 30 seconds into using them, my hearing was still muffled.

I am returning this book, because the title is misleading and in fact it is not by Tom Waits but his former group Dead City Ramblers. Although this book would probably rate a high for people who do NOT know about Dead City, it does provide some nice pictures of Tom's life as an adult. For those who are interested in knowing more in-depth info on what happened to him, like you wouldn't find anywhere else, then get another book. This one just doesn't even come close.
The movie was too cheesy for my tastes. Nothing new here and it kind of took the whole story to come out at the end. I enjoyed her acting though.

If I could rate this as zero stars I would. Like many of the other reviewers, I'm very disappointed with my purchase. This CD didn't even have a good song on it. There were only 2 songs that i enjoyed. That is what you get for buying online. I went and bought myself an actual copy from somewhere to help offset it's loss in value. Hopefully someone will make some money off these guys through downloads etc.

I was so excited to read that Amazon would sell this old classic Christmas story because I'm trying toteach my grandkids about Jesus. The description of A Visit from St. Nicholas sounded awesome. However the book is full ofhistorical errors, contradictions, and untruths. One example,a little girl who had been in foster care gets sent by Santa Claus (supposedly) as part of Santa's magic sack gift even though she wasn't born at thecharacters home nor ever saw it.
I love the coffee mugs and would recommend them to anyone. They have held up beautifully. Would purchase more if available. Love them.

The reason I give one star is becasue it didn't work for me or another person i knew. It was a waste of money. So I really don't like that at all. If the price could be lowered then would get a better review on this. Thanks Amazon. And thank you. &# 128540;
Good quality, easy to clean up.

I bought this for my daughter who has a huge music collection and loves to listen to the radio, play her MP3's and charge her phone. This product is exactly as described. It comes with all of you need cables for different phones (micro USB, standard usb, etc). The radio works really well. And you can use it plugged into AC or car. What makes it better would have been if this charger also came in black. It's not expensive so that's probably why its not. Overall great product.

It's been done before in other movies, as this was the third one I saw recently. With that being said, it does have a few twists & turns to keep you interested through out the film. I felt sorry for him, or her, whichever way they went. I give it three stars, because we already know how it's going to end. And then another star goes once again- he's just fun to watch while he is alive.

I have to agree with the other reviewers that this novel is not up to the standards. If it is a sequel for some reason or if there was only one book written then why are characters introduced from previous books mentioned when they didn't even exist in previous books so it's pointless and annoying. If you liked the first two novels and want more then don't read this.
This book has been out for years and yet I have the nerve to offer a positive review?! It's full of grammatical errors. It also doesn't describe what you're expected to learn from it.

I bought this after reading a lot of the reviews. While I did have some problems with it at first (poor customer service), everything has worked out great. I've owned this TV for about five years. After four years, I'm ready to toss it. One day -- literally one day, like so many others that I remember from my childhood -- while watching television (on cable) and turned on the TV, there was an unusual electrical buzzing sound emanating from the back half of the TV.
This product is very disappointing. The speakers suck. If you listen too loud or turn up bass, then its distorted. We couldn't even use them in my daughters nursery.

After watching the movie on TV and enjoying it, I purchased this DVD to see how it played in my Blu-ray player. The disc freezes up about 3/4 of the way through, and then all you hear is a sound coming through your surround system. You can't even skip past it; when you're lucky enough not to, you'll go back and watch the whole thing again. What I've watched so far has been good.

This is a well made product. I was very disappointed to find that the case does NOT fit my HP DV7 inch computer. The quality of this product however cannot be questioned. It has all the protection needed for your investment in your investment, including being water tight as well without leaving marks on it. If you have a specific model or size please check and double check. Because if not it will definitely not work out for you.

This bag is pretty nice - I use it as a carry-on for air travel, and it's really convenient. It's light weight, but very sturdy. The only downside to this one (compared with the other styles I've had) was that all of my items inside were getting bent in odd ways, so I had to bend down just right or rearrange them. It took me awhile to get used to, but... now, nothing gets bent. After traveling through two different countries recently, I'm still happy with it.
This was much nicer than another one i ordered, but the clip does not stick so hard and can easily fall off. Also there are other designs available. Overall I'm happy, just wished it stayed on.
It doesn't come close to holding charge longer than 15 minutes. After all that time on battery, it's still not charged. So disappointing. No quality control. Would expect better.

I purchased this item with the hopes of being able to watch videos and browse internet from my bed while i was on vacation. Unfortunately, it didn't work. The wi-fi couldn't find any signal which would have been fine if all i had wanted is a small portable device but after searching for hours reading review and looking into what else I could connect in hope that some one might be more helpful. No luck. My laptop connects better then it did before so not sure where its coming from. Not happy.
I bought this as a gift for my husband, but have already used it. Easy to use, easy clean up. Definitely recommend.
I was looking for an inexpensive book with nice pictures. There were some good and useful things in this book, as well as many not so helpful ideas.
Exactly as shown and arrived fast. Holds up well, great quality. Good value given the price. Easy install with simple instructions. A couple holes needed.
Have bought two different stands from this- very nice design & look at same time. Highly recommend this.

i like it...it works ok, you have to do a couple of things first.1) don't try and put a knife on the grates when using them. they can be damaged, not that I've had any in 6 years but could happen2) use oven glove when removing from oven, as hot hands are bad for grilling food. this is obviously common sense though3) If everything goes well, clean with wire brush. its way easier than having to scrape it down
Purchased one as well as several friends at x-mas. We all enjoyed our movie nights in style with popcorn which we now make ourselves...thank you.

Got this for my 3 yr old daughter. It's a piece of junk. When using the suction mount, it always wants to unstick from itself. You have to get the toy out and pull them apart every time you are done playing with it. It is also very difficult to put together. I would NOT recommend getting this. Spend your money on something worthwhile. This was an overall disappointment. Do not waste yours.
It was good, not quite as good as the original. Still liked it more than some of what's out there these days.

I have been pleased so far with this item. It replaced my previous one which kept falling off and needed two hands to keep it attached (that's why the four-star rating). I'm glad we settled on this, as it's not bulky and looks just fine from outside our window. Our only concern is that the velcro closure isn't really secure and hasn't stopped her from trying again.

This book is OK, BUT it's missing page after page of text. I bought this hoping to see it all in one place. But the Kindle version does not contain very much text - you have no choice but scroll on every page, and that often jumps from section to section, etc. So instead of being able to, say, quickly skim through section A when I'm ready for a discussion about chapter II, or maybe skipping sections where other authors do this, you'll find yourself flipping pages as you're forced to.

I was a little nervous when I ordered this after reading some reviews not the highest but it did what it said to do. The price wasn't too great either. It fit really well and for some reason my dog didn't seem bothered by it. Good product at a good price. Thanks amazon again! My pet peede in less than 4 days. Great product. Love it!

The product does absolutely nothing. Don't waste you money. It doesn't make my water crystal clear, or anything. Nothing at all. Absolutely not worth a penny. I went back to doing it myself. Only took me about half as long and was twice the price. It's all in your head. Spend your money on things that actually work. This is very expensive junk. I'm going to be throwing mine away. They are very small. So they should really list them. Mine don't lay flat either.

These gloves are very cheap and thin fabric that is about like the plastic dish towels you find at walmart...don't waste your money. They didn't even last through my first shower..so save money for nicer things!

I bought this to replace all my old bulbs. They are very bright and white. It's an easy fix for the color of lights in your house. The price is great on these bulbs as well!! Would highly recommend these!!! Thank you Amazon once again!!!~Lisa - Houston TX, USA

The information is presented in a disjointed and jumpy fashion. It would be better organized with a simple outline for the user - so that he/she knows at least where to get started, and what they may expect to achieve. For instance, if you want to do an advanced file transfer, perhaps some type of spreadsheet work, or more complex image manipulation, this book cannot serve as your guide but could help organize it into chapters rather than rambling through pages listing every task you might undertake.

I'm a big HP fan. I've owned quite a number of laser printers. However, this is the first product that I will return before it's had its chance to work. The wifi function has quit on me. I tried everything - unplugged and restarted, downloading drivers. There are no instructions. This thing just doesn't work at all. Don't waste your time or money. Not worth half that.
Batteries did not last past first week. A waste of money. Not sure whether I received old or used batteries. Don't buy.

To have a story with zero morals and no real character development or depth is about all I can say for this book. I'm glad it was free. Just don't waste your time. This book could be written as if someone just sat down one day and wrote something that has only minimal writing skills (that's what they call writing). I'd take the time to write better stories using my imagination. At least some of them make sense. But not THIS one. Take advantage before they're gone.

I received the product today and couldn't wait to try it out. The installation CD didn't work. But that was OK, because using a USB flash drive gave me an option of putting another disc in instead! When you put another disc, however, nothing happens. It just says "cannot read disk". This happened on two different PCs. And no, my discs are not damaged or scratched. So I'm afraid mine is defective.

It was not what I expected, there are only 12 stories in this collection, a lot like the book "Dark Horse" which has around 100 stories, but way too short and hard to get into. Some of them were fun but, overall, not worth $12.00, it would have been nice if they put an additional story into one larger volume. The first book, I enjoyed reading it. I am glad that I picked up both books together.

this product should have been my last experience buying a refurbished product. After only 2 weeks of use, we noticed that our mouse will randomly stop working and take two or three taps on the mouse, then work perfectly again.
Bought 2 one went back cause 1 side did not work. 2nd has problems with audio. Don't waste ur money.

I got this for a friend and the music stopped after less than one song. Very upset about it and would not purchase ever again. This was supposed to be xmas gift. Now my friend has no choice but returning it. So disappointing. :( I'm hoping Amazon will make this right...
this was exactly what i needed. the fit perfectly in our backyard. easy to put together.
The story was very predictable but I still enjoyed it. A good light read if you don't have to think too much.
They are very pretty and they seal properly.

I bought this product thinking it would be great when i go camping but the main reason why its terrible is because It doesnt include a carry bag or something to put all of your things in it. It says you get two sleeping pads and 2 pillows. I thought what good if im not able to keep them clean after just one camping trip. This thing is HUGE! Like the size ad said it was a lot bigger than my queen mattress so that sucked big time.

I have the largest version, and for my purposes it is perfect. Only complaint would be that the sides are not rigid enough, so the top of your head will probably slip sometimes. It does its job well in keeping you dry (and it's very comfortable) when swimming. Would recommend even with small problems.

I love the look and feel of this product, however it was not constructed as well as my other similar products. The top piece doesn't latch to hold together without help. It broke after only about a month of use. Not worth sending back. So disappointing. But the style is great if you don't carry very heavy items; which I don't. Really cheap construction!
A sad look at a poor man's version of Michael Moore's "Fahrenheit 911" that leaves out some very crucial historical fact.
Product was great after an hour of install.

We took it on vacation and used it to watch movies, use the web camera, upload pics from our phone, connect with Facebook etc. It worked perfectly at keeping us connected. As long as you have your own wifi signal, it's no bother. This was only really a problem when we were able to reach out to friends and they couldn't connect. They would come over for movies but then can't stay connected or just say no because I don't get my signal strong.

I got it as a gift for my sister who has two little kids, however in the directions they don't warn that you have to put oil on every time before use. Also, even before using it, let me say how long we had it and the plastic holding pieces are broken, not because ours was cracked but from us having used it. Now, it's just sitting there doing nothing due to no power. Save your money and buy another one. One that might actually work.
I will admit that I was skeptical. This thing looks crazy and the price seemed a little high...I can say now it was definitely worth every penny!!
We needed these filters.
A fast moving plot with some twists and turns. Very well written and edited.

I bought a new Sony VAIO laptop with the hope of getting it up and running faster than my existing HP Pavilon. Well, I was wrong. Just as soon as it arrived, which wasn't an issue for me because I'm at work, I plugged in everything to make sure there were no loose connections etc, but when I turned on the laptop, I couldn't see anything - the screen just said "no signal".

The product looks great but I should have made the connections a little better. After connecting and hooking everything up there was still a buzzing coming from both channels. So after reading some more reviews here it seems as though this is not an uncommon problem to have. You may never be able to put this thing back in its proper state. If your gonna take care of anything why would even try to? It's all or nothing with these.

I got this for my 9 year old son. When he opened the product, there was not a picture of Darth Vader standing tall and proud. This thing is tiny. It could literally fit in one hand. If you thought that you were going to put these on your dashboard, think again. A waste all around. Do NOT buy. For $15 it would have been okay, but they are only worth $2 or less!!! Look elsewhere. Not recommended.

I read somewhere else that this was good for "people with allergies....no sneezing and runny nose." Not so much. This product seems to be a waste of money. In my case, not one minute after applying it, there were white flakes coming out from underneath.
When i plugged in on first time, sparks appeared from it, as soon after connecting, some electric shocks came out. The charger seems ok but obviously this is not designed for Lenovo Vostro 1520.
Great cookbook for new cooks like me. A good resource for healthy meals at home. Have also bought another cookbook by this author.

In the description of these "books" which should be described as "short stories," it does state that "the story is only a few pages" and yet charges $7.89 for them? At least if they weren't already selling them on Amazon this would have to cost even less than that. I'm very shocked since my son has such great taste. He usually reads every book we buy. And he has read numerous other books before this.

I didn't expect it to be perfect but you get an old looking vinyl cover not the one pictured in the image and that is probably why they sent me a totally different product. And it's going back so I'm out $14. Not worth my time or effort to return it.
Very sturdy.
This cable has an excellent build quality and works as specified. The price was well under what BestBuy wanted. Very satisfied with this purchase.

I could not read this book. It just didn't work for me. My son wanted to read it with me he likes books that involve animals so that's what we did. He liked it. But I couldn't really get into it. If u want a book about talking animals and their stories then try the big fish by david lloyd.

I would highly recommend not purchasing the Kindle version, or at least wait until more editions become available. The content is good except for what everyone else has said, which about sums up this work quite well. On pages 5-6, it states that "reading time in most parts of the world today can be measured by a single hour!" That should have been my first red flag and resulted me to never purchase (or pay for) the book.
The title says it all, I like the size & weight and am able to make a complete cup in just over 3 minutes. Clean up is easier than using the K-cups.
My LG VX9200 started taking off by itself without warning last weekend.
My son loves it for his breakfast cereal so he can enjoy the warm milk without getting out our heating pan
Very nice gloves! Great product for this price. Would definitely buy again if needed. I can wear it every day. Thank you very much.

I wanted it to be more than a bunch of short stories about the adventures of characters. Did not read what appeared to be. More like an ad which was boring enough for me that I quit reading it. It was free, why pay when you can get something good at free?

I bought this for my husband, who has a hard time keeping track of his phone number and number. He is constantly being asked to put it on the new cell he got - but doesn't actually care to. The design seems cool - as some other reviewers have noted, it's very thin at first (it looks like there's no cover AT ALL when you get it), which would look great with leather cases.

I ordered this for my son just prior to his first semester in college and was a great addition to the dorm room. It is as pictured on Amazon so if you are looking at these items, stop right there. Also, there wasn't any instruction manual; however, it took about 5 minutes before we figured out that the top of the microwave had something hanging underneath. There were two tabs underneath one which came off with no difficulty (easily removed by pulling up) but would have been harder without the tabs.
Great way to learn more about what it takes to create an effective email marketing strategy. Easy reading yet contains important information.

I really enjoy learning about things that the ordinary American would think of as strange. What made these stories interesting to me was knowing a bit more how those men actually saw things and how they may have lived. It also showed their struggles against nature and other people. The stories were well written though it seemed many times in his writing he got carried away with descriptions or details.
These bottles worked very well with my daughter.

This book is a must have before you take your first step on learning the theory behind game theory. I found it lacking in depth - but then, I'm neither an astrophysicist nor mathematician. It was nonetheless very interesting to read and get some idea of what goes into making AI successful. Of course, playing games are required for this. After all, we don't expect robots controlling robotic drones to play chess either. Even so, it's a great reference work which should help anyone who wants to further their understanding beyond games.

This one makes my wife extremely happy. I've been using it daily for the last two weeks without a problem. It's very easy to use. I have no complaints. It is small and light enough that if you lose it, it'll be just as easy. I'm not sure what else reviewers would want in an mp3 player. And at $24, compared with other brands selling for $40+, this unit provides pretty good value too.
We expected more from this shower curtain set than we received. It looks okay, just not what I expected. Probably wouldn't buy another.

I've gone through probably four different brands of these and this one is the most durable. I've had to change them out once a year. I also haven't lost my hearing at all using them (although maybe I'm more cautious than usual with that particular activity...). They are clear sounding on both ends. It doesn't hurt to hear what you say either. The reason they're so expensive though is because they aren't made from cheap plastic like most.

You know how there are so many items you purchase on Amazon that come out disappointing right? Then when this one does arrive it's absolutely beautiful & exactly as described by manufacturer. Thank You! And thank you! :)
