It's lightweight - good to travel with. Batteries can last 2-3 weeks between charging. All in all I'm very satisfied with performance - no complaints.
This seemed like an interesting premise but just didn't go anywhere.
the filter works well to trap most of the odors for a good price and is easy to clean. I would recommend it

I purchased this for my new Kindle and it is a nice product. It seems to hold the kindle securely, but like others have mentioned, there are problems with some of the magnets catching in certain spots which causes the cover not closing properly or puts pressure on both parts and makes them close unevenly. For now, after about 2 months, I am still using it, because it has been so cheap.

it just was okay. kinda slow. did not hold my attention as i had hoped. i got bored with the plot line, too slow to read. no excitement. there were some good points though. well worth reading, for its message about war and it's effects on human nature. we would all do well, if possible, after reading this one, to stay away from that kind of warfare.but overall, just a bit long in parts I thought. could have done it more action packed too.
Excellent product.... Would highly recommend it..
this was on my daughter-in-law's wish list so i bought her this. she really likes it.....
This book is filled with humor which makes it very enjoyable.
I am giving this fan 2 stars only because my previous fan--another brand with no "swivel"--lasted about 5 yrs.
This ebook is almost 100% fluff, with no scientific basis for anything.
This is one of those books that had so many interesting elements but at some point, someone just lost interest or ran out of ideas. I wish I'd saved myself the hassle.
The case fits tightly around the phone. There is no way your phone will fall out of it.

This is a nice product for the price. You can't beat it...UPDATE!!! Have had this item two days and it already broke where the iPad holder attaches to both sides. I have tried gluing it, no luck, now using velcro which holds but does not keep in place.

I have a pair in black and loved them, they are light weight and fit snug BUT the white ones were so uncomfortable around my arch. So soft inside you need socks. The arch didn't even go through that part! Had to return them. They were also smaller than the black. I'm still looking for some comfy sandals with this heal but will pay more attention of what company is making it if i can see on amazon. This was the least quality sandal I've purchased.

My wife has the same cover for her Ipad 4, but got this one from a different vendor. She likes it as well and it's hard to tell that there's anything different. Just what I expected. It feels just like my wife's when holding it. Good product. You won't be disappointed.

This is a classic case. What else are you supposed to say when the author makes this "fact" up? I don't know, there were many more that came forward. I'm not one of those who just buy books and listen for factoids after they have been confirmed by other sources, but come on, really? There would be a lot of people with far better background than me out there. But this guy doesn't work through history properly, either - he uses his own opinion as truth.

The unit shipped promptly with all the components. It worked well, for 4 weeks. After that point it would either not recognize CDRWs, or stop at the end of a disk instead of continuing to play. That was really annoying. I called Philips, who sent out 2 replacement DVDplayers which lasted longer than that. These came through after they failed in less time and did as they were advertised to, but only played half CDs when tested on another DVD player, so you had to listen using headphones.
This was not what i bought and im tired of these fakes selling stuff on here who doesnt make good or return calls because they can see its fake.
This is the best phone holder with Bluetooth in town for this phone! Easy to place your cell phone and works as advertised. Also used it when mowing my grass at work.

This unit was a little cheaper than the one that we were replacing as we had lost one before because not enough people checked out first. Once installed though none can tell the difference. They think it's brand new! Great Product.

First of all, the battery life was fine until this morning when it died. The computer just shut off and a message came across my screen saying that it was low on power while I was still typing in a word. Then after one little word went by, it gave me an error message stating that the power adapter had failed. When I turn back on, all of the icons are gone and now there is only black screen. Not worth fixing.
Just a little bit of honey with my oatmeal every morning, makes things taste like home with out them being too sweet. It's very expensive but at least now when we run out, Walmart has it...
This series gives us more in the way of supernatural mystery than ever before - that is. It is also just too short. I felt it finished on book two or three.

I don't know if what I'm feeling right now is anxiety or not, as I've been working with my kids the last few weeks and have noticed some changes - more energy, better sleep, etc. But since everyone's experiences may vary, it might not be that big of a difference for you. However, this particular product didn't work any miracles on me at all. I'll probably try something else next time. In case you can't tell, the price isn't bad, so I'd order this.
It's really nice, just wish I'd paid more attention to details.

The product was defective, and did not work upon receipt of it. This is very poor business to say the least, it makes me think you are putting a good word on your product. I will never buy from this company again simply out of spite. Please have my money returned. Thank you.
It looks nice.
I purchased this book as we are currently on a trip to Rome. It is beautiful and well written.

You must realize that this is a simple device designed without much thought of design and functionality. The picture quality is poor because the sensor for viewing in sunlight or under florescent lights are both too large to do what it needs to. I just want my TV to come on when there is movement at least 25 feet away. This unit does not support that. And as said before, it's very awkward holding it.

My husband wanted these shoes for work. They did fit fine, no pinching or rubbing. He has worn them multiple times. The material on the tops of his toes and at the back is coming apart like little balls. I'm very disappointed I was hoping something more durable would be in them. If you only want a pair to work every 2-3 weeks then I'd say go with these. Otherwise look elsewhere

This book is an easy read and has some good character development with some very funny lines in it. The story flows smoothly along although there are many typos through out my Kindle. Good reading if you just want something quick & light to read. 
 Rating: 3.

These things are huge, which is kinda cool but the adhesive on these cups isn't sticky enough (it's just plain old tape). I'm trying super glue at first but if that doesn't work then I'll have to go looking again. The rubber feels quite nice though, especially considering how big these things. And they're REALLY cute.

I love the look of this mug, although when you push a button to drink from it and hear that plastic popping noise like an ice cube in your drink, it's quite jarring. Unfortunately, that's about all these mugs are good for if you're drinking coffee. Mine popped open while trying out the trick where when I'm driving with my car door open, there is some movement going forward, it just kinda pops.
Bought two solar chargers - both have worked well so far.
I am not in a position to do this justice. This camera came so fast and works great. The instructions were very easy for my husband and myself. The price is perfect. Love it. Thanks Amazon. Diane C

The instructions indicate the base of this feeder will not fall over but ours did exactly that. We are sending it back to Amazon. Do NOT buy it and please don't waste your money on it. This is a horrible design that falls apart in no time.

While this has some interesting information about how and why certain foods are put into different drinks etc, it becomes boring almost immediately with the endless listing off names from history that make up these drinks. To me, each drink is more confusing then helpful, as a beginner in many respects.

I have the original model by this company and it is easy to install. A definite way of keeping your battery from swelling up like a balloon. My scooter has over 14,000 miles on it. This product seems well made and should last for many years. Price was very good....better than local discount stores. They will also ship if you purchase from their web site. Good deal... good value... happy consumer!!!

It takes a lot of strength to take my vitamins with all the pills and liquid. I just bought this at CVS in their vitamin section. It's more than twice the cost. The taste is pretty bad. Maybe some people like it, but it does not appeal to me personally. I've also lost faith that anything good or natural will actually work for me. I'm going back to pills. You may love these, though, if you are one for chemical concoctions. Or maybe a multivitamin. This ain't it.

I have a lot of allergies and this is the only brand I've found that gets through my allergy season. It tastes great, too. I'm an Amazon Prime member so it was shipped free 2 day with Prime. Great stuff! Will never buy any thing else.

The idea of a book about how to change your habits is an appealing one. However, because people don't tend to implement the ideas in this book immediately, I guess that they didn't do it before reading it, because their lifestyle hasn't changed. Some might argue that's good, but when it's been years and you've still have the same habits, you really can't get something out of this.

My daughter received this for her 3rd birthday and it was one of the absolute worst christmas gifts. The sounds just didn't come together. She loved to take turns being Minnie Mouse or some other character. That lasted 1 day. I would have returned it, but we threw away all our packing material, so, we're stuck with it. It has very good battery use - my daughter's play hours are mostly car rides. If she likes anything, it's playing with it. So what do you do.
This is really a small book. I just took it out of the package and read about 1/2 so I have not had time to put much into it. But it looks interesting.

These cartridges are easy to install, they work very well, no complaints. I'll order these again. No problems at all with these. I'm sure that we'll be continuing this purchase. Thanks again. Robert B.
This is a very good choice for a long time owner of the Dell Laptop. I'm very happy with it, and would recommend it.

The first 5 are so good that I bought the set. This one is not too bad but the book left me wondering if the author just doesn't like cats or something. And there was no plot. There wasn't much character development, you know they meet, she's a nurse and he gets her an IPAD, how do all of them work at this job with nobody bothering them. Just did not have any substance. No great romance either.

I have a very small head so I was really glad to find something adjustable as my husband is getting bald patches on scalp which don't affect his hair. However, it did not fit snugly like one would expect of the "Flexcare Men's Scalp Support. The top comes past where you are supposed to, and in trying it both ways, there just aren't enough holes for proper compression across that area.

I love this product! It's great on the dogs and cats too! Its smell isn't too strong or overwhelming. My only complaint is that I'd really like to find it in a bigger container, but other than that its great! :)

This was a total waste of money. There is barely any story and not all that much action. The pictures are nice though. I didn't like the fact there were so many animals in this one, it just confused me, because most kids read to have one simple story. In my opinion it's okay for them but maybe not, I'd say. Maybe older teens who don't need such long stories would enjoy it; but as an adult I find it boring.

This movie is by no means for the kiddies. The special Effects are pretty poor and there is nudity. Not recommended to children under 14 years, even then I think it's a bad show since there's too many nudity scenes. They should have left out most of it and cut down on the violence. If anyone would want a good action movie let them buy Total Recall or Ghost Protocol. For those who like horror movies...try House Of Wax instead. That one was really good.

I have a very active little dog (Havanese/German Shepard mix) whose favorite thing is to destroy anything that comes his way. He destroyed this in less than half an hour. The seams tore within the hour so he was able to get at whatever it was. Very disappointed and cannot recommend purchasing it. It might interest kids who are destructive or dogs with strong teeth but not for aggressive chewers. :(

It seemed to work ok at first, had a large pool in the yard. The problem started when it got cold enough for me to put on my wet suit (it is not water proof but waterproof). When I take off from work, I am required by law to run back and forth 15 minutes while keeping up with chores. So as instructed, we waited until after work. We kept running around the pool. At times there would be 2-3 inches of standing water.

The first book was ok and kept me interested enough to keep reading. This latest one has really disappointed me!! Just boring! Where is the action that I loved so much?! It could have been a good story if there had actually been any action!!! Very disappointed.

After a few listens and reading many reviews, i realized that all these people who were talking big money are just plain ignorant people. I'm actually quite shocked how some of them say there albums are amazing. Come on.

I enjoyed the book. However, it was obvious that all of a sudden he wrote his last 3 years. He is not giving credit where its due. So I really wanted to give this book 5 stars for what it was. But I just couldn't. If you read other reviews they are saying there were too many stories about him and not enough on his life without God. That pretty much sums up my thoughts. But if that's ok with you, then it should be fine too.
Great product! This is the third time that I have ordered this and never had a problem. It's a must buy.

I have had two sets of these speakers. Both speakers are extremely underpowered. If you want to hear a song in good quality, don't buy this speaker. You can get speakers with better sound quality for less that this product. The speaker design is very sleek and elegant though. Too bad the product just plain sucks!They looked great, but unfortunately they didn't perform well. To start off with, it doesn't match up well on my desk top,looks ugly next to it.

Well, it seemed a good price on this and I figured 'what do you have to lose'?The product is fine, nothing wrong with it, but the listing has absolutely no indication of "Not for shipping" which renders almost half my ordered items unable to be used by me because they're non-returnable. Now I'll look elsewhere if there are any related products offered at such great deals.
The first camera we purchased was excellent but this one came to us defective in two ways.1. It would lock up after several shots (and then go on a mission to recover - uninstalling everything, etc).

I had no problems with the seller, and we received this product quickly..however, it is not worth it...as other reviewers have said its hard to clean, and the design does wear off. And yes, mine broke after a week. Do yourself a favor, use your money for something worthwhile like this. Our son was very disappointed in this, especially given how much these go for, you get what you pay for!
This thing worked fine for 3 months when you plug in earphones. Then one stopped working.

I'm sorry I bought this. The sound is great but the earpiece falls out of your ear constantly. It doesn't seem to have anything that securely attached it in place so they fall out. You spend so much time adjusting them you lose all feeling and quality due to that. If you're just looking for a phone then this will do fine. But if you're really into music go with one without head phones. You'll feel so lost when trying something new. Also, it's not compatible w/ Itunes.

I purchased this book to help me get back into reading for a while. I'm glad others had different experiences than me, but from what I've read on Amazon, there are just too many mistakes in the text. You have to believe that they spell all of their words correctly, sometimes it's hard to tell. In addition, at times when I see errors, I wish he clarified whether or not you can make them yourself if you're unable to find another speller. He doesn't even list it anywhere. My advice, don't buy it.

Don't buy these. I used them as replacements for speakers that are now blown out after 6 months. They did sound good while they lasted. The highs were crisp and clear, the mids not too heavy, but a bit muddy. Then about 2 weeks later, when plugged into an Aux jack, suddenly it got louder. A lot louder, in fact much louder than before. There is no way to adjust this. All you can do is turn down either side or both of them.
Product worked great to replace old battery. The instructions were in poor English however, once figured out it's simple enough to replace.

I was expecting a quality product after reading the great reviews. Well it's not that great. I'm still looking for good leather cases. Very disappointed. Wouldn't waste my money on this one again. Not even real leather. More like plastic.

The product did not seem to perform as described. I used it once and am still unable to get my screen clean. There is always something stuck in the corners of it from being removed so many times. All this after a very long time. It was difficult trying to clean out all the junk that gets trapped up there. If you have more than one computer use different products. For me there were better options with cleaning cloth included. These were only about $2 each. Do not buy! 
 Rating: 1.
Very pleased with how fast shipping was. The Anker Astro Mini 3000mAh Portable Charger does everything advertised.

The mouse does not work with the new PC. After several attempts to figure out how to program, it was not even close to working. My grandson had no interest in returning it, so, I gave it away as a gift just for something to occupy my hands. Sorry Amazon, that is why we buy from Amazon!

If you're interested in an alternate version of Sherlock Holmes, then this is the right book for you. A number of great stories are featured here. The inclusion in this collection were definitely more interesting than the short stories. Many classic Holmes characters came to life through these stories, and while they weren't exactly what I remember, I'm glad that Conan Doyle helped put some new pieces together. Well written story, but not as good as a typical story would have been. As always, Mr. Cumberbatch can act.

Although I can't tell from the pictures on Amazon, this item shipped with a couple of small scratches. It's not really noticeable and doesn't affect performance in any way, but I didn't expect that it might look as though there's been one dropped at some point. Other wise, the product is great.
The shipment was quick however, the price of this product could be lowered as well.
The top was way to big for my neck size so I had to give it away because of that but then you cannot adjust it.... not what I expected :(

I bought these for my 3 year old who is learning to read and write letters so that she can spell words/letters. They are really not made well, they don't stick well together. Plus the stickers come off very easily because of glue or whatever it is. We only have them in our fridge now. Waste ofmoney :(
These are not good ear protectors I have used foam ones that cost half as much and were better then these waste of money.

I had no idea who this author was and while the story isn't bad as fantasy goes, for me none of the characters are very likable or well-developed. The one character is actually quite nice, but her backstory at start of plot doesn't make sense to me. If she came off a bit too trusting than maybe something else would have surprised me, like what happened after they left Earth.

My father has owned the previous version of this model for over 3 years. Recently he needed to replace a part that we bought along with it. His unit started sounding odd and now won't turn on. He is very disappointed in it after using it so much.

This was a gift for my girlfriend who had this on her wish list. She loves the design and looks very sharp. I will definitely look here again. The packaging they gave is pretty good also. A little disappointed that these came from China.

I gave it away to someone else. Will not come in the mail any more as did mine last year. Have no clue how these people get anything good on line that is priced that much or more. Thanks anyways for taking mine! :-( Don't let them steal your money from you either!!!!

If you like to be taken on a wild journey into the mind of characters in this book, read it. But if you're looking for an inspirational story with solid Christian principles and character development, skip it! It is shallow at best and preachy. It's not even well written. The author would have done better to research some real stories instead. This book reads like it was written by a very poor romance writer. There are too many unbelievable aspects to make me recommend anything about this book.
This was a really quick read, about 50 mins. Each book is only 2-3 pages each. It's cute in all aspects however. Can't complain. For $2.
This mug does say "Made In China" though.

I had high hopes for this product from all the reviews. Unfortunately it proved to be a dud. It only works intermittently with my Nexus 5. My other charger connects and charges fine when connected. All devices plugged into that are either 2 year old phones, or Galaxy S3. So I'm not sure what happened but it's going in the trash as soon as possible. A bit overpriced even if you got free shipping. Returning it.

As I was taking my last round of antibiotics, every time another would come on the next day, I would have to take them again. The side effects were horrible in about two weeks, until we came across our dog with some severe infections. Her eyes looked awful, she had massive sores all over and the little pounces that kept getting stuck in her throat just became too painful.

Was not at all what I expected, would never buy again from this brand. Product was poor quality. Do yourself a favor do some research and don't be fooled by the great reviews these products have received. Don't fall for it. Go to your local Best Buy or another store like that with better quality items. Then shop Amazon. Your always safe, just pay more money and get it done right the first time. But if you were planning on buying such items in which Amazon is an authorized dealer good luck there.

Did not work. I had to spend over $60 for the genuine HP printer and refill kit that works well after spending much of my time trying unsuccessfully and then buying this non-OEM cartridge as a last ditch attempt at saving $$. Lesson learned-- do your homework! This product is junk and if you see "HP4200XL' on it's label in any way, don't make me call tech support.... there are MUCH better options out there.

Bought new in a sealed box from Best Buy. Works well, the suction doesn't hurt my carpets and it cleans up real well too. I wouldn't have spent this much money for something that works better than others I've seen. But it's very cheaply made for a $350 vacuum. The hose is coming off. The plastic handle popped out when adjusting it, and there's dust all over it. Just bought another brand (which I'm happy with). This one's back at Walmart... :( Oh well.   Rating: 2.
Easy setup...worked as soon as we plugged them in. They came with everything needed including batteries!!! Would purchase again.......much appreciated as they are great for accent lighting.

We needed lots of small, black containers to match our color scheme. For years we used plastic containers, but they began to leak or break and were hard too clean. These are perfect! It's a perfect size for individual lunches.

This book is an excellent introduction to the concepts of functional programming. The examples are very well done. However, this text was poorly edited and for some reason several pages have extra white space printed on them. It's really annoying when page turns take 5 minutes because you can't read it. So all in all a poor edition. Too bad as I bought it as new but no help with problems solved by my professor or publisher. Would love another edition which has been edited.

The product was supposed to be wireless but I can only use the keyboard in complete darkness. It takes two AAA's, which is very annoying. As much as I'm paying for this keyboard, it should at least have Bluetooth. Not a bad product, just not exactly what I needed. My new Dell laptop now has Bluetooth, so hopefully I'll find a use to this.

I haven't used this pan yet as it hasn't been purchased. I'm pretty confident the weight of the pan, is light enough for me to easily lift and put in oven. The coating looks good so far. However - the design does not look like how it shows. That's okay, just don't expect to get something similar to the picture.
It worked for me and I am in my late 50's with no health issues so i don't know how effective they are but everyone says the product is great. The delivery was on time.
I will keep it but a better picture of the actual product is what i hope for so that others can know exactly what they are buying before buying.

When I first heard about the release of this film on DVD in 2006 it had no reviews yet. In fact Amazon didn't even ship it. Since there wasn't any way to tell if they would do a review, I went ahead and got some popcorn so my wife could have home movie night. Well it's been released - we now own both versions which are very similar indeed.
Can't wait to continue reading.
I love it. It has great flavor, easy to make and the kids in my family always enjoy it. We will buy this brand again. Thanks!
Ordered replacement for rear turn signals while retaining front turn signals.
It's all right! A friend of mine had one that she bought at Macy's.

I was so happy to get back my favorite tea. I use it every morning. Then I used 2 bags and the tea came out almost clear. They were old, stale or something. Very disappointing that we can not recommend this particular brand. :( On top of that, it's a hassle if you have kids who drink milk from their cups. The only choice is one brand that's cheaper at the grocery store.
Excellent choice if you're looking for something that will allow you to use iPad as an e-reader, watch movies, etc.

These are not for your average 10 year old. My daughter uses a larger size and these were too small to fit comfortably around her nose. Very cute, and just about right size, I would say. But they dont work on my 7 years old... :-) Cute, but don't be fooled by the pictures.

This is a powerful yet quiet vacuum. It makes cleaning the stairs an absolute breeze. The tools all work great but there are two issues:-You have to be careful with attaching the brushes they can get tangled if you over-extend.-Cleaning accessories like dusting bags and filter must not scratch or damage surfaces when emptying. I clean by hand so it was OK for me. Overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase. I've always hated using attachments on cleaners as it ends up damaging surfaces.

Like most of the products that I've purchased from Anazon, this one was terrible. Within a few weeks it wouldn't work and I returned it. This also happened to 2 other products. Do yourself a favor -- don't go cheap on headphones or accessories. They break at some point so you might as well just buy them right away. That's what I'm going to try next! Hopefully, these will fare much better. It isn't worth ordering any more because they'll surely be junk. Very disappointing. 
 Rating: 1.
They sent me a regular one instead of the correct one. So I did not get to use it. The picture here is very misleading.

I got this book as a Christmas gift because it's the only one out that is for dogs of all sizes. My dogs are 7 and 10 pound Yorkies mix. They have plenty room in here but it can barely even stand up- the bottom where they sit doesn't lie flat enough to make laying down comfortable. So, what you get when you buy 2 or 3 books from this company is pretty disappointing. I'm sure my Yorkie will like it, she's already shown she likes it.

It met our needs at a fair price. The device fits firmly in the case with openings that match up to controls. The stand works well. However it only supports horizontal or vertical viewing. To use as shown I have got to lie down on top of it.
Looks nice, accurate (consistently) scale, large enough area for two persons, doesn't go through expensive batteries. Definitely worth it! Very pleased!

I had this for a few months now. It's not too bad but the design of it makes coffee spilling when you are pouring out your coffee. I've learned to pour slowly so as not to spill over on my stove top. Also, if I'm ready before all the water is boiling, then putting in coffee grounds seems like it's taking longer than waiting until everything's boiling. I'd say it gets hot enough though. All and all, good cheap kettle. Does what its supposed to.
My first impression when getting this pillow was it's too small than expected. It turned out smaller than i thought. But after using in bed, my wife says she love this pillow. It's really soft.

This is the one DVD I've purchased I feel completely ripped off. To say that you get four workouts in a bundle with three of them being short is very deceptive. A great many workout DVDs on other sites sell these three for about $5.00. The third and fourth are identical if not duplicates as they show only one exercise every couple minutes. Very unethical.

This was just what I needed to replace my broken one. Had it for years and now the bottom is chipped due to a cup hitting it. No real problems with this so far. The only thing that might cause some trouble during installation if you don't have everything aligned exactly right (not sure who makes these things) would be to use silicone sealer (blue or green/red)on your lips prior to drilling anything in order to prevent leakage.

I love this product--it works much better than the liquid detergent we were using. Our clothes are clean, and they smell clean. The package also arrived in good condition--less than a week from ordering.

I bought this book along with the "The Secret Formula for Getting What You Want." After reading it, it turned out that this woman is just another egoist, and no one can do magic to get things they want. She does make statements such as, if you try hard enough, it's possible. But she doesn't say how hard, or even what effort you have to make.

When I plugged it into my ipod, the ipod stopped charging. After a few minutes, tried to jiggle the connection and only made things worse. The connectors aren't firmly in place. A complete dud. Do not waste your money- cheap Chinese crap. Even if they worked, they'd probably last about 5 minutes. Don't even think of using them with an iPad, they break from slight movement. Very dissappointed that Amazon is selling these. And now I'm stuck having purchase another cable now.
i was looking for a replacement cover for my cell phone and ordered this one, it looks nice but the color fades from day 1 - very disappointed..

I loved the design of this bag but it wasn't durable at all. Within 2 months the stitching on the handles had started to break and within three months, there was a giant hole in one side. It's super cute looking out side though, just be aware if you buy it, you'll probably have to replace it. It wouldn't last long outside either, with any wind, snow or rain coming inside or even being carried around while closed. If i were you, i'd go for something that is more sturdy before buying this.

This thing is so terrible my cats wont go near it. It takes up like half the table and they are fighting over it all the time. Oh well..... I had to throw a few of them away! :( if anyone knows of something that works let me know.. or any cat food ideas just tell me!!
Nothing new here, nothing special.
I have not actually used anything in this pack, to rate it beyond that, but everything was as described. It came quick too.

I had this for several months and it made great coffee until one day the motor refused to start. Had it serviced in August - that has fixed it. But now when we make 3 cups of coffee, its only half full as is doesn't really fill the pot at all with the water used during brewing, so by the time you finish it, your cup is not even warm.

The plot was good, but the language felt stilted. It looked like a rough translation, with many misspellings and words left out entirely. Also, why does everyone call him an idiot? For example, it is explained that he's been doing drugs all his life, except when he needs to get his "rocks" - which he says are because of how people were supposed to do drugs, in other words. So much for being smart.
My laptop works great with this battery.
Great price and fits my laptop perfectly. The only thing I don't care for is there is no pouch to hold the power cord. However, that's a minor issue.

This device works fine on the first USB connection, but won't reliably connect to my network from another computer. I should have read all of the bad reviews. Do not buy this. Mine is going back. At least it didn't cost much. It isn't worth your time or frustration. Buy a better device. I've been trying for over an hour, and still can't get this thing working reliably. Very poor product quality.

The idea is to bring together a family that lives in the Boston area from various points of view. From the viewpoint of those who worked at the time (there's an awful lot of names, including people from New York City) it's more like historical fiction. This part reads much faster than your average novel and you get absorbed into it very quickly as you're not used to that.

What a wonderful story, how many people do you know that have the same type of luck and it works out for them. It has some really good laughs which can be found in her other books. I enjoyed reading about a girl who is so different from everyone else she comes across as real because thats what we all are. Everyone needs a little magic to make life better, love or money. Its such a sad story but it's written by an amazing talented woman with great talent.
This was perfect to use on our boat during a vacation.

I don't know which version is on this CD but one thing seems certain, the recording was made from a bad live performance. And it's even said to be in mono, so if you're looking for stereo or multichannel music you won't find it here. In fact, as a bonus we hear that all three songs played are by different bands. However, these versions sound much better than other studio recordings.

The concept of this item is great. It would look beautiful in a garden with the different colors. However, it doesn't stay on properly and it's too short. I'm guessing after they see how short it is, most will start to think twice before putting anything under it. They should also add some "fingers" so that you don't have to hold your plants back while trying to open it, especially if there are kids running around.
Excellent story. If you are not Christian don't skip this movie. Very Inspirational to the extent that after finishing it I could feel like we should do everything according to God's plan.

The CD was purchased with some excitement because of my great admiration and respect for the composer Richard Strauss. This piece will only be added to his huge catalog as a musical disaster. It is utterly devoid of drama or passion. No passion at all. I would say more about this but Amazon just won't allow me to. One can only presume that Strauss's music did not inspire these performers who should be ashamed of themselves. This really shows poor judgment on behalf of Amazon.

I purchased this product and it took FOREVER to get it. Once i received the package in tact i opened the packaging when they said use a credit card to flatten out protector. I didn't do anything special only put on protector so that is how things began getting scratched up (yes i know its my fault but come on) after about 2 days you would still here bubbles everywhere. As for screen quality good as expected.

I'm a big fan of historical mysteries, but have found the best ones are usually those which set their books in current times (although these can still be very good too), with plots based on current events and characters who might live today, so there is much to learn about them. The Last Templar was just too unbelievable for me.

This is a cheap product. The little tabs that hold the pages closed broke within days of getting it in my drawer. Not nearly strong enough to really protect your records. Spend the money and get something more rugged.
My wife ordered 2 sets because she liked them. She loved them until both broke after about 6 weeks!!! They started coming apart on side edges.
This did not last as long as an item should be expected to.

No matter what I did it wouldn't charge my ipod when it's plugged up to the wall. It would just stay on and never change anything. Didn't help much in the car either... Not worth it. Buy a different brand.

Very poorly constructed and no screws to hold the doors on, just plastic tabs on each door. They don't stay up very well. Also when you open it, I was a bit worried that something inside this box would fall out of place etc. It seems like it would break if we tried opening it. You can get alot better cases for much more money at local retail stores. We really wish we'd bought those cases.
This case fits snug on my Nexus 7, while easy to take off. Provides great protection at all angles including propping up your tablet vertically (as pictured).

I bought this for a friend. She had been using my old HP Photosmart C6280 All-in-One Printer, so far works well. The photo prints her very nice, and the color in photos is awesome. It arrived promptly from Amazon, however, they failed to deliver any paper or paperwork with it. When you call customer service there are two choices, one that takes up hours, which results in long hold time, another to put someone else through the same frustrating process.

I got this router last year and just about the first time I used it with my HP laptop, in the middle of an online lecture, it went into a reboot loop. My internet connection would go bad again for awhile after that but wouldn't actually restart. About 5 minutes later when connected to the other router, everything is fine again. This weekend was just like every other weekend, which makes it frustrating because if you bought it, then return it. The warranty says 1 year, but you're on your own.
Very bad quality. It did not fit the keyboard it was advertised with and ended up going in the trash. I threw out this product.
This tablet works really well so far.
I love the way it feels when I use it. It really moisturizes my face. It's a bit expensive, so it's nice to buy a three-pack.

I was looking for a low cost printer that would last and not jam....the Brother HL2270DW has been excellent after one month use. My only complaint is that there are no drivers from HP included. There isn't even an option to install the software on USB connected devices. Overall great product but wish it had more features. Like a built-in fax, copy utility etc.

I read this book from front to back last night and only really enjoyed reading parts of it. It is a little sad that the author put out this book. Maybe as he writes more his stories will improve. However, I didn't like it that much, although the plot was interesting. It's not something you would usually come across but it's what some people call "true love". It's also written in an interesting way. My advice is, if you're interested buy it.

I loved this book, then again and still do. Unfortunately the writing has been edited down to something like a low grade Harlequin romance. It's too bad, because it's an interesting look into what it was really like. My favorite character is Captain of the Guard Major General John Bell Hood. He made America great not only during his lifetime, but after. But now he sits in one of FDR's White House offices, surrounded by papers on many topics including who stole what from whom. A real American hero.

The game is fun, even for 2 years old. BUT - after one year of playing this game, every time I go to turn it on the screen goes blank or comes up with an error message. It's always happens when you need to put in a memory card which takes forever. It also freezes and sometimes don't let us proceed at all. Then I've been having trouble loading games onto my DS. When that happens, they ask why we want to change something.

The first time I pulled a bag of litter out the mesh ripped right off as well as my arm. We were on our way to clean it and ended up using towels for pooper scooping. Never even got through one use. Definitely not worth purchasing!!!

I've been using these batteries for years and never had to replace them. The original are good also. We have a lot of wireless devices in our home so we go through lots of batteries. These are far more durable than any other brands. They're just as described. Great price too. I would certainly purchase again when needed. Thank you.

The charm is cheaply made. It breaks pretty quickly. You get what you pay for. Wouldn't recommend it. But since we can't see them online you have to buy just one. Wish they were real beads like the others. Really bad buy.
Its an ok soap. Leaves skin soft and clean.

I was using an old one with only 2gb of space that gave up after a few year because then it started acting strange and not being recognized. When I upgraded to this new one, in addition to the added capacity, my camera has worked so great, it's much better, clearer than before.

A lot of people have stated that their batteries did not fit, but I had no trouble getting them to clip into place. They are a very inexpensive way to get more power out your phone, especially if you don't want it on all the time as they charge fast. The only downside is that the contacts do occasionally need changing, and that is why there aren't any fifth stars. It's cheaper than buying an official phone battery or making sure it's kept charged every night by removing it at night.

These seem like fun toys, but they fell apart very quickly and you can easily pull each one apart. Great idea if only these were made well. For what they're being sold, it's ridiculous that you're basically paying $1 per toy.
The remote is much smaller then expected, and doesn't even work. Not worth returning so I'll keep it, thank you.

I ordered the one with two batteries, so when my other battery died while traveling and was in need of recharging, this is what i used for backup. It charges quickly - quick enough that you can be sure you've charged it fully before leaving on a trip. Charging time appears to take about 1 1/4 hours from zero. The charger shuts off automatically after 7 hours, or until you turn it back on.

This is one of the better tasting coconut waters out there. It has a very good flavor- not watery or over-sweet. The price here on Amazon was reasonable so I definitely recommend this brand. It's great in smoothies and cocktails! And no added sugar just natural flavor! :)
This Coffee isn't bad at all. It was just what I'm looking for! The flavor reminds me much more of French Breakfast instead of coffee.
I've been using this for many months. Although it's more expensive at the price now (around $18), it is still one of my favorite lip balm choices.
Love them. Easy install.
The movie is excellent - I've seen all 3 parts at least 10 times.

great product.........works great, easy to change the oil. Would like one a little longer. It will work just fine with my mower. Easy start no problem with start. I would recommend it. Delivery was very fast! Thanks so much.

I purchased this book to use the recipes for preparing my own baked goods. The first recipe that came up on google was a bread pudding. I've never made any pudding in my life, much less from scratch. It's not even an ingredient in this recipe; however, it is the name of the cake mix and there are directions with it. Why add baking powder when making pudding? If you're looking for recipes, you won't find them.
This little appliance was purchased with a gift card from My wife and Daughter. It arrived well packed by Amazon. All that happened when opening the box was one plug went bad.
As is usual when using any device, don't listen first before you try it out on your pet.

There is no need to be a moron and ask if you can change his mind. If there's one thing this man does not have is common sense. I don't know what people are giving this album 5 stars for. He's got some great ideas, but he cannot execute them with any kind of talent. He sounds like just another washed up, wanna be, artist trying to make it in the music business. Listen before you buy. I'm sure Eminem has had more success than him. It's an obvious ploy by Shady Records.

I can accept Mr. Grisham's departure from his usual formula (lawyer/client is not happy with lawyer, attorney tries to protect client; lawyers are in disagreement). But.....the plot was predictable, and it read much like a book you might pick up at Barnes & Noble. I finished it, that's probably because I'm stubborn about finishing what should be an easy read.

I am a big fan of the Sookie Stackhouse books, and thought that was what this book was. It wasn't. It's basically about vampires. For starters, she makes friends with 3 vampires, but then they turn her against them. They kidnap her, drag & threaten her, tell lies to each other, try tricking her. When there's trouble she's the only one who comes out. The plot goes along like this. People die, people are killed, characters go missing.
This book needs an editor. It really needed some serious proof reading and/or proofing. It's not hard work but putting out something that isn't free would have been nice.
I'm very happy I purchased this. It works great and was easy to assemble. My neighbor saw the product and started getting one.

It was not what I expected. They are very small. Very cheaply made. Not worth the $ or postage you might spend for delivery. It would be good to see this item at a store before ordering if money is an object. If it's a gift, it will sit in one end until opened. There were no measurements given. In spite of these drawbacks, my granddaughter likes them. All items listed on site had size indicated. However, they did not all meet that description. Just wish there were!!. She doesn't complain.

First off, the product I received was not a Motorola OEM replacement battery, but rather an "after-market'. Second, my phone does NOT recognize this battery. My original battery still can be charged if its plugged into AC or USB, and it holds several days' charge now, whereas after installing this battery.......NOTHING. It will say 'Battery Low for Charging' on screen but nothing charges. This is pretty much worthless. I'm sure it's going to go back.

I got this hoping to use it in my car but there is no way to adjust the volume of both speakers together. The sub woofer puts out a low hum on any sound except bass and when listening to music its even worse. As soon as you power down or switch inputs, the audio goes completely dead. You must unplug all sources simultaneously just for these two speakers. Just to be clear, we turned off every other device using my computer while turning those off.
The cabinet was delivered with missing parts but not too bad at all. A few minutes and some duct tape fixed that.
Great for the money! Works well in a single home and would definitely buy it again if i needed to. And you have to do that with other filters too! :)

Do not spend money on this product. Although I have used the first of two cartridges, my printer does not recognize it as a new cartridge. It keeps telling me to replace the cartridge, even after replacing it. This is such an inferior product and no where near being worth what they're asking. Buyer beware.... You are better off paying more for one from Canon. Even though it's less expensive, you will save tons in gas by purchasing your cartridges directly from them.

I found these not only did they give me the worst heartburn, but my intestines would feel as if acid was spilling out.....i tried them for over a week with no help from amazon.com. These will go in my trash where it belongs....and that is probably where they belong. What a waste of money! Never again! Stay away, stay away! The main thing I got out of this book was to take note of the difference between a'market' and what an artist thinks a market could be. While the writing is fairly competent, it can not be taken as completely self-serving. It seems to suggest that if you give them enough money they'll keep coming, but they won't. There are some interesting ideas there, but they're scattered amongst the clunky writing.

This product was very low quality, and the " I love it...I'll never return it - we have to use these for school work..they were falling apart as soon as you took them out of the package. There had been no packing materials around them. Save your money on these! You're better off going through a classroom supply store for quality pencils. You can get at least ten times more bang FOR THE BUCK this way! We ended up buying pencils elsewhere.

It was hard to stay with and predictable. And I found myself rooting for the bad guys more than I did the good guys. A lot of characters were only marginally interesting. There is potential here, but it's not there yet in this novella. But that doesn't mean you shouldn't try it, it just means you're aware that what little writing you've come across by author John Connolly tells a great story, even if no one knows it. You might like his stuff better than I did.   Rating: 2.

I love the design and functionality of this product as all you do is connect to your device via bluetooth every now and then. The trouble is it doesn't work consistently with my phone when using skype, only works at most 10 out of 12 times..I've called customer support. They say they are "looking into it" but so far nothing has been resolved. Very frustrating. It's possible because there was not a good manual in packaging, might be different for non-iphone, just sayin.
Just ok. The dialogue is forced between characters.

My daughter loves and it is a wonderful quality product will buy again for giftsThe color matches her room well and she can take the bedding on trips as well. This is just what we wanted. It works really well on our bread machine.
Very short, and unimpressive. Seems a bit over written as well.
A very cute little book. My husband read it just before he died.

Great product for the money. Easy to use and clean up is a snap. Just be carefull as it does get really hot in use. I just wish there were more recipe options. Other than that it's a great toaster at a much better price then others that are very similar. Definitely would recommend this.

I loved the whole set. Great picture and nice sound. As usual with Samsung products all of them functioned properly. Would have been 5 stars but as others mentioned, for some reason it's difficult to adjust the volume. I'm giving 4 starts because of that. But overall, a great tv set - excellent price ($500), you can't get anything better at this price. Very good value. Amazon also shipped it out very fast.

We have owned a number of these chargers over the years, some are still going strong while others no longer hold the charge long enough. No issues with this purchase so far - we've had ours since January 2013 and it's June now and we use it almost every day.

You just can't get these to stick for anything. And if they are not very sticky why is the manufacturer advertising you can write on their stuff? There is so much glue that this product leaves a white film all over your item. I had about 20 pieces of paper and items of clothing that I attempted to put them on. It was almost like it never dried at all. The plastic seems okay but it's not working right. At least Amazon has a great return policy.

This is a poorly written and organized book. The index lists the chapter titles which only sort them by first name. However, I found three main problems. First, there was no organization at all. Each author had two paragraphs of notes, which weren't even linked to one another. They didn't make sense since they all mentioned different sources. The chapters were not listed in chronological order. Second, it seems like every other essay or paragraph contains some reference to, you guessed it, research.

I couldn't read this book. It was about a dysfunctional girl named Grace (that's my last name, not my mother's) and her best friend who had been involved in an accident (and got herself killed) three years earlier. That's when the story begins, but then moves forward to other characters that are mentioned throughout. The main character, Grace, is constantly wallowing over her death, always coming up with excuses she can get out of committing suicide. As another reviewer said, there were many times I wanted to slap her.

There are a number of good movies to be made about the British secret services. The movie "Stakeout" is an excellent example since it took place after September 11. Many people wonder what happened between that fateful day and September 11, however this film presents only some possible answers but never really gives us any answers. Even when we finally get two possible answers, both are unsatisfactory. But these seem like minor details so you won't care either.
As other reviewers have noted, this memoir does not present Mr.

I was really excited to hear that she had a new album but this one just has too much pop in it. Too bad cause there are some real good tracks, like "The Right Place", and the cover of Pink Floyd's "Money." But it just doesn't keep my interest long.
This book is a waste. It was clearly targeted to the right audience, and I must say that they are not even on speaking terms with those who are already left of center. I'm still in awe!!!!
This is an ok book. Nothing spectacular like other reviewers said.

No sense in giving it 1 star......but you have to at least give a one.....This book is so bad it's good it is written and designed for illiterates....The reason being, the author doesn't seem to know anything about real estate investments.......no understanding of market fundamentals or the math behind pricing........All he does are rip off other people's ideas...

I like the concept of these. Instead of, say, a simple plastic tube, you insert an empty bag into it, and then just tie it to your existing trashcan liner. The first one was destroyed by moths, or rather by ants which found their way inside while waiting for a new bait station when they noticed this bag.
the product does not work, in spite of changing cables, turning it on, etc... to no avail.i will return it. not worth the effort for a simple device like this.
Great movie as it always was in my past. I especially like the musical soundtrack. It is a funny one if you are not easily offended. A good escape movie! Thanks!!!!

There are better ways to learn a language than this. This is a bad idea that needs to be addressed and there should be a recall. I'm so disappointed when Amazon doesn't inform customers before selling them.
This was a cute book. I didn't think it had anything that would cause us to not be able to use the book in our home, but we did find some things out of date. Overall, good read for kids! :)

After my last vacuum which was not a bagged model, I decided it would be best if there weren't any bags to deal with when going out. The suction is OK and the features are more than adequate, but all those bag changes just seem impractical. If you don't care about emptying it, then I'm sure it's fine. For me, no thanks. I'll stick with bags. There seems to be, however, two design flaws that prevent me from recommending this vacuum.
The books were okay. I didn't really see anything new in them. I'm not sure what the point is. But they are ok.

I don't have any professional experience, all i know is that this thing works like a charm. The only downside to using wireless, you probably need better batteries, other than that, no problems at all.
I am a huge fan of both books and i loved this one however the ending just ended so abruptly like i couldn't believe it. But great book. Recommend it to people who love reading vampire books!

The first one I got was DOA as well. Returned it and just received my second unit. Again, after about 20 minutes of use, the video started glitching out, eventually fading in and out until nothing could be seen. The audio also cut out. You have to really push on the sides into each other while pushing them together for audio, a very poor design. This makes me feel that this is probably not even manufactured by the company or some knockoff...

I saw this at a show years ago. It has good music. The video quality is not the best in my opinion. But it's the band. And there aren't any other bands like that. There was more of a rock band, or punk. Maybe even some reggae influence. Overall, they were quite good. It's worth having if you're thinking about checking them out. Don't get yourself into it too much. If you really hate it, send me back your dvds. For now I can live with it.
Great product at a excellent price. It is very easy to apply and makes the screen clear. You may have some trouble with dust when applying.

After my Dell computer was damaged recently, I decided to invest in a netbook for travel. This is exactly what I needed. When you first turn it on there are no programs preloaded, but once you've got your internet information and email set up it's very easy to use. It has lots of storage space so that I've been able to keep most everything stored locally. The only thing I'm disappointed with is that the screen resolution isn't as sharp as I'd like or hope for....

It's nothing like the one seen at Walmart. Too small to even hold my cell phone! Do not buy! Also the shipping cost is ridiculous. I can go out and buy this type of "stickers" for a fifth as much in store

Works perfectly! Much quieter than an all metal one, has a nice light when it goes on and off. A really great product at the right price! We are going to have these in every bathroom of our home! Also easy for us since we no longer have a huge shower head! One happy person over here!
this little device works. i have an older ipod mini. and it works flawlessly, even with the extra rubber pieces that come in it. great product. no problems what so ever! well worth it!
This book is well written with some nice suspense in this mystery, which seems quite plausible.

Not worth a buck. Would not pay more for this. Was very disappointed. Read the other reviews before buying. This was written by an eleven year old. I have been reading all these years and this is garbage. Very little information about cats.
This little baby works awesome! I love it. It has made my time at the computer much more enjoyable for me. Thanks. Will buy this again.

This device looked good when I got it. Once you start driving at night, even with the headlights on, it's a real pain to see it in any sunlight. The only place bright enough is behind your rear view, but that can get difficult too. It's also awkward to mount and detach, no matter how careful an installer is. It looks neat and tidy as everything plugs into it. The main issue is, after two days, both devices stopped working.
I bought one of these products about a month ago, and have already thrown away both bottles. The first day that we put it on my dog, she scratched her neck excessively.

I bought this for my son's Ipod touch. It worked a couple months and then just died. For that kind of money, it shouldn't have such poor longevity! Now he has to order another one. What good is that? Just too expensive not to. Do yourself a favor and go with something else. This one certainly isn't worth the price.

Got this because the price was right. Unfortunately it did not get to me until May 5 so I can't really comment on how well they work in my vehicle. Upon inserting them into one of our vehicles, nothing worked and we couldn't even test these things. We tried several places around each other with same result. Don't waste your time ordering these. They are crap.

No reason to buy this except that you want all of the other movies because you like them too. It would have been better if they included a digital copy at least. But not including anything is actually worse than just having nothing on it. Not worth buying it either. I already own them. So don't waste your money. Buy a new disc for $10 instead. They say "release year 2010" but it's no longer relevant.

The idea of a "book on tape" is not a bad one, but this version fell very short in that respect. It read like someone had rushed it into print without doing any proofing or editing. Also, there are no diagrams to explain anything.

This book is a good read while commuting but not up to the authors first book. I gave this one away. It just didn't measure up. The characters are better developed in previous books. I would recommend reading it, especially if you are invested into the series. A fast read.
This water has no odor whatsoever once you get used to it. I've been using fountain fountains for a couple years now and they are usually quite smelly so I'm glad there is an alternative.

I think it's important to note that this book is a translation, not one written from the originals' point of view. To its credit, it does manage to stay fairly close to that original text in all parts and gives you enough information about how our family moved over there, without having to completely rewrite it. While I was at first, extremely dissapointed with some minor things left out, my husband liked it, especially since he knows nothing else about what happened between us when we are gone.
Maybe I just did not need this book, but it was over my head.
You can tell the actors were trying hard with this movie and are very good actors. However, it's just like going over old film footage from when I was child.

I bought the product to try and help with my cat's itchiness on her tail. It was an expensive bottle that you only get about 3 uses before it expires. Waste of money. Not one of the best in this series. It had too many words and phrases. But it's still a good read. I recommend. I'm looking forward to reading the next book to see what happens.

This was an amazing story, how wonderful it must have been. Even though there were some parts of the book which needed to be changed, I still felt that this story deserved a review. This is a nice addition to my small house collection. Just what I wanted, and at a great price. Thank you.
Great price on an awesome tool. I've used it for 2 years now and have zero complaints. I would definetely buy more Milwaukee tools from Amazon.

Just like the old saying goes: You get what you pay for. My unit went out less than two months after I bought it, so I'm not expecting it to work long term. That being said,. it's a piece of junk. I am completely disappointed by this. The first song has really good drums, but it ends up being a loud background of a synthesizer. I purchased this book to help me prepare for an upcoming test. The information is outdated, incomplete, and incomplete. Some of the materials are simply wrong. It often contradicts common sense when it comes to drug testing procedures. This book does not measure up to it's reputation. Save your money.

The quality of these goggles are very poor. Poor fit, poor eye seals, no real protection. They leak from around your eyes on every run. Do yourself a favor save up for good goggles, or at least invest in some decent masks before throwing money away.

I did a bunch of research on Amazon before selecting this camera. I've never heard of Sanyo before, but the reviews sold me -- lots and lots of them! So far, so good. The camera is beautiful looking, sleek, compact, takes nice pictures, seems to take good video, even when my older camcorder does not (don't ask how, but it always had trouble in dim light). I'm happy with it. HOWEVER, it was dead out of the box.

This book is very easy to read, but lacks the ability for a person who is interested in learning more about their own body and all it does to its user. It only tells you what the subject was like from birth. No info on diseases or treatments. A brief explanation of this "essence" would have been nice. Overall an interesting book. Some things were new information. I'd read more.

Ordered this after I realized I could not find my original cord. After reading reviews (thankfully many more then mine) about how cheap their products are made - guess what?! These aren't even close anymore.

No instructions included with this product. I went online to look for instructions, but there were none. Then after a few tries it finally worked. Also there are 2 little light bulbs around each socket. They do give it a lot of light, but they just blink if nothing changes even at full power. Even so one bulb died right away.
Smells like mint. The fleas on cat are gone, so no more fleas. Good product. But do read label. Just not enough mint!   Rating: 4.

I had high hopes for this book. Not only is it incredibly small and thin, but every single time you flip through the book, two sheets fall off each other. I purchased this product and it came with no instruction on how to use it. When I tried for a return they wouldn't refund my money because it was opened, although that wasn't indicated in the description. Not all the chargers are bad but I'm rating them so low only cause some of mine didn't work

He explains how he's going to use this experience for others too. At times, it seems as though some phrases or sentences were thrown together hastily.

I bought these as a replacement for the stock knobs on my '98 Honda Accord Sedan. When you pull them loose they seem like they're not going to get off. But once it takes some brute force and two people working together, the old ones just slip right back on. They feel kind of cheap, but all in all, they were cheap enough. So far, about 2 months later, both have started leaving rust streaks along their edges. It's very noticeable in certain areas.

The product was shipped and received timely. However, after three weeks of use, the back light completely stopped working. It is almost impossible to see in lower light. While driving at night it can be difficult for me with my failing eyesight. I will not purchase another one as this was priced very high. So I don't know if others have had luck or not. If you do then it would depend on how much time you expected them last before replacement.

I bought this product on December 5, 2012. However, the battery died already in March 2013. In May 2013 it was hard to charge - sometimes you had to press and hold but by July after 10 uses (I was listening for about 2 hours per day average) It started acting up. The bluetooth stopped working so music sounded like the speaker is blown. So no matter how much I try to fix it, it's useless. Don't buy this!
Excellent video quality. It is nice to be able to leave my laptop in charging dock while watching tv from bed.

This battery's "memory" has completely died. It works perfectly now, if you have to reboot your phone, otherwise it'll be dead in no time - even under light use.

After about half of the book was read, I had to force myself to keep plowing on. The storyline seemed interesting but the writing style and character development left a lot to be desired. It's not even worth it if it's free.

Easy to use and makes excellent coffee. Very easy to clean. I am not very fond of the permanent filter design, but otherwise it is fine. I bought the book thinking that it would have photos of all of these different areas and some tips on how to visit. The book is more like a photo album. So it's not super specific or detailed but if you're looking at just spending several days in one area like I've done, you can get an idea where you will want to go.
I'm really unhappy with this product. I bought one for myself last year.

Don't waste your money on this. I purchased and returned it within 3 days. It was bulky and didn't really work well. You couldn't find a good angle for the phone so the audio kept cutting out. We recently had a dog die of kidney failure and have noticed lots of loose stool in general. One thing I know is that the dogs are not always hungry. This is not one of my favorite books; it really missed the mark in my opinion. A couple starts off liking each other but by the end they are both too happy to spend any pages together. They also didn't go out very often.

I have not seen much of the new movie in many years. However, like most people, I've read about some parts of it. This latest version that I've viewed was pretty good. So, on that matter one can still get away with some exaggerations.
The story is very dark so you should be ready for it. Having said that, this particular edition, while well-bound and printed, has some typos.

First read "The Great Gatsby!," loved it and wanted more after that! Couldn't wait to get started on a new classic. I thought this would be like the last book that put me back to reading. This book is an interesting read for anyone interested in the early days of NASA. The book was not my favorite. I am a fan of Alan Bellows, but after reading this book, it left me feeling like i already knew more. And that isn't necessarily a bad thing. Overall it's worth reading, and even if you aren't as "inspired" by the read, or as excited about Mars Rover, you should think long and hard before sending your money to NASA instead just so they can build more giant telescopes.

Don't buy this product! I have owned these for less than a year and the left channel has completely died. The quality of the paper is very good. I purchased it to go with another set that has a much bolder color. Although this isn't as dark, it's still bright. I got this book because the title made it seem interesting. In fact after reading several pages of it i just could not find any interest in it.
