Very well written book but nothing earth shattering. It did put into perspective what you need in order to succeed on your first trip.

You know it's a good movie when it has the words "I feel dirty" scrawled in large block letters on its DVD cover so you'll know what to expect. How can I put this? When they first made this film, they had NO idea which kind of audience was watching. A very young pre-teen girl. The adults will be embarassed by their crude humor. If you need proof, go see it. As for me, I'm putting it back and don't plan to watch any more movies with Bruce Willis.

This is a great concept, but the execution leaves something to be desired. I really enjoy using my old Braun with it's variable speed control and easy cup design, so I thought it would work as well on this new machine. It doesn't. You have to make 3 or more cups of coffee in order for enough hot water comes out (and who only wants their coffee warm?) to cover all your cups. That means making 4 cups, or more, if you want HOT coffee.

Bought this for my son's new iPod touch 4G! Fits perfect. It covers the entire front but also has a raised edge around it so if you lay your ipod flat on a surface there's extra protection between the screen and table. Doesn't affect any functionality. It's clear with black in it, looks nice w/ white ipod. Comes w/clear film to protect from scratches. Good product!
My granddaughter loves this! And she says that no matter what size pizza you make, it comes out perfect. Thank you.

I was very disappointed to find out that this book is poorly written. The writing style seems amateurish and contrived. While the information itself seems interesting, its delivery leaves a lot to be desired. Overall, I'm only giving it 1 star because Amazon does not allow zero stars. My recommendation is skip this book. You can get more info on various sites for free. I will probably never do business with amazon.com ever again.

This book is very outdated - no mention now of modern technology or even the use of the internet. The most glaring error (and I realize that this isn't a big deal to some) was on page 13 in Chapter 7 when it called for an index listing both books of which I've read. After reading it, I'm not sure why they included this. Very hard to follow along. I would recommend just going online if you don't mind making the time to do some searches yourself. You'll be glad you did.

This was a very nice looking and sounding case to carry my new iPad 2 on vacation. When I got home, though the snap broke off. The cover part still stays closed so I'm not too concerned about it but something that is made out of plastic should be more durable especially for $40.

Perfect replacement cord for our little mini pinscher who chews through anything that moves too quickly as his teeth get older. We haven't had any problems with the cord, its like having two dogs in one, lol

Purchased one and it worked ok for a month of normal use. About 3 months after the purchase, though, the mouse button ceased to function. Contacted Amazon customer service as instructed by Logitech, who were extremely accommodating - I explained that while my product was still under warranty they could send me new one, however it would have to come directly through Logitech. Got this replacement mouse, just to find out two weeks later it's also not working.
I love TPU cases because they absorb shock.

It doesn't really work well. The cover is very hard to remove. I had a problem with it sticking on the iPad because when trying to remove the first time and there was some kind of grease or dust that made bubbles. Second time, after placing case on, still have this problem. Not happy about it, would not recommend it. In addition, my ipad slips out easily. There are two pieces where the magnets are, one magnetic closure for cover, other holds cover.

The price on this is way too high - as with the other books in this series, you could get quite a lot for your money (maybe half price) at another book site or even from an eBay sale for less. If you're already having trouble falling asleep, go to "sleep by 7pm." It's also not worth buying this book; it won't help.

Got the book from Amazon this morning. I was in an emergency so didnt open it but after only reading a few pages of it, realized its a really awful book. Not informative at all. This is mostly fluff with no useful content. You can find all your info on line or free just by googling. Save your money. It will be more than worth it. Don't buy this book. Its way over priced for what you get and nothing that won't help you.
Very pretty salt shaker. We use ours on our stove as well as, with family cooking. Great product. Bought two sets of them.

I tried to get my money shipped back from Amazon, but there was no available option for it. It's cheap and flimsy junk. What really bothers me is, this is supposed to be an "amazon prime product- fulfilled by Amazon." How does that happen? Did somebody think of stealing some money. In order to protect your reputation as a reputable company in the digital age, you need to do better than this. This product came broken out of it's packaging.

I could not put my faith into this book. The plot had no substance. The characters were so boring and self absorbed that I just did not care what happened. It made me angry to read the story. She loves her husband above everything, has a child out of wedlock, but still goes back for each new love interest! Why can't she keep herself focused? The whole book felt like an old woman's fantasy about being in London.

Bought this product only to discover the camera didn't work. We returned it to amazon and tried another one with no luck. Finally got a refund from Amazon. Good price, but I guess you get what you pay for. Spend $20 more for an actual canon product.
My mom read this series and we both have enjoyed them. Can't wait for more. Love the characters. Worth reading. Enjoy

This is the same type of thing that we see in South America these days. Just put a new cover on and sell it as something special. I want to return this book at once, because it's not what I'm looking for. What am I supposed to do with it? You tell me how much you think Amazon will charge me, that's fine. Will buy my own guide from someone else.

I purchased this for my father who has vision issues. It seemed a little flimsy, but was sturdy enough to be able to see the digital readouts. Good product. You don't need two hands any longer just 1 and 1 is enough.
This is a very nice cover. Not cheap at all.
I'm glad he did as most womens jeans/pants do shrink.
My older golden retriever loved having me clip some of his regular toys into the holder because he liked feeling so big when they come out.

This product works great with my Sony NEX 5.I was a bit disappointed when the first adapter that was sent to me didn't fit at all. You are supposed to insert batteries through little holes, and as soon as it snaps in place, you're suppose to twist or pull back so the battery will make contact. The holes looked too small for me, but if you force them in with enough force, they snap into place. But now that I've got this one right, it's pretty sturdy.

I am a fan of the series. My first book was The White Pearl, and from there it's been great. This book, however, just didn't do it for me and unfortunately I'm not going to get any more. It read more like an episode of Criminal Minds, which is too bad--it does nothing but repeat itself as most books do. If you want something good by this author try one before this, or maybe even watch an episode.
The mic works great after a little adjusting. It only comes ready to use on one side but the sound quality is great.

I ordered this book based on reviews by other readers. I've now read some 50 pages. It is not the typical book that I read. The main character is a young black man that has to do battle against evil white people. I know there are many good books with positive messages out there; however, this should NOT be one of them. There was no real plot, just pure unadulterated hatred and destruction being spewed from every page. If you like reading trash don't waste your time.

The book begins with a man reading his mother's obituary (which is quite humorous) but this was too little of it. There wasn't any sense that Jack has a real life, or we see him dealing to find out what happened next with his family. This was all about the funeral, and when I read it, it didn't interest my son. Not one of our favorite bedtime stories. If you do buy it...

The price was excellent compared to local prices and it seems of sturdy construction, however after several uses on our hardwood floors in my home, one side of plastic wheel base split open at connection points. Now it slides rather than turns. Not sure if there's a solution yet. I'd recommend only trying this product with caution. 
 Rating: 4.
Although it looks nice, in person you can see there are scratches all over it.

This is a great set of knives for the price. I would definately recommend them to anyone who likes good knives. The knife block that comes with it fits nicely on the counter and makes finding all your tools easy as there are no slots in each drawer. It also has adjustable shelves which hold most everything I need including kitchen tools. You must keep this set oiled though, otherwise you won't have much use out any knife.

I love the way this book is laid out and read. However, to be very honest, these "lessons" are all rather shallow. As a Christian, as many other reviewers have stated, it might really interest just Christians who already believe/practice what they were told, as opposed to someone like myself with no religious background. It really doesn't give you something new that's meaningful.
this book is not going to provide much help in the areas that are being taught. Also, it uses very old equipment. I suggest you save your money.

I agree with another reviewer's concerns regarding the use of this product. These gloves are listed as 'non-toxic,' yet they contain a heavy amount of formaldehyde, which is carcinogenic to children. The smell from these can and will harm your child even if unintentionally. I'm in contact directly with the manufacturer, but haven't heard back, yet. Perhaps it was some kind of misunderstanding? Regardless, when purchasing these, please research the potential effects on children and then consider using them appropriately.

The cover was great value for money and looked really nice! I am giving it four stars because the "leather' seems a little cheap but then again you get what you pay for. It has been several months, still looks good, no flaws. Would buy this again! Good value!!

This product is not even close as good or nearly the same quality. Don't waste your money. I would only recommend this product to a very young child who enjoys playing dress up! Total waste. Nothing like the original. It looks and feels cheap! Not happy.

The book is a pretty poor piece of work. Lots of typos and the author uses incorrect English words several times. He does not write that you should clean or polish your nails BEFORE applying polish, but instead says to let them dry completely then apply 2 coats of polish. And there's nothing wrong with using nail polish before it has been thoroughly cured. In fact, he recommends it.
I like it, but it is smaller than anticipated. This was not the fault of seller or product. All parts are great quality.

The first one I received would not allow the iPad to wake from sleep. It could sense that it was on but wouldn't turn on. But Amazon quickly sent out a replacement. After about 4 months, with light use, my 3rd Targus failed. I'm done. I've switched brands now - Anker has worked for several weeks and is working well.

I just recieved this coffee and its is pretty good. Its not as strong as others so i brew a little weaker than other coffee. It keeps me going until lunch time. The taste of this particular one has the right amount of bitterness too. Some dont. Not for people who like very acidic coffee. If you buy it, do yourself a favor because I think it may become your new "standard" type of decaf coffee.....

I have always loved this movie since it came out and to learn that a special edition was being released is great. However, I've been waiting for months for the first two discs in my set (the third disc contains the "Director's Cut" of the movie). Now I'm wondering if they will ever be released. The film has been unavailable here in Australia while there are copies available at our local video stores. But apparently Warner Bros thinks we Americans don't care about what we're missing, so no need to worry Americans.
This stuff makes you hair feel and look great even after one day. Definitely recommend this for men who still have beards! Also recommended other Gillette products as well.

There are so many great reviews for this product here. It probably won't make you happy in the long run. But it certainly does not hurt in the short term! This little device seems to calm both of them down -- especially when we put their favorite treats into it.
Great read! Lots of action!! Keeps you wanting more so you can't put it down.
The product is good, and works well with my Kindle. It was nice to receive it much quicker than I would have liked, which has nothing to do with the actual product. Love it! Will order again.
This toy is a hit with my dog! It's soft and safe for him to chew on. I highly recommend this over any other toy.

I am so disappointed with this product for my son & I. We ordered it in the color "lime" and you can barely see it. You have to get really close to be able make out what it's saying. This album has a wide selection and variety of music on it. For me it is not quite what I was looking for though there are alot of good ones. I recently purchased an eVo mini, and it appeared to connect flawlessly with my existing cable system which provides both cablecard & standard definition broadcasts. This is probably not my favourite track from her first album.

i got this as a housewarming gift.

Excellent light for the price! I like that it runs on a coin battery which is supposed to last over 5 hours. The beam could be a little wider perhaps, but its sufficient and bright! Also comes with mounting hardware, not sure if they include it.

What a complete rip off! I bought it in the store and returned it. On a side note, what kind of moronic marketing idea does this have? The only reason to buy this is if you're into mindless action movie violence with a bunch of half-naked chicks beating each other up.
Nice color for a dark green that will match almost anything. It just needs to be covered by another material because I've used it every day since I got it.

I love this little device. It's small, lightweight yet sturdy, has a good sound which is very loud for such a small device. I got these for a friend of ours cause he just loved these guys so much when i saw him play cards with my kids and wife they ask to play this game again that night even after 3 hours playing we were still having fun thanks again. :-)

We had a lot of ice in our garage for the month of December that wouldn't melt with other methods. The next morning we put on our new electric snow blower, plugged it in, turned it, and... VOILA! The top half melted. The bottom was still slightly frozen. So far only 5 snowfalls, but so far, so good. This thing is great. Here's how to get around freezing water/ice:1. I was so looking forward to getting this...I did my research and this seemed like a great product for us. We followed the directions carefully. The first thing we got after turning it on is an extremely strong odor--like what you would get if you sprinkled cinnamon in your microwave. This isn't even good enough where one could smell it, it's too strong. It took over 12 hours before there wasn't any odor left at all.

Purchased this item and thought it would be perfect for our small bathroom. As other reviewers had said, the shower curtain is way too short. I don't see how anyone could fit three adults inside unless they were very skinny. If you are short, please pay attention. It was shipped straight back! Not worth buying. The liner itself looked nice when we opened it. However, a few weeks later I noticed water stains in it so I'm guessing that there must have been mold on one end.

This is our second juicer. We had the one that was similar to this for at least three years but it finally bit it. Based on reviews and seeing how much better a masticating juice machine costs we decided to go with this. It looks super cool in my kitchen sitting about 8 feet from where I'm working.
Good product, not much else to say. I used this product in a class and have been using the same one for over 4 years now.

I'm not usually one to criticize a story that has so many positive reviews here, but this book is definitely below par. I was looking forward anxiously reading more about our main character and her love for a man she barely knew just starting at college. However, it seems as though other people were having different thoughts and feelings than we are. This book, especially the ending, was incredibly dissatisfying. The ending completely changed how I thought of these characters and their relationship.

This book has a lot of nice pictures, but it's useless for the beginner or anyone who hasn't had an "introduction" course in how to draw manga. I think it would be helpful if this came with some extra information before you start drawing. That being said, there are several other great manga training books available that cover technique much better than this. If you're interested in drawing manga, check out Takahira's Manga Artist's Handbook.

The quality of the picture and movies are great, but I had one hard drive that had a bad sector which renders my dvd player useless even though it shows only "bad media" error messages. This is not really any fault of this product, it's just shoddy workmanship. I've been using these drives for years on three different computers at work and have never had such problems. I'm also noticing lots more people complaining about DVD playback problems with their new players.
Really love this thing.

I think a lot of kids will feel the love they need reading this book for school or something like that but even my sister hated it. The book is just to boring and there's no real action. If you're looking for a water softener to reduce mineral build up in your water, this is the product you want. I have used RO systems before, and there isn't a whole lot difference between them.

The book seems to be well put together and is great for quick reference. However, I need a book like this in order to plan my journey from the point of view of someone who travels constantly as an engineer or technical consultant. There are several things missing that would have improved this book, including:- More detailed information on the history of aviation (pre & post war)- Less focus on aircraft manufacturers- Inclusion of some maps detailing routes across country with specific stops along those routes.

Love it, the color is just like in photo. Fits my Samsung note 8.0 perfect, with all features (speakers, power, camera, etc) fully accessible. There are 2 pockets inside one of which can hold charger and stylus. I received a lot of compliments from it too. Very happy with purchase. It's got nice padding. It gives you the feel of holding something high quality even though it's pricey. Looks great too! Also bought red color, I'm very satisfied with it.

I don't recommend this book. The characters are dull, the plot a bit silly and the ending was so anticlimactic that it literally made no sense what so ever. The only reason i finished reading is because it's just easier when you know something good will happen. And then my mind thought "hmmm - maybe its all leading up to something?" but no, there were too many loose ends. Don't waste your time. If you're curious, read it. But don't really rely on the ending.

I love this product, and was so happy to find it at cheaper price. It works great. The price was a little high. However, even though the cost is high, you get better quality with it. I've bought this for several of my dogs. They don't like the taste in any form. I have also heard a lot of good reviews about these. It turns out to be best when mixed with their food. I bought this vacuum because it was priced under $100. After receiving it, I immediately thought about buying one like it. However, when I've used it, I'm amazed how good an inexpensive product this thing is.

As I wrote before, if all a person cares for is the sound quality from this product then you can definitely feel satisfied with spending $60 on it. However, it does not matter what type of earphones or headphones one uses, even though these are supposedly'studio'. I'm just glad that Amazon will refund me my money because although these do look cool but do absolutely nothing in comparison to other headsets out there. Stay away from them unless you're only listening for looks alone.

this case did not fit at all had to return it. the colors are nice - kind of faded though so it looks very cheap. do NOT buy this. waste of money and time. also when i got mine a corner was broken off which didnt affect how well they hold my phone just gave me a sense that you get what you've paid for. i'd recommend spending your money on something else instead unless its completely flat like these cases are.

Not much to say. I put some batteries in it and the battery pack came with it. My camera fits well inside so there is plenty of room for any extra gear or batteries. The rest of it keeps your interest very well. There are plenty people on here who didn't find this a great movie either because they were expecting something, but for any viewers out there, if you're anything like an average viewer with common sense (knowing when to go see a movie), then chances are, you'll really enjoy this movie.

I must admit I had some issues with this book. First it seemed so fast paced at times. But then towards the end as things were getting interesting there was....nothing. No climax, no resolution, basically nothing happened.
The content is good but I'm still in shock on how it's packed. It comes packaged with no inner plastic wrap so my book had gotten damaged pretty easily due to this.
This was a replacement for one that came with the oven. It is easy to handle & clean, and does its job. I would recommend this product.

I am not sure there was anywhere in the listing saying "for PC's, this only works with Windows 7 and 8.1Not good enough. Also did not get a receipt or package so it's no good. Can't tell if it is legit, or not........don't know, but I'm out $ 5.00. Will be more careful before ordering next time. It sounds good though, my computer has everything now. Oh well.

The design of this book is not very good. This was a gift to our granddaughter. If I had seen the contents before purchasing it, then I would never have purchased it. When it arrived, we noticed that someone had written in and touched most of the pages. It looked as if they did not take good care of it on shipment. My granddaughter has asked us for another one like this, but without all those marks. She will be disappointed when she opens hers.

I bought the black with some gold accents thinking it was a nice change of pace. It looks nicer in person compared to online. However, it's NOT like my other watches - this piece is just way too thin. Also, it doesn't have anything that gives a hint as to where your hands and fingers will be placed. I'm constantly checking them because they don't feel quite right.

I was very disappointed in this book. The writing is terrible. There are way too many times when a character speaks in the present and then at some point goes back into past tense, not realizing he has to do that. It reads as if it were written by someone who does NOT know English well. If you want good Irish language reading get something like Sean Mac Briain or maybe The Secret Garden. Those authors write wonderfully wonderful stories with amazing characters.
bought it. Opened packaging only to find an empty case. Not worth returning. So basically I just wasted $30+.
Works well in conjunction with Dr.

I have had my system for about a month now and love it. Great sound quality with an easy setup. My favorite feature is the headphone jack on either side of receiver. The only drawback that i see so far is: every once in awhile there can be little static/interference. Overall though great buy.
I purchased this book thinking that I would read an all encompassing view on what happens after death.
It was shipped quickly! I live in North Texas and it didn't take long to get here! So far, so good!

We had been looking for these little pillows forever! They work great and are just the right size. The only negative, since they weren't advertised as having "leather" covers, doesn't make this a bad thing. I have yet to clean them but I'm sure that will not be a problem.

This is the second case for my LG 800G 820. My first one was made by LG; this one, however, is in China. The case does not have a cut out opening to expose camera and other needed areas. You would think they'd spend more time making it. Also, they only give you two screen protectors, instead of three. I found these extremely frustrating. Updating to note that, after about 2-3 weeks the rubber on mine began separating from its plastic case.
i love it. easy to use. but battery life could be better. other then that its a great product. thank u

At first listen, I was not at all impressed. Although it's a catchy beat, the lyrics are cliche and some of them pretty inappropriate. But then another album comes along and my opinion changes. And that's what this is. Not nearly as impressive in production quality but still better than most music out there, and that's why it earns its keeps. Good job, Linkin Park!Update:Now that I've had more listens though, I'm impressed with it.

I'll only review what I've read, nothing that is spoiler. As far as fantasy goes, this is a pretty good read. The author does capture the essence of the "young love/infatuation" we all have at some points.

I am not a huge fan of the taste of this coffee. The pods tend to get stuck in my machine, leaving me with coffee and grounds everywhere. Also, some days it still doesn't work - makes coffee but no water. It is nice and hot which can be good, however after having used it for two weeks I'm afraid its just another piece in our garbage. Very disappointed :( will use regular K-cups again :)

I bought this player at BB for about $100, it has performed ok, but the major problem is that it will not read many DVDs made a year or more ago. No one else seems to have similar problems with its DVD player, so obviously they just got lucky and there are fewer defective ones out there. It does play other movies though. Don't buy this player. If you do it, look around because if Amazon stops selling them (and that's a big if) then you'll never find another.

I have had this computer since November to replace an older HP all in one that had problems from the first day purchased. My printer and scanner stopped working last week. Since they are old products that were not worth fixing, as of today its just a big paperweight. On Christmas morning when my kids opened up their presents he called me and we went through updating drivers. After that, same problem! The software did not recognize there was no USB device connected. Then he tried connecting his flash drives.
I was pleased with my purchase. It arrived on time and the person who received it is very happy and so am I.

Bought this to protect my Kindle Touch with no success. The film is too big and won't stay on the screen. Every time I press down or lift it off it's off. I'm constantly touching it then smoothing out air bubbles but all I've ever gotten are more air. Don't buy this unless you want frustration. It's a waste of money.

I was looking forward quite a bit for this, as it's been an exciting year, and with several bands coming up in their wake (i.e. Linkin Park on the one hand... and System Of A Down on another hand), I'm rather curious where they will head next.

I am not happy with this camera. It stopped working right away, never had it more than a year and half before the battery door latch broke. The camera still worked without the latch, but that wasn't very convenient, especially for traveling. Once the little piece just fell off, you are stuck with no way to close it. So now my entire vacation is completely ruined because there won't be photos from our snorkeling trip. Don't buy this camera, it's horrible.

The product was broken in numerous places when it arrived and the lid for holding ice cubes snapped in two. I think even though there is a sticker on the front that says it will hold 24 ounces, it would only really serve 1 pint. But then again, 16 oz. makes enough drink to last you throughout the morning so I'm not surprised by what happened. The container came out of its packaging with cracks all over it.

I got this for my son who is learning how to ride but I'm not sure it would hold him up safely. You sit on the handle which isn't terribly comfortable as well. The seat looks super flimsy and like he could snap off when we take a good turn either. Also, be aware that it's way too wide so you look very awkward taking turns with it. My other kids all have 2 wheel scooters which they prefer over this one.

I read the book and watched the movie before seeing this video so it helps to have some other background knowledge than being a high school or college English teacher, but I'm not an expert by any means. So while there are things in the video that were confusing for me because I had no prior background, overall it's a good introduction for those who are just starting out. The actual program is short - 26 minutes total. The first 9 chapters teach grammar, vocab and pronunciation.

I thought it would be a light but comfortable and cozy blanket. This is not it. It was very stiff when i first got in bed. So we still don't know if its going to soften up. Otherwise the quality seems good. I'm hoping after some more wash that will happen..

The picture of the item is nothing like what it looks like. In looking at different colors and sizes, there was a huge discrepancy in pictures. I also looked to get how much room it took up before placing my money in, since that was one thing i thought would be easy about this product. Its too small for 3 bottles even when filled halfway. Also, if you were planning on buying this, DONT BUY. You are just throwing your money away.
The case didn't fit for a 3g, and the design on it isn't very nice. Very poor quality. Donw waste your money.

I can't say this product was horrible because it wasn't. The reason I'm giving it a bad review is the poor construction. My son has only had his for one week and he already said that after opening it, "its been in here half an hour" Its really not made very well. Also most of the time when you go to take pictures they seem blurry. The flash seems like my kids camera lol. And lastly It does NOT have any shutter speed option.

This is the kind of movie you watch once for a bit and don't think about again. The actors did good with their roles but overall it was just okay I thought. Nothing memorable or to talk about. If you're really bored, you'll probably get something out of it, like when my wife kept looking at us because she could be easily amused. Don't expect this from a great movie, it's just ok.
We ordered this item just before Christmas.

I can not believe amazon would sell a book that the author himself admits contains misinformation and outright lies. This is the most despicable act of deception I've ever seen! You are cheating American citizens out their hard earned money. Do you honestly think people don't have this knowledge or will they trust someone with this?Shame on you!

I am happy with this product after receiving it. It is nice to have all the essentials in one place without spending a bundle on some overpriced kit. The price for such a quality kit makes it more than worth it, and you won't even be able to put many of these accessories back into your purse or pocket because they will quickly get lost if used too often. It's also hard not to take pictures while doing something else so using an extra battery and/or memory card isn't necessary for me.

This is one of the worst books I have ever read. Its premise - that a world where people learn to live together peacefully and are never at war with one another because they know everything about each other beyond their physical nature is completely unrealistic, as is its resolution. You spend most if not all of this time wondering why she didn't die in childbirth instead of allowing things get out of hand, especially when those around her had died on several occasions.

I thought this would be as good or better than the last album because of his old time roots music. The new songs sound like they're recorded in an echo chamber. I'll keep looking for another cd with more country music roots. He did do one song that was okay, though.

I bought this and after about a month of use it stopped working. The problem is when you try to change channels on the radio, every time i hit one of them it flips the radio off. Its not just if im changing channels, Im hitting anything for half an extra second as well. Not worth it! Save your money and buy something else! Very disappointed in this. Will be returning mine! :(
My kids love this movie. This is the perfect thing to watch when you have a snowy winter in your house. Definitely recommend.

I bought this for my granddaughter. Very very disappointed. You can't do much with it because the camera hole is on top! If you are wanting thisto use as a wallet/purse in your pocket, forget it. It's so smalland just falls apart. This was supposed tobe a Christmas gift for someone now we'll have ta send her something else.... Not happy at all. It also took forever!! Don't waste yourmoney& time on this.
Works OK but would be much better at a higher price......

This product did not even fit my cell phone. I was very disappointed because I've never had a problem with Amazon before this. They must have gotten to many returns in the last few days. Never Again will i shop here. Just going into town. I could go on. But why should we all take our chances when ordering online? You can save yourself quite alot of money by buying it locally. We know what it is really supposed to be for, so no need to overcharge.

This product is so bad, it didn't work for my dog! I am very dissapointed. The shampoo smelled awfull and he broke out with bumps all over his body. He started scratching the worst of that product. And this was not a new product, because we had to have gotten a defective batch. Don't buy it. If you want your dog happy, use anything but this. We are never buying products by Pet Armor again,. It's too bad they dont give refunds.

I was a bit hesitant with the price, but they are not bad for what you pay for. My pair fit perfectly fine and were comfortable from start to finish. Good sound quality although sometimes hard to hear some words that have deep bass when the music is quite loud. The mic worked great too. However, after 1 month of use, the left ear started breaking in half. This does come with different rubber sizes provided so your choice could be very different.

I was very disappointed with the design of this phone. Not only it did not look like a vintage phone but most importantly, none of my friends could hear me. After all the time spent on research and review, we thought that the Nokia 2070 would fulfill our need for an old fashion phone - especially since it's made by Nokia. Unfortunately when we tried to use it, we found out its real flaws. We ended up returning it. It really is useless.
What a great deal on hard shell cover.

This is a good product to keep your computer cool and not overheat. I can notice that my laptop running cooler if this battery inside the package. However, after using it for couple of weeks, I've noticed some overheating in my computer. I'm concerned whether it's really harmful or not. If anyting will be done about that, I'll surely buy different brand next time.
This isn't anything like Fifty Shades. If you're expecting that you'll be disappointed.

I actually had to have one and so got it, but it came in very nice condition just had a little scratch on the back. This is probably due to poor handling when it shipped. Very happy though. Would make this purchase again. Thanks Amazon for making my holidays memorable. And thank you Crate n Barrel great prices and fast shipping. Thank you! Keep up your good work. Love it! Only drawback: there are no shelves or drawers included. Everything else about the bed was fantastic.
These work great for small areas. They are so much faster then the cheap ones. My family of 4 loves them. I love them too because no fumes and clean up is a breeze. So glad we bought these!

I was getting a little concerned about the quality of my print outs when looking at replacement ink,but these cartridges were so much better than what came with my new Samsung printer. Great product!!! Thanks!!

These earrings are cute and go well with a lot of outfits, but they fall out easily. I find them to be very uncomfortable even though the posts at the back end help hold the earring in place. Not terribly happy about that. Will not wear this style again. Would appreciate feedback from all who have purchased these, what happened after a few wears. Thank you for offering them. If we had more luck, we may order another pair soon. We want to send these back.
Good book. Nice variety of recipes for the vegans that need a variety. I would recommend this book. Thanks

I've had these filters for about a month. I can notice an improvement in air quality, but no changes regarding our overall health. However, we use the filter everyday, so it's not like we're breathing cleaner air. This isn't to say that there aren't other better ways of providing clean air, though. Still, it seems worth it and we love being able to feel good knowing that we're doing something healthy with our money when using this..

The book could not be worse. Its content is weak and the English used is difficult to understand even for a native speaker. I would never recommend this book. It was actually painful on many different levels. If you bought it online, return it!
Well made, small and fits nicely on my belt.

This thing gets so hot you can't even use it. It melts plastic on top that holds it together. I've never seen something like this before being sold at any store. I'm disappointed. It's pretty though. Wish I'd bought the stainless steel version. At least those will not melt off or break.

I used these for my wife's hair and they are a big waste of money. They don't curl your lashes. It took several attempts to get them to work. The elastic that holds the lashes was just too strong and wouldn't break free. Then when it finally did come loose from the lash band, one pair stopped rolling back up so the other pair would still try but couldn't. If you roll with this product, good luck getting anything out after applying them.
Great story, good character development and great ending. It had some twists to it that I didn't see coming. Looking forward to the next book. Highly recommend this series.

I just finished viewing "The Long Way Home." It was truly horrid. At first it looks so promising. Then the movie turns into some kind of horror film with little to no plot and characters. There are people falling down a hole in the ground, but then there is this guy, who keeps popping up out of nowhere with that strange smile on his face. That's about it. Nothing even happens. I've seen scarier movies at my local theater.
I really liked the color. The construction was good, so i would suggest it, if you need a carrying case. Thank you.

They broke on me and when I put the headphones back together it was too tight inside of them and they would not seal again. Very dissapointing!!! Had to waste a lot of time trying to fix it so I could send back. You can imagine what kind of hassle that is. No way in hell this should ever happen! Do NOT Buy! DO NOT!!!! BUYING...
Works very well, easy to read even during day or night.

The book jacket promises that the stories will come from "the horse's mouth and with the authenticity of an old friend reminiscing," and, more accurately, a dog who has been told to take notes by its owner over 20 years ago. Some stories.....all very predictable. There were many situations in which I kept asking myself, where would these two meet next, how could they possibly get together, etc.? Not particularly believable, nor interesting.
It does what is says except one size too small for me so if you're going to order buy 2 sizes bigger
This phone cover fit great. Just what you'd expect from a zebra print. Doesn't add much bulk. Great price too. Fast shipping too :-) Highly recommend! A+ on all fronts.
My only complaint about these racks is... there are no measurements given on them.
The case does fit but the material is very cheap and already has some scratches on it. I guess you get what you paid for!!!! :( : ( :(

This is certainly a very beautiful book. However, I would not recommend it to anyone planning on reading this book cover-to-cover. It just doesn't offer that much new information. The "daily practices", etc., are more like magazine articles than anything else. For someone who has little information in the area, such as myself (who lives by North Carolina), then perhaps it's worth it, but for me personally, there's simply too many other sources out there (online, etc.) and I found this one disappointing.

This item was supposed to be new but the only thing that came in its original box and it looked like someone has used it. It had what look liked finger prints on front cover. Disappointing when you read reviews. So much better.
this speaker works just perfect for its size...
Great read. Lots of drama. Will look forward to the next book.
The size is pretty convenient, not too big. But water leaks quickly and it leaves weird marks inside of it. Not really much to like about this one.
The filter system was extremely difficult for me to install, but once installed, it worked as advertised. My water tastes great after three weeks.

We purchased a used DCR-SR41 camera hoping that we would get lucky and not be locked out of our computer access due to using some old version software. The manufacturer does tell you how difficult it is for security users but they do NOT warn people about what can happen when trying to work with this camera. We spent hours installing software on two machines in order to try and make use of the camera, only end up having to reset them twice during installation.
It is smaller than I thought it would be but looks really good and a very inexpensive way to spruce up your living space. Love the price too.
The light is really bright but its not very durable. It does work pretty well considering I have a few things on in my kitchen because it's kind of dark here during the day.

I just recently moved from my home state of California to the east coast and have been looking back at movies of mine that i had forgotten or not seen. This is definitely one such movie. Im sorry it only made a few dollars when it came out in 1981, but its worth picking up now so all those people who want classics on DVD should know this was released in 1981.

I am very disappointed in this product. Not only did the price tag run way above what I saw anywhere else with prime shipping but it doesn't work. I'm not talking about a quick fix, as you have to go out and buy an adapter if your power supply has three usb slots or more. They need to make adapters like we used to see 20 years ago. This will be going back to Amazon right away. It is too bad because my laptop looks so cute sitting on it.

This is a really nice looking case, but when you place the kindle fire HD 8.9" in the case and close it, there is very little room for anything else as well. So if you're wanting your tablet to just stay put without being bulky, while having all its ports, camera, etc visible, then this isn't going happen. In addition, my screen cover won't go around the whole side of it. So, if I want complete protection, I'll have to get some that actually covers that.
I'm glad I picked up one of these books. It's a quick read, though it's always hard for me to get comfortable with short stories.

This is a nice book. I was a bit disappointed however, since it says 'used' but the first page looks so great that you know that it's not... It has deep water stains on several of the pages and feels like the book itself may have been opened before. Other than that, my son loves it, he likes how bright the colors are. It's very colorful in fact - the pictures are really bright. Just be careful not to open or rip it.
When using the small hooks it holds up really well but does slide a little bit. It feels durable also

I have to say that i am glad the only reviews I've seen of this book is on how great it is. My friends and family who love vampire books adore it too. It was my birthday last week, but by then all of our local Barnes & Noble stores were sold out.
The filter looks nice.
This wasn't my favorite book.

I have had two of these things for about a year!! Every time the power button is depressed, it switches to sleep mode, and that means after 5 mins you have 2 hours or more waiting on it.........if anyone has any solutions let me know! Other than that, its great because thats all i use.....and this thing is SUPER HOT! so much so, i don't really even need my case with it.

As someone who does not work for Sony, or have any ties with Sony, I am writing a review as someone who appreciates quality. The PS3 is made very poorly. There were so many problems with my unit, that just because others don't seem to notice it, I want people aware of what you can expect. The good:The price I paid was way lower than the $900 it seems at the time.

This product is horrible. First of all, you must wait at least an hour to be able charge your iPhone or iPod, which adds much more time than you're looking for. Additionally, the battery pack doesn't hold a full charge. Even when fully charged, it can't provide enough power for two consecutive iPod charges. We purchased this item in April and by July (the last month we've been using it), it's pretty dead. It only charged my phone once or twice before we had to throw it away. Complete waste of money.

Bought it so my son could use the Ipod, after only one day I am taking back for a replacement! What happened to quality?!!! First time ever, returned a product of this type, first time! The screen started randomly changing colors, like colors were being displayed that had nothing to do with the color itself, and then blue dots all over on each pixel. Very disappointing! Had high hopes from what others who purchased said about these items. Maybe you should look elsewhere...
Very well written short story about two people trying not make each other fall for them. When you read it, you'll find out why.

The description on the back of this unit says it will support iPad2 and 3G. That is completely untrue. It charges my iPhone 4S but that's it. So unless you want an expensive, non-functioning charging dock, then don't bother buying this. Waste your money. Now I have to return it! That's really inconvenient, too. This was one product that just didn't work. Oh well. Next time! Sorry!

This was not as easy as I thought it would be to do. I wish there were better videos on YouTube out there. And I don't remember which ones are bad, so I'll tell you if this one is bad. It seems really hard and just takes time. As far as I'm concerned it's useless. You can do everything with a spatula now. It's even worse when they go from being soft enough for me while making the icing on chocolate chip cookies through a butter cream icing.
It's really great. I'm very pleased with how well it's made. My boyfriend is so happy he got it!

this isn't a book it is not an account of her life at all. there are stories and facts but all i got out of it was the author did do some things that you can find on youtube if your interested. I don't usually rate books so harshly because it's possible my fault for getting what i read to be more than just another autobiography.
Worked great when we took on trip. Great buy. Have been using it daily since arrival. Very happy with purchase. Thanks. Good service.

If you like reading long books about nothing, with many characters whose story lines are so unrelated yet so intertwined and interactive, then you'll enjoy This Present Darkness. However, if youare looking for something more involving or realistic, avoid it.

This is the first time I have purchased an item on Amazon and am so disappointed at what a low quality product it is. It came fully assembled. However there was no cover plate that goes behind each shelf in one of my two units. Even though there were supposed to be two, they just didn't fit. After speaking with customer service, which wasn't really helpful whatsoever, I returned everything and got my money back.

The screen protector was just a cheap piece of plastic; not even worth $1. I would buy from another company and pay more! In addition, it was creased on the side so there is no way to smooth out the crease as your smoothing bubbles out. Just awful!! Don't waste money on this item, or I'll have you arrested for wasting my taxes!!!!! Not happy! They can't get worse than this!!! Thank goodness it's only $2. What a waste! :-( 
 Rating: 1.

I thought it was so wonderful until I tried to remove and clean the filter under the sink from another water cooler. That's when I knew that this system is completely inadequate for my needs. There are no moving parts, nothing to keep crud out, nor a way (aside form dumping it into your garbage disposal ) to get any of those little white pellets back in contact with water. It would be much better just using distilled vinegar or other bottled vinegars if you want something non-toxic.

It's very cheaply made. It does not have any kind of closure. There is no way to keep the case closed. You also must take your Kindle out for charging. I purchased another case. Although it was less expensive, there are much better cases on Amazon that protects your kindle and you can charge while in case. As usual amazon's customer service stepped up with a refund. They would do business again with this company. Just go into some other company because they make good products & work closely w/ customers.

These mugs are good because you can drink hot or cold beverages from them without spilling. The design is nice too. They work well to keep your tea warm as well. Love them. A little pricey, however. If they weren't so expensive, then they'd be perfect.
I'm new to using my crock pot. While I think there should be more information on this subject, I wanted something quick to put together and read while preparing dinner.

Not sure if Amazon will do an update to this as some other reviewers were able to. First let me point out the good things about it:- The image quality is great (provided you don't blow compressed jpegs. I use Adobe Premiere.- The wide screen has a little fuzzy edge like most projectors do. I've seen worse. Here are my negatives:1. No internal battery power. If you're running with it on for awhile, it's not going anywhere but down.
Bought from Amazon.com.

This is actually a nice product. It does have that "warming" smell however but it doesn't bother me. My only complaint was I paid the $19.99 and they changed the price with in 6 months. Don't get me wrong my money well worth it. Just wish they would stick with the original price. I'll buy again when its back to $9.99. Thanks Amazon for your quick shipping too! That works great! 5 stars all around.

So I read a review of this book prior to buying it and as my father has suffered from cancer twice, having died each on different days, I thought that since cancer is not going away it's just another one more thing he can do. I'm currently trying hard enough for him to come back but he's doing very well with chemo at home and will be back in September or so.
This book was very easy reading but gave insight into all types of birds that you most likely will never see in your life.

Great product. Had bought it from PetCo originally, but they no longer carry it. So, I was very thrilled to find it online. It's exactly what we were looking for. A good sturdy tool that our Jack Russell puppy can handle easily.

The book was more of a history than i needed. It wasn't really applicable to the business world. Probably would've been better if it didn't have so much detail. Good read in general. But not for me....
I really like this product. Bought one for myself two years ago - still works great. I've given several as gifts. It has always been in my purse or pocket, so it must be pretty durable.

These pillows feel very hard. They are not soft for a body pillow, that is the only thing in common with a body pillow. We returned them and still have our original pillow made by down so we can return these. The first time my husband used his new one, he was waking up 3 times as many times each night before going to bed.
The packaging was not great on this item.

I just finished reading this book on my Kindle. It is a good mystery with historical elements but in that the plot starts to become confusing. The characters are somewhat likeable, though sometimes they seem a little unrealistic and over-confident. I found myself trying so hard to get into the story it was quite annoying! The main male who runs from his life all of her life suddenly falls back into it...for no reason I can fathom.
Works great, easy to install (directions clear), perfect size. Exactly what we needed.
The bulb went out within 45 days with minimal viewing.
Great color, fits well and does not slip off! Can easily access all features. Love the pockets on cover for accessories.

I was looking forward to trying these but when they arrived one had been broken so it doesn't work and the other is very cheaply made. Wouldn't buy them again. Disappointing... I'm not sure how they're supposed to look with the balls in them, though.
Very effective at preventing dust, dirt, & lint from getting inside your camera bag. Great if you have multiple lenses or filter sets. Works well when cleaning and maintaining your camera.

The premise is great. It gives a great idea and gets the reader interested. However, there are many flaws that make it difficult to finish. There were problems with editing, punctuation errors, etc. For me, they made this book hard for me to enjoy. While reading I had issues believing characters actions. One example was when one character does something totally contrary to their beliefs and beliefs.

I've loved the series up till this point. I found that the first volume was a bit rough, but then they got better. And that's where it ends unfortunately. Volume 2 is really not worth reading. This one takes place in an alternate reality version of The Watchmen where the characters from THE WATCHMEN had to fight against these new versions and prevent them doing bad things to mankind. In order for all this mess to succeed, however, it's going to...
Very durable and holds up well. It's been dropped quite hard several times, but nothing happened to my Kindle. And it's stylish.

This battery worked fine in a year or so, but it now will not hold enough charge for more than one hour of run time. Not happy about this purchase. The company should consider some type of quality control process. It really makes you ask if you are ever going to get even 1/2 an hour's use out if it. I do expect my batteries of any kind to last longer than that. Amazon did send me two (2) extra battery's, so that is somewhat appreciated.

I could not get into this book at all. As a mother of 2 teenagers who are being taken away from me, this story was too slow going. What happened in the life of every character? Who knew what was going on? Not enough details or description. After reading half way through I couldn't even remember any characters! The book ended with no closure and left me feeling very disappointed.
Was exactly what my daughter wanted and is still using it!!
It's one of those things where there isn't much information online. No photo or description.
Was excited when i found this, and thought for the price there is nothing wrong with it. Put together very fast, only thing holding down the sides was some self stick velcor stuff.

It got here in a timely fashion, the package was not damaged. However, I had to take my kindle out of it because there were holes where two plastic sides would be at this point so the Kindle could fall right out. Maybe I shouldn't have tried to put that on but just putting it in without any padding really upset me. You get what you pay for. If you want something better spend extra money. But I wasn't thrilled with it. Sorry but for $17 though that's about right.

The quality of this case is fine, and it looks cute when you view the front. But if I drop my phone, it's not protected at all. My iPhone broke while in it. Not even worth sending back because shipping just doubled what i paid to buy it. So all together spend your money on something else. This one will serve as a temporary case, but don't plan it for long term protection. It's cute though. Just be careful how much space between the screen protector.
This cd is one you'll listen to again & again. Her voice goes from a beautiful whisper to pure beauty.
This product works very well with my Epson Stylus Photo RX580 printer.
Purchased this after my original stopped working.

The product arrived promptly. It was packaged well for delivery so as not to suffer a dent in the package. I have yet to get it into my machine but based on everything that other reviewers say, this should run fine. In fact, if you are still using your older version of Win7 64-bit, installation of this item and software will probably be very easy with no hassle.
Enjoyed it! If you like true history you'll enjoy this, but it's also pretty entertaining.
Great product! Charger charged fast and worked right out of the box without any problems. Will tell friends about it at work so they can get one. Thanks again Amazon.

While I really like this case and was excited to get it, it does not offer much, if anything, in the way of protection for my camera. The top is exposed only enough so that you can access all buttons as they are covered with hard plastic flaps which covers them completely. You don't have any options for connecting cables or cords either. It should be a little bit bigger because now it's basically useless since nothing fits inside.

It's too much for a child to look at the same picture over and over. Kids need fun pictures. They have to learn all new words, colors and shapes. Children may not pay attention well enough or focus on these parts of their learning. Not so this book!! It is boring as well, no color!I will never buy one again. Too much. Very little good art. We put it away after about 30 mins. Wish they would use something other than white paper.

I am an electrical engineer and can easily understand all the instructions. It is worth every penny that we paid for it. The only bad thing was that this was not a Christmas present, it had to arrive by Thanksgiving Day, but thanks goodness our grandson opened on Thanksgiving! Merry Christmas!!!

I got these for my son to use with his Ipad. They work great but seem a little fragile - he has broken two of the pens already. The seller replaced them quickly so I'm satisfied right now. My main complaint is that most stylus/tablets have micro tips and no longer fit into some cases. There were others available, but even now that we don't need all 6 we'll be getting more anyway. If your case does not offer room you might want just one to try.

This was purchased as a Christmas present for our son so he could listen to his books on tape while working. It is advertised and said it works with an audiobook. The instructions were followed carefully, but still will not work properly. It has been returned (amazon's return policy ROCKS). There have also gone several days in terms of receiving the item due to delays caused by UPS (not always reliable -- you end up waiting months for any shipment).

When I bought the package containing three sets of glasses, one in each size, I expected that they would have been made with a nice strong glass. After only two weeks, one glass had already broken and since it's not being thrown around, I don't think I'll be getting another set. It's too bad! They are so pretty, but, because of poor quality, they're just fine for everyday wear.

i have a set like this one and it is made of glass not plastic they should make the description correct when you order something on here to avoid having me going through the return for refund process that happens every time I buy from your company with no returns available in that situation.if anyone knows where else there could be an option for glass ones please let all people know before buying anything so we prevent another person from needing return shipment costs again and also save others shipping money.
So beautiful - the detail looks great, it's very solid but light enough that even little kids can carry it. My daughter will be excited on christmas morning.

The book was great with the exception of an overabundance in foul language and sexually explicit content. I kept thinking would he get it out on this or that subject, but then found myself skipping ahead to see what kind of behavior occurred next. This makes me wonder why I'm supposed to. A major character was beaten very badly by her husband and has never gotten over it. They have 3 children together. She spends too much time thinking about how she'll beat him.
This item has worked out great.

This is a poor quality book due to the lack of any photos in it. The text was fine, but, what I thought were images have been replaced by diagrams. There are only about 6 photos, but they could be better and more clear. Too bad, this books would be a big deal if it had some pictures or photos. Also, all of David Lees' books seem to use outdated terminology. My advice: stick with a good atlas for a detailed reference when driving along major highways throughout California.

I bought two of these for my sister to use if she has a long car ride. She likes it. It does make it much easier than having her phone out on the seat. The only complaint is how low the arm rests, so when you have them up high enough, they are uncomfortable because there isn't any support underneath them. You do need this product though because people tend not give us enough space in our cars. This helps with both that and also making sure your seatbelt doesn't fall off.
As mentioned before, these are very good pans. You can use them for eggs, potatoes, etc.
It came in a big flat envelope, no packing and it was beat up. Not the most practical for an office or just home. I returned it.

The first month we tried to use, it looked promising with no problems. Last week, when I was in the process of using this vacuum for my hardwood floors, I smelled something burning and discovered that a piece had burst off one side and is protruding through my carpet. For me, that's hardly worth spending so much on an unused, non-working vacuum!! At least it's going back, thanks Amazon.com.
Very nice when brand new. After about 2 years use though, you'll notice how quickly your finger will start tearing through the material you're ironing.

This book is well written except perhaps some repetitive statements about people and situations, but it held my interest through to its unpredictable ending. The characters are vivid enough so you care what they decide next. You may feel like you've met them before. Good entertainment.

Very useful to have a single source for all my cookbooks. I would buy this book again. My only regret is the lack of color pictures which you sometimes need in order to get an idea what it looks like. For that reason it got 4 rather than 5. It does give good advice and tips on how to cook healthier meals as well.
My wife likes the idea of having this as part of our camping gear. I used to have one when i was a kid. We just got back from a trip (700 miles round trip) where it proved very handy and safe.
Exactly as described and good quality. These should last me a long time.

I love this case :) Its soft but protective and the picture is clear too ^^ It also arrived a lot faster than expected to my surprise so overall no complaints from me its worth it ;) I'm in love! &# 60;3

I wish the battery pack worked but it was so bad that i just threw it away after putting brand new batteries in it. Don't get me wrong, you do have to be careful about placing on a hard surface like wood or concrete because sometimes the sound cuts out really bad. The volume is not loud enough either. Definitely NOT worth buying. I've had a few bluetooth headphones and this isn't even in the same league. Maybe i got one from lemon.
The DVD is missing four episodes on it or they are scrambled. My daughter watches them every day but these will be her last copies. What do we do?
I bought this for my friend who does not smoke nor has a smoker in the basement. He said it was easy to set up and use. Good price compared with other vendors.

I really wanted to like this case, because even though it's listed as a case for the T2P, it looks great in pictures. Once you get it, though, you'll quickly understand why not. The holes are actually too small (and don't have matching holes), and when the top piece pops off, there is just enough overlap on each side to allow light in. Other than those negatives, I'm mostly happy with it. So far so good.

i guess ill never try another one.every thing but it was all scratched up....and when i received the package everything looked messed up, also there were no instructions on where or how to put the lights up so its not even worth my time sending that back. very disappointed in this order. dont bother buying this!!!!

These were too small for my hands. Maybe they will work on someone else's feet. The ones which came with the last pair of shoes that lasted me 3 full summer months fit much better. They are still better than not wearing them, just took some adjustment

Great but does leave white cast from under eye. So make sure you have good makeup remover before using.
I've purchased several of these. If you have an older B&D;, these batteries last forever.
This was great out of one ear, but stopped working after six months.

Well, I'm pretty upset about the fact that I wasted my money on this! I knew it wouldn't be great quality, but I'd hoped it'd at least look good and not fall apart! It's really cheaply made. It was packaged like it's going to come in a big puffy plastic bag, instead of being carefully boxed, so when you take out your purse from the shipping box, and see how flimsy this thing is, you'll think "Wow, $50.
