This bedspread set perfectly with all decors I purchased.

Very hard to tell from the photograph but these look like a white chocolate with dark chocolate coating. The picture may be misleading. I don't think anyone can complain about this, it was just not what my grandmother wanted.

I bought this when a coworker suggested it. He was right - it works great -- doesn't seem to leak or anything. It also seems very durable. We haven't used any of our bottles yet that we've tried it on. The only time I've had to shake the container before is to loosen some food that's stuck together at the bottom after using so be careful not to, though :)
I bought this for my daughter. It did not work at all. Tried to charge it and nothing. There should be a way of returning it. I will never buy here again.
For what it is it's pretty good.

As others have noted, this book has some good information, but it is filled with errors. A few of the most prominent include: First, Mr. Tucci wrote that a person cannot be saved in heaven, rather he needs to receive forgiveness from God. This may seem like an easy way out, as one might say, "but there are more complicated ways in which human beings can fail." In other words, Jesus could say it's okay if you did not repent before he died, and he still died for your sake.
This is really nice product for our little pool. The price was reasonable also. It has been used for over a year, we are still happy with product.
Good popcorn movie for Friday Night,But with today's technology that would never ever happen.
This did not work as it was intended to. Don't waste your time or money on this item. I don't know why the cable doesn't seem to even fit properly into my Kindle. What a joke.

I thought it would be an inexpensive way to try out this style of blender. It works great and does exactly what we need it to: make smoothies! The motor is relatively quiet but I've been using the Blendtec Professional 600 series for about 18 months now so it's not brand new in my mind. My kids haven't tried any recipes yet so can't comment on speed or anything else like that.

The author is very knowledgeable, but she tries to pass herself off as a great storyteller. Not true. What I read was her attempts at being funny. I'm sure I'll give more books by this person the oppurtunity since, like me, they were free. However, anyone who sells their work for any price obviously doesn't believe that we are going to. So save your $3.00 and visit another website.

I purchased this product to be used with my Panasonic DMC-FS3, but it does not fit the camera. It is far too small. The screw hole pattern and overall structure seem a little off, as well. Perhaps an FS-8 would fit, however, that will require buying one from Panasonic. My own fault, perhaps, for assuming the screws/adapters were interchangeable between cameras.

I didn't have this very long, but it already developed a crack on the bottom. This is the first cover I've had that wore away like this....for no reason. The only reason I'm giving this one star instead of none is, well, it's in my car and does its job so far! Just wish it hadn't cracked. Too much hassle to send back, so I'll just toss it.

I don't know why everyone thinks this is an awesome game because it's absolutely horrific. Just not in my opinion. It's just too easy. To many puzzles for a video game. Also, after playing it and getting halfway through it you find out that your avatar doesn't even have any limbs and the camera angle changes constantly while playing. For those of us who actually enjoy having to think like an animal, we can't help it.

I was initially disappointed in this game, because the sound quality is horrible on my computer and it doesn't seem like it's anywhere near a hi-def experience. As soon as EA learned that people were looking to buy this, they lowered it, but didn't take too much away from it. The game itself seems fun once you get used to. There will be players who have little experience with other sports games (like me), so don't try playing against them unless you've played hockey before.

We have been dealing with tech support for almost 2 weeks now and they haven't gotten back to us, after the phone lines are down, we cannot get a hold of them. I would not recommend this product! If you don't believe me then see how many problems others had. I will never buy another Sony again. Now we've had it about 3 months, maybe two if you're lucky! The quality has really decreased since then. They still suck, but no one cares by now.

Took as prescribed for 3 months followed instructions exactly but felt zero results. Don't waste your money. Save up money you need to spend it. Did not lose any of the pounds that were intended after taking the pills.
This is definitely NOT my type of book.
After 2 months this cover starting turning blue from being exposed. Looks awful. Now I'm having trouble with it staying closed even when it's not in motion. It's falling apart. :( Very disappointed.
Good product however it is very difficult to get the screen protector to lay down without bubbles. I have bought another brand for a few dollars at Walmart that works much easier and lasts longer.
Easy assembly. My cat loves the litter box more than anything else in my house. I only needed to scoop once twice a day, at most, and it did not smell bad.

This sharpener is awesome.... you hold it under running water for just a second or two and the sharpening stone turns into a razor... great way of keeping blades sharp. My wife uses this often now for all her kitchen knives (paring knives, chef's knife, bread knife), as well has serrated utility knives. We love it.
Works perfectly. Just add water according to directions that come on box.

This DVD collection didn't work. I tried it on 2 different devices and a couple of computers. Maybe my machine (mac) is an issue with this collection. Amazon was great about returning the entire package - but because their own products have caused me so many headaches. They need to put that warning label on all discs they produce.

It's been awhile since I read the novel that this movie is based on, so perhaps my memory about it was foggy, but I didn't find much of significance in it. The casting was excellent, and there were no major changes from the novels' storyline. Still, for a movie that's more or less a direct adaptation of a novel, most people are probably going to enjoy seeing one version of P&P; instead of--or as well as--the other. The acting was...good.

This book was so much better than A Thousand Splendid Suns, which I'm sure I'll read again just for something different, but in this case there seems to be a lot of things missing. I wanted some explanations about what was going on and what could have happened since we had no hints whatsoever throughout the book.
I couldn't go past the first 15 or so pages. The stories were dull, and uninspiring. While I'm sure some people enjoy these stories, it just wasn't for me. In other words, no me gusto.

A story about a girl that likes to play dress up and go shopping with her friends. Her mom is an awful person who has gotten so angry since moving from Kansas city where the mother was working as a teacher in public education. When they move into what she believes are great new homes for her, it turns out it's one of those "ghetto.houses" she keeps seeing.

This thing worked great for the first year, then started to just randomly make popping noises while attempting to play. My main gripe is it would play a CD one day, and not another until I did some unplugging reseting back in the CD. The second year was slightly less crappy but still very spotty performance, especially with using MP3 discs. In total though, this player lasted only 10 months. I'm so disappointed because it's been such an expensive investment.
Not so much a read as a chore. The characters don't come alive...they were not interesting or engaging. It is hard to finish the book because it lacks any substance.

I'm not sure that i have ever seen such a bad copy of this movie. It was extremely disappointing. From the sound being so terrible, to having lines at all times in white when one should be watching and hearing them black or just plain grainy it is truly awful. The picture quality also looks like there were many problems during production. I got the movie on time from Amazon as usual though. You really need more respect for your customers than doing something that you know will give them trouble.

The picture quality is quite good. It has one of those really small buttons that you have to look carefully and find the right spot for if you're used to a big screen TV. But all in all, it works great. I can take pictures while I'm using it. So, pretty much just as good as my Nikon slr camera. Battery charge also seems pretty good...at least over several pictures. It's kinda like having two cameras on your hands.

I love this product. The sound quality is incredible and it fits comfortably for my ears. It sounds way better than many Beats headset I've own. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great headset at an amazing price.

This is not made of good material. In fact there are only like two or three small metal "plates", one for each side. I do get a little radio station and am about fifteen miles from the TV tower, but all my local channels come in with this antenna. I've wasted four weeks buying antennae to no avail. Will call them today when they return so we can send it back and buy something that works. Oh well. Lesson learned. Wish you luck if its your choice.
The first time this item was used it did what it's supposed to, however, after that, as soon as you unplug and move it, sparks start shooting out of it.

At first, this was a good product. I had to return it twice in 18 months, because the hard drive would not mount up. The last time they sent me a new case, and made sure my unit worked. Now it's been four months with no response from them. Very poor customer service. There is some discussion on their facebook page, but that doesn't help. It has gotten so bad I'm having serious thoughts of never buying any Seagate products again. They don't seem too concerned about quality anymore.
We set up this as home network. Our daughter has one at her house which she loves so when i got mine, we loaded it with photos on usb drives and had our son setup it.

Like the look of this item, but it leaks when closed. I don't know if that is a flaw in my particular mug, or maybe all mugs like this, but I'm glad my new mug has not yet leaked. I'll keep it, however, just to show off as much red as possible on each side of the lid.
Bought this product less than 2 months ago. Started leaking after only using once. This product failed before it was even half full.

They were cheap so you get what you pay for. The plastic is too thin, and after a lot of use they cracked. I just ordered some more from another vendor. And yes, i used the same size cutters my grandma had for 40 years. Those are not available anymore. My bad.
I bought this product about 6 months ago off amazon.
I was expecting more in depth information but it does have some good tips and suggestions. It is not a bad book for someone who has no idea where to start. This book shows the steps to get started.

This review isn't going to be a good one. After seeing the video for The Story of My Life on Youtube I thought that it was the best thing I had ever read. It is definitely NOT what you would consider "good". It really isn't. At first sight, the book appears very sweet and innocent. Its main concern is how God will see each person in their own light regardless if they are "beautiful" or "ugly" - yet even this gets quite perverted at times.

I bought this game for my kids ages 9, 7, and 4 - to play together. The little one just wants it to go on forever because it's her favorite princess movie. Unfortunately, the graphics are not as good a those in the Disney films. Also, the music is terrible, most of which came from Disney--too bad. We stopped playing after an hour due to frustration with what we couldn't do.
Good product. Exactly what we needed for our new digital TV. Will order again when needed.
Not the product i was looking for, although it is sturdy on my wall, had to buy 1 inch screws and go from there. Will be returning it. :(

I got this because of the price and brand name. After using it for a few times now however, I'm disappointed with it and how cheaply it's made.1.) It takes me quite some time to get my hair totally dry after curling it. Not only does every strand stick together, but even when dry, there's still that big wad in back. The first couple washes, by hand, is better than any iron I've ever used.2.) Also, there are no temperature settings.

Bought it to control my garage door opener. My wife is trying to do some home repair so she will be doing most of the driving around with it. Easy install, but does not read signal outside car. It may have been weather related. I had a hard time finding all the wiring which can easily get confused if you don't know what your doing.

I like my new phone cover so much that it is the only reason i kept this stupid phone.... haha love this!! And now to turn off all notifications because im just bored with being bombarded on Twitter at work :)
I'm not sure what people expect from one of these.
Bought this bed because it was cheaper than other options that are almost exactly like it.
Love all the compartments for everything you need and it is compact yet holds a lot. It keeps me organized. Thanks.

No it does not. Its just a generic cheap knockoff. I purchased these for the low price so did not bother to return. However one of each ear bud came with no rubber cover at all. Very disappointing and false advertising. And after only 3 weeks use they are shot. Not worth returning. So basically its more hassle than it's worth. It took almost 5 days for delivery. A good thing that those reviews that say it works for them were correct. The one earphone on two separate sets didn't work.

There are a few things that you will want to know if playing on Wii U. The controller looks different than original Wiimote; not quite right. A lot of little differences. I play it and love the wii control. But some people can tell the difference. So keep in mind it's still your choice, what feel you're looking for.

The game will try to load and then just hang up the game. I have tried everything to resolve this problem. Sometimes you can get it loaded but sometimes not. This is a great computer game, however, if all of the parts are faulty how do they expect people using computers with high specs to play it. There seems no way that this game was tested on an older PC before releasing for purchase. At least it didn't work when I tried.

This is my first tablet and it worked ok for a couple of weeks before i started to have problems with it. The wifi only works in specific spots such as the corner near by or on different levels depending how you place it, which basically means its useless!!!And this happens just over 1 month from purchase, and im returning it tomorrow. Also the screen freezes often during operation, even after changing some settings. I regret buying two tablets within about 3 months of each other.

It's really boring for an adult, but my daughter enjoyed it...I bought this book, expecting to get the one pictured here with 2 pictures that looked sort of like that. What you will actually receive is only just over 50 pages. It's still pretty cool. But not what I thought I'd be purchasing.

I bought this for my son and husband to watch movies on. They like it. The stand does not swivel, but so far has worked as it should. Shipping was fast. Would buy from seller again. All in all a good buy. No complaints after 3 months. Thanks for another quality product. Amazon is the BEST, just wish there were more on Amazon.

There are many good books on this subject - this is not one of them. A very confusing and poorly organized "history book." It goes all over the place with just too much irrelevant information. I don't understand why a book claiming to be about a topic have so little reference materials in its index. Don't waste your money - skip it. This review process gives you no option but to write at least twenty words. Here they are:Disappointed. Will never buy from Amazon again.

If you want fluff with a few plot twists than this is the book for you. But, if it were me, which I doubt, I'd pass on it. It starts out promising, but doesn't get much better. The characters are not deep nor interesting so there simply was nothing about them that made me care or connect to them.
One of those old movies from my young days but still worth seeing if you are interested in French history.

I have the DVD and if not for a bit of glitches it would be great. One problem was that after just one song on it - there is a long delay with sound - but then clears up as soon as you turn off machine. But once this dvd plays - when you hit PLAY again it's back where it started. Very frustrating. Also, several episodes are duplicated onto disk so they run very fast until your ready to move from place 1 to spot 2. 
 Rating: 2.
The battery I received did work but not what i was looking for, however if your phone is compatible with this battery, then you should be fine

Bought this as something decorative around our fireplace. It's nice but really doesn't bring any sparkle to the place. Very dull. Nothing particularly special about it. But the price is right! Also, arrived very quickly. If you like your fireplace all bright yellow, buy it!
Got this for my son in law, he says its good.

I bought the same kind of adapter from another reseller on eBay but was sent a generic unit and had to return it. This is probably just a manufacturing error as several other reviews have pointed out. I noticed others having problems with the device being able to support multiple USB devices. This has NOT been my experience. As for the vendor themselves, good luck. I've heard nothing back so far, including an email asking where I'm coming from. The product works fine, but this vendor doesn't even respond.

You can read that I am a BIG fan of George Martin but this release of the original albums is an absolute disgrace. There are NO bonus tracks whatsoever! They have thrown in only two tracks. The album has been severely cut down from 18 CDs to 16 and they put back all three instrumental versions (side two) of "My Love" as well as 5 remixes not found on ANY OF THE OTHER Beatles albums (and believe me, these ones aren't very good remixes!).

As a fan of Robert B Parker, I have read just about every one of Parker's books published before his death. There are some books that you have to buy and put aside for years but this is not one among them. The first third or so was the worst I've ever read. It dragged on painfully as Parker seems incapable of finishing anything he starts.

Got into this as the reviews looked pretty good. Was a huge disappointment. The book and authors seem to be more interested in making money than writing a true mystery. The dialogue is so amateurish it distracts from any interest or anticipation built up. I finished it, though, hoping he would turn it around. I didn't. A few of them got me. Then he seems to want all his characters, especially women, killed, so they will go away for awhile. It doesn't leave enough space for plot movement.

The product that I received did not match in the description what was advertised. It is NOT a "true red," which looks reddish orange or maybe even pink. Instead, its really more of tan and doesn't pop as red on my skin. That said, it applies smoothly and makes good blush, but it isn't anything like the one i saw at the MAC counter (although they sell both.
Not happy at all no longer work after two years :(. Waste of money. They need to stick to sound products.

The description claims a DVD in this package but it wasn't there. I was very disappointed that after waiting for almost two months, and paying $7.00, the package was never delivered. This is my second order from Amazon and again, it did not arrive. I'm rating Amazon's third party vendor as "bad" because he made no effort to deliver it. My advice is, don't waste your money! If you get this, then make sure it's going to be new when sent otherwise go somewhere else.

Although there is some very good info concerning the workings of the Federal Court system, it was presented in a way that became extremely repetitive. There were also errors not mentioned by other reviewers. If you are planning on buying this book, then check it out at your library. I would have liked to see more practical advice--rather than what may be considered "fictional" advice.

I was very excited to read this book based on the description. However, when it arrived and once i cracked open the dust jacket, all i saw were 3 simple pictures of the 2 models posing together in a pose that's nothing that couldn't be found much more tastefully with any magazine. This is not what you expect when buying a book by celebrity photographer. I also did have high expectations for some great color photos but after looking at them under natural light they just come across as dark and washed out.
I liked reading the true relationship between two troubled teens. There could have been more details given on each situation. The book was somewhat sad throughout as well.

I received this book for review free from Waterbrook Multnomah via Blogging For Books..This is a novel based on God's plan concerning the destruction of man and woman by fire with 2 million souls killed. And it's written in the form if what could easily be considered preachy sermons. I'm really not into the modern "Christian" fiction genre but after reading the description I thought I'd give it a try. At first glance, I see why people would like it.

Its an ok book. I mean its ok. I've no issue with buying books to read once and forget about. This one is a decent read. The story could have been developed much better than it was. It felt like it was just over before it started. But then again since this isn't the first book of yours that I read, I won't really hold this as any type of standard. I enjoyed reading it. Not saying you are wrong for it, but I'd recommend it.
Fits well, came as advertised. Installed easily with no modification needed. Works well at night. Very good value for money.
This item didn't cost much and doesn't last very long.
If you've got the need of this cable, it's better than original one! Very good pricing, which means it's best you buy extra like me. Good luck :)
This came as advertised.
This is the second time I buy a book from amazon. The first was this one, and it had horrible page numbers, typos, etc... But after reading that book, I've decided never to try buying another.

I have been using this for a few months now and it is working great! the cover makes an excellent shield from wind, etc. Easy to set up and take down. It will even fit back in its pouch that came with it. Would highly recommend this.
Nice machine. We use it daily at work. Our old one started leaking after 5 months of use. Would recommend to others.

Don't waste your money. This will not work for more than 10 minutes even if you have brand new batteries. Then it stops. Just like that. Do yourself a favor. Look elsewhere. The book is quite interesting but a bit too descriptive and the pictures were somewhat blurry. Some of these paintings are so beautiful that I wished for more clarity in my mind to see them. All said, it was worth every penny. Would make an excellent gift and conversation piece.

The only complaint it really has is that there was a defect on one of the shelves. I would purchase again for small spaces. Well made,as expected from Ikea. A great buy. Very solid construction.

I bought these, and received them. They are too large in size.. The fit is okay. The length comes to just above the middle part of my calf at it's widest point. So, my calves get very hot during these workouts. Not sure how they would do with larger ones. They feel like walking on sandpaper. If you have normal size calves, then this review wouldn't apply. But as it is, after wearing them once only for a 15 minute bike ride, i had blister lines. Also, no cushion whatsoever.
The power plug fell out within 30 days of purchase with light use. It won't stay in. Had to buy replacement.

i bought this because it looked very pretty on a store shelf.....now that i got the darn thing, its really big and heavy, you can barely see anything in it. just an average looking mirror! would recommend better made ones from the dollar store! save your money!

I ordered this for a small room to store the cat food and supplies. It works ok but doesn't go full circle. The bottom is not leveled. It took only a couple of days for my cats to figure out how this is supposed to work. Do not buy this cd. The only good thing about it is the price. I am a fan of old 80's rock and roll, but these songs make me cringe. They have no soul or heart, they suck all you think are great lyrics in to "songs" for easy listening only.

This book is about a kid who wants to be the best and tries hard (it's too bad I couldn't give this thing ZERo), but ends up being bullied by other kids with different abilities. It's full of stereotypes, which means that all kinds of people will relate to it. Don't waste your time. Read something better! The author needs to find some new friends - not so many as most readers have now! It was just boring for me.

We received this book and gave it to my son for his fourth birthday. The page numbers are on one side with the content of a story on the other side. He quickly learned how to read off of that, but I worry that he's not absorbing all of it. It seems like it's just pictures - very low level books.

Great for my puppy. I have a puppy and wanted to purchase her something so this would protect her from scratching as well as prevent further chewing. The fabric seems durable. She still gets it with the treats but doesn't chew on everything. It has held up nicely.

I love the first 2 books, but this book just plain irritated me. It's like watching a movie you knew from the start wasn't going to be as good that your friend had wanted for weeks, and it gets better by the third installment. The way he made out with her was just so unrealistic (not even worth mentioning), and also how he always makes everyone seem so nice yet never gives anyone any money. He just seems very unloveable, like he's some sort of con man.

This was an average book. I have read some of her other books and they were a little more interesting than this one. As much as she writes about food, it needs to at the least be entertaining. She should try new things like how do you start your next book without using the "food porn" term when talking about food? The beginning where she tells stories with recipes, doesn't sound appetizing & seems out done here. It really is better than a lot that are written today.

I just read this for the first time and while it was enjoyable, there were quite a few glaring issues/problems. Secondly, I'm not entirely sure if we're told what era but they seem more like Victorian times. When reading other reviews about the language, etc., I can't help but thinking how much we might improve with modern techniques.
the product is extremely poor quality. i put it on...within 30 seconds one of the clips came off. don't waste your money. you are better off trying something else. im very unhappy with this purchase.

This book makes the mistake of trying to use "facts" and data sources that may be inaccurate or incomplete. The author did a good job at compiling all this information, but was unable to do it justice as written in my opinion. As I read more about it, I am realizing what is missing. Perhaps others have made better observations on various subjects than I. But, if you are interested in statistics you will learn some, which might help make your point better. Overall, however, it's not a bad read.

Not the real product. It seems to get hot in the middle and then shuts off. It's not worth it. It did cost me more than it was worth. I'm so disappointed. I should have gone with my gut on this one. What a waste of money. I've had good experiences from amazon, but I'll be hesitant again.

We had a cat that was suffering since we got her in the past. The vet put us on this product and when she started to take it, almost all of her symptoms improved. She is back to full health now - as in, she's going up 5 stairs again at home without limping, etc. It takes some time for your kitty (and cats) to adjust but it works. This is a very heavy duty pan and it has performed well since I purchased it. However, just like several other reviewers, the coating of this pot came off at the edges after two weeks or so. It must have gotten to me before they were made. They need a better finishing. We will use if when we think that our current one gets too scratched up, but cannot afford another set until either the finish is improved or the product becomes more robust. As a result, I give it 2 stars.
The good: It makes very solid smoothies. We use soy milk with it.

Didn't work at all for me! Tried several times to use this with an electrical drill, and found that after 10 minutes I had only got minimal amounts of paint on, not enough to really do much with.

I bought this printer to replace an Epson that died unexpectedly. Since the older one was so good, and since HP generally makes good printers, I went with that. Unfortunately while it's a nice printer it has some quirks which drive me crazy. What might work well for you but doesn't for someone else, like when printing on regular copy paper (matte or gloss) the pages come out all wavy and jaggy. This set of headphones is perfect for my needs. I will be purchasing a second one soon to complete the set. They work great and are easily as comfortable or better than some that I've tried. For the price you really get your money's worth. I'd recommend this product to anyone who wants a decent pair at an affordable price. These were originally priced @ 100.00 dollars. The item arrived in good condition although it was larger than I expected. It is a great value for my money.

This is the only book that I haven't finished. It took me too long to read it. The story had potential but it was too hard to follow. This is a good game and quite a lot of fun to play. It took me about an hour to finish it. Not sure if I lost interest. My 10 year old enjoyed it as well. Overall I'd say its pretty much for kids who are at least 9 or older. A few words with little ones will bring you up short. If your looking for something that requires no thought, just simple gaming this seems like the best game. Good price too. Enjoy!

This book is okay, but I find it disappointing in that the first two projects (the quilting pillow/bag and the blanket) are so basic and uninspiring you could come up with one of them yourself. The third project (which uses beads to build a basket) was much better when she used beads for the beadwork design. Overall, this has some really good ideas as well, but they aren't very exciting or unique.

This is my second one of these bottles. The first one I had for 8 years and it finally wore out (I dropped it, the tip got loose, so it leaked). My only complaint about this bottle compared to other bottles I've had, which have different functions, are that you really cannot take advantage of any kind or heat setting at all. So, if you're in a car with windows down, no heater on, put hot water in, then turn on your heater, you still don't get anywhere close to boiling enough.

Just like everyone else, my cord melted as I used it on the laptop. Would not recommend anyone buying this product. Waste of money for $20. Do yourself a favor and go to Best Buy or Office Depot and get one that costs $15 bucks. Your results should be better.

The quality of the product was good, it does run a little big, I would probably order at least 1 size bigger than usual next time. But over all like it. It did give me enough room if your thinking about ordering go up from what you normally wear, but even with this extra size, everything fit. Just have to get used to wearing them more. Great for summer or just when it's chilly.

After much searching I am so happy with this. Perfect fit just as described and the quality is great. If you want to replace a damaged cord that came with your camcorder then this one would be perfect for you. Don't take chances trying other brands because some are not good. Good luck! :)

I am trying to get a replacement but when you purchase it the box is sealed at all times and in new condition- it was sent without any packing materials. so the product has been tampered with before they got it. Amazon needs better inventory controls that prevent things like this from happening.
This is the original movie and very good. You won't be disappointed. A must purchase for everyone who can afford it! Thank you so much!!

Just got and installed this light. Installing took about 20 minutes. The lights seem better than the OEM which were broken off and cracked. I really could have repaired them by myself but in hindsight I'm glad it was just an assembly. Overall, a good buy if you need some replacements. The only down side (not sure what to expect on the color temperature range), there is no blue tint like my original factory lights. These replaced the yellow ones though.

The only complaint I had was that the packaging did not protect it while shipping, therefore it arrived with a couple of cracks. The product works well and is fairly quiet. It's been on for about 1 week now without problems. Will probably get several years use before looking to replace it. Good value considering price per day.

I do love my new air purifier. The price was great and the delivery of it to me was really fast. It works great at keeping this large bedroom smelling fresh. There is a blue light in front so you know it's on even if there's not any humidity present. My biggest complaint would be that I have only had it for about 3 weeks now but, all things considered, I'm pleased.
This was an enjoyable, quick read. The detective character is entertaining despite being very predictable.
This product came in handy after we broke our tripod. The price made me think that this would be cheap stuff. Its not. Very durable, very sturdy. Great quality product.

Too many unnecessary twists in storyline. No way could I get into it and kept waiting for the story to wrap up. But this just left me feeling as if there were no conclusion. It seems like it dragged on forever with out any real story. Don't waste your time.

We were able to get one channel to work using this antenna, only 2 stations and not very well, but the picture was clear when no weather is present. Once we turned on an outdoor antenna (different brand) in our attic, which also receives 8 channels all day long for free, more than 100 channels, including a couple from about 4 states away, crystal clear, even though there are trees in between us.
Great price. Good sound. Easy pairing. Fits well even on small ears.

The book started out okay and seemed promising. I thought to myself that this will be a good read, however, the plot of the story made absolutely no sense. It was almost laughable how everyone in town lived like it never happened. It's as if they had all read the same soap opera novel. This is obviously not realistic or it's something an unexperienced author would attempt with no preparation. Please, save your money for another book. I'd say it's really poorly written.

You have to hold your arm down and rock back & forth or lean forward if you use this thing for even a half hour. It's pretty loud but also has some kind of "popping" sound in it. I gave this product one star only because it comes with two ear pads so my child can wear them without feeling like his ears are being crushed.

I ordered a set of these in the past. The old ones were good. These, not so much. Half would pop off when used. They have changed them and now they don't work. Wish I'd bought locally. Now out $30. Thanks amazon for selling me. I can't find my old ones. These aren't that comfortable either. I'll stick with good ole ear buds from now!

I really don't know who the author of "Sins Of Our Own" was -- I've read several books on this subject and, as an anthropologist, have long studied African social customs. She has little grasp of anthropology, except perhaps for knowing that she attended college. ( Sidenote: A good anthropologist should be able to pick up a phrase or two, but not enough to write his own book.) For one example, he refers repeatedly to "oral traditions.
I bought some of these in 2007 and still use 4 years later at the local farmer's market. The first one is cracked from wear but no fault to them. Great product for a really good price.

These books were better than previous ones, but I found I was getting tired of the long drawn out descriptions. However, I will still read more. That way I can feel at home in their world. But for me, it seemed these ones should have been made into one book.
There are some cables that just don't do the job.
This books takes us into a world filled with the same conflict that we all know from our everyday life.

These things feel very flimsy and thin. The plastic feels almost disposable in comparison. I have only had them for 6 months and already one ear bud is not even working. I've never used the buds at excessive volumes but when it comes right down to it, they just don't last. It would take me a few weeks tops before these were no good, let alone 2 months. It's too bad because i really liked them.

It didn't work and we tried to charge it over night. Nothing happened. I can't tell you much about it. Maybe if the power goes out we'll have more luck. We'll see. We are in Houston right now so maybe that will help. But so far? No dice. It's a real disappointment. The box had been torn open by someone & they put some junk papers into the box. Not very professional!!

Nice size, easy to handle, and makes great hot water. I was hesitant at first because the price seems high, but well worth it! Now my mother can brew her favorite tea by herself. I gave it a 4/5 only because its difficult to determine how much water is needed. Also, you have to open one part of this pot each time after brewing (not very convenient) which does not make me love it any less. Overall, though, really nice product.

Did not work. Tried everything but it just wouldn't work. Not happy with the product, I had bought several for Christmas gifts and one from a different seller broke right away did not expect this to be any different. Please send me another unit or money. Or refund. Because Im out $23.00 because you sent a defected unit. Will update on refund when return is completed. Thanks.... Karen
I bought this as a gift. The recipient was pleased to receive it and use it. She said the color is good, easy to install on her bed. It has met all expectations, so far.
My friend recommended this book to me. I read it quickly, and found it to be quite an interesting story with a good message. A nice fast read.

When I started watching this movie it didn't really seem to have anything going for it. The movie is mainly about what it's like when you're in a relationship - no romance or anything. They should make movies/movies that are solely based on relationships instead of love stories. Also the characters were not all very likable. Some characters even bordered on being annoying, like how much they loved their jobs and stuff but yet got so frustrated at having them. A bit childish imo.

I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 9 year old grand daughter, after seeing it in the toy aisle of the large store where she shopped. She LOVES her Leap Pad and we even went shopping at Amazon to find additional apps so that both devices could play together. The problem is that you must have an IPad/IPod or Kindle Fire. We don't own any of those items but thought having them be able to access most things via WIFI.
I'm glad I went with this instead of buying Apple's version. Works great. Lasts longer than stock. No complaints. Recommended. Would buy again. Very Happy. Arrived on time. Thank you Amazon!
This is THE best weeding gadget! It really works.

I bought this to use for my new iMac 15", which has a DVD drive (usb) but no card slot. When the product arrived, it was smaller than expected, about half of its size. However, after trying it in two drives from different manufacturers and several DVD-RW discs, I'm satisfied enough with it. It's not fast, nor is it quiet; It operates much more quietly (and less noisily) then my USB optical drive. If you just want something that's portable and cheap, try this.
I was able to use these on my car tires about one time before the black rubber hose had a hole in it and began leaking water. Do not waste your money.
I'm a fan of everything about this show. It is entertaining and makes you want to see what will happen next.
What could be bad? Only about 10 songs, not enough for $22.
Just too confusing for me with the multiple plot lines. Very difficult to follow, couldn't get interested in one story line after another. Did not finish book. What a waist of time.

I know this series is getting bad reviews. But that shouldn't stop you from reading them. There are just too many plot gaps in the story. And while a few grammatical errors aren't the end of the world, it does throw off my enjoyment during reading. As another reviewer wrote, I'm no literary professional, but as someone who reads daily newspapers, blogs, and books related to psychology, I'm often confused by some writing when there seems to be so much "filling" going on.
The book was good for what it was. However the characters are not well developed enough to keep you interested from start to finish.

I have used these for a while. They work every time. No problems as long you place them correctly. If u need to use two in a pinch leave one of them out and remove the second one. Not sure why they are on back order though but i recommend this product to everyone.

The title says it all. Did these people think that Americans would read about or care very much what the British considered important in their literature? This is especially true since Churchill was from England. It seems to me as if this book tried too hard. Too often I had lost interest because of how many British titles are written while having nothing at all to do with WWII.

They are soft and absorbent, but for me, these sheets would shrink too much to use daily. I have a variety of sizes from Queen through XL & they did not fit my deep mattress. They made the bed super wrinkly with no pillow case at all, which defeats having them in any form. If you get these, look up dimensions if your mattress is wider than standard queen size sheets.

This is an absolute waste of money. I received a free sample after buying this so it was never used. One bottle looked like it had been opened, and the liquid wasn't that great. The smell did not last longer than 2 hours. If you can afford to pay for something better at least buy a new one instead of saving money on this. It will take only 10 minutes tops before all of these wonderful lotions just start looking cheap.
Interesting book. Enjoyed it.
The necklace itself is absolutely gorgeous.

I bought this product to fix some scratches on an exterior brick wall of my home. The instructions were easy enough and it worked as promised. However, after only a month, the finish looked like it was flaking. My paint is fairly new, so I've tried sealing off these spots several times with various kinds of products and sealers, but they just continue to get worse - not better.

My car needed this bulb and it seemed they have never been available locally. This was an affordable way around that problem. It works great. Not sure what else there is to say except if you need it, it's hard to beat this. Buy it.

I think this car seat is great. It seems easy to clean, comfortable enough even when my daughter fell asleep, and the fabric feels good. My only complaint would be that the crotch belt tends toloosen quite a bit as she gets bigger. We are able ot retighten it, but it's usually loose in the car.
After only five weeks of use, the bottom came off both pots now leaking boiling water through it's seams which will ruin my counter top when I'm finished cooking.
The shower head works well and doesn't drip when taking down shower.

My dog likes it and the price with shipping was much lower than my local pet store. I ordered a second one. Delivery on time. Thank you Amazon.com for offering high quality items at great prices. I'm an old guy who wants to enjoy life long without having to worry about what or where we can get things like this that are of good quality. Thanks again. Happy Trails. Larry L.

Don't waste your money on this. The quality is very poor. It's not even worth the $2 I spent to rent these films. You will be extremely disappointed if you're a fan who expects high standards from this set. Save your money for something better. If you have any doubts about how awful it really is, just watch the first short before you buy it. Then skip through all of them, because they are simply terrible. There weren't that many moments in each movie where anyone looked like he was going to cry.

If you love watching people talk and make up funny names these are for you. The stories tell us we can't think as an individual in a group of people, but it's good to see some different ways of showing it. I would recommend this show over the newer reality shows. We used the dvd for background noise while on our treadmill. Love the show. :-)

I have had this same type of unit for about 10 years and love them. I also own the small version and use it regularly. This larger model seems well built. Only has two heat settings but they are much more comfortable than all other similar products I've tried. The auto shut off works well, although is probably just as efficient to keep turning the grill on with a light turn if there isn't anything being grilled. Also be sure to follow instructions"

I have read all of Clancy's books. This one was not up to par for me though. It just didn't seem as tight and believable even though it had the typical elements of a Clancy novel. If you are looking for an easy read, this would be good but otherwise I'd go elsewhere next time.
Very good show.
The price is what makes this an outstanding value.

Not what is pictured at all - one bulb works fine. The 2nd one only flickered or sometimes went out. It still worked with the 1st bulb. One in each housing were cracked and wouldn't hold any bulb after that. A waste of $ for us we needed extra work lamps now.

This short story would have been better if it was longer. That said, it's well written & interesting but felt like an unfinished draft as there were no clear or convincing plot lines (lots left unsaid) just hints that these characters might actually lead somewhere.

I got this for my mother because she LOVES to listen to books--the books on tape only get worse with age and so we wanted something that was easy to use, simple in appearance, portable and of quality. This seemed the perfect product: inexpensive and it sounds good enough for a cassette player to have on your desk or at work but not too cheap looking. BUT after having tried it, I've noticed two things.

The film does have an interesting premise that works well, although the writing is often not as strong as could be. Also there aren't many memorable scenes or characters. There's also some graphic sex scenes, presumably so they'd be rated R, if only they weren't constantly thrown in your face with such regularity I couldn't tell what actually makes them "hot".

One of the great things about this book is that it attempts to weave a complex story from all those short stories. It's not perfect, but it's entertaining and worth reading. There's some good plot twists, particularly towards the end. The writing style isn't bad, there are few grammatical errors, only small continuity mistakes. Overall, at under $7, I consider this, more than likely, one of the better self-published ebooks on Amazon right now.
Perfect fit, light and easy to handle. Does not leak or drip. Great value on price, too. No problems at all. Thanks
This is advertised as a product that fits all cars with an original antenna adapter. It DOES NOT, it has to be cut at the end so you can thread in and out. Very dissapointed by this product.

I picked this one up for my son based on a recommendation from his music teacher. It was awful. The first couple chords were OK, then the rest of it went totally out of tune. So bad that I could barely make anything resembling what I had heard him play. It's not even really possible to figure how badly done because he can't play all the notes. My daughter learned just as badly. We returned it. If you actually want to do something right get yourself any other classical children's music.

My dog won't use them... They are so hard and not at all worth the cost.... I would never purchase this brand again. It did ship quickly though. Oh well. I will give them to somebody who has a small dog. Very disappointed!

I tried to play it with multiple players including ps3 & wii and nothing worked except the first level where this thing actually made you lose some of your progress!!! The graphics and story are fun up until that point. For me though, it's not worth 60 dollars. And even though it's very hard to get a pass on this, I'm going for my money back since I don't think they should sell this crap knowing how stupid we are. They need to be ashamed to call themselves gamers.

I bought this product because it appeared that it contained more than one type of oil. This is not the case. I thought I was getting a great deal but ended up paying over $6 in shipping for two very small bottles with plastic caps. They must be sold via bulk order and shipped direct to my house. Ridiculous! Also, they both have an overpowering odor like fresh fish.
They didn't work. I'm pretty disappointed with my purchase of this product. I have another pair that we like just as well and it cost less.

This thing is worthless. It is not what it says to be. I tried using the power tip and a regular cord - that was worse then nothing. Maybe i got something wrong but I am not happy with it. Waste of money. Do not buy! Save yours for another one.

The product works well but it is very cheaply made. However I suppose the price reflects this and if you plan on only using for a few months then its fine. Not as durable or rugged looking as an OEM one. It would have been nice to know that upfront. Hopefully they improve their quality control in the future. Overall for the price, it's worth getting when there are no other options like this! Will get at least two years out of them which was our goal so far with these.
Not really sure what happens when my son pulls of the cord, but these work great at extending his iPad charger cable.
I think that the book was a waste of time and money. It seems to have been written by someone with absolutely no writing ability. Sorry, but it wasn't great.
The stories were very touching. Sad but heartwarming all in one :) well worth reading! would recommend. Good book.
Interesting concept but poor execution.

Did not fit my lamp, but I'm sure it does just fine for others. It looked like you have 3 choices. When it arrived in a box without any packing material which only added to it's damage. There are bubbles on the inside of one lamp.

The charger arrived in a timely manner and its working very well. Very easy installation...no problems with the fit or connection. It does seem to get hotter then my last one which could be because it is new but other than that, I have had no problems so far, seems like good value for money as long as nothing happens to it.
The product is what he needed to combat foot fungus. It really works.

This book was just ok. There were a couple points that I had to look up on the internet as this information is not available in English on the internet. Also, the whole thing about you having multiple partners all at once and having sex in a shower with your boyfriends friend if he sleeps around also seems really far fetched. Overall, maybe it's okay to read when you're depressed but otherwise don't waste ur money or time. You might be pleasantly surprised...
This has turned out to work pretty great for our needs.
My son likes to paint pictures on our walls when he comes over, and for Christmas, we put up two posters in his room.

I read all the reviews here, and although most people seemed to really like this machine, they were probably swayed by the overwhelmingly positive ones. I'm sorry. It's junk. There is no way we could have used it without a lot of very loud grinding sounds. The plastic grinder chamber was so tightly packed, though, that you would actually be unable to open it, except with a hacksaw or similar tool.

This song brought tears to my eyes during one of our worship services. Definitely helps you focus on God. One day when you're praying and feeling discouraged, ask JESUS into your life. He doesn't have time to answer any questions or do anything in his busy day, so let Jesus in. God loves you.
I have never written any reveiw or left one in my life but this one felt right...... First off all of these so called "expansions" are really nothing more then DLC that cost 10 bucks an expansion.
This book was not well written. It left me wanting more. I did enjoy the ending though. That's about all there is good to say about this book.

The story begins quite well then quickly turns into a "who dunnit?" with characters not really likeable. I was expecting a book about the author's marriage to the lead actress. Instead, all we have is an author on why she gave up writing and what it felt like for her at that time. The best bits were when the actress talked about being pregnant with their first child. If something of interest doesn't come along, she'll soon get back in action.

This is a very sturdy device with excellent range and reliability. I really like that there are no wires attached. The price to value ratio was just right as well. As always the shipping from Amazon beat other vendors. You cannot go wrong buying this item. Just remember it does not have automatic off for when you're away, you do need to push an orange button on both units before turning them off. Also remember they only use one battery at a time. Buy in advance if possible. Highly recommended.   Rating: 5.

I chose this book after reading the other reviews on Amazon. What a let down! It's not that great, maybe if there was less detail about each person's life and more of what happened to everyone at one time or another. All very boring and no thrills!

The product is good and I use it to make my hair silky smooth at the end of styling. Only reason this did not give 5 stars is because I wish the lid was easier to close and stay latched. But with that said, a very easy process for applying products such as this, which can be used on damp hair. The price can't argue about either!! Love it. Will definitely buy again. Great product.

This has been available on sale now for quite some time & you would do much better to buy it that try to justify paying full price if there was a lower priced version as well. If you want this DVD, just wait till it's on sale then purchase it. There are lots of other good films out that actually deserve the HD treatment. My recommendation is pass right by this. It isn't worth your time. You can find the same quality info in countless youtube videos.

I love this product! When the power goes out or my cell phone drops down to 1%-it is a life saver! Very easy to set up and works great!! Now we will never miss any important events because of our cellphone!!! Definitely recommend this product!!! I like that once you start using it, they tell u when you are not connected. It has also helped eliminate some lost sleep when your electricity may be out...lol....

This book is an excellent introduction to the field of digital photography and its application in areas such as film, still photography,and videography. It was published several years ago, but should be a mandatory read for anyone who shoots digital. I would also recommend Mr. Kaplany's other book, "Digital Cameras" which deals with many aspects besides digital photography.
I've purchased MANY different types of brushes over the years, including pet stores.

My wife and i have loved these books for years. I would keep buying them every year in hardcover because they are simply wonderful. This edition, however, is a complete misrepresend. The book itself was fine but rather than having the hard cover it is now printed on, which after much use, has begun to come apart on two pages. The second page started falling out shortly thereafter. It seems as though there must be some kind of poor quality control going on.
Good price good quality I love it works great when you just want a quick cup of coffee. The glass is very nice and not too heavy or bulky to have on the counter.
If you love reading about his family as if they weren't real. Boring story line. No action at all.
This has work perfectly so far. It does exactly what it says it does. Very easy setup and worked first time.

One star is too low!The lamp itself is fine the issue are with the metal shade that wraps around the light bar! They leave a thick seam at the front which leaves dark black marks all over my walls no matter how much rubbing alcohol you use...we had to buy another lamp...
My dog love these, they don't smell bad. Its not greasy, you just chew it up like regular treats. And its natural for the dog.

I bought this for my 4 year olds birthday party. It was a great hit at the party, but after one use, I can not get them off of me! They have all fallen to the floor with the batteries in place, and none ever turned on anymore. The seller is great, so I had no problem getting replacements.

Just not well made at all. If the company can offer replacement parts, even for their flimsy plastic parts - that would be awesome. I returned this because it did not fit right, and was very flimsy plastic. I'm a bigger guy, so being light was definitely more important than sturdiness of this chair. Not impressed. It is going back as I don't want to pay another $40 shipping plus $22 return on it. Guess you get what u pay for! :(

Good value and you get to add a book with the kindle. The kindle cover looks good so when it is closed it isn't bulky. But it seems cheaply made compared with the case I bought 3 years ago. It will work until I find another.
Don't recommend this product. The software works by plugging in a USB key into the computer but not connecting it directly through USB.

This did not work from the get go:1. The CD needed to be formatted with FAT 32 format; this took 8 hours.2. It would hang for several minutes sometimes when installing Windows 7...3. If you can even install and run it then it's useless. There's no support available after purchase. It's basically a paperweight. Don't waist your time. I bought an HP that works flawlessly as soon I returned this piece of junk. The only thing it really does is connect wirelessly.
the quality of the product is great but be aware that if your dog likes getting up on them you will have to buy a separate training collar.

I thought this book was a joke, it is not funny. I'm sorry to tell you but there isn't anything funny about that. She needs some new material.... This lady can write better than this. It's no wonder people have never heard of her. Her books are the reason all these writers don't get noticed. At least Diane Feinstein would be out her door if she wrote something this bad.
It does exactly what I wanted. Just snap in and the cover snaps on. Easy to hold when reading. Love it.
I love this book. It was a great read!!!

I have had mine for about a year now and was so very disappointed in all it has to offer. After 4 months, the GPS started not wanting to turn on at all. It took me forever before finally working again, but then just after being gone from home one night, turns out that part of my screen went black! Tried updating it, did that, even got new maps installed as well.

This is a great looking item. However, when it arrived, I found that there was no "lock" for the front latch. To keep your stuff safe, it's important to have some sort of lock like this, and these bags come nowhere close as far as security. As they say, you get what you pay for... In this case, I bought something other than what is advertised. Amazon really needs to improve their advertising regarding locks. I'm returning mine.
This is a nice quality poster from the series. It's printed on good paper, and has some beautiful artwork. I would purchase it again.

This item did not work. I wanted to return it but the time had pass and I tried connecting a new computer. It kept giving me problems trying to install it. I ended up just using my old USB 1 hub. Don't waste your money. If you have an IOGear product they are great. But this is a very cheap made product. I don't recommend buying any of their products. Spend another $20 for something decent. In fact if there were no negative reviews I'd give Amazon 10 stars in reviews.

This is one of the worst books I've ever looked at and read. It's just a waste of time. Save yourself 4 days with your friend (who isn't reading as well), read something, anything! You will actually learn more watching paint dry. In all seriousness.

The plastic is so cheap that even with the adjustable legs, it does not stand up straight. And mine arrived broken. When I called them about it, they offered to send a replacement if I'd return this one. That just pisses me off. They're ripping off customers. It was pretty bad quality. Not what you see on tv or in stores. Plus since there are no directions and it's very hard because of the size, you'll definitely need someone who can help assemble it. There were tons of parts as well.
The concept of these shelves is nice. They are flexible and can adjust easily as desired based upon my needs. Problem is, the welds that connect both ends are weak.

Looks cute on my ipod, and it's easy to remove when needed. It also comes with three different design options(white, blue, brown). However, they fall off easily if you try to take them off. Other than that, it does just what it's supposed to!

This product was very easy to set up (took about 30 seconds) but the remote control didn't work after 2 months! I called customer support and they had me do what he said on page 29 of the manual: take a look into reset button, etc. Even though this did not work, their tech could only suggest that it might have been "user error". It's an okay product, just beware while setting up. It definitely deserves one star for faulty product.

Very interesting story but I had a hard time reading this book because of the punctuation and word usage errors. There were so many errors that I think it was proof read before publishing. It's like they never reviewed the text or spellcheck. Also, when one character started to describe himself, there would be sentences describing another characters feelings towards him, even though he hadn't acted toward him for several chapters now. It seemed confusing. Overall an okay story, pretty well written until about mid-way through.

Excellent performance and sound quality. I have been using with an MP3 player to listen to audio books, which it does wonderfully. However, there are a couple of things that bother me about the unit, both when playing music on it itself as well as through my phone. First is the headphone jack. In order for the headphones jack inside unit to work, you need to open up the side door, or just slide your right thumb around the edge until you can slip in what seems like two wires.

Not really worth the price or effort. You only get 25 pages of information. Very little detail. The other reviews are accurate, it is a small book. Just don't buy it. Use your own knowledge. It's easy to do, and the pictures are fun to look at. Better ideas can be found online for free. Skip this one. If you want, check out Google Images because you'll find good ones for FREE. Save $16.
This heater works really well. You set temp's to desired amount of temperature,its a lot like a big space heater. It will blow cold air into room very quickly.

If you've got a cat and you're looking for food that is affordable AND good, this has to be one of the best choices. All three are absolutely delicious & healthy. I love being able to order from Amazon because delivery is such an easy matter - you just have to watch out for your cats eating so much food, they get picky over their dry food! Highly recommended!

I never received my purchase. Amazon said that it was "delayed by the mail." My grandson loved this. He loves cars and anything John Deere. When we contacted Amazon.com they kept saying they were refunding our money, when nothing is refund. It's been almost 2 months. My grandson's birthday isn't for two weeks yet but we're having to come up with what to do without a gift this Christmas. So disappointed! This seller doesn't seem trustworthy.
I did not enjoy this movie. It was a bit too far out there for me. We also didn't appreciate the heavy use of cuss words when no other language is used. It would have been better without all the.

This one is more of a history lesson from some guy in the early days. The music he played may not have been what those who are listening to it today. No doubt I heard him on this show and that was about it. Good thing there were more popular acts. There were many great performers before Jim Croce. He certainly wasn't like them. A very good introduction to all the performers. Not his best CD - but I'm glad someone did. The songs weren't bad just not great. 
 Rating: 3.

Interesting story but a little hard reading in certain places. But all in all, it is a good read. Not sure if anyone really survives this type of torture. Perhaps only one does. It's quite an interesting story. Recommend reading it.
It is okay. not as interesting or interesting storyline. I would read other books from the same author. Easy and a good read. Enjoy!

I expected it to hold many CDs but after two months, the center part of one side fell off. So, now everything falls on its own. In fact some CD slots only open 90 degrees, so you can't put a jewel or anything else in them. The other things are OK and it's nice that you can stack them up. It's also very nice. But not sure how long it'll last. There is lots worth buying right now, that's why I bought this. Now I'm going shopping. My recommendation - look elsewhere.

If you're looking for just an easy read that's more romance than realism, grab this series. Otherwise, keep looking, they're all pretty undeveloped. The stories are like Harlequin Presents without the sex. Some spoilers here:- For some reason you only get two brothers in each book...

A long time ago I bought this and then a second one some years later in part to have them on hand for an upcoming trip. While the other was wonderful, being able to charge my camera battery inside of it from within provided greater convenience. This one, however, when received, had no power at all whatsoever. Even charging something directly into the wall socket gave you less output. Save your money and buy something better. You'll thank me later.

I have loved this book since it first came out, but the new translation and style don't reflect what is actually written in The Lord of the Rings. It reads more like fantasy than story with some odd word choices thrown in. At first, even though reading them one after another was difficult, they were a fun escape read, which the author did well by giving each character their own voice in his writing.
This was purchased as an accessory gift for a 7-year-old friend.

The product does exactly what is says it does. I'm a computer support specialist. I've been using this device since 2011 and no problems at all. I wouldn't take the risk with any other brand unless you have really heavy use of your computer. Great product.

I was disappointed in this book. It didn't seem as informative nor did any of the recipes include ingredients to make. In my opinion, it was too expensive. It's a waste of money, unfortunately. I've tried several different dishes with success - not sure why these recipes didn'twork either. The photos were lovely. Not one I'd share or buy again. My opinion doesn't necessarily reflect on Amazon or the book itself. Thank you. Mary Lou Anderson
This headset offers clear sound, decent fit (adjustable to get it snug), relatively compact and light weight, and best of all an easy to store battery source.

I picked this unit up in the mid eighties...it was priced right at $19.95 and looked great to bring into my classroom. The first one lasted about a year, but only intermittently, never turning on or recording anything. It quit completely with very light use. This time around, mine had died too, so now we have two faulty units.

A fascinating but sometimes tedious read. If you are truly interested in the actual life and times of Joan of Arc, this is not an easy way to do it. I was intrigued with some of what he wrote, as well it should be. Unfortunately, that interest did not, for me, translate into a greater understanding or appreciation on my part for her story. There were so many details mentioned regarding things such as clothing, how she lived, etc.
This thing works perfectly if you are tired of your other adapter getting loose from time to time.
At first I loved it. But, it broke after 3 uses. The handle broke. It just did not hold up.

This book is so not my kind of thing. It's definitely a dark mystery but it seems to me like it's written in the voice of an old woman rather than of a young one. I've lost count how many times she gets pregnant with her first husband and then gets him back within seconds. Also, if all of this stuff had happened long ago, I'm sure I'd have stopped reading. It does get better. However, if you read the ending, you'll know exactly who was behind it.
Just what we wanted! Works just like the original. And at half of the price. We haven't had any problems with it, yet. We've been using for several months.

The movie is about how we can have positive relationships regardless of our background, even if it means going against what the world might think. People don't expect it from each other, but there are strong connections between us all.

I was expecting something a little more like the real thing. It is too small and doesn't heat up enough. You can't really get it hotter than low. If you need a warm plate to bring your soup or other food it's ok, but not much else. The price is cheap, though. I'd use this if my mother wasn't so old. She hates it. :)

This product does not work very well at all. I have a 6 year old Sony camcorder. They should warn of this limitation. I also used to be able to use rechargeable AA batteries which was great. Why they discontinued that is beyond me. You need one type or another battery for the video option. Also, you can only shoot 1 hour video before your camera has exhausted the batteries. In other words, if it goes dead, all you've done when you switched power on is turned off your camera.

I use this with my iPhone 4s and love it. If you have older stereos (ie. don't use CD changers), don'te that there are no 3.5mm jacks on these speakers. It only uses 1 RCA audio jack. You can get an adaptor/converter from Radio Shack or Amazon for $3.00 to plug a 2.5mm jack into these.
My wife bought me a keurig as a gift. She wanted us to take advantage of our local convenience-store prices.
This product did what as expected. My cats love it! However the price was just too much.

This is not a book or series that should be compared to Harry Potter. I have been quite disappointed by them. They are just too childish and for adults only. It was an ok read, though. But there were some flaws in the story. Some of the characters seemed very silly at times. The plot was a bit thin. You could see it coming from miles away (maybe 10 pages into it), yet you really wanted them to pull off their stunts. And the story wasn't completely original.
This blanket was very thin compared to my current one. The print isn't as clear on it as the one that came with it. A waste of money. Just another example of getting what you paid for!
The songs on these cd's are wonderful.
Great product that we enjoy using.

Bought this to replace old wireless headphones. I was looking for something cordless and had good reviews. At first it worked as expected but after a week of use the left ear bud stopped working. Don't waste your money. I'm sure these have great sound quality if you are comfortable with buying poor quality. Will not purchase from this manufacturer or vendor again based on my experience. Do yourself a favor stay away.

I used this drive for 2 or 3 months, no problems until last year when the computer froze. The only way to get past was unplugging and replugging in the USB cable. Then it would work again but after a while you could not use it. It will now cost more than $100 out of pocket for data recovery. This is an absolute joke, do yourself a favor and go with something other than OWCM. Save your money.

This was a really fun little book! I enjoyed reading it, and it is quite unique for its kind of story. Not only was Ms. Roberts able to draw the reader in, but she used her characters' voices in such an honest way, especially Julie’s, that you wanted more from them. You also felt like this read could've been a short story had not enough time passed between scenes.

Works great, just didn't fit for my truck. The description states it will fit a 2012 F-150. But I had to bend the end and get in close. And take off some plastic so that you can attach it. Then work them up into place on each other, then trim of excess wire to reach under back brakes.

This book seems great for those who love to have a fantasy come true, but the plot is slow and the heroine becomes annoying. I read it in one day, so perhaps this was my fault, since I'm not usually inclined to finish a book. It's an easy read, though. The author sets her story against Christian fundamentalism that is represented strongly, including caricatures of George W. Bush and Paul Ryan. There were many stereotypes about Christians as well, something that bothered me.
After about 6 months the screen protector just stopped being usable. I could see the difference when looking at it with my phone naked.

Very good quality, especially for these price! Used them before couple times, and no damage after using for two times. Nice grip too. My old brushes came from China in about 10 years, so cannot compare with these. But they certainly seem to be very high quality brush already. And not expensive.

The product did not work in our Panasonic TV or computer at all. So much for the "smart" features. I returned it and bought a Sony instead. It works! My wife wanted a smaller TV, but the screen on that one was too big from edge to edge. We have an old 42" Sharp Aquos which works great, with minimal glare. The sound isn't great, but you can add external speakers if needed. The Samsung is fine as long as your monitor supports HDMI.
The product just exactly what I was looking for.

Like the other reviewer, this adapter started out doing ok, but with no warning, it will now not recognize my laptop and I have to plug in another one or find a replacement at a local store where I'll be guaranteed to get a quality device.
The book was an easy read but it is not something I will refer back to over and over. A good read.

This game is not what it claims to be. It is very difficult and also frustrating. I found that you constantly need the "help" manual when trying to play. Save your money. Its not worth even giving away in a garage sale. Try something likeRock Band - Bundleinstead. That one will give you hours of fun that will actually get you ready for work each day. Now that's entertainment!

Bought this item as a replacement for my old one. It didn't last 3 days. At which point, it's now basically a $19 door stop. It's not hard to pull up the handles, but after about 2 years, I couldn't get it down and was afraid I'd damage it. The plastic is very cheap too. Don't waste your money. I'm going back to using mine that came with our old dog door. My only regret buying this.

this is a good book for those who are in the field of food science and technology. it has all you need to know about molecular gastronomy. very informative book. I really enjoyed reading this one. great book!!!! :) :) :D.... by the way there was A LOT OF pictures which i like :) thanks Amazon............. :P :DI truly admire amazon! ;) but I wish people would just stop giving such rave reviews if they didn't even read anything before buying....
I didn't care for this movie. It was rather slow and boring. The plot left you wondering about the characters, their past, etc. Too much dialogue. Not really a mystery!
It just works with no problem. No fuss, no muss. I've tried a couple of other versions before and this one is the only one I would recommend.

This book was the absolute worst. I gave up on it about 15% in because I could not believe how ridiculous some of these situations were. It seems everyone is a liar or crazy and no one should ever be trusted. One thing that bugs me more than anything else though is there were so many characters with really odd names. Is this to show us people have changed throughout history? Because by all accounts if you change something even slightly over time you'll always sound like an English idiot.
Love it because it is very easy listening. This artist can do all types of music, but really enjoy her dance music. Thank you.

I enjoyed this book up until the last part. My problem was that it moved so slowly for most of the book. In fact, if you skip to the end, it's not even clear what is happening. There are still some unanswered questions from there, but at least now they get addressed. At least, that's my opinion. I'd recommend it, though only with caution. It has a lot going for it.
We are very happy with our Dyson DC25.

The only thing wrong with this video player is the battery life. It will last about 2 hours before you have to charge up, other than that everything runs great. You wouldn't think a portable video would be that great, but its good. I bought it for my 8 year old and he didn't care much how long life was, because he's happy. This case however should come along with it.

I actually got a good laugh out of this book. I'm usually not into ghost & vampires stuff, but I enjoyed this! It really is creepy and makes you wanna have a drink & chill! Good summer time read!Can't wait to read more from this author! Very good!! Read it!

I enjoyed the first book in this series, so figured I'd read them all. I bought it for Kindle and downloaded most of it. I've just recently started a new project, "Making Books." The first four were on my shelf. Just got through #4 today. These books are getting shorter (really short books), shorter, shorter.
