It's too bad how things have been dumbed down from what they used to be.

This product is a rip-off. Save your money. I have had the worst headache and stomach ache ever since taking this product. I am in so much pain. You will go right to your health club if you want that feeling of having just went on an acid trip. Please save yourself the agony - don't buy any products from Pure Bliss Nutritions! They are scammers who would sell poison even though there was no evidence it has harmed humans. The ingredients are completely untested. Do not buy.

I thought this would have been a fun read, but instead it was just about useless and so poorly written that I'm amazed it's still being read. As one person said in another review, "reading is an escape". How many more ways can you say that? The story isn't even good, what little there is. When trying to get into the characters, they are mentioned then never talked about. It reads as though the author had pages of plot he couldn't use because writing them would've ruined the plot.
The price was fair and the picture is great. I use it as a camera in my kitchen. Only thing that would make it better is if you could add frames to it.

The product is a total crap. i was in hope of using it for both my Nikon D70 and Sony Alpha SLT. But when plugged into the camera it failed to recognize either camera. I tried everything that were described on webpages but did not work. One good thing came out of it. It cost about $45 total.
As advertised. Great looking product & well made......

Very low quality and even worse customer service. Doesn't work AT ALL. I called them 3 times to inquire as how long the warranty was, each of those calls lasted less than 5 minutes. Save your money - don't get this product. It's not worth it. It was nice while it worked and is very comfortable but for a product that lasts like that, it's just no bargain. Stay away from this company! Too good to be true if you ask me.
The people on the other end of me are saying that they can barely hear me, also its not working very well on speakerphone, but i guess for the price you get what u pay for. Its defiantly just ok
It looks super nice and stylish, but also feels cheap. The case could use improvement of better material. That being said, it's really cheap!

This is just a rip off... Not even that good - you would think that with their name on it could give an accurate description and what you're getting, but not so much. They are super cheap looking, cheap, no padding around the legs like they say in all of there reviews. But that's why I got them, because when I'm working at my computer I don't have time to go out buy shoes every couple days.

I received this book in a rush but it doesn't really give you much detail on creating a blog. It reads more like an article to me. As for the content, it's pretty generic. There isn't any real information here. If you've got some time and cash then go ahead and read it. All in all i believe it's nothing special so don't bother buying this. The author has published many other good books though. But just do yourself a favor - save your money.
This movie was done almost perfectly for me. Not my typical type movie, which made the acting exceptional.

My cat loved this toy at first, but then got bored of it. So now, he loves nothing more than to chase the ball into it whenever he's ready for a nap. He especially likes knocking down and jumping all day long in order to get enough sleep until I can give him his toy again. After seeing where my dog had chewed through another brand's plastic mouse toy, both cats have been trying to find one like this. This is great quality.

This is a very cute little book. I like how it tells the story of how they got to Carnegie Hall, but could do without all that history. It adds nothing at all. If you want an informative book about the recording studio, then go for it. My kids love it!

I bought a new pair of these headphones last night at Best Buy for $49.99 brand new. After listening to them they were very tinny, with no bass. It sounded like the subwoofer had been turned off. There was also noise cancellation (didn't work) on all settings; it wasn't even adjustable. I'm not happy that my money spent here has been scammed out of me. I'd expect more from Sennheiser given their reputation in ear headphones.
We used these as our dessert plate at Easter.

This is the best product that I have found to take your dog anywhere you want him. Love this great product. It works so well in a kennel. Just remember not try it around any people or pets. The spray goes very far. Dogs and kids can drink water but they will get wet. Also good when traveling outside with wet clothes when traveling. Have fun!! God Bless you!

I got this game because it was going to be my first time trying this type of game. However, when i installed it, the box only told me that it's running on windows XP so not sure how long is takes for windows. After that, and after following step by step, without success, I tried uninstalling it.
It worked well in the beginning, but it only lasted a few months. One week after getting it, my friend was able to pull apart it.
My cats won't touch the stuff. They know better than me. Oh well, back to their nasty little pellets, which they gobble down. Thanks for nothing. :-(

While looking for a pair of headphones that weren't made by Apple-I came across these Sennheiser PX 100's being reviewed and the price was right. After using them almost daily at work over eight months, I've noticed they sound better when I'm not moving,and I thought I'd try to use my old iPhone earpieces with these. That didn't help, it sounded worse. So it's now past 30 days so return time has expired, which isn't unusual.

I ordered this for my 6 year old, who has a small collection. When we finally got it, it looked as if the eyes were not actually painted. Not really thrilled with this. I think most would have returned it. Disappointed!!! :(

What you see is what you'll get. I'm not complaining and it's worth it for the low price that I paid; a whole lot less than one cable in most stores. This same cord was going to cost over $20! At this point - It's perfect. A little tight out of packaging. Once removed from packaging -Perfect. You have been warned. Do check your HDMI port. One thing - my device doesn't detect that its plugged in. Not sure if there's other cables like this. No problem.

I am very disappointed with this product. It never kept a charge for even an hour. The manual says to go through several cycles and leave it plugged in. But at least one battery can't be recharged without the other?! There goes my money :(

I am a big fan of the show so to see some great behind shots from inside the production department was awesome. Unfortunately it is shot in black and white which makes it very hard to really tell what they're talking about. It appears as if they wanted this movie to be about a few hours at the studio (which has never happened in any other episode) but didn't go deep enough or spend enough time on certain aspects that could have been interesting.

I really wanted to like this book, and from the previews on Amazon when it was first released, many people recommended it. However, after reading it, I'm not even sure why that recommendation existed. As a lifelong follower of science (or other natural science), I have been looking forward to some new things in light of recent advancements in biotechnology. Unfortunately, although there are more than two dozen authors included whose work is very well-written, I didn't find one who offered any interesting ideas.

I bought this toy for my daughters for Christmas when they turned 3. They love it! It has lasted pretty well with daily play. The music is not that great and the microphone doesn't stick very well. Overall we are happy with it though. My girls do get tired of hearing the same songs over and over. Also, a lot of times you have to reset it. Other than those things it works great. We've had no problems since buying it 3 months ago.
It's a fun movie, love those characters, have read most of the books. Will buy it when it comes out, wish they had picked someone less famous. But maybe there were no known alternatives to cast.

I bought this to replace another brand of wireless router that did not have range. This model is much better than the previous one. It set up easily and has had no problem since. Great buy for a good price.

I only just started using this product, and in the first few days my skin looked terrible. The dark marks underneath are already fading. This was a huge let down because so far it had a nice feel. But then as others have commented, there is oil coming out. I'm going back to Neutrogena products - their lines work great.

I bought this after watching the video for "She Drives Me Wild." The music is a fun song that does sound like it would be good on the radio. This version features great vocals, although I think some of his songs have been better in past performances (for example, he's pretty much stuck to standard rock with no real variation or changes), but overall, the album has lots going - great guitar, bass, drums, and vocals. Some interesting surprises on here too.

While the material was comfortable, these sheets are too big for our 13" waterbed, so we really could not utilize them. I would recommend this product only if you have a huge mattress in a king bed. The elastic is great and they seem well made. They came from China so it took about three weeks to arrive, but worth it. I believe that most people looking at this product, even though they claim on their site, that there are other versions of them, will be disappointed.

I've had my Nuvi 760 for several years now, and it still works great. It is pretty accurate when navigating, but sometimes if I miss a turn or stop in the middle of nowhere, it may try to send me back there, although not often, so the point there is, don't freak out about this like other people's review did, because just go into "settings" from then on.

My girlfriend was looking for a fun way to play cards at home. Not having any previous experience with this game I wasn't sure exactly what level of difficulty would be appropriate but decided that either the card dealer or other members of one team had a significant competitive advantage so perhaps they were using the rules in their favor. After three games it is obvious there are serious flaws and these can only get worse before getting better. If you're interested you should look elsewhere.

this product is much smaller than anticipated...there are only 20 bags in the pack... you can use 2 or 3 of these a month and have to worry about buying more.... for me it was worth it.. but just wish the price wasn't so high!

When my old Hoover left me, I looked at all options. This is by far the best! The carpets are actually cleaner than they have ever been, and that was a very big plus!! No longer do i feel like i'm cleaning with carpet cleaner. So easy to use. Would recommend this for anyone looking for a vacuum cleaner! Highly adjustable too.. Love love love! Very happy customer. :-) : ))))

I was looking for something to clean a couple of my favorite pairs (vintage and brand new), and this one has done an incredible job. I've had it with buying new shoes every two or three months! This will keep my leather boots on top till fall, then pass them on. It cleaned the outside of an old pair really well. I'm glad that someone is still making an affordable product like this! There are some things you just have to let go. This also comes highly recommended. Five stars.

The sound quality, and ease of use were great. I was happy with it. The problem came when it fell apart after a few weeks. It kept falling off without me touching it. It's made out of flimsy plastic. One week later the cord started to come apart. I'm afraid because it's so thin that's what will probably happen. Now every time someone picks up my ipod they have an excuse. If this thing broke where I didn't touch it, the quality is definitely NOT there.

Don't buy this cheap garbage from China, not worth 10 cents. You will be disappointed. I am going to try and return it. My guess is the manufacturer has had a run of bad units. Just go somewhere else with your camera needs. The good news is, it takes standard SD cards (I use SanDisk Ultra 8GB cards), which are readily available all over. That way you can take pictures where ever without worry if someone steals them- just get another card.

I am surprised to see so many reviews calling this film a true masterpiece. It is NOT an original version of the Dracula story, nor was it successful as one. Perhaps it's better than Dracula has been, but only because I've heard about it. As far as the acting and sets, they are good (not great). When compared with what else there is, that is, say, Michael Landon's The Mummy series, or any number of other films, we can draw some conclusions on these points.

After a year of this machine, the steam button stopped working. I've also replaced my tank with another one and it still doesn't work. I used distilled water when cleaning as some revies suggested. A lot better product out there.
My daughter has been asking me about this monkey since we got her some clothes like this.

My son wanted this hat for his birthday. We ordered it 2 days early and when we opened up one package - there was only 1 hat. So they sent us another one. We got that in less than 48 hours. On top of that, it doesn't fit right. It's really small. He can't see out of it....looks pretty bad. Don't waste your money.

I like these a lot, but they do seem to run at least one size big. I'm thinking they'll be fine when summer is here and my husband can comfortably wear them. The other thing we had trouble with was washing them, which ended up not being much of an issue because the water came out fairly easy. A good pair that should last for some time.

It's great for some things but I was looking forward to this book and the first recipe gave me a rash. The author suggests you take an onion with one teaspoon of baking soda, sprinkle it on the food (I use instant oatmeal), place in oven (instructions indicate 350 degrees) at 200 degrees for 1 1/2 hours. What happens when that stuff touches your skin? My tongue turned raw and red, now I'm not eating onions.

The battery does not stay plugged into the computer very well at all. You have to push really hard on it. This makes using the laptop awkward. Would never purchase again. In fact, we donated this one and purchased a different brand from Amazon.

It worked for a month, I can't complain. The first problem was that my new monitor would not pick up the signal, so i tried several other sources before calling HDE support (which takes 3 days!). They said it must be some kind of interference etc. So all i needed to do was return the whole system and get another since we were getting no signal at all. They agreed to refund my money. Well that's when things got really bad as far as customer service.

This pillow was well worth the cost and so much more! If you're looking for a comfortable pillow, this is it! We bought three, one we use at home while watching TV, another in my husband's office, and one to take with us on our annual camping trips. The only drawback: I like mine firmer than he does, even though it might not be an issue. It's definitely less firm, but still takes some getting used to. But great value overall, especially when you consider what others cost.

This book is not about the lives of everyday ordinary Americans but the private lives of a few men and women living in the 1940's era - one man named Henry Miller who gets involved with an attractive secretary at work called Marion Davies. Miller's sexual encounters are described as being mostly about sex but also involving her mother, his brother, and other women. The author makes the point that these affairs make up much of Marion's life and to a certain extent Henry's too.

I like these for keeping my feet warm on long hikes in cold weather. They are made of a soft but sturdy canvas and not as cheap feeling as some other boots. The downsides are: 1. When out hiking, they're constantly snagging small sticks when they don't need to; 2. They're bulkier than it seems from the picture -- making them stick off your leg all day. I'd say that this shoe is mostly designed to keep you toasty warm.

Very hard to set up, and I have a good technical background ( in IT ), as my husband tells me all the time. Setup took longer than it should have. After 2 weeks, we didn't see any difference with our wireless, but since we had an extremely short time, and then thought about hooking up again, couldn't find the password, nor was there anything on the CD that would help.

This is my first book by this author. I probably would not have picked it up if I'd known that the characters were gay, or had a child with someone who was gay. As a Christian book, I don't like to read stories where people are abused, etc. So while I'm glad it's out there, it's important for me as an avid reader of Christian books to give respect and dignity to all people. It makes them real people, they aren't just part of a story.

This book is not for everyone, although most will love the plot. For me, it has too much violence, rape, and other things that just did not seem like a fun idea to me. I think it's better for young adults. Most of my friends who read fantasy enjoy it, so I'm afraid this isn't something I'll continue with until they're older.

The product did NOT work for my needs. I returned the item and was charged a 20% restocking fee. It cost me as much as purchasing another unit. Very disappointed! Do not waste your money on this unit. You get what you paid for. Not happy with Amazon either! :-(
Very simple book. The title says "Easy Portable Webcam Assistance," but there's really nothing particularly easy or portable about it.
It's a cheap book and it is nice for my kids to look through. It helps out with learning the states as well so that you can learn about them from reading it. The price was not too expensive either.
These shoes were very stylish yet uncomfortable. It looked like a child could wear them. They did not have good support for my plantar fasciitis. My feet kept hurting.
I purchased this as an extra device and loved it. This is my second one.
These were too thin to be useful at all. Not worth it unless you like wearing underwear. Oh well...better luck next time. :(
One of my all time favourite series. Although I'm writing about it again after three years I've forgotten some details so a little revision in memory wasn't necessary...

One of the main reasons I love this movie is because it is so funny. This blu-ray does not come close to making that film better. The color looks like its off and there seems to be a slight ghosting on most people. In particular, if they move their head, faces look kind weird with all those little lines running through it. It can get away from you at times. It also makes many shots very dark. You can't see the actors or make anything out in most shots.
Very nice but very thin material.
This movie is a classic for good old American values. The acting was excellent as well as very moving scenes. Well done. Kudos!!!
The USB is the standard size and did not plug into my computer. Maybe they sent me an invalid one? I'm going to just return it.
Bought two of these as gifts & both recipients like them a lot! So far, all kids love Sharpies and it's no different with this product.....

i love david crosbie, his voice is wonderful on this album! but the lyrics are not that good and at times boring. in some songs he forgets about what he's singing. such as, "you can go all night" or the most annoying "we should sleep together."---do yourself a favor -- if you're going to get any cd don't waist your money getting this one first.

There is no way this movie was made by Steve Martin. Even his friends didn't think he had a good time making this. I don't care how many times you tell the same joke with different actors, it still doesn't have to be funny every time. Just show us some laughs. Nothing at all in my opinion. As far as I'm concerned, Stephen King should sue because there aren't enough laughs in it! Very disappointed. The one bright spot about this film were the actors and actresses. But beyond that, not worth it.

My cat loves these mice she likes the one that is a little bigger then the others. Would buy again if I ever have to but it seems like they aren't available in stores. Good buy. They don't hold up so long for her though because of how small these are.
Bought a couple of the first size and one broke within 10 minutes at work when the plastic hinge was snapped right off on my belt. I will be sending back for credit or exchange.

The case arrived damaged. On one side it was not on straight and the other side had gaps around some of the edges. It wasn't that big but enough to notice. There were also scratches in two places where they could have removed plastic from a cheaper product. It is usable if you just have time to fiddle with it. I would look for something else otherwise. Good company though, fast shipping too. You get what u pay for. A bit pricey though. Oh well.

I bought these for my son who is into cars. He said that they're ok but not great. They do keep out the rain ok, as they fit well. Overall it's an OK product. But if you really want a good quality product, try Weathertech brand. These are about 1/3 of price and much better quality. Also, Amazon sells very high prices on there stuff, so if you're trying to save money, go online elsewhere or at your nearest auto parts store. You can't beat their prices.

Don't waste your money on this item. As soon as I plugged in the charger, it would not work anymore. Now It will cost me more to return than I paid for it. So here we go again. Only good thing about Amazon is that the returns are free. Do yourself a favor and don't buy this. You might as well spend $30 at Walmart or Target because you're going to get some junk right out of there. Just be careful when you take it out. You're gonna need a box cutter.

This book was not what I was looking for. It had some good recipes just did not go into detail about the preparation of any other things you might need to make also. Just needed information on how much water do you use for different types of food.

I bought this book to study for the Praxis II PMP exam....it does not tell you what each test is all about... There were several questions which had me questioning myself a bit, because they just seemed so out of place... As well, there are some grammar mistakes on how their examples work...Also, while going through this, one day late at night when trying to answer my review questions...
I have never owned a TV this large to find that its resolution is lower than 720p. It looks like something out of the 1980s. Even worse, it makes me feel old.

This item was ordered for our new home based on the many positive reviews. We are so disappointed and we can't return it. The description clearly states this is a 3-drawer unit, just like another reviewer described. But, instead of using that to put all of her silverware in, it only has 1 drawer. In order to get 3 or more utensils in at once, she had to set them up with one drawer, but they were then very difficult to retrieve. So much time wasted.
Bought this because everyone loves their pet food but i needed more protein.

I was quite pleased over a product that is easy to use and produces good results. The price was also great. It will become my regular hair cutting product. Thanks Amazon for making it easy, safe and economical.

Just received my order (Nov 6, 2011) of the Panasonic FZ200! It seems to have a problem with focus at f/16. The photos have heavy foreground blur, but it's so severe you can't fix by enlarging them any further. I've seen numerous comments about this problem on other message boards. For some people, it will never happen regardless if they paid extra or not. I tried everything and even downloaded two firmware updates--none helped. This is getting really irritating...

Got this book to teach my daughter how to write her own story. However, I found it so boring that she was not interested in writing with crayons. She preferred me to take pictures of what we wrote. So there was no point for any art work. The book has a lot of interesting information, but only if you are reading about the history behind these creatures. Not much else at all here. My husband is even bored by it. He loves science and really thinks everything should be explained well.

This book was just okay. I didn't connect with Katelyn at all and felt as if she didn't really know what's up most of the time even when she has new information. On top of that there weren't many hot scenes. The story wasn't very believable, in my opinion. What girl goes to a strip club knowing her dad is also running it? And why doesn't anyone mention this before? Then there's the whole pregnancy thing. It never seemed believable or realistic. That part kind of bothered me.
A few years ago, my brother gave me a cassette copy of this.

The product arrived missing its main feature of a cover and with the plastic broken leaving me to believe it was used. That being said, after a week the screen cracked, which caused a few problems in playing games (had I opened it, maybe this wouldn't have happened). But you know-- my computer is too new for problems. I've decided I'm going to try again but now will not order from them online anymore. If I get one that works properly I'll be very happy though.
I can't believe you can get such high quality for this price! My dog loves these treats...and the large bags last a very long time! Will be buying again! =)

this is a terrible product. it didn't even fit the phone. don't waste your money on this! save you hard earned cash and just buy an otter box....i regret buying this..... its not worth wasting money on! please do yourself a favor by going somewhere else to get phone accessory...at least then you'll have something that works......
The book is somewhat interesting but not really the kind of book that I like. Too descriptive and long winded. I was looking to read more about the characters in their lives rather than a narrative

This worked great, the only thing I would change was how it connected to my computer. Not sure i have a computer that needed one, but if your looking for more power on a battery pack look no further for sure. The product has been great so far. Shipping is also very quick.

I purchased two of these for my daughters to take to school. One broke in 5 months and the other is only 7 months. Not worth it. Very cheap, very poorly made. My kids aren't hard on them or anything, but they can't even withstand being stuffed into their bookbags. The outside shell cracked around one corner. These should be at least $10 dollars max.
This little radio works very well for listening in on weather reports while out camping.

I ordered 2 of these cases and both were cracked when we received them. The outer packaging was fine but the interior plastic wrap on one case had been severely damaged, obviously by being thrown around in transit. Amazon sent out a replacement promptly but it arrived with even worse damage than before, although not nearly as bad as this shipment. Very bummed!

I tried to read this book. After about 3 chapters the story did not engage me. Too many characters, too much description. I found myself skimming and then stopped. There were times that there was no mention of one character or another, it went very quickly into yet another story. Not a good read.
So far nothing but praise. Good value for the price. Highly recommended. Easy to carry and light weight. Great product that does what it suppose to.

The problem I have with this is that you cannot put many items on it. You can only hang towels or the kind of shirts and stuff from what i am experiencing. And there isn't enough room for that. It was easy to assemble.

I bought this because it was the only one that would fit my 2001 Jeep Cherokee. It fits perfectly. The other cover is an open top. If you know how to remove some of those brackets inside your Jeep, than replacing and removing a top on a JKU is pretty easy. I didn't install mine since my jeep gets very hot during the summer. But, if you don't mind putting more work into it, then do yourself a favor and try it. Also it looks nice with black rims too.

I got the product by USPS but it was not very sturdy. The whole thing felt like something that could be damaged. Also, we had to take our tablet apart before putting this in or our screen kept popping off. This is a bad product. Do Not get it, just pay $5 and buy one yourself at a store if you're really looking for one. It's not worth it. It would have been more cost effective than this, however I'm glad I didn't spend much money on this.

I have had the Canon for a month now and was using it every day. The picture quality is excellent, no noise, great colors, etc. The camera does everything I wanted, which was very important. However, one day while we were taking pictures in bright sun light, my daughter set her arm on it, pulling up against something. It broke. After replacing batteries, cleaning the sensor, etc. not sure what happened. Luckily with a good case she did not get hurt, but they really should use higher quality, stronger plastic.

I'm using this with a new N900 to use as additional storage. I keep getting error messages on the PC regarding "not enough space for backups". I will update when or if it works eventually. Hopefully I'll be able get some useful data off it. Update: Did not work.

I bought this book back in 2005 after finding it used and new at a secondhand store. The author is to be commended for doing research into the history of music from its creation to the present day. And his analysis of what works are or aren't best known as part of an artist's whole oeuvre adds some interesting points relative to music by composers who did not live during the 19th century. But that's where the compliment ends.

I should of sent it back but never got around to it. Don't waste your money on the product. Mine would only work for a little while and then you were just lucky if it would work. Very cheaply made. No idea why this was not in its original packaging. Never worked properly even though they claimed brand new. This is definitely junk!! Save yourself some grief buy elsewhere.

It is definitely a unique design. Unfortunately, it does not function well. You have to be very precise with your touch and you don't really feel the brush on my teeth at all. Not sure how else I can complain about something when it's still working perfectly after several months. One of the things that makes this toothbrush stand out is that there is no battery. With other batteries, they inevitably fail or die because they're always sitting around. This one doesn't.
The boots look cute on, however it looks nothing like what you're seeing in the picture. Very disappointed.

Not what i thought it would be, the plot was so slow going, I found myself speed reading to finish it. The main character is suppose to be this big strong man but he came off as weak and unable to take care of himself. That alone made me hate him throughout the book. All in all, not a good read. Just boring. Waste of time.

I have now used this brand for about 3 years. My pool is over 1000 gal and the chlorine level has remained at a comfortable level. The cartridge that came in my 20 foot round above ground pool lasted me well over a year. So far so good. In comparison, the Intex cartridges last less than 2 months. This package lasts 4 weeks. We purchased another set of these cartridges to make our water pressure even lower as we wanted the pool to stay clear as much longer without making chemicals available.

I didn't like it. The characters seemed too implausible. And the story line dragged at times. I almost gave up several times mid-way. But then picked it back up and finished it. It wasn't a bad quick read but not as good or gripping as some of his other books. He should have stopped here.

I really think that you can only watch this once and forget it. If you're like me who loves movies with an intelligent plot, twists in the storyline, or a truly emotional ending, you won't find it after just seeing The House of Sand and Fog. Sure, it's predictable, has absolutely no point, bad acting, bad script, terrible effects - they could put today's computer generated imagery into any other movie now instead and I'm sure it'd be worth watching. But to see everything on screen, then for nothing is just...

I am trying to make a home brew soda that incorporates both cane sugar and high fructose corn syrup. It is very difficult finding quality organic ingredients in the area. This does not go bad after about 3 days, even when added to water. Good flavor though. Not too strong. Worth trying.
Love this for my yorkie and she loves to sleep in it. A must have for any small dog. It's like having her own little room.

I haven't actually used this item yet, due to waiting a while for it before using it. It looks like it's good quality, although we'll see if anything unexpected occurs during use. As of now I would recommend it! 
 Rating: 4.0 
 I was looking at getting an extension cord reel but never found something that looked well made and functional. After browsing some different home improvement sites, we settled on the Winegard WPS-4100 because of its overall appearance and weight.
Not exactly what i expected. There are 4 pieces you have pull out and place on your kindle fire. Two sides went over my kindle, leaving me with bubbles. When placed they did come right out.

I purchased this set as a replacement for my existing T-Fal griddle that got damaged or lost during my move from California to Montana. While it was cheaper then the local stores and seemed like an identical model, once using it, one could tell the difference between them except one. The new model has thicker stainless steel pans which you must be careful not to ruin by putting on burner hot after using.

We got this for our 2 1/2 year old son's birthday. All the kids including my husband and I were thrilled with it. My son is so into pretend play. And having someone to listen in now has been great. He knows when it's his turn because of all thoses sounds. It's nice how it talks about what kind of food he should be eating after being on the "potty".

This book was okay. The main character's constant self-loathing, angst, etc. annoyed me, but I guess that's why she got together with the guy. However, there were some funny parts. There are some really good sex scenes, so overall it's a quick and interesting read. But, it also has its faults. I'd recommend it. It's worth what you can get for it!
The Story of Edgar was good. However there were typos in sentences. Would recommend for anyone who enjoys crime drama. Also had some twists & surprises. Recommend adding this Kindle book!

If you're looking for a collection of stories that are about different people and their lives with no redeeming qualities and very little plot or story, this might be the book for you. I found it incredibly depressing to read all these people's lives. It reminded me so much what life was like during those years, there were some bright moments but overall, they lived miserable lives.

This is the perfect size for my son's school lunch. The stainless steel inside and out makes it easy to clean. Its also nice that two containers are separate, but can be stacked, since this was a good price. I would recommend using them in conjunction with a rubbermaid or tupperware. You might get more use from them.

Ok. It's a nice book, but you can easily find all of this information online for free. It's just an extension of what the free web sites tell you. So there really isn't much to gain from it. I was thinking it would be more helpful than that. Most likely not, since most people know about common sense tips like drink lots water or get enough sleep. Well, if that's your case, by all means go buy the book. Or download any of the many books out there.

When using the bluetooth feature, you cannot make and receive calls while wearing this. Also, to use it, you must remove your case from around your phone. This is inconvenient since my belt clip has broken as well due to cheap metal design.

When I first read the reviews about how good this heater was, i thought they were exaggerating. How good can a little space heater make?! Well let me tell you, it made everything hotter. Its like my room was more comfortable! Now, it's all because of the heater, nothing to do with me. I'm so happy...oh yeah and no burning smell. A must buy if you need something that makes your place warm.
Good product at great price.

I recently bought this book on the strength of another reviewer's review and thought I'd better see what Mr. Moore had to say for myself. For a short story (or novella, if you will), this was far longer than most other stories that I've read. That's okay, I guess, given its setting in medieval Europe, but then it's not really clear why he chose this subject.

This product is exactly as I expected. The shipping took about 15 days from China. It does not have a hole for the headphone jack but it seems you really don't need it. Just push hard and take out all of the little pieces around that hole(I also cut off one piece after using tweezer).
This is an excellent product. Much better than the hard plastic ones found at most stores. I am very happy with it and highly recommend it.

So sorry to say I hated this book and only finished it because of the sheer number of good reviews. But my problem was that there were so many characters without any sort of back story or development whatsoever. No one had a meaningful role in helping out other than their romantic interest (or being pushed around). Even though I did like most of them very much, none felt "real" enough for me to even care what happened to them.

One of the reasons I loved this author is that she writes stories with strong and sexy leads. These are two women who meet on a plane to Japan in 1989 where it turns out they grew up together. In 1992 they meet again years later. They were both married at home but had only seen each other once or twice before that. You would think if you spent so long together after all these years, it should have made them feel something.

The product description states the following: "This book does not contain any of Ms. Kleypas' previously released titles - this is a reprint with no changes, but most importantly it has none except for an additional page at Chapter One and one sentence or phrase change in all 50 chapters - that's it. Even though they are titled separately, these short stories appear as separate books so buyer beware!" It should be more precise. If you have collected many Linda Lael Miller books, don't buy this.
I'm not crazy about the flavor it leaves in your mouth. It does say it's a vanilla ice cream, but I don't really like the flavor.
I used this for a homemade deodorant. It worked well and came quickly. Was also cheaper to buy online than at local stores. Thanks
Its a nice small handbook, can be read in no time.

My husband and I bought this printer because it's cheaper than an ink jet or laser printer. The color is terrible on every page. We have tried to clean the print head several times with no improvement. It came when promised, which was great. Unfortunately, it just doesn't work. There are tons of better deals out there for laserjets that don't cost a fortune. Don't waste your time with this.

After doing hours of searching for a laptop mouse that would work on ANY surface (with or without protective coating), I found my perfect mouse. This one had glowing reviews, and looked great, except it was made in China out of inferior materials - all plastic with tiny bits falling off the top cover every time you touched it. It worked perfectly, but only after 3 weeks when the USB connector broke off, leaving me stranded in China.

It's very well made especially considering you can't beat it by it's price tag. My favorite thing about this was that I can actually see myself eating popcorn now. :) Can't wait until Thanksgiving rolls round, when I'll get to have my guests try it.

After putting it on and seeing what a pain installation was, I thought I'd give the matte version a try. But it looks terrible, even with brightness at all levels (it's way too dark to see anything with this on, and bright is just as awful). Just go for glossy screens, or don't get it.
It's good stuff at an excellent price. The packaging and service were perfect. If you like coconut ice cream, you'll love this.
This is a cheap knock off of the real stuff… I found it to be totally disappointing and not worth any price.

This product only worked for a couple of weeks, and then stopped working at my apartment in Philadelphia. The adapter is rated up to 100 amps, which means most home appliances would probably be fine, but it did not work fine with mine. When I plug these into the wall,it started off as a trickle charge, almost like plugging something in. Then even though that was happening, It wouldn't stop charging my cell, ipad, or ipod until all three items were fully recharged. Very disappointed.
My two grandsons have fun pulling this out on a cold snowy day. Good quality toy, has lasted through several winter seasons. Would recommend! Fast shipping. Happy with purchase.
This film is horrible. The acting, story, cinematography, dialogue, and music are all bad. One of the worst movies I have ever seen. Avoid at this price. Very disappointed!!!

I bought one in Feb. It quit working 3 weeks later. The repair kit does not work on the unit. The manufacturer had no info to tell me how and when it would be fixed. As a matter of fact, none was available. Good luck if your unit stops working. Update. I've learned my lesson. Don't buy Panasonic. Their TVs have been cheap for far too long. They should know better.

We thought it looked nice and we had a high foot board, but after only seven months of use the wood has splintered in several places, making us afraid to put anything on it. If you don't have people or family that are really big and weigh around 140 pounds then this bed would probably last for years. If your wife is small at 5 feet tall you're going to need a new mattress every 7 months.

This is a great screen protector! My husband didn't even mind the fact that it had two tabs stuck on to it. However, he peeled one off and now every time I need another one, I'm going for something else from them first. I love this product!
It's fine but very cheap. It won't fit in a standard book. You have to remove some pages prior to putting in.

The cards are great, but they don't have envelopes included. You can't tuck them under one of your other mail envelopes. Also there aren't any tabs on them. I put stickers all over mine, so you can't see thru them, but it's a really great buy if you're looking for something very cute and girly.

It appears to me that this cd should have been entitled "I Want a Hippie In My Living Room." The selections are so awful it is beyond imagining! Nothing but music which sounds like elevator music. Not one track really touched my heart or mind enough torecommend it. Don't waste your money. Sorry for the bad grammar and spelling.
The headlight assemblies were easy to install, no problems there. However, on my 2004 Silverado 2500 HD both headlights now have intermittent blinking.

I ordered two bottles of this product in a different flavor. This flavor was so watered down tasting that I ended up giving one away to my neighbor for the same reason. I'm sticking with Red Bull. For me, at any price. Sorry Amazon Vine, but you lost on me.

i didnt really like this product after getting them, the plastic felt cheap and thin to me and there seems not enough of them in one packet. then i try one out on my face it actually hurt a lot when putting them on. for some reason they didn't work for me. might just be that they dont fit right. I would probably buy something different next time because most likely ones are going back since I wasted money on this.

My friend showed me a new one of these and said it was great so I purchased it. It's not very strong for an FM transmitter. The other transmitter in the car doesn't have this, but works great. I'd avoid this one.
Not exactly what's it takes to be an American. After losing his family, one man goes far from home.

I am on my 3rd power cord. The first one burned out after only a couple of months. Amazon sent me another one. Only lasted 3 months and now has stopped working. This cord also gets really hot. Not sure how this got such high ratings. Wish I'd never bought it. At least it was cheap! :(

If there were a way to give this product negative 5 stars, I would. This is truly just a waste of money and very little fun for my son as he really likes the real version of Mr. Grinch with Jim Henson on it. Skip getting this, it doesn't even come close to fitting his needs at all. Wish we hadn't bought this....especially after seeing how many other similar versions that have been available.

I purchased this for my daughter when she was just 3 months old. At first it seemed great, but after only a couple of weeks, the little mirror with the fish on top fell off. She couldn't use it! The plastic is pretty sturdy and would have withstood being chewed on. My advice to you if you're buying it used or cheap - be more patient. You can still get one that functions properly without losing all mirrors or fish. Otherwise, don't waste your money.

I loved the first two installments, and was even more excited for this third episode. Instead, all of my excitement turned to disappointment in its execution. Like previous series that have come before it, Dead Space 3 is another game whose makers couldn't get their heads around why you would want a story told through text versus having your character experience events themselves. As such, most parts are just straight exposition while characters "watch" as though they had gone back in time.

Bought two sets of these tea sets for my granddaughter who is in love w/Tinker Bell. They're beautiful, bright colors & sturdy, well-made products. Very pleased especially since it's a hard item to find on sale like this.
This is my first digital camera. It really does take very nice pictures. Easy to use. I just haven't had enough time to try all settings.

Great product! I love the quality look and it fits my phone perfectly. My only drawback to this item is that you have to use a screwdriver or whatever else you can find to open up your case. If not for this feature I'd give 5 stars. But other than that, it's awesome! Thanks! The pen is cute as well.

You get what you pay for! Cheaply made, and the zipper broke within 24 hours of my daughter getting in it, for no reason at all. I would buy it again, but just from somebody else not off ebay, as that makes things worse, don't even try to use this if you're looking on a budget, unless ur having a party or something!! But once they're all packed together like they should be, with little tags on them like other ones, then its fine.

I bought this book looking for some help in building a business around the blog. While it had all of that information available at a cheaper price point, there is one thing missing from each chapter. There were several other errors and omissions, but they are minor compared to this. All that aside, you can learn more about basic concepts without buying an expensive book. You do have better alternatives than this, such as my own blog, http://www.mybusinessblog.com/, or your employer's site, http://www.www.biz.

This was actually kind of a pleasant read. I found the descriptions to flow nicely. The characters were well developed - but also not perfect. That made it less predictable. The world building is pretty neat and original. Not your standard fantasy fare. It has plenty of romance, suspense, action for those who like that sort f thing. And, as some other reviewers have mentioned, there are lots of grammar errors - which really bothered me at first, because I'm so used to books being professionally edited.

I have read several other books by this author and was really hoping to like it. This novel is filled with horrible stereotypes. The father character is incredibly cruel to his youngest daughter, who he thinks does not know how much she would get in trouble if her mother left the home with her siblings. His daughter resents this. To add insult to injury, she moves away two years later to go back to where everyone knows everyone. She returns only because of a car accident.
My husband picked it up, so I got it. He says he enjoyed it, although not as much as his other books. It kept my interest even more than "Honor Games," though. You might like this one, too.
I'm pretty happy with this.

The item pictured (green and yellow striped cover) is not at all what arrived. Very disappointed. They may as well call it yellow. I don't think they even make the same cover in two different colors. Other than that, it's fine. It does NOT fit snugly like my original Dell battery does. If you are looking for a cheap replacement battery, this would work ok. But if you're wanting something that really works, keep looking.
This was an amazing buy..

When this game came out, I think the reviews for it were pretty strong. We got a Wii in our family and started off with some games that we'd already played once or twice. My 5 year old son really wanted to play "bowling" with dad. He has always been fairly good at Wii games, but he was getting frustrated...the ball kept missing from his shot, etc. So, we tried out several of the other bowling games. This one is okay.

I was excited to order a new headphone. My old cord had gotten frayed from years of use. After receiving this product and using it for the first time, It fell apart in my hands. Cheap plastic construction and extremely uncomfortable around your ears. No matter how good audio quality is with something, I would rather spend more money than waste hours making sure all connections are correct between components of your system.

This book of recipes is pretty good. I can definitely recognize some ingredients in the first batch I made and others haven't produced yet, which will be a concern if you're on a limited budget or don't have time to prepare them by hand. The bread pudding was excellent, but the muffins were too dry. Other than those, things went ok. Overall very easy recipes, with few ingredients.

No picture and no sound. A piece of garbage. Don't waste your money. This movie should be removed from the market place to protect children in this country. Now I am afraid to buy it on vhs. There are plenty available. Be ware.

As an avid reader, I've had my fair share of thrillers. I can count them on one hand. The last time I was shocked out the front door by an action packed thriller that kept me awake for hours, while sleeping late, wasThe Girl with the Dragon Tattoo: 3-Disc Set (50th Anniversary Ultimate Collector's Edition).That novel has held up and is still a very good read. Sure, it suffers from having too much going on. So does this book.
I actually had a little sticker on my car and was looking for some way to identify it. This is perfect. My order came fast with no issues.
We purchased this product as part our business needs. It worked well initially, although it took two tries before we got both units working. That didn't last too long either.

This worked well for about 4 months. I have only had to re-charge it twice... but now the charging light goes out every time they are charged. Bummer, and disappointing. If this unit would actually hold a charge, I'd give them 5 stars, as they seem like great headphones. But given that you can't simply put new headphones on these when they need recharging, not really worthwhile. They do still sound good, and work just fine if their ability to be charged is worth more than that.
The writing style can be frustrating.
For some reason i thought they were all black.

The speakers work great..The stand alone case works well. We have not used the bluetooth as of yet. Great product. Good sound quality. Would definitely buy again. Fast shipping with Amazon. Happy Customer :)

Very slow and hard to get going, was hoping for more mystery with it. Could not wait till the end of it when a surprising event occurred. The author tried too much on trying to create suspense in it by telling you where this is going and making sure that at least 50 pages goes into each chapter. This book would appeal mainly to women. If your looking for an easy, light read, then read it, its just not worth wasting any time reading it. There are better books out there.

This is the most frustrating item I have ever purchased from Amazon. The picture clearly shows a full back brace but does not indicate that it contains some kind of gel insert. If there was any kind of gel you would think this could be comfortable. In fact what feels like one of those things made for people with high level tennis elbow, feels far too hard for someone who has arthritis. It also had quite visible seams which are very uncomfortable.

Well, let me start by saying the author is good. As of writing this she has at least 1 more book out. Now onto my criticisms. The characters were not what you would expect from an Amish book. They weren't very loving in their marriage or that they treated each other terribly. In fact, I don't think there was any love involved at all. So unless your idea of a good read includes sex, it probably shouldn't be considered good. The language in general felt out of place. It didn't feel right.

When my book arrived, I went online, and read reviews of this product's use. Some people said it worked fine, but others were having the exact problem as I. It does not attach to a windshield mount. Instead you must try to use tape which never really holds,,,, just falls off. There is NO way this product would work on anything other than flat surfaces. The suction cup attaches to only one side.
My kitties love this bowl/bowl.
This Kindle cover works great.

The product did make a good cup of coffee, but it cost $16.95 for the entire unit, including shipping. I was shocked and disappointed. Don't waste your money. If you want to have hot coffee anytime during any day without wasting all that gas then don't buy it. My wife will get mad when she sees me brewing on this device. We do like good cappuccino's in the morning. However, at $8.00 per shot that's over twice what my average latte costs.

My boys are two and a half, but just can't be trusted to ride without us. I'm not sure I would have been able to keep three of them on the bike if we had done it at home, by myself. i dont recoment at all, its horrible the color or the quality of this product it doesn't even deserve a star!!!!
This is just what i was looking for. Good price,good quality, quick delivery,perfect fit. What more do u want.

I read this book very quickly, which was kind of strange, it took about a day, and wasn't bad but certainly not for the price. There are a lot of typos throughout most if the book. In one paragraph he refers to himself in 3rd person singular - that could be easily fixed by using plural pronouns. It gets quite confusing at times, especially when there is only one sentence per page. Also some sentences don't end properly leading into the next one.

Like the reviewer before me, I received this charger on 3/18/2013. It is not quite as "solid" in appearance as my original Samsung charger. The cord that attaches to the plug at top of charger, which connects into phone seems a little more flimsy and less secure. Since I had been searching for an additional charger because one of mine broke while driving when the cord flew off the plug; so, I'll keep it but I'm afraid it might only work 2 years. Would still like it, though.

I purchased the book only to have it arrive in poor shape, missing a page...had some pages stapled into it. There was nothing written about this book, which is why I'd ordered it. Will not purchase from here again.

This movie is one of the most boring I ever saw. There are a few good points in this movie, but they're few. It's not for everyone. I didn't receive this item not once. It's a great game when it gets the product, and I'll be sending them back they were so poorly done. My grandson wanted to play. I have purchased about 2 dozen of these drives over the past two years. They are fast, they don't make noise, but that's it. I've also had more failures than just plain fails. The drive failed to boot, or a program stopped working. Sometimes it took hours for my computer (brand new in Windows 7 x64) to recognize ANY drive. Most recently after installing Linux on it, it kept telling me there was no disk and it would not boot up. So it was dead out of the box.

This is so old school I don't understand it, if she didn't put this on the radio and make it a song, how could we have known about it. Then you try to listen closely because it's not anything really new or original...just recycled sounds heard before in one of her previous songs. There's very little originality, I think she's trying too hard to be different, but what she's actually doing here is, she's playing around with her sound, nothing new, that's all.

This is the ultimate in "comfort food," and I was glad to be able to purchase it without having to go from store to store. The order came promptly through Amazon at a very competitive price. When I first saw these headphones on the internet they looked great. What could be wrong with looking at cool headphones? Well, not much.... I've been using these everyday since February of 2010 (they are still in good shape) for almost 2 weeks now, i love them! They sound really good, they're light, sturdy, comfortable, and they actually fold up so neatly.
this guy had his wife write it. He says he's going to teach her how to use a computer. He's not. And he doesn't even mention that.

First of all, I have not got this set from Amazon. So, that is why the 5 star. The product was not the original version even though it said new. I bought a new one at Wal-Mart. Not to happy with this. If you're giving me this used like new, then just ask for the original. It's also difficult to clean because there's no lip on top of what looks like the traditional bottom layer found with other travel mugs. This tumbler does do a good job keeping cold things cold.

I am a big fan of the series but really lost interest or respect for his writing style in this one. There were just too many characters being introduced by far to keep up with and they often made no difference to any particular storyline.

The first one I got stopped working after a week. Amazon replaced it. It also quit working within a couple of weeks. I'm replacing again and just hope this time it works out. This has to be the biggest rip-off ever and I am so disgusted by this company! We had a problem when we first set it up. It could not print black ink at all! I read this book to my children when they were little and now we use it for church study together. However, our copy has a few glitches on the CD. We can't seem to get past them, though. For a "heavy duty" item (read: not cheap) this is just plain junky. It broke within minutes after installing it. The plastic connector that mounts the metal pole in order to bend it back into the hole snapped in half. Now I have no way of fixing it, and am left with an expensive piece of...junk. Don't waste your money.

The concept is great and there are some nice games on it but when I got the device, it froze with a black screen and then rebooted saying I had to install an update. I tried repeatedly until I gave up. They should work more diligently in fixing the bugs. This thing really needs work. Very frustrating for my kids.

This product has an amazing aroma of fresh orange juice. The gel is easy to use and applys a nice non sticky finish. I also like that the spray can control how much comes out so you don't have it all over your hands. Some complaints by other users are in regards to using this during summer months. The amount dispensed seems very little which makes me wonder if my dispenser runs low, or if there's more fluid that goes into waste.

It worked great for about a year, then the water just goes down on it's own and dribbles out. This defeats the purpose of hot coffee. I have used multiple brands of K-cups with no such issue. So when this product quit working I bought aKeurig B60 Special Edition Brewer (Bold)-Black and I'm happy again. One reviewer suggested that it has to be one bad model. Perhaps the K20 model works well - but not in my experience.
If you've purchased many types of mosquito repellent over the years, you'll have heard all about this product.

This item arrived within 2-3 days after ordering! It is extremely easy to install (hardest step of the whole job) plus it looks great on my pool. When the summer finally comes back its going to be nice not having that pesky hole in our pool! :)
Not much to this one. I guess if it's free & offers challenge in one go, you're still interested. Otherwise pass.

I received this book as a gift from my mother to add the music for our choir. Although it seems like many of the tunes are similar and have some connection to each other, there aren't enough melodies in an accessible form. Also, much of their notation on which notes work together doesn't always match what they actually do.

This is a good idea. Not so much when it comes to actual quality. I bought two, and both leaked in the first few months. I thought this DVD might help me, I'm 65 and have high back pain. It didn't really offer me any relief. And the music was horrible! The instructions were not clear. At least Yoga Zone's instructor moves like she has a life, and doesn't mumble all day long. So maybe if he did that, I'd try this.

The micro USB end became faulty within a month of use. It did still charge but had to wiggle it around for it to work properly now. This book has very little helpful information. Its a poorly written pamphlet and was not even proofread. Nothing new or useful in this book. Don't waste your time reading it. The author gets in way over her head with all of the details she goes into, trying to make a complete story. I found myself skipping pages and even several chapters. This product works great. My wife loves it. She has a severe and painful problem from osteoarthritis. The price is much better than those sold at the drug store. Highly recommend. Great buy!

I bought this to do a few simple jobs and just have it around in case the power goes out but as I've tried it, if you put more than one cord into it it overheats. I loved this story until the ending. What a waste of great characters. I'm glad it was only 99 cents so even better. This book is too short, ends abruptly and feels extremely rushed. Definitely an author who should take one more week to finish writing it. The main male character's love for his fiance comes across as childish, yet very shallow.

Excellent product! I am going outside the box by purchasing this product and saving money. The performance of these batteries far exceed their cost as they seem to last longer! It is very nice having a backup set in my tool bags and at no additional charge.

This book and its accompanying CD is of little help, especially if you are attempting to learn how to perform the actual practice test. The CD does not contain all information needed for an accurate performance. There may be exceptions but this seems to have been a poor effort by Pearson with regards to producing anything other than self-study, poorly illustrated material that would mislead even the most novice piano student. It did NOT fit my phone at all.. My cell is an LG enV3. There was no way it would fit. So i sent it back and got some in town that worked. Good seller, fast service but dont wast your money. This thing went from $4.00 to $29.

In reality I have to take out my Nikon grip after placing in into the pocket of some type of fabric (I've tested this) which holds up against normal handling, so I'm not using it. Also, the lens extends beyond the end of the lens, creating what looks like a huge black bubble at times when used indoors.

When I first read the synopsis on this book that it was about 2 best friends - a girl and guy who had crushes on each other - It was okay. I kept reading. There were no big surprises to it. The game was fine, but it does involve a lot of reading and you must read the manual, as well as watch video. If he does this, then there is no reason for him not to know what cards are in his hand, so long as he knows what they are.

I ordered this game to play with my 4 year old. It was not fun for him or me. What is going on here? We both have very different idea of what a child's mind should be interested in and while it doesn't hurt that he prefers Disney Princess games, he also tends more towards the more simple games like Spot it. There are better options than this. If you would rather your child just stare at pictures all day and eat cookies, then by all means get them.
Enjoyed the series. Can't wait for my next adventure with Robert Duvall.
The toaster works great, looks great and very fast.
My mother wanted this.
Very limited number of games. It was really slow starting and I still have not completed all levels. Needs more to play.
I liked this book because of the romance between the main characters. Not overly steamy, but not lacking romance. If I want some more action, I'll go to Harlequin or Harlequinn Silhouette Romance.

I have used this product for a month now with no changes noted. It has however improved my appetite while it lasted. My stomach still rumbles when I'm taking them and the fiber is so fine you really seem to be swallowing pieces of your food. If they would come up with some new packaging that didn't make me gag, I'd buy them. However, they are not cheap but then again all sugar supplements are. And I don't eat a lot anyway. Just add water as needed and you're good.
Item took long time with standard shipping but price was right. Works perfectly and no problems even after 3 months. Hope it stays like that. Good product! Thanks Amazon!

After I got my order, one of the plastic lids was already opened and put on. The other lid is very small too. Just a normal salad container set or something would be good. This is an absolutely wonderful movie. I ordered it as a gift for my husband and it arrived in awful condition on DVD. We returned it. They only refunded us the cost AND shipping - more than half of our purchase price originally. In total, this was about $20.00 with shipping. Not going through them again. Just not worth that kind of hassle every time.

This is the 2nd one of these that I have bought in less than a year, it stopped working after about 2 months. The first time this happened i returned it, and got another hoping the unit was more durable. I've had good success with WD drives until now, not sure what's changed but they seem to be cheap Chinese units. If you don't get too many use out of your drive then its worth it.

I ordered and received this product without any problems. About 10 days after applying the protector it began to peel off. Also if you are used to a full body screen protector, keep in mind that this is for an HTC EVO 4G. There are 2 layers on it. On one of them there will be "X" cutouts which means you must place it where its supposed to. The other half sticks at random parts around the phone.

I did not read the size of it when i bought it. I guess you really just pay for what ever they think will sell better than nothing. But a lot of things are not that big. If there is anything to it, then don't waste your money on this one.....

This has turned out to be a pleasant product. I've only used it while sitting at my desk for an extended period of time, and as far as comfort goes, it's wonderful. The padding isn't as soft or cushy feeling as you'd expect, but there's enough there that if you sit on one side hard, you'll get some relief. It's not so rigid from top to bottom as to cause your shoulders to feel like they would explode.
This app wouldn't download on my kindle fire. The ads came up several times. Even after deleting them, they still kept coming up.
This is a good product. It arrived in excellent condition and it was exactly what I needed. It's just the right length for my needs.

This thing didn't even work. It only came on and off for 5 minutes then the screen went blank. The sound is okay but not enough to get through a movie. I have returned it in less than 20 days ago. I'm still waiting for my refund to be posted as of July 10. Still no refund. So disappointed. Please don't buy it! You would spend more money with shipping this back so that's probably why you're going to.

This product is fantastic. Great quality and easy installation with the included video. It was installed within 15 minutes on my 2012 Chevrolet HHR. I have already recommended this to friends who are looking for a replacement mirror, as well as, some extra help installing it. One suggestion before attempting this, watch a few videos online about how it looks in comparison with your existing mirror. The mirrors will be off much more than they had appeared prior to install.

After having used the Canon 5d and not knowing too much, I picked up this camera at a local store. I found some reviews online about how well it shot in low light, yet there is simply no way to see what you are actually seeing with this. In short, it will just be dark, until someone makes an LCD viewfinder version. You can make out faces but that's it. No option for taking photos outside.

This book is not what I thought it would be. The majority of the information provided is already known, and much of this info can be garnered from a quick Google search. Nothing really here that I haven't read before. If you've never heard anything about it, it's okay, but if you have, pass on it. I gave 2 stars because it lists some good info, but there's nothing earth-shattering. Disappointing.

As a long time lover of the series, I was deeply saddened by this book. It felt like nothing new had been added. While all fans knew there would be major changes, most have hoped for only minor details. Maybe because they were told so many times that the characters got back their memories, it's quite obvious in some ways they're not living up to that. If you're looking to see what's next for Sookie, then read this, but if you've already started reading these books, you could do without it.

This book is an excellent companion book. It provides great insight into what makes and causes children who love animals tick. This is my personal go-to reference if things like pet parents, dog owners, etc.

This cookbook is ok. Not my favorite recipes. I don't understand the purpose of the recipes or the ingredient lists. Some are not what you would call healthy and some ingredients sound to complicated that it's hard for me to make them. On top of this there aren't photographs in it. But the food does look great! The price was right but I'm disappointed.
I really wanted to love these but after a month I'm pretty sure they are going back and just get the plastic ones.
This product has exceeded my expectations, especially given the inexpensive price. The one problem I had was that both magnets were not properly glued shut by the manufacturer.

No doubt that this book is chock-full of wonderful information. The whole website thing is a scam, as I'm writing down every single thing said by Dr. Brown. What makes matters worse -- he's charging money when in reality he isn't worth it. You're best off learning all these things without paying him anything. Just Google his name.
If you like bluegrass bands from around the world, then this CD should be in your collection whether or not you've previously heard of them.

I had ordered this item twice from Amazon. When it first came in, the box was a bit dented but not badly enough that we could tell what condition it was. However, when my dad opened he saw there were holes in it, so apparently somebody tried to remove it. We put batteries in. The mouse itself stopped working after about 5 minutes and then just went dead. It is VERY cheaply made. Not to mention now Amazon wont make things right with me or refund my shipping.

It didn't work. It was missing the battery and all instructions that should have been with it. In fact it came apart as I tried to get batteries into it's compartment and ended up causing minor injury. This is the best soap ever for my baby's skin. It cleans his skin and leaves it moisturized, even when he gets dried out. It's not expensive compared to many stores so I don't have to buy as often. Also, being an organic product, there are no harmful ingredients in this soap. Highly recommended. In fact, it's been a very good purchase - great price (cheaper than Walmart), large size, and fast shipment.

I bought the set and have been happy with it. However, it now displays an error message that says no disc. The player will not eject a DVD or CD, even when trying to play music CDs in them. This has happened both on a new system installed about 6 months ago by a different brand as well asseveral other discs. Very disappointed since Philips used to be one of my favorite brands.
