I have had a cuisinart food processor before but got tired having to clean all parts every time after using.
Very cheap quality. I ended up breaking it because the glue came out in different places during transport and wouldn't stick. Buy something else. This wasn't worth the money.

I've been an avid fan of the John Rain series ever since I first read the introduction in 1984. Since then they have become a mainstay of genre novels from my favorite author to one that might be considered better than all but one. The story was weak at best.. The characters were dull and predictable and had minimal depth. And though it took us back through time, we didn't really get close enough for me with just a single character to "feel" their emotions.
This is so precious.

This novel has all of elements of good writing - compelling story, strong characters, witty dialogue. The author certainly had some nerve to tackle such challenging material, having been married since 1974 when she first visited India. She really takes you on an interesting journey into very different cultures through her characters in the beginning.
This screen protector is great.
As usual this movie delivers more laughs than it should.

The music is wonderful. Really brings back warm memories for anyone who lived through that period. Even though it's from 1973, there really wasn't any profanity or other material like you see on some DVD's.

I have been really pleased with the Black & Decker Dustbuster since my mother purchased it several years ago because it's light enough for me to carry up and down flights of stairs without tiring out, but powerful enough that it goes a long distance until you need more power. The little dustpan nozzle is so flimsy that if you don't hold it just right it'll break off from underneath when using it. I've owned three of these over time. All started to fall apart within 2-3 months.
There where some scratches upon receipt which wasn't too much of an issue or concern for me.

Not worth the money I spent on it in my humble opinion, was hoping for more details of the characters as well as having more recipes from scratch and a list with meal plans. As usual some of his books had great pictures in them!

These are NOT professional grade at all. The tips on mine came in several places that couldn't be sanded down. I am very disappointed with this product. Don't use them if you want your work to look like the photos. They would have worked fine for my purpose if they didn't arrive damaged. If it was just a matter of a few pieces being scratched up, I'd deal with it, but these were all damaged or missing pretty severely.

I hate how this is not compatible with iTunes. It has many features. The app doesn't give you an option to buy the songs in iTunes like it did before. Even when using ITouch 3G, IT DOES NOT WORK!!!! Please fix this. There were a lot of positive reviews. Don't know if I have just received a defected one but its useless. No reason why Apple can't make apps for their devices! This is ridiculous. They need better apps.

I am not normally a reader of romance novels, however after reading this book and other two by the same author, both with characters like our protagonist, I do need to continue reading. However, I will say that the female character in this novel (Claire)seemed very whiny, weak willed and lacking any sense whatsoever. I did find it more intriguing her first lover (Peter) was dead because she had been carrying on an affair for 6 years which caused him to die from aids.

This is a very cheap piece of equipment that will probably break within several months. The first one broke from the base and wouldn't charge after 1 year. For $40 I ordered 3 thinking it would be much better. You get what you pay for so I'll try another one. It does do ok but not great. It's easy to use, though it gets hot/warm pretty quickly but has good suction. Overall it's OK - no more expensive ones have ever gotten 5 stars anyway.

I was very excited to get this, it looked so much more impressive than many similar products. When my parents and i got it, the box it came in looked like it had already been opened, all of the wires were undone, there wasn't plastic or anything with a place for screws but only the metal. All that is not really important, since its working and all, But when you screw on 4 screws, one by one. The bolts don't thread through them, they are just straight through.

My daughter and I thought this was one of the best movies we've seen in a while. We had high hopes for it but were greatly disappointed. The story line is slow to develop yet at points seems like an attempt to keep you watching just so they can show what happens next -- that's not nearly enough story, or good plot, that has happened within the first third of the movie (not too mention there are NO extras on DVD).

These are really fun as a stocking stuffer. Very small - about 2 1/2" x 3". They arrived packed so well that the box was damaged. I think they get better with age or if kept in an airtight container, but only time will tell ;)When using them to bake cupcakes, you want something on top, however, depending upon what you're baking, this may not be ideal.

My grandson loved the book as soon as he received it. However it was missing pages from page 4. I wanted to return it but they said since we opened it, all of our packaging had been destroyed so that meant just throwing in a box and sending back. Very disappointed! He loves Mr. Bug now.

It is a lot better in theory than reality, but good for getting into the mindset of starting small and keeping things very low cost. If one has not lived this lifestyle before, some parts seem way too much to believe. But if you are looking at trying it and plan on living like this, then you must read this. Just make sure that your partner goes out with you, isn't taking home more money per month, or maybe even less. That's part of it.

I purchased three of these for my cats. They were not cheap. Even the one that worked wasn't sturdy enough to stay on a regular carpet even when cats would jump on top and roll around. A total waste of money. What would have been great is if it worked. Update! This item totally fell apart less than 2 months after purchase. At first, no cat tried climbing up. Eventually they did climb up it. Unfortunately, one came loose from under a kitten who was playing with me.
This modem works great. No issues.

I ordered a used Kindle Fire HD 7" for my daughter's 14th birthday. It will not charge. The light turns on and it can only charge the power pack. When plugged into anything, even an extension cord or the USB, nothing is happening. You can't turn it on, take pictures with it, hold anything down at all. Very disappointed in this product, especially since we did not purchase through Amazon, but directly from a third party seller here.

I got this for my son at college. It wasn't as exciting like other games. It's very easy to play. Only one type of game that has a lot to do with the game. Most games are not fun or have too many steps. He prefers some more action. I'd say it's an OK game, but maybe there was alot going on I didn't see. Good buy if you need it in the college library. There were not any issues with shipping. Shipped fast. Thanks Amazon.

First I have to say, I'm fairly critical when it comes to this sort of thing. But for the price, a couple things really stand out. The biggest thing I've noticed is that none of these pans sit quite level. You turn them, and they wobble back into place. No matter how much you try cleaning or re-oiling it, it's still gonna be uneven. So if you're not very picky about your pans, go ahead & order them. If not, they're ok at best.

I'm so sick about people spending millions and $billions killing unborn babies....it makes me sick. The only difference is those women are now making money. If you need proof go look up fetal anomaly scan findings by searching for "birth defects" - it's right there if you want them or not.
Did not work out of the package. Poor quality as to quality. Looks ok in picture, actually looks like junk. Do not waste your money on this cheap item.
Not only the battery that comes with it sucks.. It didn't last very long. I charged for like 8 hours and still took about 2 hrs. to get my laptop fully charged. Don't waste your money.. Save it! :(

This is a book which reads and keeps the reader's attention. It's about how two people who feel an instant attraction discover something wonderful out of their own selfishness. The problem with that is, in real life, we all know some selfishness exists at the same level as most people. One has to take into account how selfish one really is. I also believe everyone wants love regardless where your economic situation is, but it looks like money does not come anywhere near helping out someone in emotional needs.

I saw this documentary at a friends house and we both agreed that the story is so interesting that, although it has long been available elsewhere, you are compelled to see it. However, there were some major problems with its presentation:1. The DVD version doesn't contain any chapter stops.2.

I ordered this for my daughter's Ipod 4th generation because it is supposed to be the "right" size and make her happy. But right out of the package that was shipped from China there were scratches on it. It doesn't fit perfectly but does cover most of the screen. Also shipping took several weeks. If you want a case with some bling then you will like it, just not if you're wanting something functional which it clearly states.
I bought this book because we have made dozens of recipes from her website (the other one with a different author has been removed now.
These buckets' construction seems solid enough.
This is a very satisfying treat dog food without too much fat. And this is one of the few brands that has lamb in it. Lamb meal gives off its characteristic odor but doesn't contain a lot of fat.

I tried 3 of these. The first one was defective right away and had to be returned for a replacement. Another one worked fine the first time it started, but has failed after only two or three tries. At this rate, these will soon be thrown in garbage cans because there's no way I'll buy another one. I'm surprised Amazon would even sell such an item.

I've been a fan of this product for years. My local Lowe's/Menards stopped carrying it. I was so sad to have the only good soap dispenser and not be able to buy more. So when i started research on online sources I came across Soapy Cups. Not sure what changed but it seems like every company has gone downhill with their products. This one is cheap plastic that doesn't work, very hard to fill.

Great sound but not sturdy enough to keep my tablet in the stand without it falling out and crashing on hardwood floor. My iPad 2 has a case so it doesn't fit well either if you are using cases that don't provide an opening for headphone jack. Overall it's ok at best with its problems.

Got this as a gift last Christmas. Worked fine until I started watching movies on my iPad Mini. Now it won't play any disks, makes that loud sound all the time and the USB cable for charging has stopped working. It's still under warranty, but if you're buying an iPod dock, spend more money and get something sturdier. This model doesn't even deserve 1 star.

This book was not worth my time. There are a few good quotes from the movie, but that's all it had so I wasted my money. It could and should have been summed up more simplily. Sorry - never buy this book. Read the movie instead!

This book is completely worthless. Its about a guy who was born with autism and learned how to communicate by copying others. He doesn't have autism. There are some helpful parts of the book, but all in all, it was garbage! Do NOT recommend! I wish people would quit writing negative reviews for books that actually can help people, like this one can. But hey, at least I'll get more money from amazon.

The sound is great but the bass is lacking. I find that when listening for more then 30 minutes the top portion of my head will burn from ear pressure. Other headphones I've owned are extremely comfortable and offer very good bass. You can still hear other noises at full volume though which makes me a little irritated as I like to have private time while listening. These go back in less than an hour. They do look cool if you aren't overly concerned with their comfort level.

This DVD was better than expected. It is a must for any fan of the show or music in general... and it was great to check out Michael Jackson doing some live singing on what was obviously his last tour (the one he came home from after). His voice and the overall stage presence were stunning. When I saw this video coming out, I thought he'd be too "old already" but it turned me into one. I really liked him as an entertainer...

i bought this CD a month ago and only two songs have been used but the rest is garbage, it will not play in my cd player nor can I transfer it. if you want REAL dance music download any of the songs she did for her other cds. THIS IS NOT GOOD DANCE MUSIC, IT HAS NOTHING TO OFFER, DON'T waist your money. i'll be sending mine back just like everyone else.

Bought this on the hopes of some new information, but was disappointed. Lots more info than what is stated here, which was to only buy from online vendors. Not much about why or how he has been able to do this, just lots of pictures. He could have done that by cutting out most of pages and added a bunch of information in his own pages.

I think this may very well be the worst book ever, the writing is so bad and juvenille, they should put him on a suicide watch! My father gave this to me thinking it was good. He didn't say anything before giving this to me.

The sound is horrible. You have these little 'headphones' that are supposed to go on over the ears and they don't even fit my 12 year old. He was so upset because it didn't work for them. No matter how tightly you put these on, his glasses pushed them off at every turn. They wouldn't stay put. Don't waste your money. I returned mine immediately. Bummed kids = big headache.

In the beginning of the book where he talks about his childhood, I was like...is this guy serious? After reading what happened to him at school, I'm really glad that I don't live in a school like that. If you want my advice read something else, if not, don't read.
The battery is easy to load up and works perfectly in my Canon camera. It was a good value. Will definitly buy it again. Much better price than the canon OEM.

I bought these to replace a pair of Koss earphones that had broken. It took me some trying to get them sized properly after my head was in the recommended fit but once they were there they worked great. Sound is great and comfort too. No complaints so far. But as someone else noted, they're not adjustable. I like that. A good headphone for working out or if you tend to workout in really loud environments where it matters whether something sounds muffled because they are on your head.

This novel was well written and kept my interest. I've read books by both Kate Morton and Helen Macgregor, so I expect nothing less from them both. There are things about this work which were just confusing to me. Perhaps they needed more explanation than I could give them.

This book is not well written to my liking at all. The author assumes that everyone knows the names of things and there are no pictures or illustrations with a sentence description so it doesn't help much if you don't know some of them yourself. I ended up throwing it away. At least others might be able to figure out what they are talking about. Not an easy read!

I guess we all have a certain style of listening and buying music, however this has to be the worst example of it I've heard. For starters, it's not only boring, but extremely boring. There are no hooks, nothing that will make you want to sing. The lyrics don't grab your attention either, and seem rather cheesy for a metal album. Sure, there are few actual screams by Dave Mustaine. I just can't see how he'd fit screaming in with metal.

I purchased one of these at the same time for my wife. Within 1 month, it would take a photo and then stop working. It wouldn't even turn off after fully charging. Now I'm buying her another camera. Very disappointing.

I was looking very forward to reading this book. Although it started off rather promising, the lack of proof reading, grammar, and punctuation quickly led me not only to a book that is less than satisfying but one which leaves much room for improvement before its publication. With so many errors in grammar and spelling, as well as numerous typos throughout, I gave up after several chapters. This book, according to various reviews posted on Amazon by other readers, may be even more poorly edited than my own writing.

This is a great concept, but has not worked out so well for our needs. Our kids (ages 6 & 3)didn't enjoy this game. Maybe it would work just as well, or even better, in the hands of adults, at least I think that may be true, since they seemed to have found the game very enjoyable. The main problem with our child who loves mazes and finding hidden items (figuratively) was when we asked if he wanted any help, instead of being directed by an outside character.
Not happy with this book!!! I feel like there is to much filler in it; don't waste your time reading it..not my cup of tea

I purchased this printer because my old one wasn't working, and the cost for a new cartridge was getting out of hand. The ink is expensive but when compared to using paper with inkjet, it gets rid of smudges on documents pretty good. The scanner works good too. But once again like other reviewers mentioned, it's not compatible to Win 7.All in all I'm satisfied so far. And hope they fix some glitches since there are still about 5000 copies left. Only downside would be the cost.
Not much more can be said. It works. Its cheap, and holds your gps.

I was totally disappointed by this cd. It sounds nothing like the orginal or it's cover versions. It's more of a karaoke cd that you should buy for your kids. Save yourself from getting swindled out of money. If you're going to try and put it in an actual format so people can hear it, why not use my credit card, thank you! The only exception being that I did get free shipping :).

I purchased two of these lamps and was very disappointed with both purchases. While they certainly look much more expensive than the ones at my local retail store, that quality is not all there. One lamp (which has a higher wattage rated bulb, unlike the smaller units) had an uneven shade which caused it to fall forward. It might as well have been defective. The other lamp, though, looked perfect. Beautiful finish, good size for reading or TV viewing. For only $18.99 each, this seems like such a bargain.

This was great for the first couple of weeks. Then I began to experience many different problems. First there were dead pixels. Second my sound kept getting disconnected from the tv (happened after about 2 weeks so it must have been interference in both cords). And now its completely dead. I can hear a loud buzz throughout all speakers while watching regular dvds. So basically this product sucked. The fact that mine died already makes me want another brand. At least then I'd know what Im getting.

I don't know what happened to this author, but it appears she is no longer putting out good clean mysteries. The characters are caricatures and the dialogue insipid. Her previous efforts were much more enjoyable. Not recommended. She seems to have put some of her old fans off. I'm one also.

At first, I was excited to receive an email about this book as it sounded fantastic. Unfortunately, it wasn't written well - some of the scenes were hard for me to keep up with due to the poor editing (grammatical errors included) which made it seem like parts did not make sense.
This vacuum is great. We had a Bissell before this one and we like the way they clean. I would recommend this vacuum.
A lot of information for beginners. Too detailed I think. Some very pretty pictures. Would be a good reference but not all that useful as an instruction manual.
Perfect to play around with. Very fun and easy to use. I would purchase again. Bought this as a gift for my friend and he loves it!
this is my second set for these replacements. They last about 6 mos. if not washed or dryed by time you notice problems.
My favorite group of all. If you are true fan then this cd is must own in yourmusic collection.
Bought this collar to use on a German Shep. First time using it, she reacted by shaking her head or back tail as if she'd been shocked.

It works well after several months of use. Great value. Would recommend. Will be useful to keep in car since cell phone batteries drain when left plugged in. The cord can plug into two places on AC outlet.

This is the lowest price I have found on a genuine Canon ink cartridge. However, it would be much cheaper to buy an off-brand that does not leak and has only a moderate capacity (I use it for documents only). My printer works great with this cartridge but will NOT work at all when there are other cartridges in it. Do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

The one thing about this movie that just seems out of place is the music score. I don'tice a lot of great movies have an incredible soundtrack and it almost always gets me hyped up to see them in theaters because you don't believe these movies, they're actually written for soundtracks.. Well, they are not here. Not even close. In case anyone cares, the music was quite terrible. A cheap guitar or synth with some cheesy, low quality 80s sounding effects.

Like so many of the other reviewers I did not think this series was worth purchasing. However, when it popped up for free as a daily deal from Amazon with my prime account, I figured that if it ended after four books, i didn't lose too much. The concept is interesting, and there are things to like about it. It does need some improvement. Unfortunately, there were no major plot points or character development in the book so far, aside from our heroine developing powers at such an early age.

This is almost the only movie I've seen with a black cast...but it had an excellent story line. I thought all the actors were great....especially the kids! They certainly stole some scenes from those little kids they dressed up. What else can you say???? It was good, very well done. Very well done!

I wanted to like this, but it just didn't do much for me. Maybe if you were living in a different country or have no other way to get a lot of fresh air, might help you relax. If you're trying to sleep on planes, the small size could work nicely and I'm sure they are really cheap. Just not what I'd call effective. Also, the "pillowcase versions" aren't particularly comfortable or easy fitting either. This is kind of an odd design.

As other reviewers have mentioned, this is a very attractive set and includes so much to go with. It looks like you're getting more than your monies worth when you actually open the box. In my case I just bought it for everyday use because it's nice having so many pieces that are of decent quality! I also really love all that Oneida packaging - recycled materials or not, good work!The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars, is mainly due to how small each piece seems to be.

I read the book after its been on my "To Be Read" list all summer and didn't get around to listening until yesterday. Let me say that I'll be sure NOT to buy any more Stephen King's books. This entire reading experience had nothing but bad acting, a terrible script, an overly-dramatic score, plot holes big enough for a garbage truck, lack of continuity, poor use of description, abrupt endings and so on. For anyone who spent money thinking they were getting something good, this just is not good.

I don't mind this movie, as most action movies are the same from then on. But I feel a little ripped off with how short it was, and didn't even have all of it's own chapters. It was one long scene that goes back to each character. The story seems really weak, especially if your talking about these guys who were big enough in season 1 just playing their part. This is only part 2 in what should be more.
It broke before i even got it! :( i am VERY unhappy with this product.dont do it. Dont buy it. & lt;3 NOT A GOOD PRODUCT AT ALL!!!

We needed a new vacuum based on the reviews and what seemed like reasonable price. My wife used it after assembly but we had problems as soon as you start pulling it. The wand is just too narrow. It also pulls to one side or another when vacuuming. Also, if there is any obstruction that moves up under it, it jams up. Then you have to take every bit of dirt out. I can do this by hand without much trouble now.

I was excited to get this book, it looked like such an awesome deal. But as soon as I put my order in they canceled it and sent me instead. It took them three days after they told me we wouldn't be getting the book. Terrible experience. They also just cancelled the first one over night. Amazon needs better tracking systems.

This is another great product from OXO. Just be sure to order it online, as I have found stores around us don't carry this item any longer. I am sorry Amazon does not stock the smaller sizes. It worked so well and made quick work of my canning needs.
Bought two pairs of these because they look like an elegant pair at first glance. Wrong.

This is one of the worst. All these songs are not on other albums, and it seems that when an artist does put out a single album with only his singles, they don'thing but re-hash them. These tracks will be great for listening to in your room, as their repetitiveness makes everyone want to punch someone.
Just like having the original to enjoy over and over. I watch it every Christmas season. My mom loves them too!

This cover is thin & light weight. I've been taking my laptop with it everywhere but there has been no wear. Also the "kickstand' always falls out of place as soon as you lift up or let go because it's not sturdy enough.

Don't waste your money! A very poorly designed device. Poor button interface that is hard to remember how to use. You need to be a computer expert to figure out what you're doing. Not worth the money. After returning it and buying something else (I couldn't decide which one though- they weren't all bad). If you don't mind doing lots of setting up and/or tweaking buy it, if you've got an intuitive touch I suggest looking at other options.
A great show, just too bad that there are so many people living "happily ever after" while we watch the trials of their lives. Not everyone can be happy. But that's life. Great show overall.
My 7 year old can't play this game. They said it's hard, they haven't taken the time yet to figure out how to.
There are plenty of different glues and lots enough supplies. And there aren't any duplicates.

A great deal seemed to be made of the title role in La Bohème. However, I was never able to take it. Instead of playing a tortured and tormented young man, he seems more like a shallow cad who would rather have his money than his girlfriend. The music was outstanding, however. Unfortunately, this movie had zero direction. The singing was terrible, even at the opera.

I am so glad Amazon has the new version of these. It's only a matter of time before they make more and less available. I've bought two packages in case something happens to my old sets. The packaging is great for shipping them as well; no breakage...
The movie is pretty good, however since you have to buy this separately on DVD, don't bother. The DVD comes in one single sleeve, with no inserts.
This is a nice looking TV and easy to use. We have trouble getting the sound out of it. So we turn it on before each use now.

If you've played the Sims for a while, you will be slightly disappointed when playing this game because it's nothing like the older versions. Pros: Many new features. A way to customize your house and pets. And there are even ways of changing color scheme!Cons: It's still Sims! The music is annoying. You don't get to customise homes or furniture. It takes forever to grow food. But I can live with all these things because it's Sim world! Also lots of glitches.
THIS WAS REALLY DISAPPOINTING. I HATED THE PLOT AND JUST DID NOT CARE FOR IT. I'M GLAD I DIDN'T PAY TO SEE IT IN A THEATER!

I got these on sale at Target for only $8.99 which is a great price even if they cost $19.95 normally. The sound quality is very low so the bass tends to hurt but all in all, it was worth what I paid for, as this will work pretty well with my mp3 player when working out. However, there are some cons that aren't exactly ideal about it. First, while its still comfortable around your ears, you do get fatigued from time to time.

My son loves to read..even enjoyed the Thomas The Train books as a child and it was hard finding new adventures for him. He loved this...until he tried it out on his own...and the book fell apart.. Poorly made book. A few pages came off. Very disappointed. I am sure this won't last long. It's definitely not worth $24. We returned it. What we like about it- small book, pictures of trains & firemen.
A pair can last only a few months before breaking down. As my children used these daily on long trips they wore out in less than six months.

I was disappointed with this book because of all the spelling and grammatical errors in it. It has caused me to question if anything at all is really a true story. One good thing is that there are stories written from other people's perspective. I'm sure it wasn't easy or flattering for the author but someone just starting out wouldn't have the mental discipline required to do any better. A little guidance would be a definite help.

My kids love this story and now I wish that it came out on VHS but then they don't like the cartoon anymore. Maybe when we are adults we'll watch it. But for a 5 yr old and up of course, it's way over priced in price not to mention.

The only thing that is good about this product is the price. That was my reason for ordering it. Now I've gotta get to work and find something else. After 2 days of use in which i used minimal functions, it's already junk. Waste or money since they don't cost very much at all.

One reviewer says that he or she couldn't read this book through to the end. He is either crazy (he seems to enjoy describing sex acts), or didn't do much due diligence of his own. Here are some facts for you: The female character in this story was raped twice and then gets out of jail after being raped. This woman would NEVER call her rapist a good guy who will help her.
I've used other similar coolers from different manufacturers, and have been somewhat disappointed with them.

It is really not a very good design - I could hardly get it to fit my ipod touch because the cover was so big and bulky. The belt clip mechanism broke off in less than 6 months of use. Would only use for special occasions. Very poor quality overall.

I had high hopes for this book, and was looking forward to learning how women have gotten their start in the industry. While it gave a few good examples of successful, "no-nonsense" business women, as well as, ones who failed, they tended to focus on their successes without addressing all the struggles necessary to get there. This would be great if you're running your own small company, but really no help at all.

I like this book, it has helpful tips and really good pictures. My only complaint is that they have used the same pictures on most of these "new breeds" as with some of the old breeds. The colors are different too. It's also lacking in depth regarding each breed. It doesn't go into any breed specific information but does seem to be a compilation book. A book which will help show you your pet is not necessary, unless they're all related.
This is an amazing headset. It has great sound - rich & clear - fits comfortable without being bulky. You will not be disappointed.

What a waste of time. I should have read the reviews first. This book was written by someone who only knew how to take people's descriptions (the author's own for several instances) and twist them. He obviously didn't understand that characters in movies don't really talk like that. His attempts at dialogue would never even pass as authentic conversation - they were so poorly done he seemed more interested in writing his script than getting it into print. My advice? Don't put your trust in this author.

I was very disappointed because this book does not talk about the true spiritual truth of Christianity and Islam. It is a way forward to make money. And yes, it gives you an online code for getting $$ from Amazon. Do NOT, let me tell you: do NOT bother reading about Islam or religion in any book. This one takes up all pages with nothing good in them. One thing this author knows how to do, is: write long passages on subjects that will sell lots but have no value at all.
This is an amazing movie. Definitely worth seeing - especially if you're looking for something outside of what you've been consuming. :) Watch it!! :D
Love this product! I drink a cup of tea in the morning with my husband and now we are enjoying our own teas! It came right away and seems to be very durable.

I've loved both the book and movie versions of "What Maisie Knew," so I was keen to reread it, although my library doesn't have a Kindle version available. Having recently read an excellent biography about Margaret Lockwood, I thought I might pick up this earlier version, perhaps available in hardcover. Although it's definitely different from the film adaption, it did bring back pleasant memories for me.

I had the same problem others are having with this product. The picture of this monitor is incorrect. All of these Asus monitors have the exact model number that Amazon posts on their site, and it appears for a long time before you see any reviews. These companies pay someone somewhere to review products they send out so if anyone else buys one after mine goes bad than Amazon's page will still be correct as far as I'm concerned.

I had purchased a new electric smoker grill from Wal-Mart and decided to purchase some more of these grills as gifts for family members. They are smaller than my old ones but they work great. Can't wait until summer so we can use them outside! Thank you!!!

I received a used one, not new as they advertised. The box was damaged and scratched. It did have some marks and scratches in it. I called the customer service department but nobody answer me. It has been for over three weeks. This is really bad service. They should check what happened before sending it to customer. Not satisfy at all after 2 weeks using it. After 3 weeks, one side of remote switch stops working. We are still waiting if we can get another one.
This is really nice. Bought it as a gift but my brother likes it.

Well this book is a great story, although it was badly written in my opinion. The author used too many commas and he often skipped from one character to the other with no warning. And some of his words were just plain wrong! He told us about Jack telling him they are brothers but at that point I know what it means. So where he jumped into saying these characters were brothers when they weren't it made me wonder if English wasn't his native language or something.
I ordered this for my daughter and she likes it. She is very pleased with the quality, price anddesign of the product. Very nice colors at a reasonable price. Highly recommned.
It's not bad, but it's very short. For this price I would think there are more recipes. It was free.

The product was listed as a refurbished item from Amazon and when we received it, there were marks on every part of it. We didn't want anything more than the phone itself, now all we're hoping for, are working headsets.

I don't have a lot of good things to say about this item except that it is worth the price. It looks really cool on my macbook pro with the carbon fiber/brushed aluminum design. The legs are made out of aluminum. These parts do come in two pieces though. You will need to take apart your old keyboard and put these on. If you can't see the little metal "clips" or whatever they call them, that's fine, it's still very easy.
Nice quality bag, great design except one thing, not enough storage compartment inside.

The book is ok. Not the greatest writing but good general information. All in all a decent read. But what bothers me most about it (at least I think it's him) is he doesn't do any research to discover anything new. He simply states the facts and tries to spin them into an opinion. You are not really told of who or how many times some event was done this way or others were doing these things that way.

There are a few things that don't add up here. First, the book states that two of the three women had been married as children, then they all became single and married. Second, the people at NIV apparently forgot to update their Bible translation. Third, some references were simply incorrect for any given chapter in Scripture. I understand what the author was trying to do, but his choice of details is bizarre.

This product is definitely cheaply made. The sound quality was not good and the mic only worked one time on me. I ended up sending it back. Don't Waste your money like me if you want a decent mic. Spend a few more dollars for quality...get something that will stand up.
Got this video for my kids but I enjoy watching it too. The singing is really good too. Kids will love it!

This product met those expectations, as well as giving me one more tool from my small toolbox while reducing the space they would take up when stowed. It feels very sturdy.

I purchased this as a birthday gift for my mother and it was greatly appreciated. It looks exactly like the picture. There are no problems whatsoever. The packaging was very impressive. One of those plastic bottles comes in this huge box (with bubble wrap on top). If you have any doubts about your purchase whatsoever, just think "if it's made of glass, does it matter?" And don't be deterred by it's size. This thing is much taller than you'd expect.
This shower curtain set looks just like in this picture.
Very easy application. Really enhances the look of your phone like no other. Just as described,this item is very much recommended. The shipping was super fast. Highly reccomended. A+ product

I have heard a lot of stories about how people put their old CDs in the players for my car and that seems to work well most times. And with an automatic CD changer it would be nice if you could get back at least half the songs off your CDs. After having purchased this MP3 player based on all the positive reviews here, I can tell you why mine didn't live up to them. The first complaint is this: the FM radio.

This is a horrible product. At the time of writing this, it has not even been one day, and my 3 month-old puppy had chewed through this product to little pieces. The fabric was shredded where she got her paw in it, which caused some minor cuts. My dog doesn't chew much, either, so I'm quite certain that she's NOT teething. I immediately contacted Amazon Customer Care, who suggested washing it.
For some reason when these books are in hardcover editions with dust jackets, it's a bit annoying because if you try to pick up one, you invariably pull it out of your purse or bag.

I like the price and it's light weight but I'm unhappy with it because there's a seam in it. Like the one that runs from chin to shoulders but on the right side. Not sure if this is normal or not. It just has me worried as it's new so don't know. My other hats have no seams except in the crown. The color (red) was nice. Very lightweight, almost unbreakable for such a lightweight hat.

The reason why people want to own this album is for two reasons: the production and because Snoop was behind it, as executive producer with Dr. Dre. It may not be his BEST. I don't know about most people. But it's very good in general. First song on Disc 1 is, without a doubt, Snoop's #1 hit, "What Would You Do?/P.S.K.

What a waste of time, this thing doesn't work and no one else can tell me what I am doing wrong! It is not possible to figure it out because it does not work! There are so many programs on the market if that helps. Not worth your time to buy it. Please do yourself a favor but something better. I will be shipping mine back! Do not, repeat, DO Not!! While the film may have had entertainment value while it was on Broadway in 1971, this DVD does not do justice to it. This TV has pretty good picture and it is a great value. Amazon delivered with this product as promised. The only drawback I experienced was that the stand came without all of its parts, so we have to find some hardware at Lowe's for about $40. Fortunately, our other television is compatible but there are no speaker options on this model. All in all, though, very happy with it.

This is a good book, but definitely not the best one of its kind. The only complaint I have is that it could be more descriptive and less anecdotal. Also, because there are few photographs in the book, this does cause some problems for me. For instance, if I want to see how many people were killed by wolves or how they died (because these things can become a part of our collective memory), I'll look at books such as "Wolf Killing Machine.

Easy setup with good connection. Love to use over home router. Its very fast compare to my old linksys one. Have been using for more than 2 month. No complain so far. Fast download/upload speeds. Highly recommend. Must go wireless if you want to enjoy all its benefits. Buy it.
i did like it.

After only 3 days of using this bag I started noticing that my iPad had a funny smell to it. Not sure what it was and how to properly wash it, but when you first get the bag, they included with plastic bags (don't know why since there's no instructions on it) for easy washing. So I'm trying to keep all items super clean until after use, so just made me paranoid that my iPad's not sanitary. Since then the bag has seemed to have gotten more smelly.
They were smaller than thought and have already scratched. Otherwise beautiful quality. Very comfortable in bed.

This book was so horrible. The main character is a complete idiot. She kept screwing up at all the stupidest things that normal people wouldn't even do in any other situation, she constantly runs into situations where someone tells her something and doesn't bother to listen or read back before deciding what to do. It seems as though there are only 2 characters in this book, one that I could ever imagine not being friends with but somehow they have a crush on each other. The 2nd isn't explored enough.

Pros: This monitor is awesome if you plan to get a really good quality picture. It comes with VGA, DVI, and three HDMI. I bought this for my Mac Mini 2013 because of the Thunderbolt technology but it did not work since thunderbolt doesn't connect through an OSD. I tried all sorts of cables which made everything worked just fine besides that no HDMI cable worked, so then I had some spare Apple TV cables. So after I installed those, things started working fine.

I was really excited about this book being as it is geared toward a young adult audience. This book reminded me of the "Twilight Zone" for adults. The character development could have been better and there should not be so many similarities to vampires. All in all it's an interesting story with good premise. But, you need some things worked out.

The book itself isn't bad, but I won't buy anything from this publisher again. They shipped the first copy to me with many holes around the spine, and they sent a second one, which was still in bad condition after all this. This is just poor quality control. Amazon has always been good about this, so what you should do at least if it's going to be shipped, get it checked out by another customer who says it works fine.
This product was great. It shipped in a timely fashion even though we ordered regular shipping. We are pleased at this purchase. Thank you. Would purchase again.

I bought this for a christmas present so I don't know how it will hold up if the reciever enjoys it, but I think he is going to love it!! Fast shipping......... Can't wait to see him. Great product. It came when expected and in good condition. Would recommend this seller. Great price. A win win!!! Thank you. :-) :)

This product is as described. It stays where you're putting it. However, if it isn't placed on completely straight the first time around, then there will be some ripples that aren't flat. Otherwise, seems like a quality product. It's been through 2 washing cycles so far, no problems so far.
these didnt like in ears at all...

I ordered a pack of six filters to replace the two that came with my Brita, which is about 10 years old. So many uses. This handy bench comes with two different height levels including a level and cup holder. It can be carried easily. Love it.

Too little information on how exactly was done the capture of Idi Amin. Still it's pretty interesting that it has details about the process involved and that there are only some very vague mentions to him being captured.

You definitely get what you pay for with this product. I purchased it on a whim. It worked great for several months then all of the sudden it went dead. Just plain died. Nothing would work. I don't know why but it doesn't seem to really work for me. A little pricey. Maybe someone else would benefit.
It works very well, but I find it a bit awkward to use. Otherwise I'm pleased with its performance. It's easy and efficient.

This is the worst book I have ever seen in my life. Perfect fit. Easy on, easy off.

It is exactly as described and at a great price too. I bought this to hold my daughters laptop in her backpack. She loves it!! The item came quickly and was nicely packaged. Thank you so much for your wonderful products! We are very happy customers!!!

It charges the phone like it's supposed to. It's great to keep in your car so you don't have run out battery but that takes up space. It also serves as a flashlight. Excellent battery, strong, durable.

If you do business with Amazon this is not the book for you. There should be some sort of disclaimer that it is strictly aimed at large commercial enterprises. That said, many ideas were interesting.
This book cover is not as long or wide as my old one.

I bought it for two reasons: (1) to use the iPod as a GPS, and (2) to connect an iphone with good quality head phones into it. My expectations were not only disappointed, but they would have probably been surpassed by its main features, given time spent trying out other options. Firstly, let me say that my unit came from Amazon, so of course there was no hassle about exchanging it. Secondly, when used as intended, you are left scratching your head.

Excellent product, easy to read without glasses, works on every type of battery and does not require any additional power source other than batteries. I use it with a small LED flashlight for all kinds of things including checking my golf swing. The LED is much stronger then the old flashlight. A plus is that I can clip this device anywhere in place which makes clipping or removing your shoes even easier. If you need a great reliable wireless device, get this.

Very unhappy with this product. Product is described as new when I received it the screen cleaner was missing!! The battery would not charge at all and i had another brand on hand that was charged in minutes. Sent back to seller, got my money back. Good price compared with other places. And they're really quick & easy. Like having your own personal dessert. I'm trying to eat healthier, and am usually craving something sweet...so these crackers fit right in.

I bought this for my husband as a birthday present - it is beautiful but if you plan on wearing it everyday, beware the leather WILL start to fade in spots. One of our pieces became all frayed and just looked awful after two weeks. But when worn casually, its amazing.   Rating: 4.0   My boyfriend works most mornings so he needs something to keep him warm which is why we got this, he does not love how much warmer his head sweats,although i still gave it 4 stars.

I have seen these at a different store but they were much more expensive. These gloves are thick material and work well for me. They are made in the States by people that know how to do this right. If you can afford expensive items don't buy cheap, get what you really need, if not, your money goes down the drain. Great Gloves!

My family and I like our coffee hot. The Bodum insulated mugs stay perfectly warm for hours on end. I've owned several of the smaller ones, but decided they were just too small. This larger version fits nicely in my wife's purse, so we have a mug ready to use whenever there is opportunity. Even if its not immediately available when she needs it, it doesn't bother her. Plus everyone likes them! They feel solid, are very heavy duty, keep drinks hot, will probably outlast us all.

The camera had a horrible autofocus system. It took time for my shutter speed increase to take the picture and still didn't track where I was focused. Then when zooming in pictures they were not sharp that day. This happened with all pictures. My Sony cameras have awesome focusing capabilities but this one is so low quality you might as well put your money into a good point-and-shoot. On a plus side it would probably be safe if dropped. They say waterproof up to 2.

It was written by Richard Bach - a great writer but one should remember you are reading his account of those times. Not all the facts were included in this story. Read it through with an open mind to what he says. He had good insight into a time long forgotten. His own wife has passed now so I hope he is writing more history about her. And hopefully still alive and happy. To me that story is not finished.

We love this toy, but, the paint scratches off very easily,as do most of the accessories. So we are looking to replace it now. It also gets stuck alot, when they try and play on carpet. But, overall its great. I wish you could find new ones, but they dont seem available. Very difficult for a two or four-year old.

I have enjoyed using this knife so far. Works well on small fish as well as larger ones. Great cutting edge, feels very comfortable in the hand. It is a bit hard to get clean, and not really worth putting it back together, but you should be gentle with it. Good for boning fish. One side of the blade has been chipped, though that part seems sturdy. Overall I would recommend at these prices even if they had some design flaws. This thing rocks. Buy one now.

I was a bit skeptical and figured there may be problems with this light considering the low price. Well, I'm glad to say that so far it has worked great. I've been putting LED lights everywhere in my house because of their excellent color temp but they all were too big, expensive & heavy, hard to mount or just plain ugly. And none are perfect. When we're camping we go backpacking, kayaking, etc...This little guy is perfect for every occasion.

I bought this printer for a home office. The wireless feature works well however after the print job is finished it takes 5-10 minutes to print/be able to do any other operations - basically all it's good for. Wireless setup was easy. Quality of printing documents and photos are nice but not great. forever Printing envelopes taer. If you aren't using photo paper you need two sets which in my case ended up being about $40 per set so that's another expense. Print speed could use improvement as well.

This is a book that has some good things in it. Some people think it means you can go get your nails done. That's what I wanted but this says different things. It's worth reading or keeping to refer to. If you buy someone else to read the book with you, make sure they really enjoy reading. Maybe then both of these will be more fun. For my own purposes it needs some work. But as always, if you're interested in getting into better health, find something better.

this movie is a major insult to all david bowie fans,most people dont know that.while many of the songs are good,the soundtrack should have been" no good deed goes unpunished" by michael jackson just happens too be on it,so don't waste your money unless you like those songs and can accept that they must go in order.

I just wanted a simple, good looking case with the sleep function, and that's what i got to be quite honest. This could have been a great cover had it been made for the new ipad 3 as advertised. Instead, the sleep/wake function doesn't work when you close the cover. Also, even though I went in and out of this case several times, there is a chemical smell. Not sure if it's from manufacturing or shipping. Will do some touch-up work, but overall the picture looks great.

I agree with other reviewers who state that this book could have been so much better. The plot was rather thin and, though the characters were well drawn, it wasn't very entertaining. But what did save this books for me from a 1 star review is McNaughton's writing style. She has such an interesting and creative world building style where she's able to show you quite clearly what's going on without ever speaking to you, which makes her a truly unique voice in fantasy writing.
If you're anything like me, you're likely familiar with J.D.

I ordered these bulbs and they put the wrong bulb in, now i have to return them. This is very unsanitary & a horrible experience. Do not place orders from this company if u dont want your package tampered with.

I got this book hoping to find some more insight after reading The Other Side. It was okay, but a little dry. My understanding of how others reacted is that the writer had gotten them to be as she portrayed them, especially by using their first names. So for example we have "Emma" and it said that Emma did not care about her job or anything else because she married him. And then later on, when describing the divorce process, he refers back to Emma.

This book is okay for beginners. I have had some great cookbooks (Julia Child's was my favorite) and this one did not bring a lot of excitement. There needs to be more pictures. The recipes are average at best. We got a few interesting tidbits here and there, but overall, disappointed with the book. Don't recommend it.

It's got a lot of great reviews but I wasn't quite prepared for it. It was so loud it ruined everything in the room that I have no clue what happened. Needless to say my wife called me and took care of that. We can't return this item because it's flammable material! So unless you like hearing explosions, please stay away!

I bought this from E-bay as a replacement for another one we have owned since 2001. It lasted almost exactly three years. First the sound started fading out gradually, and then just completely died. We took apart to look at it - it's obviously an electrical failure in several places. Too late to return under Amazon's policy, so we'll start looking into sending this thing back.

Love the product and will buy more when it is a reasonable savings over other vendors. This product has been around for years and there aren't many who offer this brand compared to some of those that do sell it. You should order from them. They always ship quickly, too.

I am a fan of Dan Brown and his books, but "Angels & Demons" just didn't make it. There were many loose threads to be wrapped up as well which ended up left dangling. Why did Angels have the gift of telekinesis? Who was Mallozzi? What does he really know? Etc. etc. The big mystery at the end is never solved either, except for in Brown's own head (which got so tedious after a while).
I bought these for our small office. A lot of ink was out in a little bit over two months.

My daughter has used it a couple times since Christmas to cook her egg rolls but I am not quite sure how well she likes it. It is an important tool in the kitchen and I'm glad we have it! :) This would be helpful if you are entertaining as well, though my husband made up some fun stories about having been kidnapped by pirates for making scrambled eggs. There were no instructions included. Overall the eggs came out OK. The timer was easy enough for me to set.

We used this for years until it broke. I don't know about the other reviewers, but my original didn't last much less than 6 years. So when that one broke we decided to buy a new one. It worked ok except they have made things so cheap these days with plastic parts (the cover and power cable got torn up in two months).Then after 4 months of very light use it died. And now I'm stuck trying to figure out how to dispose of it.
Well It did not fit our phone very well. The charger will fall out if bumped or dropped. The case was too thin for an adult. Would do good to protect a kid but don't drop your phone.

I was really disappointed with this set of cookware, after reading the rave reviews. There are a lot of very superficial features lacking in these pans. The pans have not been seasoned well, and require far too much work to clean compared to my previous set, even before using anything but plastic utensils. Most important, is that any food cooked on these cooks through like crazy - it looks like it came off immediately, leaving burned bits behind.
Love it! it is what I want for my baby to sleep in. They last the whole week and they are very well made.

This is a nice sized scale with a good solid feel. It does take up counter space but the unit itself seems heavy enough not to tip over. The two issues I am having are 1)sometimes when weighing in grams, it says 0.0 g and doesn't change so you just have one gram right there - no way of knowing if its off or not. Also 2 months after purchase, my display looks like it's broken already. But since I've dropped it, I'm guessing that's what happened.

I just received this. I'm not impressed at all. It is actually larger then it looks in the photo. The top will take a very long time to heat and be able to cool down by itself with out cooling from outside. And finally what do you say when someone wants hot dog for lunch. You don't need this. It's not warm enough. If your going to buy one, get big so u can put alot of buns on it. Just like an over priced toaster.

I was expecting a much sturdier case. After only 2 days of carrying it around, the seams began to rip on the outside cover so that you could see what looked like fraying all along where he had been sitting in it. The zipper would not hold anymore and now the case is useless without something to prop up my kindle with so as to make viewing easier. Very disappointing. I've always loved CaseCrown cases for other electronics, but not this one.

This thing is a rip-off! It's only 24 pages of "stories" and about 30 pages with illustrations - the other two types are merely advertisements. The advertising material could have been included as one story, for example. As it is, it makes no sense to spend almost $12 just to read those 2 or 3 pages that make you want this ebook. And no, I'm not saying you're in any way obligated to click on every ad.

My son loves puzzles and was excited to receive the puzzle. However, we were very dissapointed with this puzzle. The "board" is made of cheap paper like puzzle pieces but really big pieces. This isn't even a regular board. It came loose from shipping and had creases in it. The bottom piece fell apart within 2 days when I picked it up off my son's floor.

I wanted this to work. It doesn't work at all. The remote seems like it would work, if all the lights went on. We followed directions and were still unable get it to. A waste of my money for me. Wish we could have gotten a working one. Very disappointed that there isn't any better review on it. Just read other reviews, which are really bad. Guess it's an off brand product. Won't be trying another one. If you want something for looks and just as decoration only. Go ahead.

This is a great product. It arrived on time and was packaged well. The product itself isn't as good of quality though, but for what I paid I can't complain. Great price so worth the money to me. Not bad at all in my opinion. And it looks just like the picture.

I've returned mine because the earpiece kept popping off. If they would build in some sort of safety feature as others have mentioned, I'm sure this item would be great. However, without even considering that, my main complaint about these headphones are twofold.

The idea of an individual book on my favorite tv show was really exciting! So when the calendar arrived it came in a timely fashion, and though there is nothing wrong with it, I did anticipate that there would be more than one episode in each month.

After spending several hours attempting to connect the wireless bridge with my Cisco Linksys E1000 router, I gave up after a couple of failed attempts. I got this to plug into my wife's car's auxiliary outlet. Now we can all play songs from our phone on long trips. Works just fine with no problems. No complaints. Very good quality item.

I bought this as a gift for my husband who loves his wine. This looks great on the counter and was packed very nicely so nothing arrived broken or broken. It has become our favorite decanter. Love it! Thanks Amazon too!

I have never been one to get into novels with explicit sex scenes. But, as an avid reader, it is just not my cup-of-tea, that's what the other reviewers wrote here. So, all of you others who enjoyed this novel, then by God be my friend--I beg you--and don't read anything else.

It was recommended to me by my doctor and did absolutely no good at all while I took it, even the first time. Not a bad product. Just doesn't work. My pain didn't go away after taking it. It is the perfect size for a small space, which is where ours is. The problem I have with it... right out of box it only worked once. When plugged in and turned on, there was not noise or light, just NO power to unit. After 3 days all lights come on so it's ok, but who cares when one has no power!
This is the best product I have ever used for cleaning house and car windows. I had been looking all over town before finding this brand. Thanks Amazon!,

This movie had an interesting concept, but the character development was weak. There were a lot of plot holes, and I don't expect every Hollywood blockbuster to be accurate. I'm hoping for better from this writer in future. Also, there are some scenes that felt out of place. They simply did not flow with what else happened within the story. It would have been great if they could put more effort into writing the script. The movie was shot on digital video, which made it look pretty low budget.
My little dog loves this. It will be great if she would learn how to take care of it.

The product seems to be pretty simple but you can't use the phone if you don't have your charger connected, that is why I bought it in first place! It charges up great and does exactly it promised. i dont think its working i saw nothing no changes while using this.maybe im expecting too much.ill give some more time then i'll try anything else. oh well live n learn.
Looks nice and just the right size for all our toiletries. A good value at a reasonable price. Pleased to add this item to my collection

I bought two sets. The first set had a problem with one of the earphones. After trying all kinds of tricks and tweaks on my iPod to make them work, I've decided it is not worth returning them. So, after much research, ordered another. This pair sounds fine. The problems are they fall out too easily from time to time. Sometimes when I have some weight in one ear, other times not. They also seem very thin and cheap. Not a whole lot here at $20 per pair.

I tried this product on both of my Kindle Fire Tablets and Ipad Air. It was very difficult to place the film over a screen protector. The first few times around it worked great. However, as with all things in life, the more one uses it, eventually dirt gets attached to it. The film began to lose its adhesive ability to reattach itself after several uses even though there were no lint particles or bubbles when finished. Then yesterday while trying again, it pulled up making application difficult.

I'm usually able to look over grammar mistakes when they're small, like misuses of words etc. However this book's grammatical errors were simply too much and distracting so for me it's all down. The character development was lacking, almost nonexistent due to poor sentence construction.

Our dogs don't like this toy. One doesn't even come to get it. The other, she played with for about 30 seconds and then just walked away. Maybe it's better suited for small dogs. Would probably work great on bigger ones…
This is the worst money i've ever spend on my kindle fire it's so slow u can't do anything at all I couldn't even download this game if I wanted to pay for it.

This book was a huge disappointment. I felt that the writing style seemed forced and unrealistic. It is written more like a blog than an actual book. There are tons of grammatical errors in there (typos, missing punctuation, etc.). It's almost just a collection of random thoughts without any attempt at order. The best part about this "memoir," to me, was reading some of my favorite pop culture references. Don't buy this. Not worth it. Even free it wouldn't be good.

I don't own this item and don't need it. I simply want to warn you. This product is listed with the Garmin StreetPilot 295WT which it does NOT work with. Not happy at all since they did list that product. I'm out $80. It cost me $15 shipping for a return so guess I'll keep it, but if this is how Amazon sellers are going about listing items, please take heed of this. It's totally false advertising.

I really wanted to like this book but in the end it just couldn't do it. The premise and world were fun at first and had me hooked for a few chapters until all of sudden the author has everything wrapped up so neatly by chapter 20 you wonder when you've reached the end. After finishing her other novels that I've loved I'm not sold on how well she's been able to develop story lines and characters into full novels.
The product did not match up to other filters we ordered at the same time.

This book is a collection of two books, so you basically get the first half for free and have to buy the second one because they are not in order. This makes me quite angry. It should be stated immediately that this isn't just an inconvenience. For example, if I want to know some information about how to implement data encryption with Mailvelope, I'll look it up online using [...] first, then try again by finding the URL with mailvelope.com/learn? And that's it.

This book has some good tips in it. Unfortunately, that doesn't mean it's a great book. It wasn't easy to read (well, the first two or three chapters were), and there were places where grammatical errors took me out of what I was reading. But overall, it does give you food for thought. If someone asked me- "What's most important is love between women as well as men," I'd probably answer something like, "The importance of respecting your partner both physically as well as emotionally.

this is a very good tool for helping you understand the process involved in starting an on-line web hosting busines and how to get started with basic internet setup and security for your own personal domain name. You need to provide free server space so that other people can do it too.

It's very well constructed, especially considering how low price. If you need a case with all your phone needs, this really fits the bill. You should get one ASAP! Good product! :) Fast shipment! Highly recommend to other buyers! :)

This product is a piece of junk. I bought it for use with my new Canon 60D. The first time I used it, the connection stopped working properly. Then, after about 30 shots, or so, nothing but static. Nothing at all. Complete waste of money. Don't be suckered by the low price, because you get what you pay for. I'd give this thing negative stars if I could.

I hate to say this, but the book started out with so much promise. The storyline was interesting with a female President in an office of power and yet there wasn't enough time devoted to exploring her character. So many times throughout the book, it felt like she could be anyone, except her. It seemed that everything came at us too quickly, not giving me more depth then what I knew before.
After reading all the positive reviews on this product, i decided to go with it.
Just like new...

This book is basically like any other self help book. It has lots of little tips, and if we take it as a collection of tips that I can relate to then it's pretty good! It's not a whole lot different from the others but if you want some simple advice about improving your career or life this will do it. If you're looking for something more deep with new insight - look elsewhere.

Not the best read, especially for someone who has not worked with these types of people before. Seemed like there wasn't much to it. Very repetitive. A bunch of stories about other people's experience and how they work as well, so there's some value there. Worth a read if you've been doing this awhile. The section on online dating definitely puts out red flags though.

Ok this movie was ok. I wish that it weren't so drawn out and wasn't just the same thing over again. Don't get me wrong, we all know everything is not quite fair for the man she chooses....but come on! She never did anything to give her child any other chance of life! They should have put more emphasis on his side instead of trying to make a better life for him in America! Save your money unless you can't see past it.

While the book was well written and a page turner, it contained too many graphic details. The content is not appropriate for middle school students. I feel we should be exposed to more historical facts like what happened during WWII, Pearl Harbor & that there were spies in the US. This would have been great if they had avoided some of the violent content. But as is, you can see where a parent might raise concerns about kids who read over 50 pages.

Don't waste your time. There is nothing in this book to help you. If you have ever used a computer you'll find it ridiculous. This author does not know one thing and doesn't seem capable of writing on top of that. The grammar level is bad at best. You get the feeling that he just sat down some time after college and wrote this. Very disappointing. Wish I could post something useful but don't want you to spend $14.

I bought this in a two pack along with the purple keyboard so both of us have one but my son said his was not as bright and his just faded away from use. He loved it though because he could see all the keys better then before. Will send back for another set soon to see. Would buy again in store where it's easier to check color first. A good replacement cable for our old Canon 5D MkII. Our first experience with this brand and it lived up to the standard I have come to expect from Canon. The only downside I see about Canon's cords is they cost a bit more than off-brands. At the end of the day, I've learned that you get what you pay for, so after paying for premium price cables, why not give them an extra buck or two to build quality?

This book, by all accounts, is an absolutely wonderful resource on the art and history of American women's clothing. It contains a wealth to information, including both text descriptions and visual examples as well as photographs, illustrations, sidebars, etc. However, this book lacks photographs with captions detailing the garments being discussed, in contrast to many other well-known books like this that I've found. I'm guessing because there are numerous drawings accompanying some of the textual descriptions, but none for these visual examples.
Bought in early August. It worked fine. Had a great price. By mid November it died before it reached 12 months.

These are the best for your money! Super sturdy. Works with the new iPad as well if needed. Not expensive but a must have. Worth every penny.

I purchased 3 packs to use for a small project. There are enough cables now I can leave them on the fridge, because they keep their coils tightly coiled with these cable ties. The colors and patterns allow you to tell which wire is active at any given moment. I will buy more of these.

At first glance, it seems like a good product - has all 3 outputs including an input jack. And at $13, it's definitely worth buying. In fact, you get way more value in that $10 than if you'd buy similar products with single outputs.

As with the other series, I loved these books and could hardly believe they were coming to an end. This book, however, wasn't great but not terrible either. Not what I'd hoped for. You can't wear them as wrist bands with other rings until you get to size 9, which really didn't fit my wrist. And then at 8mm they were still too long. As bracelets go these work okay, they're probably meant for teens.

The author talks about her experiences at the age of 15 to 20 and is surprised that she wasn't sexually assaulted or beaten for daring to go by herself. To do so in this day in age? This has to be the worst recording ever made. The sound is so horrible and awful its barely listenable -- you can just feel through their performance there was absolutely NO effort put into it. I have a small yorkie mix who LOVES her dog food. One thing we didn't like about it was the smell. It took me many months to find one that worked well, but this is it. She likes being out in public all day, and with this bowl, you can leave your door unlocked at work knowing she has extra water while you're gone. This book was very fast paced and it had a good amount of interesting side plots that I enjoyed but there were also some issues. There are really only two things wrong with the book. Firstly, there should be more editing done. Every single time I read one or another spelling mistake, grammar mistakes, and/or missing words, they pulled me totally out of it. If you aren't bothered at all by these things, then this is definitely worth giving a try. It's fun enough to keep reading.

I found this movie to be very boring. It was hard to identify with any of the characters. The whole series had no character development. Very little action. There is a reason why it came up as "must see." Don't waste your time unless you are looking for some mindless fluff.

It's a great coffee for breakfast or an afternoon drink that is satisfying with your favorite flavor. So easy to carry around just fill glass and the mug it goes in. I'm getting ready now to order more. I don't want run out.

The story seems to be told in a very episodic style, with the reader seeing almost none of the main characters. In this regard, it reminded me of, say, an episode of The Twilight Zone. It's worth reading if you're interested either for its science or as literature, but not much more. If all you want from a book like these is entertainment, you'll enjoy it. Personally, I found much more value and enjoyment at my own pace reading "A Boy and His Worm.

My 4 yr old is really into dinosaurs. Her older brother is a little younger and enjoys them. I got her this book as she would love dinosaurs and it seemed like something fun to read together. Imagine my surprise when we began the first night reading it. First of all, every page had several references in it. It didn't seem to be at all geared toward toddlers. They don't talk about anything, they have no real story. The animals are not realistic looking, but just animals.

First I love the story and characters. I'm a sucker for romance. This book would have earned 5 stars had it not been so short. It was almost over before it started but it kept us engaged enough to want more of the story. The author put some good thought into her world building in this book. When you read the description of the books it sounds great but when going the download its quite amazing how they all come together perfectly. I can't wait to see what's next. Good job Anita.

This book was one of the hardest ones I have ever read! It jumped around throughout time and it wasn't very suspenseful...unless you count killing someone in a car accident. There were two main characters who made up for the story, even with each other's flaws. Both had their issues that they worked through. The ending just left me disappointed. At least an epilogue or something?!? I'm not sure how to sum this up...

Some sections include the whole book in one volume, others need separate entries as they pertain only to parts or individual pages. This has become somewhat frustrating after three days worth of usage.

It doesn't matter if you believe some things never happened, or are part of his imagination, he just ends with a little "what happened?" That's it.

My wife just bought this coffee maker and she uses it every day for several cups of coffee. The problem is that after only 2 years the unit started overflowing during brewing. We sent in a claim to Hamilton Beach 4 weeks ago about having to replace it. They are still waiting on that repair. Great for the price. I would definitely buy again. It was easy to assemble using a youtube video. The material is comfortable and appears very durable.

I bought it for my husband and he is not very happy with it. The keyboard does NOT work properly. Some keys don't work.
