The TP-Link 8 port usb hub is nice looking with just the right number ports (8, though others have complained about it being too few).
Great design idea to use different sized screws for different size holes. However, I have an issue with this product.
I liked this novel enough that it got me hooked on reading historical romances. It's set during WWII when most of us forget how terrible things were.

This book was just too cheesy to be enjoyable. Most of the characters were not even believable, the story line was so bad I couldn't finish it. I'm in disbelief that this would ever become a best seller. It is about the only piece of garbage I've read recently. If you want good stories with realistic characters, stick withThe Secret History; or, even better, readingAmerican Psycho - Criterion Collection (Two-Disc Collector's Edition)orThe Adventures of Huckleberry Finn.
Installed my new screen in minutes after cleaning well with Windex and alcohol swabs. Had no problem removing old screen.

It didn't work. Won't download on Windows 7 Ultimate. It's also really slow at getting graphics and sound running (it's supposed to).This is an older game, so I'm guessing something else has changed with them. It looks as though other people have used other versions of this, but for me it's garbage.
I've never made homemade bread before until now. Now I'm really enjoying it, especially since we've cut back on eating out quite a bit.

I purchased a set of these in April 2013 for three different locations. They all seem to be defective and cannot charge the batteries after two weeks use. The first unit was good because it had instructions on how to work it. However, when the second failed within six months, not much more than one month from purchase, the next units that worked began with battery issues right away, although sometimes charging properly or not. When you go through several failures before they are replaced with another new set, this is not acceptable quality.

I got this as a gift for someone who likes to cook... so maybe she enjoyed it, but what we actually got was the newer version with little pieces of bread on them, which is a much smaller size. Too small & not all that nice looking for an office or even the kitchen. To make it work at our house (I need about 15 slices each time I bake), I had to cut down on how many slices...
The kindle won't stand up anymore. This isn't good so it's going straight back.
This is easy to assemble with good instructions - you may do some trial runs just in case but once its put together it's very sturdy.
i got one and returned it.its way too bulky,even for my Nikon D3000.had problems inserting any extra lens if you have one.

This phone case would be great because it's cute and my daughter LOVES owls. However, the first time we opened it, the seam on front was already coming undone. It is a cheap product. We bought it as Christmas presents for our daughters, so by February these were worthless. Also, some of the stitching came undone in other spots. If this item ever becomes available, buy another case elsewhere. This isn't worth it. It's cute, but not durable. :-(

My wife purchased this DVD the day that it came out, we just couldn't wait to get it. We were disapointed on so many levels. First of all, it's not even a full concert. It's merely 6 songs, 3 songs each from the same song session. The second problem is in several places the camera was zooming out and taking pictures of the backdrop. If you want people dancing behind their musicians, then don't film them at all.

the price is excellent but this machine does not run as smooth as my old one even tho it has a much higher price. It bogs down on some pots and other pots. The lid handle gets pretty hot also. I would look at another brand next time. My previous pot had no lid lifter and was simple to lift open lid. Not sure hown that made this coffee makers design better. I'm not happy. :(

I don't have this phone set myself but was recommended it to my sister. When she received it, we looked through the instruction book in a few minutes and thought it seemed easy enough. We also compared some numbers on caller IDs that are programmed into our phones. We found out those number were not in our cell phones? We did ask her about these two factors regarding our cellphones as you can only see what is reflected if you open 2 or more pages.

I like the sound that it makes when it's plugged in, but have to keep messing with its position in order for me to hear the actual sound... and I'm not sure if that's just my unit or the product. It's a nice little machine, though. Don't regret buying it. Great price... would recommend it!
This was the first review I've ever written about any product, but am so impressed with these brushes that had me want to.

I love this product. It is nice to know that you can get a product of such high quality and good value. Very happy with purchase. The packaging was good, no damage. No leaks. Fast shipping from Amazon.
It's not bad by all means, and probably works in some situations, but...
Bought this charger and after about 3 weeks would only turn on at 100% charge. After less than 2 months it stopped working completely. No amount of jiggling will work.

The product arrived very quickly and was in excellent condition. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a good quality case for their Nook. It's also well padded, which it has saved my Nook several times when the kids have dropped it. I'm definitely pleased with my purchase and can't wait until more colors are made available. This was exactly what i needed without paying tons of cash!! :)

The idea was to use it for a Christmas party with my grandchildren ages 8 and 10. They really enjoyed the game but the mechanism at which we made them "speak" broke about after 20 minutes of playing. I think this is definitely an item worth more than $20. It would be nice if they were sturdier. Other games have worked great but don't plan on putting that much wear and tear on them. Disappointing. :-\

I bought this DVD expecting to find an easy way to help my children get introduced to the Bible story of Abraham. Instead, it is boring and repetitive with NO entertainment value for a child or preschooler. It simply seems like you are repeating about 1 example out loud, over & over, rather than actually showing Abraham and his family at work in their field getting into trouble! My kids lost interest quickly.

I was excited to read this book. Although the story is really not good and not at all true to what happens, it does have an interesting plot line, which could make for a very enjoyable read. Unfortunately, the character are unrealistic -- they are, as another reviewer wrote, "wooden" in every sense of term. Their personalities are pretty inconsistent (although many reviewers like their different personalities) and, frankly, boring; one has literally no personality whatsoever...

Not a particularly good movie. It is predictable and not that exciting. I would have stopped it after 20 minutes. But for an extra couple of bucks on Amazon, what the heck. Oh well... live & learn. I won't be adding this to my collection anyway!
Love This Stuff! Especially when you don't have time to cook and this is really fast!!!!

Although I was not aware of the book until just this morning, when it arrived, my daughter (age 11) is thrilled to have it! She has read about 1/3 of it, and as we approach a Christmas gathering at home, she will be reading some more. It arrived in short order so I'm pleased. Thanks Amazon! Will recommend your store for such needs from now on. Love this book! Thanks.

I received the book "The Secrets of The Universe" from a friend who knows I'm about to be a father. So we read it together while waiting on our third son. In retrospect, this book might have been useful just prior or following my son's birth -- but in truth, there is almost nothing I can use now beyond some background knowledge, and I've had plenty more than that. It's very repetitive (especially if you don't follow every single point over several pages).
I really like this product. It stays on a long time, and it was at my house within two days. Very good deal!

Ooh, my oh my. This is the new book of romance novels that I am not gonna buy or buy! The hero and heroine hate each other. It's like they are doing a battle over who has "it." Oh, there is, but it's hard to feel it. We can't believe them when they're... yeah, there's some action. A lot more than we need in this story. What about how their relationship develops.
Very cute but when I saw it in person, the plastic didn't look as nice. It did come fast and was exactly what my friend wanted which made her happy. So that's all that matter to me :) Thanks!
This looks like an excellent resource that has lots of pictures showing how things came into being.

I like the fact that this can plug straight into my computer, but unfortunately only one side of the audio is playing. A bit disappointing and doesn't compare to those I've had for mp3 players. Maybe something I'm doing wrong or not installing it correctly. But either way, it's useless to me unless someone could tell me how. Thanks.
Just really didn't like the ending though.
For $19 bucks you can't beat these gloves, but there are some design changes that make them less than ideal when compared with other brands.

It seems as though the author never had to experience such horror. One would think when people are killed, they just rest in their graves and fade away like so many others. It's hard for you not to wonder who died first. The story opens with several young children at school being attacked by demons.

A friend of mine said all along that this would be the last Clancy book I read for a while but I'm sorry to say it just wasn't. When i was reading The Hunt One Day my only thought was, What is next? Is there more? This felt like an episode in Tom Clancy's next tv show or movie. After awhile your mind starts racing with possibilities.
The item arrived quickly and appears to be working fine. My previous charger had come apart. It is nice for our use.
I bought this case to keep dust off of the screen when carrying in back pack. It works great. Is very thin and light. Love it.
Our granddaughter wanted this for her birthday. She loves the Barbie movies. Was not disappointed when we got it. Thanks so much.
They work good enough on our 1997 Toyota Camry.

I did not like this and it was very disappointing to the point of almost making me cry. In fact, one day after viewing it, i tossed it. It is a real pity too. I thought so many years ago, when i first read it. It was such an innocent story. But then i began to think that maybe as adults we need our fairy tale endings( or at least some happiness in it) but really what could you do? And by now that would have been two weeks ago.
My daughter loves this blanket. She says its soft to hug on. It does get softer after washing but overall we are happy with it. Very pretty.

This item was the correct part but if I had paid more attention to detail, I would have known it came with a hose and not just hoses. Also, my husband said that it was difficult to connect it while he is trying to set up his mower. The mower itself works great though. No complaints.

First off, let me start by saying that I am an extremely huge and devoted fan of Steven King - particularly his horror masterpieces, Pet Semetary, Christine, Dark Tower, The Stand, IT, etc. Having said that, if you have read these classics (and they are classic, folks), don't bother with this DVD. It is, in my opinion, a cheap attempt at capitalizing on Stephen's popularity. Don't buy it unless you're prepared to be disappointed, then go right ahead & watch it.
I've always loved reading all these stories in order and this anthology does that well.
First there was the fact the audio kept changing in both English and Russian.

The light weight case didn't really hold a charge, I bought 2, which was great becuse we have multiple phones, and one of the batteries still doesn't work out after only 2 months. But for the price, you can buy another.

I bought this for my daughter and son-in-law to use at their camper as one of the two items needed for them to charge a laptop was not provided. It is very easy to use, charges both devices quickly and portable. There may be cheaper ones out there, but after trying several others in stores, I've said that you get what you pay for. In fact, it appears these are made with better components than similar products from other brands.

I tried and failed several time to install this software. Every time after installation when trying to open the program it pops up in another window. I'm thinking of either removing all programs or just uninstalling it. The only reason I did not give one star is because you can copy files from disk very quickly with Windows Media Player. If anyone has a solution for me I'd appreciate it. Thanks.

I can't explain why this product did not work for us. Our two Shih Tzus who had been on different brands of heartworm preventatives, we are pleased to have found another option that helps them while helping the dogs be so much healthier. Great product! Thank you!
Bought for kids because it's cute. The sound quality isn't great, very little bass, and you don't have much control if they want music or not.

Great product that seems well built and looks to hold up really well. I was hoping this would eliminate the ugly shower hose clutter in my shower/tub, but it does not. Still, a great buy given its performance - no leaks or problems, easily assembled, looks nice, sturdy, good price. If you're looking for something decorative, you may not want this, but if you're putting any real strength behind your shower, it's worth every penny.
The story of life after death as told by an extremely gifted and insightful spirit guide. I will look for more books from this author!

I couldn't make heads or tails out of this book. When reading it to my children, they were confused. There's not enough information for a child and the pictures are boring. The cover says'read aloud as your child' which is why I bought this, but no way. For that purpose, there needs to be more words on each page. I've decided to return it. Bummer. It was great when we had all things animals. But they're making them in bigger sizes now, so I'll just stick with that.

I guess we were looking for more. The writing is fine. The story was good but so many times throughout the book we get pages telling us that something happened instead of showing or showing. You had to read a bunch just to figure out what happened. Then there are other places where you didn't need it. In fact, as far as I'm concerned, this series is done in an awkward way. It's too short, and not enough details were given about some people.
It's a great scale, does what it's supposed to. Looks nice, works flawlessly. Accurate readouts.
Item was as shown in picture - holds Samsung Note Pro 8" tablet securely. Easy to adjust screen tilt (360 degrees) -- works great, looks great.

The only reason I gave this book one star is because of the author's extensive research on military and other weapons. There were several times when I'm fairly certain that he was basing his "fact" incorrectly. For example: He states that an average person would die every 10 minutes, based on information that an internet search will show. Yet during the Gulf War in 1991, according to a report for CNN, there were roughly 200 deaths per day.

I bought a package of these. About one in five cartridges leaked ink during installation. The other ones seem to work but have lots of issues with the black toner. Some colors are fine after cleaning but for some reason they always leak ink. These will be going into the trash. Do not buy.

These are very pretty but don't hold much tea in them. More for just a nice conversation piece. I gave them this rating because shipping was fast which made it easier to keep the cost reasonble but would order more if they were larger.

These are really terrible. At best, I suppose they might be okay for one day where you don't have a choice--and after that only if the weather is bad. And that's not something that should get your attention or even keep up with you. If you're planning to use them once in awhile and want some cheap headphones to travel with, maybe these would make sense - but at nearly $20 as of 1/7/12, I've got better options from less reputable brands.

Good for a quick read and entertaining book. I did not expect the twist at all when it came. If you like light reading this book is okay. Not exactly exciting but fun. You pretty much have to suspend your belief with each chapter however because of how crazy most people are.
Perfect adapter replacement for our old dell laptop.

There is no real meat or substance in these 2 books. It seemed like some people had taken bits from other books and cobbled them together in an attempt for a novel. At first it looked good, but as u progress there seems to be more fluff.
I really enjoyed the second book, but it seemed to be pretty predictable. Not as gripping and interesting as the first book. I'll probably read book three anyway.

It is a shame that this DVD has been released. Most fans of the original recordings and video footage don't mind paying extra for additional material which are also available separately in remastered form on CD or DVD. Not only that, but it leaves them wanting to see what happens from start to finish with every song. All they need now after having spent hundreds upon thousands of dollars was one shot with a single shot.
I love these portable speakers.

Did not do what I expected or needed. No different than plain water and just as much to use up. Should have bought regular shampoo on the boat trips this season when there was always too little clean water. It does take away your red eyes and doesn't bother my sinuses like other products. Good price, though but better for something else. This is probably best used where you don't mind a lot of suds.

My daughter and I watched this movie on VHS. She loved it so much we needed to find a replacement DVD. The picture quality was perfect for our small TV. This is my favorite version of Pride & Prejudice. It follows the original story well, has wonderful actors, especially Colin Firth in one of his best performances, and has humor you will not see anywhere else besides Austenland.

The product and the service were excellent. We received it sooner than we expected and my husband was able to hook up a dvd player with no problems using these cables. They are of higher quality than what I expected. Not as heavy duty though, thinner wires that will break easily if they pinch on something hard. That's not necessarily a bad thing...just be careful when connecting it. Over all very happy :)! :) Thanks again!

My dog looks so cute in her little sweater (size Sm-Medium), but it's a bit small (and the velcro is too tight).Good quality, but just be cautious... I think it might rip if pulled on or snagged, and you really can't stretch it. The medium was pretty snug (it barely reaches my dog's neck)

I bought the case for my iphone 4s thinking it was going to be a little easier getting in and out of it. The rubber is like a cheap material that causes lint everywhere. It covers up an important part (like your button) when you try to press it. The charger broke within minutes after use, so not only does it don'thing but charge (mind blowing), it's also hard plastic. This can lead me to believe this isn't the most durable product at all.

The first 2 books of this series were a great read. Loved the characters and couldn't wait for more to come out. I was very disappointed when I put on book three and got about 30 pages in before I had to put it down. There is NO character dialogue other than some lame 'thoughts' being exchanged between characters. This makes me wonder if Ms. Gabaldon has been drinking too much coffee lately. Maybe she needs to read her own reviews...

This case is so incredibly large that it took a very smart and determined man to put his iPad in. He actually had to get help getting the ipad in there. I would not encourage anyone buying this one. You have been warned.

I use this as a light weight backpack for carrying in my car. In its current position, it just barely fits under the arm rest of my car (Hyundai Elantra), and it's about 2 feet long by 1 ft wide. It has plenty of room for a laptop, power supplies, extra mouse, etc. I'm able to fit easily one textbook, along with all those papers etc.
Great tasting almond flour! It was packaged nicely and I received it just in time for Thanksgiving dinner. It is a quick cooking wheat flour.
Does not appear to get heated up. Just plugged into my netbook and kept going. Great little adapter. Would recommend for someone looking for similar product. Was shipped super fast. Good service.

I'm disappointed in this book because I purchased it for the same reason everyone else was - to hear about other "newer,funkier and more popular music" that didn't make an appearance on the charts, and some of which is now considered pop culture.
I'm so bummed. This book does not have any pictures to look at from an artistic standpoint. It looks like most of the designs are made using straight lines.
The game is super addictive and its just a ton of fun. I think it needs an update to fix at least the lag in the game. But all and all, definitely worth it. Get this game! Its awesome :)

The unit itself is great - works wonderfully as long as it works. And since the battery life has also declined significantly, one must wonder whether this will continue. One thing at a time. I have not contacted Coby to see if they offer an alternative. At some point, even their own products need more than 20 cents worth of work in order for them to sell them. This should all be taken into account before putting out faulty products.

This product is a rip off from China and was not what I expected. It did come sooner than expected but they send you what you pay for. The quality of the case was fine until i went to take my phone out of it for charging. I had noticed that its starting to detach from the top left corner now which kinda sucks since it's pretty much glued onto this case.
My dogs love these. They are great treats for them. So far I have had no problems, and they arrived before the time stated on my purchase.
i got three of this to give christmas gifts.it's perfect item if you need to have more than one pair.thanks. :) ^_^ very good!
The story line was good. It flowed well.
I ordered this product after the one that came with my phone broke. The length is perfect and works great. No complaints so far.

If you are looking for a set of inexpensive speakers that get good quality sound then definitely pass up on this. These things blow in the midrange and highs even when you only run with them at 1/3 power. You have to turn these suckers down all the way unless your looking to listen through some earbuds. My main gripe about these is its absolutely not worth it if you're doing any kind of running.
This product was perfect for me because my old laptop keyboard- which isn't always great in quality anymore- couldn't be connected at all.
It was an okay book. Not to much information on how to use it other than the pictures. Could have used more info. in it.

I like the bag overall. I do wish it had more than just the shoulder strap, but overall it's really nice. My only regret on this is that it's so expensive for a backpack. The other thing is, they don't have very many colors to choose from. Other than that, great bag, seems durable and looks great. I'd buy again if I were looking at something else. It's an excellent size too.
This is such a fantastic camera. It takes very clear photos, especially outside.
Too much filler & not enough plot...kept reading but just wanted something over all and then finally got it..no thanks,didn't enjoy it.
Love this product. I can cut it and mix with my favorite drink or give a portion to the dogs for chewing

I had a very small garden and used these with the EZ bloom to have all my tomatoes on one plant. It gave me great shade for many hours at a time, not just when it got hot out. They took up way less space than an outdoor trellis or trellis, but were easy enough to adjust in height. My tomato plants went from 1 foot high through 6 inches of earth. Now they are 3 ft. tall by about 10 inches. If you want your seedlings into something, this is easy.
We never received this item. It was shipped one way, then sent via carrier pigeon. Very disappointed! Did not bother returning.

This product is completely useless. It has no power at all and doesn't clean well at all. Even if it worked for my room I wouldn't use it. I wish I'd returned it. I'll go with a different brand next time. If you want to get the best one, you'll need one that actually works better. That way, it's worth buying in the end.

This looks okay in our living room, but its materials are a bit cheap and it feels very cheaply made...We found others cheaper that just look as good or even better than this, for MUCH less. My husband had this installed by the local handyman guy, who was working on installing some decorative stuff to his house, so while he was putting down screws with a magnetic screwdriver set, all we saw were pieces of metal, not wood. If you need something nice, get one made well.

After getting this phone I have not had any problems. The speaker system is the best I've ever heard, it's loud and clear. Calls are crisp as are those received! It's definitely an inexpensive phone, but it was worth the money. The only problem for me so far has been a delay in dialing out from the handset itself. This may be due to interference, or maybe its just user error. Either way don't know if other people experience this.
The set was good quality. It came as advertised.

This stuff is very effective. I can't really tell much of a difference on my skin. It does have good ingredients that are better than most face lotions, which is why you'll want to use it. But you don't need to. If you're going for something natural and organic, then go with this one. It's been great at keeping out the rain when we've had storms here! =) And no nasty chemicals. Yay! :o)
This is not what I was expecting to get. It looks very cheap, almost more for decoration than anything. However, my wife liked it, so we kept them both.
Awesome product, really cute. Really fast shipping also! We live near an area that sells this stuff but we didn't have any at our local store.

this product was a major disappointment. I purchased it to replace my very old one that broke. The item arrived quickly and in great condition, which is why I did not return it. When we plugged the new unit in, however, it would not operate at all. In fact, it turned on, but after trying several times just as described above, nothing happened, so no power.

I purchased these lights for the winter to help illuminate our property on cold days. The install was very easy. However when they come on, only the left light turns on. And yes, my wiring is correct. This has never happened with any other LED lights, and it is really annoying that you can't tell if your lights are working without turning them off. When this happens, you'll have a great view of what happens but won't know anything about it.
This is an old book, so do read as much of it as possible.
It's really easy too install. My only complaint was that it's kinda small for her but I guess that's why we bought it.

As others noted, this adapter will not work with a Pentax K20d. I returned the product and now have two useless adapters for my K-250.The price should be more closely associated to quality. If you're going to sell an item, make sure it works first. For this, it's just very cheap stuff. Don't waste your time!
These are perfect.

These headphones worked for about 3 days. I was running with my Zune and the right headphone quit working which made me so sad. The sound is very good, but if there's a bad design it's not going to last long. They were comfortable when they work though. Maybe I'll return them. I'm really afraid they'll stop working. I just got it in January. Can't do anything right now. =( Please help me. Thanks.

I wanted to like this book. The cover looked cute as well and the reviews were good, so why not? I'm on page 30 of chapter one, after about 15 or so pages - I was hoping for character development by now/but it appears that Ms. Young is going through the motions without ever getting there. To give a concrete example I've never heard someone speak like this, not once, before today in my life. And there are plenty of passages where it's supposed to be funny...
Like some other reviewers, I discovered that these things could be really bad for you.

While the premise for this book sounded good and interesting, I found that I did not enjoy reading about an abused wife of six years. In fact, while there were some amusing moments, these parts are too short to be really interesting. I'm glad it was a loaner. I read it before buying it. No time invested.
I'm still a fan of the first 2 movies so I had to check out this one in its own right. It was slightly better but not by much.

This is not a "book" at all, its an extremely short essay that could have been included in the magazine article. It contains almost no useful information and actually seems to want you only believe what they do to you. If your interested I suggest just reading the article on this subject if thats all youre looking for. To me it was like having two glasses of water which were both full from one bottle! They really didnt go into enough detail either.

I have read a number of books by this author. All are good. This one had nothing to do with his usual good writing. Just too wordy. He wrote he wanted us all up on our feet after the first chapter. If I'm in that position there isn't much time or room. Too many characters trying to say something at once. Did not enjoy it much. Sorry Will. Keep writing.....

This is a very nice looking knife with a good heavy feel. Although it costs more than the price of most chef's knives,I would gladly buy this one again as well as recommend it. It's perfect for slicing tomatoes and other vegetables.

This is a beautiful kettle and it boils water super fast. My problem with this appliance is that the base cracked after 2 months of use. I would not have expected to crack any part if you handle a teakettle too lightly but having dropped it on to my countertop once (I live alone, so it's certainly an awkward feature) was probably over-doing it. And now the enamel has chipped off in several places. The inside coating looks fine. :-( I'll fix it, though.

These are great for those not so talented and clumsy types who want to have fun on their phone. It gives your phone a clean finish while protecting with ease from scratches. The only minor con is that I wish it were easier to get all the bubbles out when you first apply them but that's true of most screen protectors. Good job Zagg!

I really have to wonder why Mr. Patterson would do this with his readers and in our children's book collection. It seems that the story line has all been done before. The main character was a weak girl. Just because she's from Washington doesn't make her any more realistic. In fact it just makes her more of a stereotype - she can't help how others perceive her.

I got this book as a gift and was very excited to open up the package. Unfortunately, it's a total disappointment. The author obviously did not do any research on her topic of time travel (which seems so simple in theory and makes it sound like science). She used some words that made no sense, such as:"In fact, my mind is working at warp speed because I'm doing some intense thinking right now.

I bought this to see how my cat would like it and she started using it immediately. We have had it about a month now, it's very easy for her to get on now after several tries. It doesn't seem to hurt even though the collar rubs against her. It's great so we can relax with our kitty while we're at home, but still give some freedom outdoors as well. Update: We've been using just the collar which was good training because that is all I have to do now.

I have owned this product for over a year. It is still one of my favorite purchases. The only thing that could make it perfect would be if you can just plug in headphones and don't need to carry the cord with your computer. That being said, it's not really an inconvenience. Definitely something others would buy because they see how amazing it is. Great Product! I'd recommend

First off this book has no depth whatsoever to it. Also the story is quite boring. In most novels there was something more interesting going on, but not here. The characters are all so flat, I actually didn't learn very much from their lives. The only thing holding me back from giving up on it in frustration at page 110 or so had been that for some reason i kept thinking surely someone will find a way out. But I'm still stuck with it. For now I'll keep reading.
We used them both to put together the puzzles & also for kids and they liked it. Worked really well. A good buy.

I love the way it works, especially since it's a lot less expensive than our original cord. But like other reviewers have noted, it quit working shortly after. We may need to go back and purchase one of the more expensive models. :-)

If you like great ice tea at a reasonable price... you'll LOVE this product. It's perfect when traveling because it's not all that heavy to bring along so there is no excuse in grabbing one of your other cups if you're ever stuck somewhere where hot or cold drinks just aren't readily available.
I bought this for my daughter. She loves it and I love the protection that I get from it. It is great.
This has been a very good product. I have already enjoyed having the product as well. The price was just right for me too! Thanks! :)

I'm a fan of the books on learning German, but this book is only so-so. It's much too basic. After I learned to speak and read German before attending university in Germany it was really interesting reading his story about traveling everywhere with absolutely nothing in my pocket. So it's hard not to, like some other reviewers here, feel let down.

This is a great product. It does what it says and I think anyone over the age of 16 should have it. My only complaint about this product was that it took me 5 times longer than most to use it. If you want fast results then go for an otoroide. The shipping speed really doesn't bother me. Most stuff from china takes forever but not this.

I'm a fan of the show and was waiting for this to be released. This DVD is very poor quality. The episode selection were all really bad (I think one should at least get ALL of those). There are several great episodes on here. If they actually had put them in their order, it would have been better! I recommend just watching those episodes online because there isn't anything that you can't find via an internet search. All the extra features (interviews) weren't even on this.
I thought it was an R&B song, but instead it's a reggae version. But I like it, good tune..
The product itself does what it's supposed to.

This is my fourth chopper from Hamilton Beach, I have two because they last so long an one that we keep at our second home. They are not as big or bulky as some others but perform well and clean very easily. Well worth the price.
These bags fit under the front passenger seat. They are large enough to hold everything needed when we go out which was why we ordered them. It's nice that they zip together and can be used alone.

I have bought this device on Amazon through the seller "SuperGadgets4u. It's terrible. It doesn't hold a charge very long. Battery runs out super fast. The buttons stopped working after six months of use. This is an absolute waste of money. Don't buy it unless you want to feel like you're ripping your hair out. Horrible device. If anyone from'supergadgets@ua.com' reads this, go back and redesign this.
I got this for my son who drives truck. He loves it! Uses it every day and says it's super secure.

It is very loud and makes it difficult to hear the music. It's not good for running. I would have sent it back but unfortunately my son broke it. I just threw away the box when he got home. He liked it, though. If you are looking at buying one, i dont recommend getting this. Find something a little bit louder. This one will drive u crazy without music going on so often. Save your money. Its okay.
Bought this case for brand new 13" aluminum MBP and although everything fits well, the upper right corner does NOT close flush. It leaves an "opening" about 1/16- 1/4in x 1/2in.
This product has done wonders over a period of time, and I've only had to replace the unit once. The problem is, it's very noisy.

Do not buy it unless you have a very small TV or dvd player. It's like those "portable" DVD players for kids. Very bad sound and video (blurry). Poor remote too. If I can't return it, I'll put on the goodwill pile right away. You shouldn't waste your money.
It works just enough for me with no other problems. Its a great buy for the price. And i would recommend it.
When we got it there was two small scratches already but not big deal. A must have if your going anywhere. Takes excellent pictures.

It may have worked fine but I am afraid to buy a new one because the next time my wife tries it out it will break or wear out!! It's not worth it! She used for about 2 hours and that's it. That's all its good for. Now she is having trouble using it at all.
This is a Great CD for any age. The songs are all original and fun. Kids will like singing these songs! A must buy for music lovers of all ages.

I don't like the shape of it. It is not comfortable to hold it, as well I hate it that you have to charge battery for every time that need a recharge. So now I got another phone, which was in good condition and also came with charger, so everything will be fine.
not very warm - but it's small and cute so I'm satisfied.

After reading the synopsis, I really wanted to love this book. But halfway through I found myself skimming over a lot of useless information and it just didn't connect with me enough to finish it. The whole paranormal aspect was so not what I've ever heard or read before. All in all, it wasn't great, there were things about it that really seemed far-fetched but if you like some interesting supernatural stories, give it a try. Just know it's pretty much a work of fiction, probably more for women than men.

I bought this item to use in my kitchen to store all of the utensils needed when cooking/baking. It works perfect for that. But if you have a LOT of small things, like forks and knives, or even smaller things - not so much. Because they just flop over on themselves, which makes it very difficult (even dangerous) trying to grab them while being stored. And because they're flimsy, everything gets scratched up. Plus, there is no space inside.
The DVD box was in good condition. No defects noted. Plays as advertised and a very enjoyable western adventure for the whole family. Enjoy!!!

Not the book I was looking for but there wasn't one to help me with my project. Guess I'm not sure what you want unless you're a serious woodworker. As someone who wants to learn more about wood working - this isn't it. If you'd like help in getting your project done, check out Doug and Mel Bay's book. You'll enjoy these guys even better.
I really do like this cutter. The first time we used it, we found that our homemade Italian Pasta with Shrimp Sauce did not work out but tried again just in case something else came up.

I bought a pair of these at first and one has stopped working just after the return day. They sound great while they work but if you want headphones that will last you buy something else. Also tried to get in touch with customer service twice for this issue, only got an answering machine most times. Not worth trying since they were never able to send me another headset to make it right. I'm done returning them. Amazon took care of them quickly so I give them five stars.

My husband wore this shirt one day and the button on top unclasped while he was working in his yard. The other reviewer mentioned that it didn't have pockets, but mine did not. It is a decent looking shirt, though. Just be aware of potential safety issues.

I tried it on before putting clothes away. It does smell good but it's like that white powder you add to your laundry detergent. The one size fits all makes sense. My complaint is, as other people say, the smell. It's bad. But hey, if you're looking for something with a pleasant scent, this is it. It's also hard to launder clothes. You have to use three times much soap because it's not absorbing.
One of the discs was not recognized at all. I had to buy a different brand from another vendor. It wasn't worth returning it. I'll take my chances with something that is supposed to work.
I've used this switch as an extension with three external hard drives. It gives me four additional USB slots instead of one.

This book was a very boring read, had no character development, it kept having the main characters go on and on about how much they loved each other but would never give up their faith even though it cost them everything. Don't waste your money. I hated this book. Sorry that i spent $5.99 for it. Thank goodness it's not going to be one of those 50 shades books which is so popular now because frankly these are poorly written books. Save yourself some money by buying something worthwhile.

This product is much smaller than it looked. It only fits about a pack of cigarettes. If you're looking for something more substantial, look somewhere else. You can barely get one to fit between your butt and ass. The price was good though, so I'm happy with it. But I should have read the measurements better.

I read most of the 1-star reviews here first - and while some people had given poor service, many were very helpful in fixing small issues quickly that others overlooked. After reading more reviews, it seems that this may have been a defective set or someone's problems weren't solved as quickly. First, there are several complaints about cleaning up dried food on plates. The bottom line is to wash by hand immediately after use, using Dawn dish detergent. That works really well and no residue.

Well, it's nice that we have a new game system but the games are not compatible??? How come they can't sell it with all of us who don't live in Florida so this could work? Just make sure you do your homework first and then buy it. Or maybe I'm missing something because I am having trouble loading up my older games. Not happy.
These items are way over priced. They don't do anything, and can harm if used improperly.

We have two cats who were not excited at all by these toys. The "frog" is quite small and just didn't hold anything their interest in it. There was only one treat that they found to be interesting. That being said, the product packaging states there are four different chew options for the wand, but I will give you a tip from my own experience with our cats: we don't usually go looking for more treats once we've finished watching the ball roll down it's path.

I am in love with these earphones!!! They can get really loud! The bass is fantastic!! It doesn't sound like a cheap headphone. I'm only giving four stars because the rubber came off part of the black part. That's not that big deal.

I bought these headphones based on brand name and the price of $80. Unfortunately they only lasted me 2 months to about a month in where wires are starting to fray away from earphone plugs. These have worked well most times, there is no tangle wire like with cheap ear buds. If it weren't for this cord fraying, would give 4 or 5 stars. At half the price, one can't beat it. Update: This pair stopped working after less than 1 years.
This product looks expensive but works perfectly! Great price compared to other products.

This book is a very good example of how the Bible explains things that were difficult or even bizarre to explain without taking the obvious and turning it into an allegory or just making up words to fit in some way so as not to offend anybody who didn't really understand it. I got very bogged down with all this stuff but had always enjoyed reading about it before, so it was interesting reading. Overall, I'd recommend for people wanting something different from standard interpretations written over thousands of years ago.

I purchased this little converter for my Samsung 3D TV. It works great. The best part is that unlike other converters in it's price range - I can now receive all of the TV channels without having to hook up an extra antenna which was costing me $80/month before.
Nice product but the picture shows a large container and it was really small. I guess that's my fault for not reading more into it. Great quality, though.
This is an excellent product. Much better than any other brand we've used. We bought a second one after the first one.

this was not good at all. I read so many great reviews and bought it with such high expectations. but the recipes were bland and tasteless. This book is a waste of time to read. just do all your cooking on top grill or in oven...... don't buy it. get real cookbooks. its only useful if u are looking for some basic information. they should call it an encyclopedia of kitchen knowledge.
It took three times to get the parts that are needed to assemble this furniture. This is a good idea bad design. The chair I received was defective and does not hold its position. Buyer beware!

This game seemed perfect on paper. Just like many other reviewers here, we couldn't believe how much fun people made playing. So when a new version was released, even though it added more things we'd find in our regular Wii Fit games...

When you get this case they send 3 pieces of the front & back together..so when i put them on...one was always coming out and had a gap on top. So no matter how hard I tried to place it, 1 piece would fall off or just slide off. NOT VERY HAPPY with it...

When we bought it and put on the bed sheets you could feel through it. I was disappointed for my son. It is more flimsy than expected. Don't know how to take care of this because he can't just throw away after one washing. Would not recommend. Not worth $30.
I enjoy reading this book. It gives a lot of practical information. I would recommend to friends and family.

I bought these for my Canon Rebel T1i. They arrived in great shape, looked pretty good. The instructions were not even the same as a set of instructions on another camera brand. But after installing them, they kept falling off. Had to super glue them on. And one came with a scratch that obviously scratched through it. Very poor quality. Pay more and get actual real nikons. Will never buy from this seller again.

It's not what I needed but that is my fault so if I ordered it again would be nice to get something with more options though. If you're trying to use one of the products listed then that's probably all you'll need out of this kit so it's a good buy.

It would be great if my printer didn't have a paper jam every time I go to print. Oh well the little error that happens just now is not an issue. The quality of printing are fine and everything works properly with me.

We use the scale when we travel and have not been disappointed in quality or functionality. It is always ready as we walk into our hotel room. The digital readout is easy to read, the tare feature a great convenience for measuring food. I recommend this product highly. Only disappointment was that it did not come with batteries!

I was expecting a lot more when playing the game. It is way to easy. There are no challenges and it just repeats things over again, which wasn't much fun after reading all those reviews. If you like quick games with little thought involved, this will be good. You can play for days without too many challenges. I'm sorry that my son lost interest in it. He used to love Minecraft. However, now he's using his iPad Mini instead because it's easier on the battery.

This was my first experience with a new product, and I was not impressed. The coffee did not taste much different than the average Starbucks coffee, even though it cost 2 dollars more per pound then Starbucks. I'll stick to making the 10 cups at home in an Espresso machine, which is quick since it's less costly for me and better tasting every day. Next time around, I'm paying 3 bucks worth of premium beans and get some good crema.

While I found a great deal of useful advice and insights in this book, there were lots to wade through. The book is written more as an outline than a cohesive narrative, so it took me several days just flipping back through the pages trying to find relevant information. Some sections are fairly short - you could read them easily if you're on vacation but want to make sure the topic wasn't something you'd already covered.

Pros:It does keep the heat in. I am not sure that it really warms anything if you have a very warm car. But it is good for short trips. Cons:The material (plastic or rubber) heats up much slower than my old one which was metal. Sometimes when inserting into cigarette lighter to charge it, there seems an excessive amount of pressure and this makes me feel like I'm going to bend something. This leads me think it's being bent by itself.

I ordered this for my boyfriend as a surprise gift. He loved it. Unfortunately, less than 2 days after he opened it to get his first look at all the features he went outside and pulled off the light cover because there was no way that it's not leaking. Not happy. The only reason why I'm giving 1 more star is cause of how cool it looks when on but it leaks so much. Will be sending back. Very disappointed in Amazon. It has been over two weeks.

I've been a fan of the John Rain series for nearly 20 years and I have read every book except one in English from when they first were published, over a dozen times or more. However, I think this is going to be my last one. The story could stand up as an old standard but just like Tom Clancey's books, it doesn't matter how much you can explain away to make all your "stuff" fit the storyline. Let's start with the biggest mistake Mr.
It was really worth spending the money on these cords.

This is my 2nd one in 3 years. The first lasted for a little over 2 years then the volume knob failed. I don't put this pressure on it at all but it's just not built right. It's way too soft and does nothing to improve sound quality. Would not recommend. Go with something else. Also if any of you have trouble understanding me or emailing me, I'm here if anyone wants information or help dealing with these things.
The product worked just fine. We were worried that because it was such an inexpensive battery, we'd get what we paid for, but no worries. So far. so good.
Pretty happy with this set! The dinner plate is perfect size - big enough at first glance, not too large or small.

I have had this coffee maker since September 2013. Within the last 60 days and less than 100 cups, it has begun to leak at the bottom. It only leaked a little when pouring but not enough for us to feel comfortable with our water supply. We tried leaving more coffee, we turned off and on multiple times. Finally got tired of mopping up so called customer service (who would never answer their phone).
The authors of these stories should stick to their own business in other countries.
Too thin to do the job. Would not recomend. My husband found another way to use it. Not as functional and would have returned it.

This is a complete rip off, I purchased it for $27.00 brand new. It arrived with broken and cracked corners, the plastic holding inside of each part was broken. The quality is terrible. And then they told me there weren't any more available so that really made not sense. Do you know what I mean? Buy at your own risk....... I'm waiting on credit to be cleared up. I don't want another one because this company won't back up their products.
Great film, great acting and very well done. Very sad to watch so many young people lost from drugs so young.

Works very well for a low price. We use them on our boat during the winter season when I need to run an additional plug in. I've been using for several months now and haven't had any issues. You get what you pay for.

Well made product, looks great. The only problem I had was trying to thread the bolts through each other. I'm happy and would order again. Easy installation even a non-techy could do it. Thanks,James Taylor

This thing has really held up well, especially considering that I've used it outdoors every weekend since i got it! Very easy to set up, very comfortable. And its great at keeping me cool. Really happy with my purchase for the price.

The book was very disappointing. It had way too much unnecessary filler. I got the idea of one character with Asperger's, but then there were numerous subplots that did nothing to advance this story. It could have been condensed a hundred percent and saved more paper than it wasted. I'm sorry i bought it. Just another "feel good novel" from Ms. James. If that's what you're searching for, go for it. Otherwise, don't bother. There is far better out there.
The quality is not the greatest especially in one area where there are three layers to the fabric. Otherwise great value for what you pay. Would recommend it.

A couple hours after plugging in this, our laptop began making a vibrating noise and would shut off if we touched anything on the cord. The only thing worse is that my 3 year old was trying to clean up around this for no apparent reason, but of course, he's being very careful like he should be. If all you're looking for out of a power cord-breaker is aesthetics, I can say I'd get it. But at such low amperage, it's useless.

Although they claim to put out more volume, this headset is awful. The mic worked for about a month, then no more, and I'm not sure why. I was really disappointed because the price of these seemed great. I've had many Turtle Beach in similar style so it isn't me doing something wrong. Now it's too late to return them or exchange them, but still disappointed. Good luck trying to make calls with these.

I was disappointed with this product. For the money it costs and if all you need to plug into is a single power source (transformer, laptop. If your computer requires two or more plugs then maybe you'll get some use out of this. It doesn't charge laptop when its connected - only trickle charge. So that's pretty much it. Not what I thought it'd be.
Love this little thing. Now all my stuff is more organized and I can organize myself a lot better. Will probably buy another in the near future!

I love the color and it was exactly what i expected! However as soon as you put cover on your phone, it's a real pain to take off again. The case wont snap onto my phone! And when u pry it off, pieces of plastic fall from both sides so there are parts that you couldnt actually use. Its not only annoying but looks cheap. If this phone had more than one case then i'd just be happy with any other case.

This book read like it was written by a young teenager. It could have been an interesting story but I felt there were too many descriptions about things that did not add anything meaningful to the plot. There wasn't much of an explanation or development in this story, rather if you skimmed it and knew what happen next you didn't need to. What is weird is that when I'm reading a book, I enjoy some details that enhance my sense of place.

I purchased the product and did not use it for a few months. Finally gave in to having my carpets cleaned. Today I went over with this steam cleaner and guess what? It just got so hot that there was no way I can vacuum any further. There is condensation on all of the brushes because they stopped turning. The carpet looks like crap now. DO NOT BUY!!! Just spend another $2000 up front and enjoy your new machine.

I have the older version of this model and it works great. Unfortunately its battery would die far too fast so we upgraded to this, which is not better. Battery life barely lasts 1 hour. And when you go from AC (plug) power into battery, forget about it. Even worse in warmer weather, you lose power. Maybe I got a defective unit but my guess is that these all seem like poor quality units without any testing at all.
What i expected is that you could use any size glass with this.

Got the book as a birthday present. Very dissapointed that it's only 40 pages. I thought it was around 150 pages and way overpriced. There are better books on the market. If you can't find a well reviewed one pass this one. I'm trying to return for refund. Really feel scammed. Thanks Amazon. :/
My husband bought both of these toys from Toys r us.

When I received these, their material was different from what i expected to receive based on picture. Although these mats did fit, one of the latches for the strap that holds them together fell off, so now they're only holding by 2 screws. Other than that, seems like decent quality at a reasonable price. The shipping took longer then predicted though.

This book is a complete misrepresentation of what the actual text in Revelation is. It takes out some words that are actually there and distorts it to suit its own agenda. Please read the real passage at Revelation 1:1 - 3:6. The author was dishonest enough writing his story based on the interpretation as best he can, but unfortunately this doesn't stand up well against a better translation. It's sad because it's basically an amazing story. I wish I hadn't wasted my money and time reading it.
Exactly what was promised and delivered timely. Quality paper. Much thicker that expected. Color true to picture. Pleased overall. Thank you.

I just ordered and received my new Dell laptop with Windows 8. With all the negative reviews it looks to be a fairly simple install using this software. However, for some reason, Amazon won't ship me the Microsoft Office 2010 program until after I'm finished installing Win8 - you can't cancel within 30 days. It also says that because of shipping it will take up 1 hour longer than expected for delivery. If they send me, as promised, Word 2010, then it's going back to Amazon, not me.

My friend and I decided to rent this video for $10. The description on here makes it sound really scary. We just rented it. It was horrible. The actors were all bad. Some of them where in high school while others couldn't be more than 15 or 16 at the time they were doing this. After about 10 minutes, we almost shut it. About 5 minutes in, though, it started getting good. Then suddenly there were these long boring scenes. This is so not scary even though it's rated PG-13.

They are NOT "leather." I could tell by looking at a sample that the inside of the jacket (the part where you put your arms in, not on the back) is paper thin and very cheap. Even if they did match up to real leather, how would it protect my iPhone?The armband works well.

My son loved these "book" books when he was little so i decided to get him one for an Easter present since he's 4 now. We had ordered four different types hoping each would have a new story or maybe even pictures.
Not a very good read. It was ok but I couldn't really get into it and it definitely wasn't one of her best.
I'm a fan of the original movie as well if not better. This was just like I remembered watching it when i was younger. Cute movie... and it's nice to share with my younger daughter.

I bought this for my 5 year old son because he is always leaving little bottles of mouthwash at school with his lunch boxes. This container protects it and makes him feel special when pulling out the bag. It goes through every level imaginable from water to boogers, you name it, you should be able to. Very durable, no worries about plastic breaking, especially a bottle that was left on top over night :) Highly recommend

This is a useless book about the history of computers by a bunch of professors that were obsessed with computers. Don't waste money on this tripe. It was really written by 3 or more people and they all hate computers--so you get 4 different perspectives on what it means to be a computer scientist. I can't help but wonder if these guys just sat around gathering data for 5 years after college or something.

I am a fan of all things vampire and loved "Twilight", but this just couldn't keep up. It was pretty unbelievable when Bella fell down the stairs during her first "encounter" with Edward. And if you like to read about vampires, you'd think she'd have learned not to, right? So what's next - going into war?!! That part would be unrealistic as well. I'd say that Meyer should hire an editor because she missed SO many opportunities for great writing in this book.

These were very expensive for 2 pens. They don't write as smoothly at the Zebra Mech Ball Grip Roller Ball, which is 1/2 of the price or more! If I am going to pay $2 per pen, the ballpoint version would be worth it. The only thing that makes these pens unique (other than their low price) are they have a cap on them. Don't waste your money like I did. It may work out for some folks, but it isn't working in ours or anyone else's household.

Purchased this as a gift for my husband who used to purchase and sell "old" antique watches before becoming an owner of his own. He recently went with the new generation quartz watch movement but didn't have any means to actually buy one. This set was inexpensive enough that he was able to get one since you can't put anything in water anymore (yes I know - bad guy just mentioned it!).As soon as it arrived we removed all plastic packaging from it.

So I read all 4 books at once this week. Each book was a short novel with one chapter for each couple. The first two were written in the past tense. This third book's only present tense, then switches to other time periods. It wasn't as bad if you just overlook that until about halfway through it. However, when they switched back and forth between past scenes it felt really choppy.

The first one I purchased worked for 5 months before it died. They were nice enough to send me a new one. Unfortunately the replacement only seemed to work intermittently. It would then stop working, or so we'd think. By coincidence we had another storm in NYC which killed my main power supply--now these units don't have AC inputs--even though they appear with an internal fan. So, even though they're pretty expensive, it's cheaper than replacing that whole thing.
The color and length were perfect for my needs at the time. I would recommend to anyone else. Very good product.

Although it's not a deep book, it's worth the effort to read it. I found it interesting and thought provoking. The characters were likeable, even if their actions would have been considered selfish by today's standards. I like how he included the spiritual aspects of love within his novels.

I was really disappointed, especially considering how much I paid for it. There are barely any pages and there isn't a single recipe. Just random thoughts. It is not what we were looking for. And I'm also shocked to find that it says you must only use organic ingredients. Well, who knew? How on earth do they get around the fact the animals have to be killed?!? Not cool... don't buy this book. Very disappointing.

The first four books in this series were great. It is nice that the author decided not to continue and keep the story alive for a possible third book. I hope she ends that series. This book was rather disappointing though. I think it was a little bit rushed. In fact, there really weren't any surprises or surprises. Everything made sense at close of second book, but by mid-through it, everything started tying together. Nothing much happened like you would expect. Very disappointing.
As an artist, I purchased all of their products from paper crafting to oil pastels. Love everything about them. No regrets there. But with this product, The glue they use doesn't hold at all.
Very good for small jobs. The only reason it is a little less than a 5 star rating from me would be that the storage container does not come attached to the handle.

I am a fan of the author, but this book was poorly written. It had too many inconsistancies. A lot of sex and not enough plot. What happened to that interesting plot? I didn't care for it. There were times when I wanted to throw it across the room. This makes me wonder if there is someone out there, just like him, who cares.

The screen protector is very easy to install and can be easily removed without leaving any sticky residue. I didn't use the dust removal strips included because it was already installed with no dust. Very good product!

Just read the short synopsis and realized that I've seen this story way too often. Didn't need to spend my time reading her description of other peoples' lives or descriptions. It went on forever. At one point I skipped over several pages because it stopped being interesting. I'm not sure why it's so popular, but definitely didn't find it any better than A Thousand Splendid Suns. If you want a decent book, you'll probably have a hard time. There really aren't many books like this. Don't waste your time.   Rating: 2.

I bought this camera at the end of May with high hopes, and it surpassed my expectations. I'm no photography amateur, but I've managed to capture some pretty cool shots over the past couple weeks. Here's what i love about it:-The shutter lag on slow moving shots is incredibly minimal, which makes me even more impressed.-Even in fully automatic mode (auto), I was still able to get a number of great shots.

This product was exactly what I expected. It is a great little tripod for traveling with my laptop and other stuff. The build quality, weight and ease of use are all very good although the center piece holding up the screen does not seem to be sturdy at all. At this price it still seems like an excellent deal though.

This is an excellent product for the price. The item was delivered fast and I couldn't be more pleased with it. My only recommendation would be: make sure you have a heavy duty extension cord. It does use quite a bit, believe me, but it makes such beautiful hair if in my estimation, worth it!
Loved it! We get together regularly whenever we can find the time because of our busy schedules these days.

I bought a bunch of these for our new condo near the beach. My son is in his 20s and very tall, 6' 3". He said they were not comfortable at all because one side would fall down as soon as he laid on them. So we just tossed them out after 10 or 15 minutes due to discomfort. We tried using it inside with a thick comforter though, which felt kind of weird.

My computer never really worked, it didn't recognize the memory stick and when I tried installing my own program on it, Windows 98 wouldn't load because of the malware. It was quite possibly a scam but I've got no way to prove that. It's been several months since I'd installed this junk and still using it. In all fairness to Amazon.

This product was extremely inexpensive. The quality is sub-standard. It lasted less than a year. Not at all durable. I've never had something break as quick from this type of product. I bought similar products in the past that were inexpensive and yet lasted. Perhaps they just don't make them like they used to. I'll probably buy some more but not these ones. Sorry.
Great color and fits perfectly. Bought 2 more later in other colors. The stand works great as well. Highly recommend it.

This is truly a great product that you dont find in stores very often. I cant tell if its really worth the price but at least now my little boy has an extra one he can play with and use as well. Very well made toy! Highly recommend. Makes wonderful party game for all ages. Also makes perfect birthday presents.

I don't like the item and don't see a reason to spend money on it. You get what you pay for and this is no exception. Cheap Chinese crap - look at it as another scam perpetrated by China itself. The one star review was way too kind! If you're using Windows 8, or have older computers, consider buying something other than this. I'm sure it'll work fine when you remove any ancient junk from your computer, but if installing Windows, forget about it. It will be a nightmare.

It's okay for my needs, a little too small in size, but I'll make due. This is one of those tools that need to be used correctly. I've never heard someone complain about it's size except when they have their hands full while working on cars.
Love it! The top drawer wasn't completely straight out when i received it, but easy enough fix.
Good sandal, great arch support. Comfortable walking or standing up all day. Feels good when you put on thick socks which really help to cut down weight.

This is a fun read. The story moves along at the right pace, with an interesting premise. I enjoyed Mr. Wright's handling of all aspects (mystery, romance, action). I was excited to try this but ended up throwing it in the trash. It's easy enough with a blender but its very thick and messy. It made my mouth burn and still doesnt dissolve all that well even when i run hot water over it. Would not recommend. You get what you pay for though as other have said. Try a different flavor.

As many others have pointed out, the ending seemed rushed, especially given how strong of an author this has to be. Still, overall good job for $1.99. :)

The first thing I noticed about this album when it came out, was how much the lyrics were based in sexual imagery and fantasy. This is nothing new. What a few reviewers here claim to find exciting or intriguing about songs like "Sweet Child O' Mine" by Guns n' Roses and "Dirty Sticky Floors" by Led Zeppelin did exactly that. Then again, not everybody liked those tunes. You just can't make everyone happy.
I have used this same one for years and when my last two were stolen, I bought another. The plastic is cheap and breaks easily. They need to make a better one.

I had read another book by this author, which was good, but not great. This one is nothing like his other works...just plain stupid and unexciting. Sorry, John Grisham you are a one-trick pony now...go back to what made your name in the first place (legal thrillers), instead of churning out these poorly written, amateurish novels. I purchased this to replace a broken faucet in our shower. It arrived quickly and was easy to install. The original had been replaced by the contractor when he discovered that some contractors didn't make sure they had replacement hardware. So we decided on replacing it ourselves. SPOILER ALERT:What makes this book so lame is not only that it's a YA story, but also there are references to religion which I do NOT care about, nor have I read much religious fiction before. My kids and I have an affinity for the old cartoons of yesteryear, so we were excited when this one first came out. But the quality was bad. One episode would play fine, but the next day it stopped playing. If you hold down all buttons on your remote at once, it'll get stuck in a "freeze" state. The second one, however, had several episodes. We returned it, got another, only to find that there was already at least 20 or 30 minutes of missing episodes from each disc. Very disappointing.

This is a good light weight. Works good. I use it for my motorcycle. It takes up little space and easy to attach on bicycle. Nice and bright. Downside of this light, it does not have on/off switch. Which means if you want a longer flash duration, you cannot turn the light off. The button will only hold it. A major problem when using this as a flashlight. You would likely be in the middle of your night bike ride with no way to stop your bike.

I should have heeded the warnings by previous reviewers. As a professional artist, this is simply not designed to do what I'd expect. I'm glad that my wife and i did NOT pay more than $75 for it. My main issues are with the lack of sensitivity (even if one makes it as precisely positioned as possible). It skips notes all over the page which completely ruins one's ability to see where each key actually is.

This is the first book I've read on this subject. I found it to be really helpful in dealing with an anxious dog. It provided a lot of insight and helped me learn more about anxiety disorders as well as coping strategies. A good read!

This has to be the worst printer I have ever owned. If you print color there is no way of getting it right. The cartridges are so expensive that I'm out all my ink. They are quite stylish as I have heard them compared to Kenneth Cole shoes but with all due respect I'd choose any kind of sandal over these. This is not an informative book. It gives some information, but nothing you couldn't have learned from any number of sources. As far as the content itself, there are much better material out there. If you're serious and want something detailed, pay attention to how many pages, content, price, etc.

There are some helpful things in this book. For example, you can use the phrase "eat your cereal," when referring to small quantities of vegetables. Unfortunately, there is also a problem with this. It has something to do with the fact that many vegetables contain enough protein and calcium--probably too much calcium for most people (including children)--to be dangerous under most circumstances. So, I wouldn't really suggest trying these.

I'm just an average sized dog lover, and I do love my dogs - particularly as they mature. So when we got a puppy last January, we thought the name was perfect for our little pup. However, she grew up to be quite small (4.5 pounds at 7 months). She's now 13 months old (6 pounds) and, sadly, is quite bony too. But she's not yet arthritis. We bought her this supplement in early July based solely on what seemed like impressive results from other reviews.
Great product great customer service.

Don't buy this if you are a Mac user and don't want to return it. It is very limited in what it can do. I had an older version that was much better at reading video files. Do yourself a favor and go with something else... I've learned my lesson.

My husband and I purchased this as a Christmas present. It worked for about four days then broke. The screen will not turn on when it's plugged into the computer. I feel like I've gotten exactly what they promised - nothing. A complete waste of money. Do yourself a favor -- don't buy this.

I wish the company would return my money because there is no one left to send it back to. The unit worked for a week, then started dropping signals. I have been looking for a reasonably priced, small footprint, decent quality blender, especially since we just purchased the Ninja. This one works well, but has no low speed settings. The other bad feature is how the base comes off. It's only two pieces and they are not screwed together. It can come off all by itself. So it's also easy to accidentally pull it out of our cupboard if you grab it the wrong way. All in all, it's an OK product, but nothing special.

I can't believe people like this stuff. What a waste of plastic, time and money. It's not even funny--its pathetic. This is a classic example of what passes for comedy today. All the good stuff that's still left on tv will probably come out eventually, but until then this...This just isn't funny. It's insulting. It reminds me now how bad my childhood was compared to most young people's nowadays. Not funny, stupid, pathetic, and so obviously fake. Even at $3.99 it's not worth it.

Very poor quality product...didn't like it. It looked cheap and not as it shows in the picture. I would have returned it but i threw away all packaging. There are better covers than this, go with real silk sheets instead. Don't waste your time or money.

I bought the product in late March 2011 for my Dell Vostro 1500. One month later it started making a loud noise. The sound was so bad that I had to shut down every morning and leave open the laptop bag before turning on my computer. It is now early August 2013 and only time will tell if this noise means premature death or not. Either way, one month beyond warranty period, Toshiba does not stand behind their product. DO NOT BUY.

I wanted to use the camera with a Nikon D700 and was told that it would work but when i plugged in everything and put batterys into every thing and nothing worked no matter what settings my camera.....DONT BUY.... get an expensive one so u can watch your cam. A good book of this kind always has a few moments when you may wonder "what is the point?" This book certainly had those moments, but that's really to be expected. All in all, some interesting thoughts, as well as some very real examples presented with compelling prose. The downside for me was that it often didn't seem like Mr. Gladwell's point at all. Most often, what he wanted us to think about was either not a problem or just wasn't worth worrying about.

If you like quality recordings, please don't waste your money on this! There has to SOMEWHERE be a better collection of these recordings available at such an attractive price!

Didn't really hold my interest at all. Too contrived in my opinion. I'm a fan of most all books that have been written by Nora Roberts. I don't mind cliff hangers - but after reading one like this--well let's just say it was an unsatisfactory ending. The only thing redeeming about this, is the love between Bella and Edward. That's more of her usual writing.

I purchased this product because of the high reviews but was still a little worried about it's performance. I must say that it has exceeded my expectations. It is extremely sturdy and holds all kinds of tools. We highly recommend it. Easy assembly.
I bought these for a friend of mine who has two dogs but only used it once. We followed directions as instructed and the next time she needed it, there were small bits missing.

In my opinion, it should be illegal to sell a product as is until the government actually issues you with a license or license in writing that clearly states all of its ingredients. I don't recommend this product. Please save your money for an all-natural, proven cure and alternative medicine instead - which has helped us all. This did absolutely nothing other than make me feel worse about trying one more time after already having attempted it. Take 2 capsules twice daily at night like instructed on bottle. Don't waste your money.

Battery did not last. I charged and used the battery twice. After recharging again my machine is dead so now have 4 batteries. Should have purchased more original HP product. Maybe that's why Dell wants these companies shut out. Will no longer purchase anything but Genuine HP products.

We had no problem getting this on. There was some issues with the fit and it wouldn't quite close, but we just pushed them together a tad bit more. The cats like it. Not too bad of odor either. We have 2 small dogs and so far, they haven't scratched it at all. And it's nice that you can clean it.

I was very pleased with this book. Once I've read the first page, my eyes were caught to keep reading.
