I'm so glad, that she made it into a book, otherwise I'd have had no idea how and when things turned out. However, there are many points in which the book seemed rushed in places, like all of her decisions just went through without some kind of consideration.
I love the original and love this one. Some songs are better than others but overall it has good songs. This one is awesome because it's new music. My husband likes it.

This is a cute and unique case, but you get what you pay for. The case did not last long. In less than 6 months the paint started peeling from around it, along with my cell phone. It was quite disappointing. If you're willing to have this in one piece then go for it. But if you want something that will hold up on its own, don't waste your money. And make sure it stays closed! I tried gluing mine closed, which worked until all of those tiny chips became exposed.

I was sent a different product. It didn't match my laptop. The adapter is useless. In order to return it for credit, I also have to pay almost $8.00 more for the same product that i originally wanted. So basically, I'm paying both shipping and handling on this product. This whole thing makes me angry every time when things like this happened. But that's really not Amazon policy anymore. It's Amazon policy. You make mistakes and then your customers complain about you.

The instructions were on point. One side of the bracket has a couple of slots for putting in an inch or two more wood screw to lock it into place. You get what you pay for. It works and at $2.10 per hole I can't complain. But it's only good as temporary replacement or just decoration since I'm not sure if other people have tried attaching these shelves yet either. As soon as they find a solid stud they'll probably buy another shelf...maybe then I'll stop complaining.

I'm not going to bother commenting on the content of this DVD, because even I feel it is an insult with all the errors and factual mistakes. First the most annoying error -- he has a group sitting in one room talking about the Holocaust without noting that almost every person who ever worked for or was persecuted by Nazis was Jewish, making no distinctions at all: they were all Jews.

What the heck is up with this cd? I know they can do much better. Is it just me or am I missing something? This album sounds like a lot of other artists (well, most bands nowadays) trying to be Incubus. Not that it's not good. But, come on. It's the sound and songwriting style as good as, if not better than, incubus, at least, compared to say some others.

Excellent sound and ease to setup. We put the subwoofer in a large room that has vaulted ceilings so this helps fill it with excellent sound. This system is quite small although it packs some punch. My favorite feature of the design is that two inputs are controlled by remote. I like being able to separate our speakers because we have one on each side along with both TV components (Sharp Aquos lcd TV) which only uses surround sound.

I love a good mystery but this one just didn't really keep me interested. Perhaps it was because there were so many other characters with their own plots and problems to deal with. The main two couples in the book barely even interwove as they tried or failed at every scheme that came up. Just too much unoriginal going on. I'm not sure why anyone would think this is great literature. As mentioned by others, there's no real depth of any characters. They are pretty much cardboard cutouts.

I was thrilled to find an economical replacement filter for my vacuum - after all, you have spent hundreds of dollars on the original one and you're sure your money was well spent. This is almost as bad as that was. The size looks correct, but that's about it. For it not fit, we had to cut off a great deal more than 1/2 inch. Now it's impossible get in or out, so this thing makes cleaning our house very difficult.
I love OtterBox. Love it. My wife loved her iPhone 4S.
This product works extremely well and is simple to useYou will want some sort of filter pump if you plan on using this for long periods since all liquids are very filtering.
Very cute - bought for young granddaughter...looks sturdy and well built, easy to put together with no missing parts-but only time will tell.

The book is a very good read.......until the part that has nothing to do with his life before he was in prison... Don't get me wrong I support anyone doing hard drugs BUT having more than one or two pages dedicated entirely to how great you are and what you're into will have most people throwing this item right back where they bought it....

I got this and thought it was a waste of time because the book did not go very indepth on anything like what really has to be done in order for your dog get better. And why do you need so many words required - really? Just writing an essay or some crap that doesn't mean anything. A lot of useless information about diet and exercise. You will learn nothing.

I had high expectations for this book and they have all been dashed! This is one of the worst books I've ever read. My review isn't based on whether you agree with or disagree with Rand's philosophy, but rather in her personal life. Not only was there no real emotional connection, she spent so much time attacking other people's beliefs even though she's probably got most of them right (except for Rand herself.
I am soooo disappointed in this C.D. It seems like she sold out but her soul was still inside of her. Now its all about being a star and not listening to what God has had to say instead.
Good but very short. It was well written and I enjoyed it. A friend who wrote this told me she got it for free so I checked if amazon had the kindle version also by accident.

This item I believe was a used and returned, it didn't work at all. It has to be the worst ever purchased via Amazon. Will never purchase anything that might be available for sale. The best you can get is some junk from China. No way will this product live up what Amazon advertises as "quality in China".

This book started off interesting, however, about halfway through there were very disturbing occurrences involving young children. There are many better zombie books out there, including THE HUNGER GAMES...

I ordered this with some hesitation because of the price. When it arrived I was a little worried about installing them, but they were easy to install and seem like good quality. However, after about 18 months one stopped working completely, so now I'm on Amazon looking for another set. For $25, they should last more than half that long. Don't waste your money in these, you can find higher quality bulbs elsewhere. The reason these burn out is mainly due to thermal inertia.

So I just took my cat to the vet and let her sniff this collar on before putting it on. She did not like it, but gave me a funny look as she sniffed it. After about 15 minutes, she put up another "nope!" Which was when I tried giving it back to her. My assumption is that this thing makes some sort of rattling noise if it's in your cat's neck.
Good product. The delivery went extremely fast as well! My husband liked these supplements very much! He would recommend them if you want some new protein supplements. Thank you! :)
The quality is awesome. You won't find anything better than this. My kids got one at Christmas as well. No complaints here. Get it.

This film was boring from start to finish which is strange because I usually don't like horror films. Don't waste your time. There aren't any surprises. My apologies people. The ending leaves some questions unanswered.
Very well written. This guy didn't have access to the best of medical care or any good insurance back then either. His condition would explain much in regards to what he went through.
The premise is interesting, but these short stories come across as unedited messes.

My experience was the same as the other two users that have reviewed this item. After reading the very positive 5-star reviews, I purchased it. When I read my receipt, it said to contact Apple - and then you know why I'm posting this. To top things off, they wanted me to pay a shipping fee of almost $30 on return! Are we kidding here? Amazon is sending these refurbished items out with defective hardware?? They should test them before shipping! I'll be doing the same.
I chose the book after reading others reviews. A nice story. Very enjoyable and quick read. Looking foward to more books from this author.
As my dog says "It's as tough and durable as gold!" He has ripped up every toy or plastic thing we've given him, but he hasn't destroyed these yet.

At it's best, this book should give you a bit of information on how the process of writing novels is actually done. But that isn't really what this is. As others have stated, they only give lists and descriptions about certain aspects (characters, situations, etc.). And I guess if you're looking for that, it might be good, but not a whole lot more. If that's all you need, then good. Otherwise, better books exist for that. This one was too basic as far as info goes.
I've been taking French online classes for the past 11 years now.

You can't put too many ice cubes in this thing, but it will fit enough for a nice drink. The insulated design keeps your drinks hot. I've used mine over the past year to take iced beverages outside all day with no problem. Good value, and I expect it'll serve me well several more years.
Scale worked well but must have had some dirt inside. But I think it could not work correctly without dirt. It does what its supposed to.
Very comfortable to wear and keep warm but need a jacket with arms for the cold winter air. Nice product overall though.

We have been trying to replace our very old Braun coffee maker/grinder. This one has a lot of bells and whistles that we use all the time. The programmable aspect is wonderful. Also with this model you can set it for 1-4 hours. It's also larger on both sides than most, but that's great if your counter space isn't too crowded. Love it, love it, loved it.

I was expecting the same as I got in a store. But the price is great. It does not leave ur hair frizzy and soft. The good thing about it it's safe to use on people that are sensitive or have skin problems due tot he ingredients inside also since it is only for relaxed hair. Would recommend this product but would definitely shop around before buying. Shipping can be hit & miss.

This piece of crap did not charge properly on the first use. They claim no problem but I found out. The cord broke off and you can see exposed wires everywhere. It's a cheap piece of garbage. Please don't waste your money.
This coffee was just ok didn't really have an after taste to it, I drink it before bed and don't like the taste.

After reading about the movie on [...], and then checking out many other good reviews in amazon.com, I purchased a copy for my local library to give out. Well, we all know what happened with that....it made me sick to watch it. The script was poor, acting subpar by most actors involved but some did not have much of any lines at all.

I love the show on tv and can't believe how much was missing. This dvd collection is only a partial season. So what you are really ordering it for though is season 1 part 2, or half as much. The price was good just buy them separately.
Bought for 3 year old grandson, when he opened the box, one ear already had paint chipping off. Didn't seem worth sending back, but wasn't impressed either.

This is my second purchase of the Big Red. It really works great. Easy operation for turning burgers. Just wish we had gotten it in earlier when they first came out. The grill has changed many times so you need a new one. A little expensive but it works. We like it.
This shower caddy makes storage much easier than any other design you could try. It installs easily without drilling into your studs. A few caveats, though: 1.

I was excited to see a non-stick pan available with this type of nonstick. Very disappointing. It is NOT able t cook an egg without using more oil than any conventional non stick pan. And cooking spray and butter are recommended. The product says it makes eggs "easy". After making two batches my kids said the eggs stuck in many spots and they were very hard boiled. My traditional heavy cast iron skillet fried them like frying chicken. Would not recommend this product.

A bit slow moving and I found it difficult to like any of the characters in this story, with a couple exceptions being the two kids. The book was about love which seems easy without needing people who can actually express it. Not sure how close it's to reality. We have had similar family situations so much that we felt a little sorry for them. It just dragged on and on. However, there is always hope. Read the preview before you buy. Perhaps you'll figure out who's making your life difficult.

It's OK but not great. The cover and binder is more than adequate for what it is. As you insert a CD or DVD, the top edge of the box slips off the binder, exposing the CDs or DVDs inside. Not worth it. I would NOT buy again. I'll go back to my original boxes: those can take abuse from everyday use and still work. This one can't.

This did nothing for my allergies whatsoever. It smelled nice too. Not worth the extra money. You will be better off with a spray bottle. It's not that I need this stuff: just needed some more air to help me breathe.

A classic example of how the film industry uses an unneeded soundtrack to add action and suspense. This is not music that fits in with film. It goes against what was meant by a Bond movie. These days soundtracks work better as part of drama or action. To be honest, I do believe Bond should use his voice instead of relying on other people for it. What makes this score so frustrating is that Sean Connerys original scores worked wonderfully together. The tracks don't syncronize either.

I returned this as soon as it arrived to my house. Not worth the money. The material is flimsy and feels cheap. It would be fine for some but not me. It's cheap plasticky material. And it was a little off size. But overall you get what you paid for. I'm sending mine back. Don't waste your money on this one. Buy something else. Good luck.

I did some shopping around looking at these type of items on many different sites before finding this one. The one negative review was a bit overblown in my opinion. This set is great for the price. It seems to be well made and sturdy enough to hold most pots or pans. If you are only moving between 2 sets it comes time to shop around more. These can get expensive.
This thing took a very LONG time for me to install. I work in IT, so installation wasn't that difficult.
Great product and a great price.
These are pretty much the same thing you would buy in any other place but with this brand & style it's definitely worth buying it online.

This was the cheapest looking thing that I have purchased on Amazon, and then got one of those "item may not be new" type emails to say it. The paint in most areas has a flaw or an area where it looks like someone spilled something on it, which they did by running their gloved hands over it. Then there is almost no room so my kindle barely fits. You are supposed to slide your Kindle into these slots but you can't do any other way unless its sideways.
I bought this for a 2002 Grand Prix GTP. The passenger side intake is in a very hard to access area under the car. This adapter fit right in. No modification needed.
Easy to set up and easy to use. Well worth the money for an added tool on your tool box.

What a disappointment. My mom bought this for me as soon as it came out in theaters over Thanksgiving. As I watched the movie my first question was "What's with all the screaming and cussing?" After seeing it, I could not believe what the kids were doing on that island. That being said, after watching the entire movie, there is no redeeming quality. The film drags until you just want to jump through your TV screen because of how annoying everything is. It's an insult to real Native Americans.
Does exactly what you need - at least my wifi is faster.
While there are some of these reviews saying it's slow, it kept my attention from start to finish. Would suggest reading it for a quick fix. Also a great discussion starter.   Rating: 4.
For some reason this did not fit as well as i expected.
Looks great on phone.
I had a bunch of these that i didn't even know came as a pack of two, what good is that? It's not worth the price and it's not useful to me at all.
One of the most overpriced toys I've ever bought. The paint job is terrible. You would be better off buying a piece from Michaels and using their craft paint.

This is a very poorly written book, it reads like someone's first effort. There are too many grammatical and spelling mistakes which causes one to wonder if English isn't the author's second language (which I doubt, as she writes in English). Not only that, but all of her "stories" start off by showing how bad your child is, then tell you that it's OK to yell at them for doing something they were "not supposed to" do.

This is easy to read and great information for the beginning grower. I love reading with a magnifying glass so can do it on my Kindle Fire. It could use links etc but at best has 3 pages. Very interesting book which shows seeds in detail. Well worth reading.

In my experience, most digital audio interfaces simply don't sound good. Too quiet and no real high end in these things. I bought the E07K-USB so i could finally use a pre-amp, since my laptop came with only an optical out headphone jack. This thing sounds like it's eating my ear drums. Even with it turned all the way up, there is no bass. Not recommended. Look elsewhere. Spendy for nothing. Should have purchased something else.

The book just doesn't go anywhere. It is a story about someone who has the ability to get anything that he wants. But it's not much else. What happens after that? Just another short story. I would have liked more substance from this book. But, again, what happened was okay. Not very long. I wasn't thrilled. This author can certainly improve on her craft. And when it comes down to it, she needs to.
The quality not as good as previous version.

I had such high expectations when it came to this headset, unfortunately it's not working as expected. The mic does work sometimes but mostly the sound coming from my speaker doesn't come through very clearly. All in all, I'm a little disappointed. It was supposed "to be" a replacement for Turtle Beach X12 and I will probably just have an old headset around next time.

The first time that anyone attempted to watch this they had to skip the entire movie and then it worked perfectly. I like this film. Not sure if my machine was in error or what, but a disappointment. Still for $5.99, its great deal all right...

The screen protector is not clear. There are many bubbles after it went on. It may be me and when the directions mention wetting it down I was trying to apply more water than what they said. But my son tried putting this on without any luck. Too bad, because its suppose to help with glare too. He gave up in favor of some other type of screen. We would have gone through a couple more. These do stick well but thats about it.

I love it, even my brother who has a new Samsung SIII phone wants one he is very impress! The battery last for two days and the screen never shuts off so you can watch movies or listen to music without having to recharge
Having owned most of the books in this line over the years, I'm always delighted with their new ideas - no matter how obvious they might be.
It's okay but not sure if its gonna last long. I am also afraid someone will steal this from me. And there are some weird wrinkles on the back of it.
I have always bought K&N air filters for my vehicles. They are easy to clean in a few seconds, and they keep the engine nice an clean. The best feature is there is no filter media to worry about.

After reading the reviews on this product I was looking for an alternative to drinking sugary soft drinks. The problem that others have pointed out is valid. However I noticed there were many people who claimed their bottles leaked when they put ice in. That does happen. But it turned those few times into one thing after another. A couple of weeks ago my fiancee, husband and brother-in-law enjoyed a long weekend at our house enjoying our daily iced tea as well.
Good quality and perfect color(maroon) exactly what I needed.
This was for my husband but did not like the smell or taste. We will go back to his original product.

When I bought this book I was expecting more information. Most of it I've had heard before and could find very easily at the library. There are a few helpful tips, but overall, not worth paying for it! Unless you're someone who knows absolutely nothing about getting older, then maybe it's worthy - to save you some money. It only takes me 10 min to write my thoughts on every topic in the book.
Very enjoyable game, however many times during the course of playing multiple players start having problems connecting.

I received this book as a gift. It is a cute idea for kids, but don't buy it to play with if you're wanting something that isn't going to break. We got 2 of them and only one was usable by my son. The other broke almost immediately. My son did love the idea, but can't use both. I'd rather have just found some plain old magnetic tiles. He liked playing with those, so we'll be trying those next. Too bad because I do like it.
This is a great canner set. A large canning set often comes without small lids. These handles make it extremely easy. They fit right on the lid easily.
My son loved this toy at first but now it has started coming apart already because he's ripped off all pieces from both eyes by pulling them off. This item really needs more reinforcement.

My title says it all. I just received this and have not even had time yet to do any test taking. I'm very disappointed. It looks used, all the page numbers are torn off. It arrived in terrible condition. You can tell its been used. And of course there is no receipt or invoice. They will need one if they expect Amazon to take my money back.

The sound was horrible. Like the other reviewer said the vocals are really low. When they speak then it just sounds like noise. They also have to change your speakers when this game is on because most controllers aren't compatible. If I would of know that before buying this game, i wouldn't have. Maybe it's not my TV or something? But I thought hey I'll buy one and see. Same with me for those saying you can talk through TV.

I found that this book was well worth a second read. It is an easy read for anyone interested in the subject of reincarnation as it provides several new perspectives on it. While there may be different opinions about reincarnation, everyone will find one or two ideas that he would not have seen otherwise. Even though my view of reincarnation differs slightly, most people could get something out of the book.

I've read a lot of Stephen King's stuff and I found this one to be boring. The first half or so was quite interesting in its portrayal of the terror inflicted on some survivors who have endured years underground. However that soon fizzled out into a story with almost no character development at all. The "story" is hardly even believable, it's actually hard to connect the characters names without using google maps.

Not a good story, not really romantic, even when they found their way back to each other. I had some trouble finishing the book, as it seemed like you either love them or hate them. Too many characters, too confusing, and lots of confusing words. Maybe she needs an editor, in case others do read her books. I'm more likely that I'll skip other ones from this author. Sorry Ms. Roberts. You must have been under pressure to get your work out there. But the story line was not strong.

The story was so full of cliches and unrealistic that I couldn't help thinking about another book that takes itself seriously but just gets silly. Don't waste your time with this one. There's a new one out every month? How does all these great authors put them out? One reviewer talked about the cover being a poor reproduction on a large scale. If that's what you think you'll get, it's not as good on an actual Kindle or tablet because in landscape mode it covers almost half the screen.

This product had such great potential, I really wish there was at least one chapter written about the negative effects of having a child with dyslexia or any other learning disorder. I've enjoyed several books and some documentaries that address this subject, including "The Dyslexic Child", by Diane Fanning. You can find it in most used bookstores.

I bought this book because the title sounded familiar. So far I've only had a few problems with it. I'll have to see how many more glitches there are. The one problem that makes me, not a little bit uncomfortable, is in chapters 4 and 5, on page 14, a whole bunch of numbers are cut off, such as.433=.0457... On all other pages, however, except for 2 or 3, they come back on. Not sure why.
I love Coffee People coffee, particularly Donut Shop blends.
If you are looking for a book as a reference then get the hard copy. I think the book is good but does not serve it's purpose.
Works great, no complaints. Came in fast and was easy install (provided you have a screwdriver handy and know how to use it).

Love it. Used as directed for body shave...great results. Feels like shaving cream from can...but better!Great product. Will continue using this product. Love that there is no after effects of razor burn....
i love it. its easy to use, but it does make your laptop heavier. Other then that there no problems at all. Thank You

This is one of my favorite books and I am looking forward for more. How do we get an email copy instead of having to read through amazon's "check out - buy now" system each time you wish to buy? Seems like more work added on top of what should only be a free download.
Great sound at a reasonable price great value for the money. These are the best sounding speaker we have ever heard.
First taste was good for a fast cup of hot beverage. Second try proved very good.
This device worked fine until it didn't. Battery capacity is low and charging times are long. It lasted only 4 months. Now this product does`nt work at all!

They are quite comfortable but after a short time, one side stopped working. My husband tried all the tricks from changing batteries etc., etc and finally gave up. I only paid $17 for them so maybe that's why they didn't last. Otherwise, when they worked, he liked them. You get what you pay for. :(

I love this stuff and have ordered several times. The order was promptly filled. It came in good condition and no problems with any of the cans or caps. I can't live without it. As long as I can get it from this company it's my go to product.

I read somewhere that this book is best used with a magnifying glass and was able to do so much better! Waste of money now if it can be returned. Never got through the entire thing!!! Glad nothing happened in my life.....thanks AMAZON!
So yeah....

These pencils write smoothly, have a nice feel in the hand, and don't bleed through thin paper. I am very disapointed with them, however. When we recieved them (Feb 2013), my son immediately noticed they were "yellow", even though it was stated on box. Even after several sharpening attempts, still no change. After reading reviews online here, apparently these are made of some kind of pigment used to lighten color- seems like an afterthought by Finis.

I did not rate this product 5 stars, because the quality and quantity of the bags appear to be equal to other premium brands. The price, however, is by no means cheap, so if these are indeed better value than others, then they may deserve more stars!

The book had some good tips, but wasn't formatted well for Kindle and the pages were jumbled with text missing. A more complete description of content would be helpful. I found much information in other books that provided better detail as well. However, I was glad to finally get a reply from Amazon, which is rare when trying to return something. They even offered my money back or another book. If you don't want it, contact Amazon. They know exactly what they don't like most of all - bad reviews.

After all the rave reviews and raves I was highly disappointed in this book. One of my main criticisms is that it simply does not come close to capturing the magic created by Stephen King. As other reviewers have said, King can evoke images that are so clear you forget what place you're in. This book fails miserably.

I found that while the story was not bad, it wasn't very exciting. It just didn't keep me interested. There is a lot of killing and torture in this book. If that's what you are looking for then go ahead to read this. But otherwise, look else where. I'd rather spend my time reading something like John Grisham or James Patterson or any other good authors. And don't get me started on Clive Cussler! Read about half through before throwing away.

After playing both the new and old version of this game...it was really difficult not to go with the updated one...and I'm glad I did..however some minor things were just kind of.....weird.. but overall good game..

This piece of crap doesn't work at all.... i put the battery with a proper amount charge, connect it to my iPad2 and nothing... waste of my time buying this,... stay away from it! If amazon will take this back,.they have no choice,..now i know why I love doing business w/ amazon.com
Good product...
Book 3 picks up right where book 2 left off.

I own and use a variety of different headsets for work in the real world but this particular device just does not cut it. It's uncomfortable, doesn't have enough power, is very difficult to hear, makes voice recognition really weird & it feels cheap as heck. The best thing about it, aside from its size, are it's battery life. I'd pass on this, get one that actually meets your needs or buy something more expensive so you don't feel like you've thrown away money.
it ok good book but if a little bit boring. not exactly what i expected.its still worth reading and the price was good.

I was looking forward to using this when my dog barked a lot at everyone in the house. Didn't work. Still barking. Maybe it will work with other dogs or people but wasn't for us. Not sure why there are so many good reviews on this. If others can use it, that would be interesting.
Well made. Works as advertised. Like all phone cases its hard to get out when using belt clip. For that reason only 4 stars. Overall it's worth it. Can't beat an OtterBox
Protects your device, stands vertically or horizontally.
It seems to work fine. I have had no problems with it and the price was good as well.

We were able to set up the camera using a hard wire as an ethernet adapter. The picture quality is very good, even in low light. The price point was reasonable and we are considering buying more. I would recommend this camera. We did not have problems installing it either. It was fairly easy. Overall, quite pleased with it.

What can i say for the price, It works very well, I love how small & compact it is, cleans easy. great blending abilities. easy set up takes about 2 secs no need even read the instructions. Just wish there was different lid colors or something instead of just being black.
The color was different than expected from what the picture shows. It doesn't look black and white as shown.

Don't waste your time or money on this movie. If you're reading this, you know how it ends, so no need for me to try and convince you. But I don't think I've ever seen a movie worse than this. From the first shot, it's clear there was no budget, just amateurish special effects, poorly executed acting, bad script and poor directing. Not even remotely believable, in any way shape or form (and that usually doesn't happen).

This is by far, the most disturbing movie that I've ever seen. For an avid horror fan, when all of them come out, even something as bad as, "The Haunting" or "Carrie", it's hard not to be disturbed but also entertained. And yet, after viewing "Flatliners", you will find yourself completely disturbed.
I've been using an Android smartphone/tablet for some time. In that time, it's become very common in our home to get into a lot of charging situations. So, having a smartphone battery was not enough.

I have tried to use this but it has not worked. If the product is connected to power there are lines on screen no matter what resolution we get through an adapter. The only way I can keep a signal and see any detail is if you don't connect or disconnect your HDMI cable from the source every couple minutes. This happened at first until I figured out the problem was with this product. Not impressed and sending back. Bought another brand for same price that works. 
 Rating: 1.

This product did not last long at all. Not what I expected for the price. It worked fine but then in less than a year no longer charged batteries. Only works with rechargeable battery. If anyone wants to try this and can get it for under $10,I have two of them on hand. They are great!! Hope you do too. By Ray B
Purchased for use as bedroom tv. Everything works fine, except wifi connectivity. Samsung support has provided some troubleshooting tips, but no luck.

This is a great product and very high quality. Not sure why the price went from $120 to $100 in two days. I would say that it is still worth it. My only complaint was its size. It's larger than my average key chain, but not really a space saver. Would definitely recommend, especially for those with many keys you need access to. Very good quality product. However, if the seller had offered an open box, I'd have gotten one just like it, or even something smaller instead.

I have owned this case now for just over a month. After about 6 months, the "leather" started to fall apart along the edges where it meets with the plastic shell. This isn't surprising as it is exposed and exposed, so you can see that it's almost completely bare. There are only two or 3 of these corners left intact at the sides of my case, which was expected since they're not made from quality leather material.

I bought this based on the first reviewer. I have never had a problem with an electronic product. This one, however, is pretty bad. Not sure why, because it's only $30, but it doesn't even work. I plugged it in and got nothing out, nor does anybody else here tell you. Do not buy from this. Maybe they sell them through Amazon, who knows? Anyway, I'll post that somewhere else.

Bought one of these for my wife and the mic didn't work. I returned it and amazon sent me another since our first one had failed. Same problem with this one. I'll buy a real microphone, not these. For that reason alone, they are probably going back. The sound is fine but I've moved on.

These are terrible. They don't stick to the carpet at all. I tried cleaning before apply and after several applications there was no difference. Very disappointed with them. The only one that did work great is my cat since he doesn't jump on me but runs around. But don't waste your money like i did. :-(
I did not care for this, one size fits all did not work. But at least Amazon makes returns easy….thanks! Love Amazon.
The product delivered was in new condition. It came with everything needed to install. Great quality and looks good. I would recommend this product.

I used the device four times before it stopped working. This occurred just days after my warranty expired when a large piece of plastic that holds the motor cover in place cracked near where the two halves come together. Needless to say, I'm very disappointed with this purchase and certainly cannot recommend it. I've had several other electric kettles over the years (cheap ones) which never developed any issues. I'll switch back to those now - it's worth spending more.
This remote was exactly what my 2 year old son wanted for his birthday.

This thing is nothing more than a cheaply made waste of money. No way around it. The software doesn't even work with this adapter unless you run the program on CD or something like that. It comes straight from China and will not install if you don't have Windows 2000. I tried to contact customer service for help getting it to work, got no response.

I bought this from walmart a year or two ago to hold my large coffee cup, and it was fine until today when the plastic base warped so much that with moderate pressure on the cup, you couldn't even support it. Don't waste your money. If you're looking for an over priced caddy to use once in awhile, buy this. But if you're buying because it's going to have long life (like years), look elsewhere. Now I'm out $40 bucks.
The screen protector gives my phone a unique appearance. I can not count the number of compliments have been received.

I like the way it works. It can pull out a lot of hair and is very easy to assemble. But at the bottom there where not enough room for most any product. The blades can get stuck in it. So you have to go after them so many times because your hairs are short.

My wife asked me to order this replacement phone for our Panasonic phones, and the price was great compared with other listings. The product arrived on time in an OEM box inside a large cardboard box, but unfortunately it didn't include an AC adapter. It turns out that most folks don't want extra wire hanging everywhere, especially if its going into a wall. So we bought one locally at the auto parts store so she could get started.
This product came quickly as expected.

This item was advertised as having a "quick connect." I have had the product for less than 18 months and when attempting to remove it, it broke in half. The plastic is extremely brittle. You would think that if this were part metal with metal threads, a plastic knob or button connecting them together could hold up better in light of some reviews, but you know what they say about assuming- don't assume.

There was some mystery in this book about the killer and his life as a drug runner. This is not a murder mystery, more of an adventure novel so it makes for good reading. I loved reading the dialogue between James Bond and Felix Leiter(sp?) which were very funny. However, there are two things that keep the rating low. The first is the way the author goes after Bond.
The quality is as you would expect. It takes a while to heat up and when it does work it's great.

After my last set was thrown away I went out and bought all stainless steel cookware. My only complaint is that this size fits so nicely but if you want to cook with the smaller pans the handles are too short. I've had several people comment on them!

Not a bad product but it is not what I thought the material its made of. If we have to do this every day there has got to be better quality out there. But does protect your tablet from scratches and all that falls on it.

What a waste of my time. I've read all the other reviews - as many have stated, it's no great deal and that this is some type of parody. All I can say is "pay attention to your inner self". When you see someone writing these reviews, do you...count down how much money they will make from you?? It's not hard folks. It doesn't take any time for these people or companies like them to make their money.
My son absolutely loved his new phone.
This book was good reading, with a little romance thrown in. The characters were likable but the plot seemed somewhat predictable. A fast read though. Well worth your time.
I used these, because i needed something since it's hard for me too hear outside noise when listening to loud music.
Great product. Came fast. It is working perfectly. Definitely better than the apple product, which has also worked great for several years.

I bought this because all my other chargers broke and thought it looked cool and would be easy to use on long trips. Well, the first time i used it, when i plugged in a device, It fried the socket in my truck. And now, it's completely toasted. This product is not worthy of being sold. Do yourself a favor and don't buy it. Buy the real charger from apple. Spend $30-40 dollars with Apple directly so you have that confidence you'll never need a charger.
I bought this phone for my elderly mother. It is easy to use and looks great. She had trouble setting it up but otherwise has no problems.
The item I ordered was supposed to be a new item, but it looked like someone had tried cleaning it. When the package arrived at my door step, one of the items inside was in pieces. One more time.
I love this product and the price was just right for me. Thank you so very much for getting me what I needed
I am very happy with the product and the company that sold it. It was reasonably priced to me. Will buy from again when I need to. Would recommend this service too. Thanks! Very pleased customer!

I recently watched this movie and i cant believe that amazon wants to sell such horrible movie. This is a total waste of money which should be deleted from the website. Dont let anyone show you this. Its torture for your senses. The worst part was when u find out what really happened. That just pissed me off!!!

I didn't have many expectations of this album as compared to the other bands in the genre but it was a pretty fun listen until the last song that takes you up into a state and then slows right down...seems more like they were having trouble keeping their momentum. That being said there are some great tunes on here worth checking out. The sound quality is great, too.

I bought this to replace the last one and so far it seems better, no problems with opening cans without using our hands anymore but we have only had ours for a few months. Good product would recommend if you don't like those electric can openers that always leave us holding them down when they open a can.

It's like the author couldn't get enough on her life before writing this and spent little time developing these characters who then become so important to her. You are supposed to believe that even after the two main protagonists have been together for a couple of years, they still are not getting along, but we don't really see why. I didn't feel much about either one of them. It also felt like the story was written by someone else in some ways. In summary - interesting plot concept badly executed.
Just what was looking for. Good material not flimsy. Very functional item. Had other similar item but these were much better....
this books is okay,but not good enough for 4 or 5 star.
Poor quality.
We have watched The Rifleman, Buck Rogers and Mission Impossible. All of these shows give us hours of enjoyment. This is even better than when my kids were little! Thanks so much, Amazon.

The book has a very basic writing style and the title is misleading. The first 25% of the short story was written to convince you that your daughter needs her own room. She wants one, but she already has one. However, it says they are not getting married, so there isn't going to be more than one girl in their dorm. It's a nice try, however if this would have mentioned at least ONE guy you'd want on your side I wouldn't see why you're getting angry when another girl walks away.
I love this collection.
Works perfect for me! Love it! No regrets at all. A bit pricy though. Very thin material though so expect to only use it on special days or if you know someone who needs it.

The product is good. Works good and does what it claims. I would have given 4 or 5 stars, except that after 3 months the back of mine broke off. If this item was available with a longer warranty they might get more business. At least then people could complain like i did before about getting half way through their warranty.
I love the case. i have to take it off a lot because my phone is in the army and this seems like its going to be really durable. great price too. thank you.

For some reason you never want to read a book that's almost done. You are eager to see how it ends. This felt like one of those stories. Interesting characters, but just too much going on. Too many people involved with everything. Hard to keep track of. Didn't really care for the ending. It turned out okay and that makes me happy.
This was my first bluetooth headset. I am pleased with the audio quality and it has worked flawlessly. It also came in a very nice travel bag. Very pleased.
Very happy with this set. The knives aren't that sharp, but are easy to sharpen. We would reccomend it for anyone who wants something cheap and very affordable.
Not as complete as they claimed but adequate. A bit lacking in some features common among modern lexicons. Very handy.

The characters in this story are one dimensional and flat. And you start wondering how many more times can she get herself into trouble. She goes from place to place. They think she's nuts. They're clueless.

I'm a big Michael Connelly fan and this one was ok, but not great. I had heard good things about it so decided to try it. The mystery is pretty good, but with all the technology advances today, how someone could get information that they needed at least an hour earlier (days away) rather than 30 minutes later, just seems unbelievable. I've read many of Connelly's books before, he always has great character development in them and keeps you interested. This book did not.

Bought this for an aging cat with a hard time getting around or moving around. He loves to go in the garage and run back and forth up and down my steps into his room, even under heavy snow! My husband was able to take it apart (easy, if you follow directions step by step), put it together easily, attach wheels, and set up. Took him about 15 minutes. This works so well that I plan on having one at home now. Very sturdy.
It doesn't work. My kids tried it and they felt bad to be honest. I hope people won't have the same experience as me with this product.

I bought this thinking there was going to be a lot of different patterns and instructions. Instead you get instructions on how to create one or two from scratch and another example project done in beads. There is some good information, but very few projects are included or at least were only shown briefly within the text. A little disappointed.

This is one of the best little products for your car that I have ever encountered. It works exactly as advertised and I've had no issues with it. The suction mount holds my Motorola Droid Razr Maxx securely regardless of bumps. There are only two downsides to this mount, but they can be easily remedied.

I have owned a Krups espresso machine in the past that worked great, but this one, although it looks great and works wonderfully, makes terrible coffee. It doesn't get hot enough to burn my hand after brewing 4 cups of coffee or if you let it sit on top for 3 hours. And we are only drinking two cups.

I own two of these and found the instructions difficult to follow. Once installed they seemed very flimsy compared with my older models. The "feet" were actually screws that protruded slightly from plastic brackets. I would not buy another item like this. We will see how long it lasts. I'm looking at returning or giving away. Disappointed in all aspects.

So many other reviews mentioned that these aren't real and are fake. I made sure to get REAL ones. It turns out they ARE FAKE. Don't waste your money. They didn't have tracking number though, which isn't how you know it's authentic. It's junk. Definitely not worth $10+. I'm returning them at first chance.
This works wonderful for us and keeps our cat entertained. We would buy again. Thank you so much. we are very satisfied.

I got this thinking i was geting the best deal and instead i've found out why. the item shipped quickly but when it arrived there were no bulbs included. very disappointing. Also while installing it, one of the light fittings broke off with ease. So if you buy this, just be careful screwing them into place because that screw might not go far enough cause their cheap. all in all, a ripoff purchase.

I am a huge fan of the Bourne series and when it came to buying this, even considering purchasing it in Blu-Ray, since there are not enough movies released with this version (the latest being 'American Psycho'), especially from Sony like they did about The A-Team, then I thought that "hey, why not?" Well it's sad but true, no extras, barely any special features, basically just a repackaged DVD.

After spending some hours in the field and a couple of hundred dollars for Nikon equipment, I have learned quite a bit about this equipment. In short, there is no such thing as good gear and, with today's cameras even the best. When you spend over $1000 and your pictures look worse than those from a pocket camera, it means that either (1) you went cheap, or (2) you've got all the bells and whistles, not real world quality.

not good on my small head. I could use the foam pad but they would fall off if you move. I tried to adjust it for a tighter fit and then lost an earcup. Just sent them back. Wish these were more adjustable in size as well since most of us normal people are so close in size. They aren't adjustable.
Its beautiful but to hard to put on,just have my sister do it. She said u better go buy your self one from apple cause u can tell its been used because there are scratches all over some of them.

This is an excellent product and I have been using these pads for many years. There are other more expensive models, but they come in a very flimsy plastic packaging which does not protect them from moisture or damage. My only complaint about this box holder is that you must take the entire top of it out to open it.

As I said in my review, this is not an album that deserves 4 stars. It needs work. Maybe it's time to rethink your sales strategy, and make the kind of music you put out, more like what people want you to make. With the right direction from you, these guys could have a fantastic career. Hopefully it won't be too long. I still admire their talent, but please don't take yourself out on us with "filler." This CD would get 0 stars if I'd been able to.

I must say, it would be easy to get stuck with a book that doesn't work properly, but this is not one of them. For the price, you don't expect perfection, right? Well, I'm sorry to say there's something seriously wrong here. As other viewers noted, there appears to have been little care put into it. There are numerous typographical errors, spelling mistakes, and grammatical errors as well. This may just be how it was "scanned", and at $17.95, there should have been no reason for this.

The description said that this would be a light weight plastic bag. I like the fact it is BPA free, but it's just too flimsy. If you want to keep food fresher and less expensive, go with your cheaper grocery store bags. For me, I feel more confident using one of those instead because at least I'm not dumping tons of recyclables into landfills. With this bag, my hope was for something stronger, thicker. Maybe even double or triple thickness. Instead, it'll do until we get really desperate.

I think that this is a good idea. BUT what it lacks in design and usefulness, it's really excels in. The problem is, they didn't put ANY sort of handle on it. You have to pull the whole vacuum out from under your sofa just to get at anything. If you try putting it around furniture without having any handle, well, well... you're not going near them. My sofa has no handles or anything for people who want to do that.
First it is an okay book and I did finish it. It is not one of his best but the story line was ok, if you love to read bad sex novels then this is for you.

I love the light that i can use with it or not, and its price is really good compare to other brands like Neewer or OLight. The one thing would make this product great was if you could adjust both focus angles of your flash... but overall this a very affordable portable flash, so far, very happy thus far. :)

I purchased this as a gift for my nephew when it was on sale. He loves playing with it. The price is so reasonable too! It's also very colorful and fun! Well worth the money. I'm glad to have bought something that he really enjoys. Highly recommend it! As always, Amazon service couldn't be better!
The color of this bowl set really makes a difference. Very pretty.

This thing was a complete waste of money, and I am not even an "audiophile". It didn't take long to see that the quality is horrible for this price. My headphones are better than this. The sound sounds distorted all the time. I've never seen such poor volume with my portable speakers, let me tell you, they may have been cheap, but it does make you question paying $40 or $50 dollars for it...

I got this for our first baby and it worked great until my husband accidentally dropped it. The plastic has cracked all around the camera lens but that's mostly because of one drop. It seems to me that they should make these cases sturdier. If your phone is dropped, you lose a corner or front cover will be cracked. In all, we have two different models with the same problem in each case. I guess we'll try making new ones when Otterbox gets their act together. 
 Rating: 2.
this is a great product to use with your ipad, there only wish it came in several colors than just the white color that I chose, thank you much.
I ordered two, 1 didn't last long, The other would work from time to time when the switch is turned on.

Failed on 5th month to date. Worked great at first, but then started having major issues over time. Not worth it. Going back to Western Digital. At least they will give you 2-3 years of service. But if you're building a data system or doing any amount of file transfers -- look elsewhere.
It fit perfect on my 2002 chevy. Good price. The price can be higher compare to dealer quote. Just have it tuned and go see the difference

I would give this product zero stars if possible. This is not a toy at all. My 5 year old was so upset to open the package and find out it is supposed to be water soluble candy. There were no warnings on any of the outside packaging about it. We had some from our previous tub before we bought more new ones, but these are NOT good for kids. They have NO flavor whatsoever.

I wish it was a real book, not just a picture book. Just pictures does make you feel closer to the characters. And my kids liked it. They read every few days or so, but they are 4 and 7 so perhaps it's better for older kids. My daughter likes most of her books but she didn't really like this one. It did keep them occupied while we were waiting at the doctors office, though. She's still asking "when is part 2?"   Rating: 2.
I have used Nexxus products before with good results so when i saw a suggestion on one of my online email accounts I thought i'd try it.

First off, let me say that I believe this is a fabulous album. With many of the same musicians who created the magnificent album from which it was drawn, in fact, it's one thing to produce an EP but what makes THIS and others such as it all but unlistenable is the constant "loops" or sounds being placed over other sounds (or something similar).My girlfriend made fun of my obsession with them when we first heard them, so at least I'm getting some enjoyment out of them.

My cat loves these. A little spendy, but worth it, even at $6/bag. She likes them because they are soft and have no rawhide in them. One of my cats is very picky with food. I thought she wouldn't like these, but the first time we opened a bag from this seller, she licked off all the bits that were left.

This charger does the job. I was a bit skeptical when i ordered it, but this one works better than my original that came with this camera. It also seems to charge faster due to its lower current draw and higher voltage. I've had it for 4 months now without issue. No complaints.
Wonderful music from first track right through to last.

The product itself was fine. I ordered two of them to replace a battery that died while charging in the phone overnight. But they charge well just not long enough for my situation. Next time I will try one like Sony OEM. Not as expensive and work much better. Very disappointed as it is almost needed at this point where we live with out electricity. And there are no other batteries from Amazon or local stores but another vendor on Amazon.

My dog didn't have the interest to even get close enough to smell it. He did like how it smelled when he was a younger puppy, though I couldn't give him anything with that smell. But as you might expect, I've since been able to find something from another manufacturer. So, this one is sitting in my office being forgotten about and left open.
A waste of time. There was nothing in it that you didn't already know. Very disappointed. Not my favorite authors writing. I always enjoy her books.
Great product. Small compact and easy to store. Seems accurate on calibrated weights. Good price compared to similar products. Would buy again for another small scale.
The quality seems a lot less than what we had before but still good. For being in another country there is no problem getting them. It's like they don't want you to.

This product was received on time, but didn't work. No instructions, no online support, and I spent a lot of time fooling around with it so there is no way to figure out how it's supposed to work. The software that comes bundled in the unit makes little sense and the directions say exactly nothing about how this thing does or doesn't work at all. If you want an item that does, you'll have great trouble finding it.
Excellent for those of you who don't always go with the mainstream and like to take a different approach to their love life. Great read!!

I purchased this so that my mother could use it on a long plane trip. She had to use the extension cord but seemed pleased with how well it worked. It isn't too loud - which was exactly what she wanted in traveling by airplane. Good buy!
The kids loved this one. It's got some moving parts that move when you pull it, also a ball catcher on top. Definitely recommended if your family has 3 or more children.

It is not as good or even close to being a true prequel to the Halo series. I think they need to stick with what we love which are the games themselves. I'm also disappointed how short it was and left me wondering where the next chapters are. I'd give this game 1 star, but if you enjoy playing Halo, then go ahead and buy it. But overall, do rent out first, just in case. This was one of their worst games, sadly. I'll probably never buy another video game from them.
A wonderful selection of songs and well recorded. We had one similar when we were young. My mom fell in love with it.
It was perfect! Just what they said it would be! Great price! We loved it!I highly recomend it.
For fans only this is certainly worthy purchase.
Just received this case in June 2009. By December, both latches already broke. As another reviewer mentioned, I'd say look elsewhere.

It's a great little machine except for the fact that it's very easily to spill. The water tanks are all over the place so when you try and move it the counter is on top of them. Also mine just died after four months. Very disappointed - don't waste your money. There's plenty out there that's more reliable.

This would work great for a small room that doesn't have air conditioning! It is very compact and easy to use. I like being able to pump out the warm water while holding onto the filter so it does not leak. The only problem which may be my fault was as there were no instructions when we plugged in some of our existing filters (we had purchased 6 different sets of 3 separate adapters).

What can you say about an item like this? Item arrived well packaged as described. Plugged into outlets and nothing. Tried another power strip, still nothing. Returned unit with no trouble. Still waiting after three weeks.

I was not impressed with this book. The stories were all the same and boring to read. If you like reading about how great a person is, why did they go to college, etc, then you might care for this. But most people would rather read books from real life because that is what their lives are like. This type of "memoir' just bores me. For any men out there looking for more insight into women.. keep looking.

This product works better for bigger seeds which is exactly what I need it for; my cat needs smaller ones like baby peppers. It seems almost useless with small seeds because the suction cup just wont hold. If it's supposed to be that great, I'd think they would have come up with a better idea. I'll try putting a bit of soap inside and see how that goes, but so far, not impressive.
Great price to protect our expensive new iPhone 5. I would recommend purchasing this case for your iPhone. Highly recommended. Thanks so much.
The book was a very easy read. It made you interested to learn what is going on in the lives of this family. It's just amazing.
Great grinder. Good quality. Makes excellent coffee.
Great product, fits my daughter perfect, protects her KINDLE.
I purchased this battery for my Acer Laptop. The price is much less than the batteries at Best Buy or other computer stores. This purchase made me a happy Amazon customer. Thank you very much.
I'm very pleased to say this company delivered what it promised! We purchased 3 sets.

I received this set as a Christmas gift and it is absolutely gorgeous! However after about 5 months use the mugs started to leak, which defeats the purpose of buying them. The whole reason we spent money on high quality stainless steel cups in the first place was that they are so sturdy. Needless to say, I'm quite disappointed. So for now we're stuck with these. If you get these, make sure you hand wash. That way nothing breaks off inside these mugs.
This device was exactly what we needed to replace our old one. It fits very well into either of my microwave's shelves.

Exactly what I needed. My new LG monitor fits on it easily & looks awesome in the bedroom. It's sturdy and a great price. The product itself was shipped fast, packaged nicely, instructions were easy to follow, good product! Thanks! :)
The pillow is comfortable to sleep on and easy to wash. It also washes nicely in a laundry bag. I have enjoyed it. Would recommend.
Good movie.

This is probably my least favorite of her books. The writing style was ok, but the storyline just didn't flow like it normally does. I read over half way through this book without really feeling it. If you are an Anne Rice, get another book. I'm glad that she wrote this, and don't give up on her, because I know that if she gave us something else, we would have loved it, too. We will see how "A Tale Of Two Sisters" goes from here.

When I recieved the package it was not what I ordered. But they refunded 100% of my money and made sure to send me another one for free. However after just a little over a month with this case its starting to turn black in spots like I'm using it. Don't get me started on shipping from Hong Kong which took all these extra days that were supposed to have been saved. Overall good case, but bad shipping. Oh well :p

This is not the most interesting book. I read it to my children and they didn't like it. Not a keeper. It's very short and there was nothing good on it.. Not worth any money. There are much better children's books out there. For instance, The Cat in the Hat books by H.A. Souther would have been better. You can buy them online for free!
This is my favorite hat that I have purchased from Amazon. It's comfortable enough to be worn around the house during winter weather, but it's not too warm or heavy, either.
I used these when traveling with our grandson.
No real plot and it didn't get better as time went on, it read like a first draft when all those little things could have been fleshed out.
it was an ok read.. a very short story that makes you realize its all in how u treat the people around u. i would read more... and i'll add this author to my list..thanks :)
Works great even outside in the rain. The picture on both sides is a little fuzzy but for this price who cares. I would recommend this.

I am in desperate need of a new adapter. This product was purchased March 15, 2011 and it broke today. The plastic housing around the wire has broken at both ends near the metal connectors. It is now past Amazon's return period. So I'm stuck with one that doesn't work and won't last long enough to get replacement. I've had the same adapter for over two years now. No problems so I guess Amazon went cheap this time if they know they've run into problems.

I just ordered this product, and although the description said it would be good for a 6 oz. glass of water to take with you on camping trips, I took my own advice based upon other reviews that have mentioned how difficult it was to drink out of. When pouring, your mouth has a tendency to dribble water, which goes onto whatever surface or container you're drinking.
Very different in subject matter & characters, I really liked it. Good plot lines involving relationships, family dynamics, & faith.

I used these spoons for my kids lunches and one spoon shattered on the first use. You can only get four uses out of them before they are unusable. Poor quality. Not worth wasting money. Buy a plastic spoon. They do say not dishwasher safe but it is possible to wash in the microwave. Which was nice, because at school we always use the same spoon. In case I'm being cheap enough or too lazy I'll reuse them! :) Don't waste your money like me.
My son loved this - great for a birthday gift or just to have around the house and it arrived in no time at all!

I received the item in a timely manner, however it was not what is pictured! You see all these little jewels being worn on necklaces. And also when you open to put them together.. they are made of very cheap/cheap looking plastic (looked like a piece of paper or plastic). This product really sucks! Would never recommend it! Not even for my daughter! Now we have paid over $30.00. To ship this stuff back.
This arrived before the date stated. So far working just fine. It was reasonably priced as well. My main concern after reading reviews stating problems with connection issues, etc.
The TV is ok but they advertise "No Motion Blurr" with 1080P.

One thing you can't help noticing (aside from a few typos) is that both main characters in this book are women. We don't get nearly enough testosterone on television. The story itself does an excellent job showing how easy it would be for both sides to lose sight of what really counts - family ties.

This does work well when you have room for a unit with an unusual shape. However, if space isn't available, then go without. It barely fits my Garmin Nuvi 255w. My husband and nephew each bought their own units so they each got about $20 worth of product which seems pretty good.

I've never been a regular reader of science fiction and when this book came up as part of the Vine program I was so excited to jump in. However, after finishing it, which took me two days over my break because it just felt like such an endless slog, is that there's really no point to it. First up, I'm only half-way through at this point, but there are dozens if not hundreds or more stories within the first few hundred pages.

My husband and I needed a way to protect our new mattress. We wanted something that would be waterproof without feeling overly heavy or bulky (that's another story). This mattress protector is exactly what we needed. It's lightweight but protective; you could even say it's like sleeping on air. The price was extremely reasonable for the quality of this cover. There are cheaper ones out there at local stores such as Ross, Petsmart, etc.

At first glance, this book and its contents make you eager to begin reading. But unfortunately this is not true in real life as the reader will find out. The premise of the novel seems intriguing but I found out quickly that it didn't deliver. The main characters, Jack Morgan and Nick Stone were shallow at best and unbelievable at worst. Both were supposedly "professional" assassins even though they spent practically all their time hunting down criminals.

This is one of the worst examples of creative writing I have ever had to endure. All it was was, a lot of rambling and nothing at all resembling dialogue. At first there seemed promise with several stories being connected, but once you found out it wasn't so complicated, they fell apart. Nothing was believable in this book and certainly not well thought out. There are dozens of similar works on Amazon, buy them instead. Don't waste your money on this. It's junk.

This book has a fun storyline that will leave you guessing until the end. If you're looking for an easy, entertaining read on this subject this is it. It only took me about 5 or 10 minutes to breeze through it so its easy enough and fun. The last story really creeped us out as well. I would highly reccomend having these available in your home because you'll never know when the inevitable power goes off of one day even if everything else hasn't been turned off. 
 Rating: 4.
Good movie I enjoyed alot, the cast did a good job and it was just an enjoyable film. Will watch again when it comes out.

I bought this toy as a Christmas gift for my 2 1/2 year old boy. When we opened the box on Christmas, he was SO excited. He couldn't wait to open it. After playing with it once, the remote stopped working. You had to hold both buttons down and then you could get any color ball rolling that made contact with one of 4 buttons. As soon as you touched another ball, the button would go off again or not. It is going back tomorrow.

When I plugged this device into my car, one red light came on. The second time I did this, all lights went out. This was not good because when I turned my car back on, the indicator showed that it had shut off. But then, minutes later, everything from there is no longer working. Since I waited months for it, I'm very disappointed with this. It's been working nicely until now!!! It should at least last half a year.

I ordered a white leather folio for my son's kindle fire as a gift and his favorite color is navy blue. When this product arrived, there was no black in sight on the exterior of this folio. There were tan accents but not black. In both cases, it looks cheap. If you are looking to buy this, know that it's more khaki than navy! Buyer beware. It's pretty useless. I'm returning it. Don't order if that's what your heart wants though.

This product had no impact on our mouse problem,which was becoming less and less of a problem. We have been using this for over 3 months, maybe it has not done its job, but at any rate, we aren't convinced. The problem is, mice are attracted to the food in my kitchen. Mice cannot see through metal foil, so what works wonders for them would be useless here.
The ear loop fell apart.
The product met my expectations. Very easy to use.

I ordered this book as well As all the others of Ms. Quinn's that I've read. Well let me tell you, I'm soooooo disappointed. This is definitely not my style at all. The writing lacks emotion. I found myself skipping through every couple chapters just to get back to how much she didn't want it. A lot a times its very boring.

Great product that is easy to use and works the way it should. I have used it with two different brand tablets (with different cases) for music and video and am very pleased by its performance. Well done, Samsung!
It works fine. Just make sure you have enough inputs before ordering. That way, your receiver will be set up for 5.1 so you don't need this.
Good book but it was a bit confusing...this is the second time that I have read this authors books with some different characters.
This product works very well, have two different versions of it that use them both without any major issues. All functions work as described.

I was really hoping that this book would show me more in depth about the author's life and career, but it only touches on some topics. It just left me feeling rather flat after reading it. She talks a lot of talk when really she never does much. It's nice to read about her work at first with all the interviews, etc. But then as you move into the last chapters you're not quite sure how much research she's done.

First of all, the title is misleading, because there are only two stories in this book:The other story by Elizabeth Beary and Kathleen E. Widdoes (which she wrote under her married name, Eileen Dowd) isn't quite as good or well-crafted, but it IS worth reading just for Ms. Dows beautiful cover art. My main problem with this edition was that the print quality did not match that of some newer books on Kindle, specifically ones from Harlequin & Silhouette.

This was well written and I did enjoy reading it, but it only got 2 stars because the story line was so unbelievable. Why would we expect anyone to go on a trip just for money in their 20's? A good plot should have some surprises thrown in. If the author were trying to write an emotional book with believable characters she failed. Instead this is such an unbelievable story. If everyone traveled around like they do then there wouldn't need to be anything special.
The book was exactly as stated and it came in a very timely manner. I would purchase from this seller again.

Not the greatest book. The author seems to take himself too seriously. I did finish it. It's a long book at almost 600 pages. My advice would be don't judge this book until you read it for yourself. There are some good tips in here, but if you're used to getting your information from other sources, like books of the bible or magazines such as SELF and others, then you'll find little new here unless one is willing to accept what he says without any hard evidence (ie. no data).

I've been in an office environment with this product for a week, and am looking to see how long the tip will last before failing. The rubber is starting to pull away, showing some signs now of cracking, I only use the tool occasionally but it should not be failing so soon. Too bad cause it's perfect ergonomically otherwise. A very high defect rate on mine makes me think that's just the nature of the beast. Would love if they could re-design it.

This is a pretty easy tool to clean that was delivered quickly. However, it doesn't seem very durable and looks like it's going to fall apart if I used it, which makes me wonder how long will this last. So far the biggest complaint seems to be its flimsy handle, but that's probably more of an inconvenience since you have to bend over while working with it. It has lots of openings in the side so everything should get cleaned. Just wish it looked better, feels cheaper, etc.

It's a cheap product. I wish it came ready to go with it's own little case, but it comes pre-assembled and doesn't really need it. The USB dongle that fits into the side of your pc was broken, just like everyone else said. It still does work in windows, so I'm ok buying this. The buttons are somewhat stiff as mentioned, however, they seem pretty durable. There is no doubt you get what you pay for, though, hence my 2 star review.
I'm happy that there are posters like this, however it's too small compared to the poster in my room.

While I enjoyed the content of this book, it wasn't as well written and flowed a bit more unevenly than previous novels. It's true he used other characters names to help fill gaps left by not fully fleshing out his main characters, but when I'm reading one of his books, they are supposed to be on my to-read list at least. This is not an excuse to stop writing excellent books. Just something that bothered me.

I found this book extremely slow reading. It seemed the author was more interested in his own observations about life than helping us to learn any lessons we could from it. He gave very few references and never defined some of the concepts he discussed making it difficult for me (avid reader) to work out what is meant by a sentence or concept.

Not much new or exciting in this book, which is a disappointment for me considering so many books were included as examples. However, that being said, it does provide examples of various kinds of web sites and services, including the ones I would consider more 'important. 'Overall, worth reading to refresh your memory on what you already know about building websites.
I love my towels they are soft but strong. There also absorbent well as well. My husband loves his too.

First let me say that the picture on this bag is a really good representation of what you will receive. The actual product does not look much like that. All I got was two separate plastic bags containing one bag. Now imagine looking at an oversized cardboard box. If i had known this, I would have never bought it seeing as how I cannot put something into any such small packaging. This can only hold so much. One bag, one box and then the rest fall out.

I bought this item for my sons 10th birthday and on the very first day he opened it he dropped it from less then one foot up high by accident. His iPad hit on the screen with a loud cracking noise and shattered. The second time that it fell out of his backpack. So now is cracked all over the side. And even worse, not enough to get another iPad. He has an otter case but it's quite bulky. It also doesn't stay snug around the ipad either.

I've owned this product for a little over two years now, and at first I did really like it. It is fast -- even works well in some places where my old wireless g was too slow. My problem though after owning it about 10 months has been that the speed degrades to nearly useless. If you set up your pc on it, you will not be able to access your router. Even if you have full signal, once the laptop loses connection (connections) -- it's worthless.
As the title says.

I have not even received these and there is no way that the items are in as new condition with tags & plastic wrapping on them. If you want something to last for more than two months then spend 20 bucks at your local dollar store instead of $60 for these. The sound quality isn't any better either. They could barely stay attached by themselves without falling out. Definitely would prefer a pair similar but made by Logitech if I were you. These suck!! :( 
 Rating: 1.

I had not used the new Epson R2000 before purchasing this and a spare ink cartridge. Both cartridges arrived today. First of all, it appears that someone is trying to unload returned cartridges, because one of both inks was completely dried out. When installed, no image showed up. Very disappointing in terms of quality control if these were reconditioned cartridges. Another problem came when plugging them in. The plug into my monitor would never make good contact or stay in.

This item is not as described in the product description and did NOT work for me. I used it according to instructions that was included. It may have been intended for someone else but not on me! I think it caused a reaction. Did get refund so no worries there. Hope this helps.
