Our cat loves the Furminator. She enjoys rubbing her nose in it and is much calmer after having been groomed. Thank you Amazon. We got the furminator as a sample from petsmart. Much less expensive through amazon. Love it!

It's awful. I tried one of them and it did nothing. Another time, there was even less than nothing on the brush. I'm gonna give up trying. These brushes were just too expensive. Not worth it. This brush doesn't seem cheap at all. I don't recommend people to buy these.

I got this as just a nice looking desk with some real functionality and it fills that niche in my office. My only disappointment is the keyboard shelf doesn't hold much after assembly (which was very easy to do). The other reviewers are correct - for $199, you can't really beat it.

This is a great way to protect your ipod by only adding about half an ounce of weight per device. Plus it's more stylish than those cheap leather cases. I highly recommend it for anyone who wants to take on the protection and fashion quotients of their ipod. It can be folded in half which makes taking photos much easier.
Purchased at a very favorable price for what you get. They work well and will likely buy another of this model after this.

Product seems to be good, however the packaging was pretty poor and when it arrived one of my tubes had busted open. This caused me some trouble since I'm out about $17 on shipping in addition to having to run back up stairs to return what looked like just another tube with broken glass.
I bought this for my dad and he loves it, it looks great in his car. Very easy to install with 2 people.

While the overall story was quite predictable, I found that characters and dialogue were very amateurish at best. As an example, how many different ways can you have a man get into bed? What sort of fantasies are they all having?And what exactly is this big secret about one of the main female character's parents that she keeps from her father? That doesn't fit with his character.

These are not a good choice. I bought these to hang on my windows but the adhesive is very sticky which would tear off within two days. They were just horrible. Maybe they work better in a smaller space.
A little boring at times but good story line. There just didn't seem to be all that much happening in between. It is worth reading.
I have been on this brand for years it has caused lots of digestive issues and now will not purchase again, as is there are so many other good brands in the market.

Great tool with lots of good tools. I highly recommend it. I have used a lot of different brands but this one is the best. It may not look fancy but then again it did cost 1/10 as much. The blades are razor sharp and last forever. Very well constructed. I'm sure there more expensive knifes, but they will be too difficult to use. This set has everything you need at your fingertips for any job. Thanks Stanley Bostitch!

For some reason I wasn't expecting that much in quality at the price I paid, and I'm surprised to say how well it holds together. I've used this for a while now with no rust or problems. One thing is though - it's definitely not dishwasher safe. The top piece seems like stainless steel, which probably isn't any good. But other reviewers seem happy they washed theirs by hand. So be careful, people!Anyway, highly recommended.
Love it. It has all you would look for in an inexpensive, portable system to fill your rooms when entertaining. Definitely would recommend.
This set works fine.
Jack Black gives what we expect from him: he's hilarious.
The movie is great but the disk won't play. I am a little dissapointed. Is there anything to do about it? You have been warned.
This product came on time and looks exactly like the picture but it doesn't work.

It will work for your cans but its not very smooth at times and does not hold as many cans in one shot. After about five cans, it quits pulling tight so when you put another in place, more of the first fall out again.

This product is made very CHEAPLY,the sides will fall apart,its very small. not worth the money. I would never buy another one like it. A child can rip it. It has been sitting on my back porch for 2 days now. My yorkie will eat whatever comes across her..
not that great as i thought. there is no plastic covering so the screen looks awful when installed. but its cheap.

Good book but the ending was a little rushed. All in all, an interesting read and quite worth it. Recommended to readers. 
 Rating: 3.0 (3.5 star review)While I enjoyed this novel as much or more than The Art of Fielding, I did find myself annoyed by certain parts. For example, what was with being referred to as "Sophy's Aunt" at one point rather than her Grandmother.
Very good tool. I like it.
I read every single review. I'm not sure why people gave this "toy" five stars. My 4 year old daughter loves it.

This book was not what I expected - maybe it's just me?I'm looking to learn German for about a year. The grammar of this book left me thinking "what???" and that made it difficult to learn. I would have liked some more explanation for how the sentence were formed.
The filter fit perfectly, great price, fast shipping good packaging thanks for a quality product! I will be buying another one very soon!

This book was a difficult one to follow for me. I read at least 20 ebooks on my Kindle and so rarely have difficulty keeping all the information straight. But somehow this time it still managed not only that, it kept me wondering what would happen next, even though almost everything that happened seemed logical except the plot itself. It is very obvious that much research goes into these books, because most of the secondary characters could be from any big city where there are large number of wealthy business owners.

Sorry, but that's not right. I ordered the print version and it's in black - on Kindle. So, what is it? My mistake, maybe someone else can do better than me with this material. Just give me the book. That's all...... Love them anyway.
These were so easy to put up. My husband didn't mind putting them up. They look great in our kitchen. The price was right. You can't beat 'em. :-)

Very low quality and poor workmanship. The metal has lots of rough spots, some spots show rust. It does not fit into the light fixture well. All is fine until you try to install it, then it doesn't fit. There was not any type of instructions with the lamp including a diagram. I would advise paying more money for something better made. I have returned my product and intend on purchasing another from another supplier.
Loved it, we put in place over 2 months ago, there is still water left that hasn't flowed yet.

This is a very nice looking and well made item that I would buy with confidence again! I especially like the fact that it has it's own little drawer inside which stores all of my spices. The price was better than you will find in an appliance store too! :) Great product, great service. Highly recommend! A++ rating from me.

Great product, works perfectly, easy to use. I would recommend the product for this product. Works as advertized. Shipping was a little slow but that is not the vendor's fault. Overall great product and highly recommended.

If you are looking for a guide of which parks to go to, and what sights exist within those parks...this book is NOT the one. This so-called "travel guide" does not actually help in any practical way. The writing style makes it seem as if she has some kind of axe to grind with a lot of these places, but that hardly seems like it's even close at all.

I needed a replacement after my cats ripped through the cheap one that came with our kittlery. This is better constructed than similar priced ones, appears to be of good quality, works as described and was reasonably priced.

I bought the book with some interest because of my past experience in a number of other cases from the same company. While I agree that it's interesting to read how and why someone gets into an abusive relationship there is very little practical advice about getting out (leaving or trying to). It almost seemed like, well, abuse isn't good enough for this person so we'll see if they kill you next, but there's nothing like what works before they leave.

This was the only set I bought of this type when making home decor. While they have a cool futuristic design, they're not practical because as we all know, you can never fill an 8+ oz. container without overflowing it. We also found at least one unit that had poor quality. Some were cracked or chipped. Other units leaked. So many other people recommended these to us and it seemed like just what we needed.
Its a good cover to protect your iPhone if youre hard on it. It fits perfectly however, makes phone somewhat heavy. Overall its good.

I purchased this book because of my experience as a college student during the 70's and 80's. This is a good example of an underutilized tool in education today. There was just enough detail to whet your appetite, but not too much that you need more. If there were more examples it would have been more helpful. I bought the Kindle version which should give me increased value.

Very easy to use. Only problem is you must remove the battery every time which takes some time. A few pics have already been taken and it keeps on taking. We went kayaking last weekend - took about 20 pictures before turning off camera. Great little camera. I would love an underwater case for it.
First off this is a well built cabinet.

It's nice that this product has a wide range on the suction cups, and the size is also large. Unfortunately it will not stick to my textured surface. My dashboard is too smooth, so I had to buy different one.

These were awful. The only reason I gave them one star was because of the price and free two day shipping. Do yourself a favor & go to your local store for them. Those are good quality bags. They seal well. This is just garbage. It doesn't even feel like there is enough plastic in each bag. Don't waste you money. Buy something that will actually contain waste. Not these things. :(
I bought this product for my husband as a gift and he loves it. It fits great in his truck. Fast shipper. Thanks again.
These are perfect for the office and have tons of space, would def buy more once I run out. Would recommend. Will order from vendor again. Love them!!! Price is right too!! :)
For $30 you cannot make any sense out of these CDs. Their supposed help section was obviously setup for their own benefit.

Ok, now I know how your first review came out with an "S". Do you even read the book before making a review? You think it is great!!!! If you can stomach all of that, great. But I found this story to be very boring. First off, everyone hates on her because she's in prison. That's probably cause they are not ready for something like that. When are people going to grow up! Anywho, we find them out, so there goes another star.

It doesn't matter how hard I try with using this adapter to my D700 the pictures have a white border and they start looking yellow by itself when it comes in focus. The reason is that either there are too many photons bouncing back from its surface or somehow there are too few of them. If you don't mind having bad images on your expensive lenses - don't waste money here. You get what you pay for. I'm going back to Amazon Basics USB cable.

If you've seen "Blood Work," you know how good the acting is in this movie. It was good, although I think it could have been better. The storyline wasn't great and not anything really new happening. Just a few people at different points of their lives struggling to find meaning or purpose with themselves. Overall an okay, easy movie for any fan of either actor involved.

I was really looking forward to reading and reviewing the book "The Great American Beer Binge as I've come across so much great stuff on this subject of beer drinking by people who know what they are talking about. So you can imagine my joy when The Brewery Guide (Brewers Institute Guides) came out today in hardback, with a color cover with wonderful pictures inside!Unfortunately, that pleasure only lasted for a single look from cover. There were four very small photos of all these rare craft brews.

I love this product as it works perfectly for my purposes and I can carry all of my essential accessories in a bag with ease. The only thing that would be better is if the side pocket was big enough to hold sunglasses, or at least a slim book on one. Overall though it is a pretty good bag. Very durable. No complaints! I'm very pleased :)
This set worked really well for me, though there were only three little things in each size besides 1/2" adapters.

I'm amazed and have no words for this fantastic product. Just love it a lot. Good price as compared to others of its type on amazon.com. We took about 5 years off our carpet with three dogs. It's like having your puppy now without the carpet! It is so easy to handle even when you don't do it very much, just use it. Love it! This should be in everyone's household.

I've never seen anything like it. It doesn't look at all the picture. The picture looks as though there is some sort of rubber pad that comes with it...not in this particular product. You definitely need a different case. And my iPad mini wouldn't fit inside either.

I enjoyed the first two books and loved this one right up to a scene when they are all having sex in bed together. So disgusting! Would never recommend anyone read these books. Very disturbing what was done in such an innocent way. It got me so disgusted. Why would you write something like that. Even if it's just a short story why do that? This makes it completely inappropriate for teens.

This is my third set of the OXO Good Grips tongs, I use them all the time. They are sturdy, strong, easy to hold and look very attractive. Just keep in mind that they never come apart. Other than that, great product, would definitely purchase more like this one. One note: The tongs can be used together - so make sure you have the right size. It also comes with a small plastic holder for your kitchen counter.
Not what I wanted to read when my kids ask for stories about dogs. Might not look so bad though, just didn't hold their attention. :(
A good idea that really needed more fleshing out so that we got some emotional attachment from our characters but this was barely done.
I own two of these and one stopped working after 4 months. We only use them on weekends. The other still runs fine (i assume its just the battery).

I ordered this case thinking it would work for my ipod. It does not. The front camera and the home button could not be accessed. The seller offered to refund me. However, since its too late now I'm stuck with a cheap case. Do your research before buying from these people!

I have tried 2 of these now and they are both too small to even be useful. The plastic is so thin that it tears if a dog chews in them at all. As far as the construction, the one we received was just thrown into some bubble wrap, when it arrived there were only 4 of 12 on all sides, not enough for me or my dogs (3 each).
While trying to set this product, it kept cutting off on me. Finally got through and found they said that is normal for the product. Got one from another company and no problem whatsoever.
Enjoyable movie to sit back with friends at home for some laughs. Definitely worth watching. Would recommend it as one of those movies.

I bought this to run my ipod while cycling (something I'd only had experience with doing in ear headphones). It worked for two months and then died. No display would come on. You get what you pay for. Don't purchase it! You'll be disappointed. Also, it takes some finagling to make a connection, even when your ipod's volume is set at 100. For the money, I expected much better. There are many, many other options available that produce better output. I'm still searching.

I love the idea of what this product could do. The technology is great. Just wish it did not stop working. Got about 4 uses before one day it would not even power on. Customer service said they didn't see any other reviews in the return portion either. When a device was defective and you cannot get to customer service, that tells me there are some bad apples out there. For a price like this, I'd expect better. This will be returned. I'll go with Apple next. I sure did. 
 Rating: 1.
it was the wrong size. I didn't try to return them because they weren't worth my time and energy. Don't care for them. Maybe someone else will have better luck with them, but not me.. oh well. :-(

I like the idea behind this book, and have had positive experiences using it for my own family history, particularly in finding connections to ancestory I've never been aware of, or not thought about before. There are some problems as well, however. The most obvious problem is that it's very difficult to determine which parts of the book relate directly to any particular ancestor. In particular, I'm only interested once a year, so I can't tell whether something was in reference to myself and my husband when his mother passed away.

I am pleased with product and would highly recommend to others. Only complaint is packaging was horrible - UPS or whatever package handling system left it outside in the rain and exposed them and made shipping difficult
I've read almost every Alex Cross novel written by James Patterson.
This toy was just what we needed for Christmas. We had looked everywhere in the stores before finding this.

A good story told badly, which is too bad because this could have been great. I felt the main character spent too much time complaining how hard her life is; she complains incessantly, and gets off on the fact that other people think she's whiny, insecure, bitchy, etc. But for me, that's not an appealing attribute to a young adult. As others have mentioned, this was published before the days of Kindle. The lack of maps made it all even worse.

Purchased the Roku LT for HD movies with Netflix. Wanted one primarily because other reviewers reported very happy with it. Set-up went well but it's definitely easier if you have some experience setting them up.

I don't think this is a good choice. It did not do anything for me, and when it came time to get rid the bottle, my skin had turned red. It's expensive too, over $4 per use...that doesn't really make sense. You end up having two bottles of lotion... And what about the smell? The perfume smell isn't strong enough or long enough. Maybe there are some people like this. For me? No.
I bought this for my wife and she loves it. The color is a perfect addition to her kitchen. Very nice weight of the glass.
Not quite what I was looking for but it looks great in my bathroom. The quality and price were better than other similar items. Would recommend.

This is more a cookbook with some cooking tips; for the same price get The Happy Herbivore on Kindle instead -- it's not great either, but it has pictures and actual recipes. If this one didn't have "diets" or healthy eating I wouldn't recommend it. I'm new to paleo diets - too many variables in life already.

I'm sorry. I don't want to write too many bad reviews, but this book is totally and utterly unenjoyable. To have these characters so poorly drawn, it's hard enough to imagine them as two people. There's little effort put into them, which makes the whole plot seem all wrong. They're not likeable even for teenagers. It seems they were written by somebody else, because it looks like there wasn't a lot of effort.

This was pretty good. If you ever went to high school it would make u laugh, i guess. I mean sure not for EVERYBODY but at the end of each chapter there is a bunch of facts so that makes more sense. But some jokes didn't get as good reviews as others and are better than others.

Had the same problem with the second one I received from Amazon. Did some reading online, no more issues for me. If you have any problems just contact the manufacturer and get it replaced. There is an official warranty if purchasing through Amazon though! They also sell replacement covers on their own site too. Great product. Have had them 2 months now. Very happy overall so far :) 
 Rating: 5.0 
 The battery life is amazing. I can use my HTC One all day without recharging it.
The product works great for a very good price. Just ordered our 5th one.

I've had this product for two years. The first one was used by my children as their own personal water bottles with no problems. They are pretty hard to get clean and I couldn't see how the lids could be better so that's something that would keep me from buying another set of these. However, they started showing signs of rust after only 2 years use, so I bought a new set. My boys really don't drink much water, but it wasn't anything like the time we had them.

I bought this set for my daughter who likes to play with her own nails. The nails look great, but the "clips" that hold the nail polish are awful. It does need stronger clips than what comes with it. Also, after one use, it is showing some rust. We have only had them a month or two. Overall we are pleased so far. As for being made in China, not sure about that.

This is probably my 5th Sunbeam electric blanket in 20 years. They last and last but unfortunately after 10 years of use this new one stopped heating. Will return or replace. We will see. Hopefully they do better than previous units because we really loved it. Unfortunately it's not available anymore.

This is quite possibly the worst book I've ever read. I read about halfway through and was tempted to throw it in a fire. I'm not sure I'd want anyone else to think that this books deserves five stars. Don't waste your money. If you're really desperate for something decent just go look at some of the old movies from long ago. At least there you'll have something worth reading even if it's trash. But don't bother with what Mr. Patterson has got to offer here.

I have a couple of dozen CDs and several thousands songs in my music library. Since getting this player, I've had it for about 5 months. The FM tuner is great, but the MP3 player has become very hard to listen to. It skips tracks every second, even when playing at lower volume. The first few times that happened were from turning random on or off. The screen works fine except you can't watch videos off it. This problem also happens with some songs, so that's annoying.

I bought a new HP Pavillion Laptop and wanted a wireless mouse pad. The picture shows one pad while the price said it included one. Well the pads in the photo are only 1" thick. These guys are liars. My mistake. This does make good coasters though. Just beware people. Don't believe the picture!
Works like advertised with my Galaxy Note 7. The extra long cord is fantastic. A quality product at an affordable price. I'm very happy so far. So fast shipping, too. Would buy from seller again.
I used this to fill out a box for my friend who is a die-hard Bears fan. The size of these tags was perfect, and the price made it very cheap. Great item, great price. Thanks

I purchased this as a gift for someone else. As of yet, they have not heard anything bad about it. The person whom received it seems to love it! It was shipped promptly and came in one piece. All around, very happy with the purchase.

This cover was recommended for the Kodak C183 but it did not fit my model. It cost me a lot of time and expense returning it. So I'm stuck with something I've already thrown away. Don't waste your money on this one.

The item is very poor quality for the cost i am amazed that it worked at all. Do not buy this product and waste your money. There are far better ones out there including by Samsung to be used with their TV as well but you get what you pay for. I will most likely go back to my previous brand next time because everything about samsung products just seems cheap made now days so buyer beware. Good luck.
I returned this item right away. It did not work for my husband at all. He could barely hear anything. And no headphones, just the ear buds that come included. Not worth what it was...

This book has been read and passed around to several friends, although one friend did point out that there are plenty of products available in local shops which provide an equally good experience for half the price. Still, if something is available, it's worth a try.
Too many misspelled words.

I bought this product after receiving a similar one for my other car from another company. I'm completely satisfied with the design of this. it does exactly what its supposed to do- keep your hands warm & toasty. It has multiple adjustments so you can cinch down around your arms and chest. The only draw back is that after wearing it, it's not great about absorbing water but since there are zippers on either side, any air leakage doesn't take away much from how effective they are.

Not great at blocking all smells, or not as well in that case, however these are quite durable (I own 2, actually). They can be easily washed (and I am also fairly careful about wiping up stains), so they do go through some wear between uses, even with weekly cleaning.

I'm a professional photographer and use this card in my camera on a consistent basis. Never had any issues with it until i was out shooting at the Zoo while I took pictures of some rhinos. When I shot 4 pictures, half were lost so after reviewing the data from it, I found that every other file has significant write errors. Now i'm stuck unable to open the file. This is extremely frustrating. Don't try these cards unless you're taking them for absolutely sure.

When I installed and hooked up the adapter to an XP, WinXP or 7, it does not work. It says a computer with no network is present in order for my computers on each to connect, but since they don't, all of my USB devices will only connect to one computer. I think this adaptor was manufactured incorrectly, because if you look at other reviews here you'll see very many people had exactly the same problem that i did.
I found this little heater worked great for a small space.i only wish it ran on 4 D batteries. The auto shut off is nice.the thermostat was easy to adjust too.

I purchased this product because my husband has dry mouth and is always looking for something to help him with it. He had the original oral b sonic toothbrush since they were first introduced. It lasted 10 years until we finally tried out a more modern electric dental brush. This newer version was too weak for him, he can't get enough vibration that makes his teeth feel clean, so back it went.
The Jabra Freeway Bluetooth speaker has great sound, especially considering where the wireless range is. It also works extremely well with my Motorola Atrix.

This a disappointing book.. No real plot at all. Slow and boring. Was this suppose to be some new twist on a true story? I have read every single novel Mr. Brown has written, however after reading this, it is definitely my last.

I like the color, love the feel. However, if you are on your hands and knees looking for a mouse, this is not it. They just don't make them well enough to keep moving my mouse with one hand up while grabbing another to type!
Bought this doll for my granddaughter.

Not much information or recipes for real meat substitutes, maybe they are just veggie based. If not, not what I'm looking for. A waste of my money...which sucks! They say if it looks too good to be true, then it's probably not. Sorry.

i am really shocked that this book made it to print. there is not one thing in here worth taking the time to read. save your money and get something by a real scientist. most of what she writes about are just wrong or misleading. her writing style leaves so much to be desired. I was forced to give this at least 1 star because amazon would not, which says alot more than i can say. if you were thinking bout buying this, don't. buy any other science book.

What is going on with these books? As far as writing goes, the author shows talent. The plot was okay, but there wasn't enough mystery to keep you reading. Also, at first, like all of her romances, she uses lots of foul language. Now, no one talks or writes in such language, especially women.

Great product. Works perfect at our office. You might want to get a heavier duty cord though, it has always been so easy when we leave that computer on but I don't know how much longer it's going to last. Seems like the ends will weaken because they have not had theirs for as long and have only used twice in 6 weeks!

If I had to put in more words at this point it would probably be too much. These are not the best earbuds that have ever been made. The build quality is poor. The wires tend to make cracking noises when they tangle. The actual sound quality is good for a cheap pair of earbuds. But if you want really good headphones look somewhere else. In short these are alright but just don't expect any kind of quality. Don't buy these.

When I placed an order with a total of 4 batteries 2 did not fit my camera - so i was sent another set and the same problem - but this time it is on their end instead if mine, they decided 3 were the ones that worked! All of them will take about 30 pictures before needing to be recharged. Not happy about this product at all! Would never deal again with any one like this.

I'm not a fan at all of the style which has no pictures throughout but only numbered pages so you don't know where to go from. I suppose I've just read better and worse books, it's almost like one is telling me how cool it is, when in actuality you're reading about some guy who didn't think it through well enough to have good illustrations. It would make for an entertaining book if this could be fixed.

These headphones looked nice and seemed comfortable at first. Once they started sweating, the rubber pieces ripped off. Very inexpensive product for what it's worth. Avoid them. 
 Rating: 1.

I bought this thinking it was a book about the art of creating quilts with your hands, and then decided to give it to my 12 year old because it did not look like it. It wasn't as easy an experience for her, due to there being no pictures, no instructions, just one quilting page per square foot. If you do decide to make these in fabric, by all means buy one. It's really worth it- or at least try one!-Julie C.
The story is good but sometimes difficult reading. There were parts in particular where the main character had made an unwise decision regarding herself.

The cover seems to be ok, but the description is completely off and misleading. This book is only about 1 page of written instructions (maybe less) covering several different topics like soldering and building a breadboard. If that's what you're looking for, then you'll need one with more detailed instructions. Also, it's NOT worth your time or money unless you are planning on having it professionally made. As I said, if printed out yourself, you'd get better results than this little booklet.

Don't buy these, they don't work or are a complete waste of time to buy. I went through three sets and could only get one to work, even after re-installing them over my speakers. The seller sent me another set thinking it was just defective but the same trouble repeated itself.. Not worth the time, trouble, or effort at all.

I bought it for a trip to South Africa and Africa. It worked well but could be made much better with more rigid material or maybe some kind of strap. The zipper tab broke on the second day when packing it. It's really cheap plastic. This was my first (and only) camera bag, so don't expect anything that will last. If you want something rugged and dependable, I'd spend a couple extra bucks at Best Buy. Otherwise, this one works.
This has been a great product for my son. He enjoys using it. I recommend this to anyone who wants one with good value. Easy to assemble. Great price!!

The screen protector works, however there is a small bump between the speaker and home keys. That means the buttons push against something. Once I'm used to it, no problems. Overall, it was good product for its price. I'd recommend it. It comes with 3 protectors. One of them has started peeling on one side. Only time will tell if that happens or not. That's not why I marked off 1 star. So, all in all, this was definitely worth it! You do get what you pay for.

I had great hopes for this book - we went to the author's house and did our daily meditation exercises together. I'm not religious, but my husband thought it was an insightful way of getting a new perspective on life as he grew older. However, after one day of having meditated by candlelight with her book, his mood changed and he found himself wishing that they would make these things mandatory.
Fit like it was made by Samsung. Quality seems much better than most other products.

This is not a true story. I am amazed that it was ever published. I would steer clear of this author and all his other works. Disgusting. Should never have been published as fiction. You will be sorry.

the material is not bad, but if you have long hair beware because this wig pulls your hair and it looks unprofessional. I really regret buying it. And also mine doesn't look like it's even from Kenzo, just a fake one. But for under $7 its worth it! So I'm giving one extra star. Just know that it's pretty bad. It's okay though cause it'll fix my short haircut.

What an utter pile of crap. Don't buy it unless you hate yourself. If you're looking to find a nice laugh in your collection, go for it. But if you'd like some good belly laughs, try watching the movie "Memento," one of my favorites. It was not made by this clowns. Watch that instead. This is bad. I can't even call the music original. It's kind of catchy... I'm having fun with it, though. How could any band give 5 out of 5...

Love the book. Good read over all. Could not put it down once started. Enjoyed reading this book but there were times where it droned on for no good reason. I thought the author could have told more about the characters and their struggles. Still worth reading. Also loved meeting his family as a bonus especially love that he has children.
Nice material, colors are true.

First thing I want to say is that it isn't a "high end" product, like some have stated. But for the price. It just worked great with my Nexus 10. Just make sure you plug in your USB power source. I am a professional bartender! This little thing is great! It keeps my drink much colder than the ones on the jobsites. The only caution I'd give to people thinking about this purchase or any for that matter, is.......buy the travel case! It's worth it!

The description says it's a complete package. That should have been my first warning sign. When I opened the box, and found just an ordinary plastic case that only had room for one of the discs inside, with no additional storage space, I'm not sure why anyone would pay extra to get anything extra. If you really want this movie, go ahead and order it. Just don't expect much in terms of how it will look.
My son really likes this book. His sister also loves it and we read the story together several times. It is very easy to read. I recommend it for little boys. :)

A total waste of paper...even my Kindle can't fix that. It's no longer about the story, it's all just sex with people other than the characters you've spent so much time developing. Don't bother buying it! Seriously disappointed!!! If you liked this book, or have read some others, then don't bother, not worth wasting your time.
Great action movie with an intriguing story. The special effects were pretty impressive as well. Glad to have it in my collection. Worth the rental or purchase.

I don't recommend it at all. Its quality is only one of a kind and when my camera broke because the case would stick in it. I can't believe that this product cost more than $10. Even though I'm talking about Nikon cameras, there are lots and tons similar cases. It's worth your time.
The set is well balanced, great look to it. I would definitely recommend this knife block if you're considering one.

Good product and easy to install. We had an electrician install our ceiling fans (heated) as the thermostat did not have a light on it so we needed a replacement thermostat. The installation was pretty simple without running wires around the ceiling, just drilled two holes in the roof about 1.5 feet above the floor level and installed it. Our furnace works perfectly. It does seem to run faster than previous versions that I used to use. Great product. Price is great too. 
 Rating: 4.
What a waste..! It took me only one minute to figure this out... It's really the stupidest book i ever read..!!! I don't recommend reading this.. :((
Works great. Has good power. The only knock on buying such a tiny unit is that there are no instructions showing where to install.

The phone works fine. Voice is great and the voice announcement of who's calling which I love. Caller ID can be selected from the menu, however cannot program it in to automatically call on whomever that is. This seems like an oversight since Panasonic would have had more users. It's a bit slow when you first start talking, but gets faster as you're speaking. Has good sound quality for both sides. All around, I'm very satisfied.

I recently went to the local mall and picked this dvd up for 19.99 thinking it was a good deal but once i finished watching it, it's pretty darn stupid. Even though Jackie Chan is in this, he's not very good. He's just going through some routine and you can't really care about him. There's more talking than fighting. It's like every fight scene consists of Jet Li fighting people. Then after awhile its actually funny because there's all these guys running around with their faces covered from various diseases.
It installed easily. The battery door is a bit loose but doesn't seem like it'll fall off at all. I've now used my laptop outdoors for several hours while waiting to pick up some things.
This product shorted out on me after one week of use. We had to go buy another cord immediately. VERY disappointed!

As a lover of the classic stories that make up so much romance in our hearts, I was drawn to reading this book. Don't be fooled by the 5 star reviews this thing got and I should have paid more attention too it. This was an utter waste of money. It's not worth even sending back it would probably cost half as much to return it. It's cheaply made with many broken parts ( one part doesn't stay on). The only other choice is Apple or Samsung tablets.

This book is short with only 26 pages. If your looking for a very basic overview then this would be fine but i think people wanting to understand economics will most likely get just as much from reading my blog.

Doesn't taste even close to coconut. And there are ingredients as well. No way it could be remotely healthy. I threw away the first bottle because my dog would eat it. Won't buy again. My own fault, should've read better...

This book was ok. The story line in this book, to me, is a little too predictable. I'm ok with that in an easy read, but I did get bored when there were many characters taking turns to show their feelings. It would have been better if the author had stuck more closely to one character for that matter. For example, what about Alex? He loves Grace just as much as she does him.
Did anyone else notice an smell that lingered for weeks? It's nauseating! I don't know how it could have possibly gotten there, if so many others haven't noticed.

I got this as a gift for my father. It has been about 6 months and it is still in good condition. My father used the product to sharpen all of his own knives. There could be some improvements on how well the knives sit under it, but overall its ok after all. The rubber feet aren't secure enough. The quality isn't bad, considering that you get what you pay for.

I couldn't finish it; the writing was atrocious, and what little plot there was, could have been written by a fourteen-year-old. Don't go near it. The only interesting thing about it is that it's based on true events. Even those involved felt no passion for life, and most of them would feel nothing good to write about. One wonders how their family copes knowing they didn't live long enough to care if they ever did get into heaven. And one wishes she had made more effort with her ending chapter.

As a book lover the title alone drew me in, but I just could not get into it. Perhaps an interesting story, and maybe if you are more interested in what caused these people to suffer than their own individual stories, this book would make for some fascinating story lines. But it was all very boring and depressing. Nothing much happened. So sad how they treated each other. They made such little progress. And yes there were people who suffered and endured unspeakable tragedy, that no one should have to.
I have only played this game one time and it was very entertaining. It's a great combination of strategy gaming with fun games. Highly recommend that you purchase it.

I really like this product but the lid is so hard to get on and off. And when drinking from it, it drips all over my hands, making a mess. Other than that, it's great for what you pay for. But again, i was trying to save money too :)

My wife had used an identical set from a local store for years to keep her tea warm. So she said it would be great if we found them again as they were not made anymore. However, she does like these cups.

The device works but after two months of use it broke and I ended up spending $30.10 for a new one from somewhere else. Not too satisfied since the first one didn't last that long. The only problem is I have to buy another.

Bought this product to use with my Blackberry in conjunction with the Samsung Galaxy S3 phone as a GPS-only application. I had hoped that it would work just fine for me without any gliches. It does, and then some. There were no issues getting device pairs up with both devices or navigating within settings - they seemed more seamless using BT than through Bluetooth. However, when driving down I-5, there will be times where GPS navigation won't work.

I'm happy I borrowed this from a friend who didn't have to fork out the $35 for it. If it had been an $25, or maybe $25 as some of these other reviewers are, then yeah...it's well worth it, but that's not how you sell things. The entire book is just another sales pitch with no real substance. And if he does say something original about being happy, I'd like my $5 back and stop wasting it on this. A very average self-help book.

Just finished this book. It was entertaining if a little predictable. I thought the characters were believable. Good book to read on vacation or sitting around on vacation. Also would be great beach reading. Thanks for letting me enjoy it.

The item was delivered with the box looking a bit beat up and the pieces were in one large bag, no outer box. But for this price, seems OK just can't use it.

It was the same as my review of your other products - nothing different here. What you do is take your great product and try to screw it up into something it's not supposed to be. Great case for the new iPad, and love all of its features. The only complaint I have is there are so many colors available right now it would be nice if a selection were offered, but oh well, you get what you paid for. Worth every penny!

This album is complete and utter cash. Its the same formula as all his previous albums only that he seems to have gotten lazy. No substance here. I'm glad I bought this on sale for 6 or something because if not I'd feel like a sucker buying this. It wouldn't even stay in my player. Save your money people, stick with any of his old music you can find cause this isn't it.

Bought this product with the intention of saving space. The unit I received would not power on. Had to send it back. Amazon worked well on sending me another replacement, and so far haven't had any issues yet. UPDATE: Second Unit DOA as well. Same problem. Power light just flashes for a second then shuts down. No more OCZ products in my house. Returned it and bought an Icy Dock instead. It is also much better than this. Avoid if it's going behind your entertainment center.

i bought this watch at fry's electronics. it is not a bad watch, but the features and quality just dont make up for it's price. I would recommend spending more money on something with great features.my main reason to purchase was its waterproofing, because once you are out of water. water gets in pretty quickly. so when doing dishes, etc., it has become kinda important! having all those functions was nice. if you have time to waste getting used to it, then great!overall, very sleek watch.

This is a product that I cannot rate since it was purchased as gift for someone. They were extremely excited when received and have been enjoying their new camera. The camera itself appears to be of great quality. Thank you very much.

In my opinion, the worst book I've ever read. I usually love John Grisham.... but not this time. Bad bad bad. Borring read all around. Won't buy any more of his books unless it gets better reviews. Sorry, John! Sorry for ruining your book career. And good Luck in the future!

this game is a great game. the only reason i did not give it five stars was because of my personal taste and some pretty minor glitches but it's still amazing. If you are into RPG's, then get it. It has everything any person wants/would expect. This makes an excellent gift.

This book was interesting. There are many good reviews already written about the book, so I won't repeat what others have said here. It did take me several days to read this book. First of all, as some other reviewers mentioned, it is a story that would be better suited for younger readers. Second, there were grammatical errors which surprised me, not so much when reading with my 3rd grader, but she noticed it, too. Third, these books could really use an edit.
First off, this wasn't one of my favorites.

The story line is good but, I only gave it 3 stars due to all the graphic sex scene. They are in this book so if thats what you like maybe read it. Other than that its a well written book. Good job by the author!!

A very typical story of the man who grew up with a disability but was fortunate to discover his true purpose in life. This book has many of the qualities that I found annoying and distracting. An elementary student writing this book.
The movie came promptly and in good condition. I am very pleased with the movie. My son is still laughing everytime he watches it.

I've just received my Kindle which I like a lot. Having been without one for a while due to having two kids plus work and home life it seems logical to get more use out of it. Great quality and great price. It is well worth the money compared to other ones I have seen. Fit my phone perfectly..

The product is great, it has excellent screen resolution and really shows the difference between my laptop HDMI ports and this adapter. I also use a WD external hard drive with it, as long you set your resolutions to "standard," you'll have no issues at all.

This film is so bad it almost makes good for the first two thirds. It suffers from a plethora of unforseen plot devices and terrible dialog. The acting also really suffers. This book isn't for those of you who have serious knee issues. It's quite basic. A great read if you're someone looking to get your knees out and do some good stretches, but it's not the best overall workout book.

This set was perfect for my daughters room, it came with everything as described, i only wish someone would sell the other decorations in this size too! great price, shipping very fast! Very cute set. Im sure our daughter will love it!! thanks so much.

I am extremely angry about this. No matter what we do, our kindle refuses to go on line. We have never had this problem with the other two games or any of their apps, let alone a full length app. Amazon won't do anything either except try and force me into buying another game.

i like it, very functional and looks good on counter. assembly took only about 20 minutes, but wish drawers ran deeper in width.

My cat uses it and loves it! She doesn't want any other catbox. This product is great if you have animals that prefer box.. Would highly recommend. Worth the price. And comes with it's own cleaning pad.

The product is great! It fits the phone and protects it well. I am sure that my daughter will get many compliments on it. However, if you have this phone, be aware there are two screen protectors in every pack. Once they wear off (which takes a reasonable amount of time), they won't stay where they belong, so then it's totally useless: either you'll miss half your pictures or else they'll just pop up. It's not like they're worth having replaced anyway.
The information was good. Too many words were misspelled. It needs lots of editing before release.

Like some other reviewers, I was eager to review this, as it's one of the most famous works by Carl Bark. In fact, I'm surprised it didn't get more attention than it does. It's a real disappointment. The story concerns two brothers, who have been in love for years, but are unaware that the woman they marry is engaged already. There were too many things about this novel that made me give up on it, and that's when I decided there wasn't anything worth finishing about.

The battery worked fine for about 2 weeks. After that, it wouldn't hold a charge anymore. I can only use my computer if the charger is attached. I'm looking today again and see that they're now selling this same product under different brand names. If that doesn't tip you off already, don't waste your money on this. You might as well get one on ebay. There are way too many knockoffs out there now. I've had no problems with any other products in this price point. Don't fall behind Targus again.

I expected more than a series of disjointed vignettes. The author appears to have been either bored or too drunk while doing the research for this book. As others have noted, he could be writing by longhand with nothing better on his mind. There is no continuity, no narrative, no character development, just rambling accounts that are not interesting at all. Do yourself a favor - take your money elsewhere. This was money well wasted.
This model replaced one that lasted about 10 years before burning out. This new unit worked great for 11 months, then quit working.

This mouse is worthless. It does not track on my glass table and will randomly change position for no apparent reason. Also, it constantly looses battery. The cord needs to be at least 3 feet from the mouse. I would never recommend this product again or purchase from Anker. Please don't, repeat don't buy. Horrible item. Save yourself your time and money. Buy a Logitech. That was a good purchase. I hope you find this review helpful.

It was recommended to me as a resource for teaching college freshman students. The authors of this book are more interested in making money off the university system than doing their job at helping students succeed academically. Some problems and solutions are given but you have spend another 100 pages looking them up on Google. If you just want an encyclopedia with interesting topics, look elsewhere. This is not worth 99 cents. And I wish Amazon had posted my review so others don't waste their money. Buy something else. 
 Rating: 1.

I was reading the other reviews, and there seems to be an issue of sound quality with these. The reviews for all the headphones were great, so it caught my attention. When we got this vacuum at a store it was easy to put together, and worked pretty well for the first six months or so. However, the switch that turns off the brushes doesn't work so there's constant brush burning. And although it's nice having such small size, I can only clean one room before it's full. A bit disappointed. We're shopping for another new vacuum because of the above problems. The good thing is customer service from Hoover. They replaced it right away by mail.

As another reviewer mentioned, these are very nice looking glasses. They look fantastic in my cabinet. However, I don't think I'll be purchasing more of them. The glasses feel like they would easily shatter. I've dropped them, but that wasn't the reason for me to get rid of them -- someone was throwing out a plate and got glass all over it. If you're an office worker or have kids that will probably throw away your dishes, then this set might work great.

It doesn't work well without a rubber stopper at the top to keep water from flowing over if you don't have it set in a flat surface like an ordinary sink drain. We are still working on that problem. But works ok. It's large enough for our standard size sink, no issues fitting that. Seems sturdy as well. We'll see how long it lasts. One star is generous and it does not deserve to be. I bought this book at the bookstore in a hurry without reading any of the reviews. Then suddenly took an interesting twist so you wanted to find out what happened. Well except from when she did that. She was just annoying all throughout.

It has been one year since I purchased my first book on the kindle, and this by far is second to worst purchase i ever made. My husband and I have owned many pairs of Oakley glasses in the past, having always been pleased. Not this time, though. We were so excited for these glasses, but when they came in, both his lenses fell out on day one. Both sides are no longer attached, just like most other brands. Also, one side constantly fogs up! Each with their own distinct way in which they kill people, each with his specific weapon. To me, each one has very similar mannerisms from early childhood through adulthood.
For those of us who would like to know something really bad that ever happened, there are probably few authors alive whose lives we don't already know.
