This is a nice looking TV if you have access to an open store front. If you're like the majority of us and can't afford the latest models, this might be for you. If your budget is more than half what we currently have, it's probably worth looking elsewhere. The picture quality isn't very good- it feels fuzzy in many parts at times on standard definition, even though I think they're actually just slightly out of date now. It's really noticeable when there's any background noise, or dialogue coming through speakers.
These are by far the best quality and most durable dog toy I've found. I don't feel like they should be $25, but that's just me.

I bought this case when it was $15. It is absolutely amazing and does a great job with protecting your iPod! If you have any doubt about the case, then go ahead an buy it! You will not regret it. Not only that but if it's $20 or more for every other case sold on amazon, it doesn't even matter because I got mine for way cheaper! All in all, very good investment! I recommend buying the one by otterbox too. They are both great.

I expected more from the book but did not get it. It's an interesting short story about a time traveling family and their experiences with one of several future Presidents that could be elected at any time. The authors give very little to back up what they write - there is simply a statement without anything substantiating it besides the possibility someone in this past will hold office for another decade. This isn't a compelling story, rather it's just a lot of conjecture like others written by others.

There is no good information in this book. It was not very useful to me. A waste of money. Better invest your money on a more informative and well written book. I have read many books about learning and practicing meditation techniques. This one fell flat. If you want info on meditation, go ahead and pay attention. They seem like they are making the whole thing up because its what they've heard.
These aren't bad.
An interesting story, told from inside an unassuming, ordinary middle class family. The characters all have flaws. However, it's a great read. Very well written.

The first few times after installing the batteries I was pleased with performance. After a full day of shooting, however, it went completely kaput. It no longer turns on even if you tap it. You have to wait 5-10 seconds before pushing another button for it to turn on. That's ridiculous. If I were going to purchase this item again I would look around for one that works better. Especially when other reviewers mention battery dying in less than 20 minutes.

This isn't worth the money.. The plastic screen doesn't adhere to either of my iPads... I would be very embarrassed to give these as gifts. They're not even good enough for a kid. Not worth it at all!!!! DO NOT BUY!
Enjoyed this book, however, after it took me a few days to read it's hard sometimes for me to remember who is who. Would recommend
Although they take ages to dry, you feel dry afterwards. Even after hand washing with soap and/or water. These are better than other products I've tried though.

I can see there was a little more detail or description needed for some of the parts where certain pictures need to be, but for $5, I'm not complaining too much. It's exactly what it says, A collection for beginners. Great if you are new to makeup and want just enough instruction.

These headphones stopped working within a week. The left ear started producing static then wouldn't work at all. I contacted Amazon and they immediately sent me another pair. Unfortunately, the replacement pair also quit after two days. If your head is large or you have extremely sensitive ears like my wife, these might be okay with regular listening but if you plan on using them while moving about or even just sitting still don't waste your money. Even for thirty something bucks, these are not worth it. You get what you pay for.

I bought two of these for my girls (ages 9 & 6). One did not work AT ALL. The other one worked about 2 times. It was cute that both times it lit up and she loved it, but as far as durability it's a dud. Maybe we just got bad ones, but we're really disappointed! We returned the first time too, so we'll try again.....will update once I get the new one!
Got exactly what I ordered.

I tried this in my Ford F250. The car sounded like it wasn't starting, the engine blew a bit with rough idle. Then after sitting for more than 5 minutes idle, the light turned green which let me know that there was some transmission fluid squirting out. After spending hours trying to diagnose it, I finally learned from Ford's service manual that when you add ATF (anti-seize) you'll need a torque wrench.

I have never been able to use this adapter. When it first came in, we plugged and unplugged the cord but could not make any contact at all. We tried 2 different outlets with multiple outlets. My son was frustrated that he couldn't watch his dvd's on long road trips so I gave him my old adapter which works great. If you don't need anything else for your trip this would be a great product, just wish it worked.

The product description gives a very good idea of this book's overall content, but I still feel the need to address it. First off, there are no detailed drawings of any kind, nor is it particularly well structured in that sense. It would probably have been better titled "The Art & Artifice Of Painting A Car With Laser". Second, most vehicles appear to be painted with black enamel paints which has absolutely nothing on their color depth.
It works as advertised. It's very easy on my eyes.
Awesome little speaker for a small price. The sound quality is pretty good considering its size. I wish this product had better battery life but definitely worth 10 dollars :)

I enjoy this series for entertainment and it has a reasonable amount of plot to it. These aren't award winning stories, but they are enjoyable. The books get into the psyche and motives of individual characters instead of always being concerned with action. It would be nice if Ms. Auel went back beyond these novels so that she could show her readers more about their worlds. That said, do read them. It's fun reading fantasy stories set in another world where there is magic as well as humans.
Another good book - however, it was over too soon. Would like some more details about her life. All in all she does deserve 5 stars for her devotion and commitment and belief in Christ.

This was the biggest waist of money ever spent. When we hooked it up to our satellite TV in September 2011, within 6 months, the digital tuner died. We had purchased this piece through one of Amazon's marketplace sellers and after three months they would no longer exchange it. If you buy a television from your local big box store, check the warranty before purchase. They will not take anything out even with an original receipt. You have been warned!!!!

Like some of the other reviewers, I'm having trouble playing this game. The game will crash every four - five minutes. Since many others have mentioned this, I would advise you to check your video card drivers and monitor settings. After a reboot (hard reboot), it sometimes works. Sometimes if I change several settings, it's better. Bottom line, don't buy it.
I've had mine since January 2012. My wife has taken care of my iPad and it is still using it, even when we travel.
Ok if you didn't know anything prior about this topic.

These were okay, but did not last very long. I had them on my iPhone 5 for about two months, when one got scratched. It was easy enough to remove from the phone, though. And they aren't overly expensive.

This product was not the one I ordered. It did fit into my camera, but it will not activate either in sleep or on off. As soon as you put a battery in, none of these functioned. Save your money and buy something else. At least if it's expensive, it probably takes some getting used to for a replacement. For me, this is junk.

I bought this machine for a family member and she absolutely loves it! The only negative is that we ordered two sets of coffee pods so that the coffee would last longer. It has been over two weeks since our order arrived and it was not here yet! That little bit of extra time does make such a difference.! Thank you Amazon Prime! They are definitely a staple now but if they come fast - keep your mouth shut!Update. We got our machine.

I bought the Kindle version of this book thinking it would be much easier than trying with a paperback. It is not. You have take an active part just like in real life, which makes you feel that you are really there.
Very happy with my purchase - product was delivered ahead of schedule in mint condition. Great value also. Would definitely do business again :-)

I must say that this product is really hard to install without getting bubbles. After applying it with the solution provided by Marware and installing a different protector on another ipad my boyfriend did it, thinking he was doing something wrong. Well we tried again and then decided he had wasted enough time - removed all three of them. Since there were still bubbles even after using up so much of the supplied solution, ended trying to remove them one tiny piece at time. So bad results, never going back again.
The first time I used this thing, it was awesome. So easy to put together, and so easy to clean. Love the fact that you can pour in ice water from the top.

This is one of my favorite authors so I was excited to buy this book when it came out. But the ending really made me angry especially after trying to slog thru a long and arduous journey through all kinds of characters that didn't seem like people at all. None seemed real - not even anyone who had ever talked with the main character. As for her description on how she lived while writing this, it doesn't ring true. She probably lives in an old rundown basement somewhere which makes sense.

If you are a fan of this band you really should pick up the Limited Edition cd version as it has 4 live dvd's and 1 music video so all 6 shows can be watched in their entirety. It is worth every penny, I would buy anything they put out! All these Dvds include interviews with members past and present so it's definitely money well spent.

After reading the other bad review of this book, I am not sure that it was quite true for all. When you consider there is limited information out there, and especially when you think about all the things that can get done through science, engineering, and math, it's an interesting thought. Perhaps there are better books available, but if we took nothing else into account, this seems to fit in with a good part of our past knowledge.
Not much more to say really, except that this is a quality product and does exactly what it should. Highly recommended.
Very good quality and perfect fit for my Kindle Fire HDX. I've been pleasantly surprised with Amazon at how reasonably priced their products are.
I found this dvd to be very helpful. The techniques are clear and easy to follow for anyone who is a beginner or experienced.

This book was very short. The author could have added more details. She has not written other books in this series, so hopefully she will do it soon. I would say if you didn't read the first one, and just started reading her new books, go ahead. It wasn't bad. Worth a read. Just keep it short :)

The price is excellent. I would never have guessed how nice they are and the great sound quality. Definitely a good buy! We did not think we needed to replace our older speakers for something less expensive... but once you try them, you'll be happy with them. My husband loves them so much, he can even listen while he's working out in his garage without disturbing me. It makes him happy which is what counts. :)
I purchased this book for a class and the class wasn't very enjoyable. It is difficult to understand so i cannot review it well. Just not that interesting.
This product has good leather quality at an affordable price.
Arrived in less than 2 days.

I bought this book because of the ratings it received so far. After reading half of it, I'm still not sure how I feel about it. It is very short and most chapters are only 1-2 pages long. Don't bother. You can get everything you need to know on youtube. They just won't make money off an ebook for sale. This goes a long way in explaining why we don't like Amazon's Kindle format, but that's another review.
The lens takes great pictures especially the low light settings.
this is a great product. It works for 2 adults and one child as there are no issues. They love it! I would highly recommend getting this. Very sturdy.

I purchased this to charge my iphone. It can fully back the phone three times with one charge. It's good for emergencies or when your batteries can't cut it. In that aspect, it serves its purpose. However, be advised these units are not exactly water resistant. They cannot even resist splashes of water. For those reasons, I'd recommend getting them water-resistant and charging only while outside. Otherwise, it's a handy device especially in long trips where you might run out of juice before plugging in.
it says 3 inch but the one we got is 5inch. seems to be well made and a good price. would have chosen 5 instead of three if i had known

I have purchased many headphones and ear buds from other manufacturers in the past. The only ones that worked were Monster cable brand. After my purchase of a pair of Turbine Ear Muffs for $300, there is no way I would pay anything close to $400 these things are terrible. They did not fit well on my head, they just hung off because even when you adjust them it still looked like your ears had an overfull muffer. It sounded terrible as well.

This product does well to eliminate some of the odor and is supposed to help with cat urine stains in areas that cannot be treated. However, I must say that it doesn't completely get rid for this problem. We use enzyme cleaner on carpet stains. Also, it seems to cause our cats scratching more when they are sick. On a positive note, this litter clumps up fine even when there are many "extras" - so no dust mess left behind.
It's difficult to give out a rating, as I have no idea what this product does for us. So far, so good.
I love this product. My hair is not only shiny and healthy but my allergies have cleared up since started using it. A friend recommended it to me. It has worked wonders for me!

I just don't understand why anyone would rate this book better than 1 or 2 stars? It's nothing new, and there are so many great books out on the subject of "how-to-be" with little to no substance. My favorite title I've read recently is "The Magic Touch by Dr. David Wilcocks", which explains clearly what it means for you to be your magical.
This product fits as expected, the only thing missing is there nothing under the lace which makes one looks just like other underwear.

After a few uses the color did not seem to be as bright and vibrant on my teeth that I thought it should have been but with use some of them are getting brighter and brighter. As far as how well they whiten your teeth, don't try one until you see results for yourself though. All in all its an ok product compared to the rest.

The title is misleading. I expected a book about the life and times of King Richard III, and instead was disappointed. It is basically about how he lived his adult years with his wife and son. If this had been in the public domain from its original publication, it would have garnered another star. For me, though, while there were some valuable nuggets to be found throughout, when describing Richard's relationship with Edward III that added much more detail than what I'd expected, they weren't enough to make any kind of lasting impression.

I don't own this recording myself, but a close friend has the same copy and was sharing mine. He told me he couldn't find anything to complain about or criticize. If you love Mozart, don't miss this! It is very easy on the ears, relaxing music that also makes one want to stand up and dance! Just put it on, sit back, relax, have some vino (or tequila, depending on your preference), and enjoy these wonderful pieces.

I have had this blender for two years now and it has performed great. The only drawback is the speed at which you want to blend things - fast or slow sometimes doesn't matter what your blending preference is. For me that is a relatively minor thing. All in all, great value as a kitchen appliance. Highly recommend.

My daughter is a huge fan of this book, and we were so excited to get it. When she opened it with anticipation, however, I noticed the paper quality was much lower than what I had anticipated (looks like they have reduced the stock from the first printing for that reason - although not all pages are printed on a bad paper).

This is a basic unit that provides adequate capacity without any frills, and at very reasonable price. The only negative comment I have would be the lack of user replaceable battery. It can stay connected in an open situation, but not if you put it on a shelf for a few weeks, like mine did. It should either go with batteries, or make sure to mention this limitation from a beginning.

the light works great. It is very easy to install. Be advised that some wires must not have been cut correctly and will require additional length if you want it less tight. Also, there are a number of tiny screws in what you would call the ballast. Mine was missing one hole drilled so I did get around it, but be warned. The screw covers do seem secure.
So disappointing. I've never written anything negative about what she's written, until now. The character of Anna is completely unlikeable. She's shallow and selfish as can be.

For the price and quality - it is a bargain. It's been working on my Samsung TV every day for 6 months. Easy to use and works fine. Not sure if all bluetooth receivers can be this good. Only con I could think of now is: It picks up Bluetooth from other devices when I'm not near it. If it does that, then this receiver will get 5 stars. The only reason it's 4 stars is because there are some things with its functionality. It just isn't perfect....

For years I've been cutting my own hair at home. A friend introduced me to the Andis clipper and that's all it took. The clippers are light, easy to use, comfortable grip, great price point - exactly what you want in an effective haircut.

Just got my disc set a couple of days ago. It looks awesome! But, as many others have reported, several of these discs don't work. If you try to watch one, it stops in the middle, saying "region error". So I'm returning it. Amazon is great though.
This is a solid replacement part.
This unit failed with only 20 days of use - no way will I be buying from Toshiba again.

This is a really nice product. Makes it almost impossible to use paper bags. Wish I could find something similiar locally. Glad you carry this. Now if someone would create one on grocery bags, then the world will be perfect!
The Gloves did protect my hands from heat well, but when putting any pressure (pulling out hot, hard to clean items) it caused the fabric layer over your thumb ripped.

I ordered the set of two twin bed rails for my daughter's new bedroom. The description says "with included drawing" What show is this? If you don't have a dresser or headboard to put it on, then what are we supposed to say? All they did was make the frame without any kind of instructions. Then we got home and found out that no instructions came with the bed, there were none on their website.

Bought this to put some music on a 32 gig card. Works great, does the job well. The only improvement I can think of is a little on/off switch... But for 10 bucks you cant beat it. It's also very fast and easy to use. It took me just three minutes total including unpacking it from the box to being able to use it. Definitely would buy again in an instant. Especially at 10bucks!

So much for the good idea of a stainless steel can with no plastic! I was disappointed to learn that after being in use less than ten times, this plastic had begun showing and chipping on every can. It wasn't an issue before, but now it's getting worse at the seams between top handle and lid handle. Looks very bad under use. A friend told me about rubber bands used as handles. I'm glad Amazon has them because replacing it is cost prohibitive.

The color is nice and matches my decor, but there was a split down the middle/end of it. I would not recommend this product. Not worth even the cheap price. It should have cost less. Very disappointed.
A great series that can not be said for a lot of shows. It has good character development and fun story lines.

I use this in my business and at home. Love it for all over home use. Easy set up right out of box on both PCs. Batteries last quite long. Keyboard light indicator looks great at night. USB port works well with wired keyboard. Logitech's products seem to be made well. No regrets here. Well worth $100.

The product was packaged very nicely and arrived on time. It only took me about an hour to complete changing out the lamp myself with no help from me. I would definitely recommend purchasing this replacement lamp. Very easy. Worth every penny. Fast shipping. Thanks! =)
I love this product. Great product at a reasonable price. A must buy for the home. These filters come in handy year round. Thank You.
No way they are up there with the O'Reilly books. While it is difficult reading because of lack of organization, but if you need an example you should know how large that is.

Bought it and used for a few days to watch TV....nothing too fancy or anything......until one day the screen started making this 'buzzing' noise, which is like you getting sick when using your computer.....if u turn off all the peripherals from ur computer then shut down ur pc. Then what do ya know???? It never turns on again!!!!!!! I checked my power supply and..... nope, not working. What else can happen during powerup?....
It's actually kind of fun.
As with others here, many people have found this game entertaining and easy to play. My experience isn't as good, in regards to enjoying it.

I know that it is the nature of these types of programs to have one or two bad programs, but this was an obvious attempt for a quick buck. The characters are poorly drawn and unlikeable, particularly his female counterpart. My advice would be save your time on this one. Do not waste yours. Even though it's only about 20 minutes long I'll never watch again without skipping parts. It really does not make you want to.

I liked the idea of being able to take them off when they aren't in use. But it only lasted a couple days and then one by one the "fingers" fell off. The magnets were also not strong enough even though there was extra glue provided for attaching them. You can go spend more for ones with better construction if that's important but I'm just an average home owner who didn't run around with my hands full all day. Too expensive for what you get.
Good product, it met my expectations.
The author gives an excellent introduction in his book, "How To Start College Calculators.

the book gave much of this information in my school books. I was hoping it would be more informative. My professor said not to buy it, she said everyone already knows most if the info. Glad mine class is only a semester long!
Movie takes you on an exciting ride where little girls are trying to save her life during zombie apocalypse! Definitely was entertaining.

This is a cheap knockoff - no doubt they made money. Please don't buy this product as I did in addition to the one that comes with kindle. It does nothing at all and only lights it up by going into sleep mode..its worse than useless... waste of money for sure!
This item could be better if there were more magnetic features. The magnets in these pads tend to come unattached from each other. There must have been an idea with this product before selling it.

I bought these hoping to get a good audio quality but was very disappointed. For an earbud of this price one would expect the sound at least not be bad. And even for my $8 Sony headphones they are way better. I do like that it's adjustable. But over all very disappointing. I'm going back with the iPod regular ear buds.
This author has set up her story for what appears in each book.

The product was defective right out of the box. It wouldn't take a charge. I plugged it into my computer to try charging but got "Not charging" flashing on it. I ordered another battery from this company and that one arrived quickly after ordering which has been fine. I've had no problems with any other Anker products so I'm hoping the replacement they send works for me. For now just getting by until Amazon finds me a new replacement is fine though.

Great action movie, great characters, a solid cast, well-developed story line, just fun to watch. The only thing that prevented me from giving them 5 stars was at about 20 minutes before the final scene - the script writers threw in something unbelievable (which doesn't happen so much this day). Worth watching.

Very cute and fun to listen too. However, after 3 days some of the letters started disappearing completely. Disappointed! I am returning. Don't waste your money. The toy is too expensive. For an alphabet toy, it should be more durable.

I did not know what to expect for the price but it turned out great. The leather appears very high quality. As always, a little difficult on install. You need two people and patience so make sure you have both before buying. Other than that, it's beautiful. Well worth it!
If you are looking to buy this just stop here. There is NO new music nor remains...

Good quality and fast delivery. Love this case, even when it is new. But, after two months of use one of the corners that holds the tablet in place started falling out slightly. For the price, that's ok. No complaints.

Bought this about a year ago, but just opened today. It was packed in a box almost too small, the lid of that small box, fell off and I am not an engineer. Upon taking it out - there are three huge dents inside one corner. In addition, both hinges that hold the filter top cover down (the plastic part on top) were cracked. The handle has been bent inward so that no longer holds water. No way to return it. Just junk.
If you need one, this is exactly what you want. Nothing more needs to be said. And it's made here in America.

I bought these thinking they would be good because of the price. The first time using them only three out nine didn't work. Then when I got more then one, a few worked for about two days, and all became useless. Very disappointed that there wasn't anything in each pack. Not even 1 star is enough to get this review.
Great buy at a very fair price. I love this product. Works perfectly, and looks great on my phone. Recommend it highly.

I was looking for a good replacement phone - this fit the bill. Works just as well with Vonage or our old Ooma system - only slightly lower quality sound but you can't beat it for $19.95 per month! Good value & worth it. I'd buy again...
I love this product it met all expectations! I've never thought of buying such a thing before, however I'm going to purchase another one. Thank you again!!!!!

While the book has some interesting facts that can be difficult to put into practice in everyday life it is just one opinion of where we as a species are headed. I was hoping for more discussion on what to focus our effort and time on. Maybe someday when he has kids they will understand better why this world cannot continue. This was an ok read, especially if you are at all interested in survival or environmental matters. I wanted more.
These were a waste of money. They would be ok to keep the bugs away during a zombie apocalypse but are very cheap for how inexpensive they are! You get what you pay for!

I'm a bit shocked at some of the negative reviews for this CD. I have been listening to Sarah McLachlan for years and this is her best work as a singer. It certainly took me several listens but she managed to perfect herself in every aspect...songwriting, instrumentation, performance, everything that could go wrong. One person was complaining that it didn't sound like Sarah's style. In fact, there are no "styles of music" on her records. They're all about making an emotional connection with the listener.

I cannot be more disappointed in the product. Upon receiving it one screw was missing from the base and could not use it. After installing it, found out 2 of the screws that hold the head to the post were also missing. Now I have a stand with several very noticeable holes but no screws. Not even worth returning for such a small purchase, would look at this in person before buying.

If there is a better game than this i dont know about it. You can buy it off ebay for under ten bucks. the graphics are as poor as you would expect for such an old game. But that's what games used to be like when computers were first released 20 plus years ago in fact. The story has no plot, and takes about 10 hours of your time just simply walking between each mission at all times. So save yourself some money and pick up something different.

I only read 25% of this book. It was so hard for me to read. I'm still trying but I find the characters so immature that by chapter 50 or so, my head is spinning and it feels like reading a script written about teenagers, with no adult character involved. If you can make it through, that's fine. As for me, it's in the recycling bin. My husband thinks it's cute just to watch the kids run around acting crazy.

I was using two previous digital thermometers to read the temperatures of meat which only had a dial temperature with an indicator light. The second time I used this product it made my cooking life so easy and accurate. It is important we have accurate instructions for good cooking. The reason why people are having difficulty setting up your device by following the directions on how long the light should remain on is because you must first press and hold both buttons in order then step down past zero.

I wish someone had warned me before buying this. Not only did the author have no idea where to begin with basic cooking basics, she failed at every turn after even beginning to write. Instead of giving helpful advice or a recipe for any type of meat (chicken, pork etc) but rather throwing in some completely random information that may just as well be taken from an online dating site.
We loved this coffee table, especially for Christmas time.

The main problem is that the first unit was defective. I received a replacement which worked well for about 6 weeks before it died as well. This will be my last purchase from this company. They make a good product and if they can get their quality control issues sorted out then maybe their customer service will improve.
If someone wanted me interested, they could write about my life for me, but first let me know why people are interested.....

This is not a bad book. But, there was no reason for me to buy it, or even open it. I would have loved some photos of the actual buildings. That said, this book will be useful just as my other architectural reference books I've bought in the past. In fact, these are all from the same publisher. There is, however, another way to view what should otherwise appear like a very poor photo book, namely by looking at it through an artist's eye.

I bought this with great anticipation based upon favorable reviews. However, when it arrived, the battery pack does not fit properly in my Canon 40D. The plastic end cap fits very tightly, and the two halves don't line up, meaning that there is a gap of an inch either side on one side. To add insult to injury, it doesn't work. It was charged at least five times before using, so I'm positive it's fully charging correctly.

Not quite as I hoped it would be - the fabric wrinkles terribly and doesn't look well at all... don't recommend for anythign but decoration in an office or bedroom. You definitely can't count on this being even usable. In addition, while all of the buttons are very soft to touch, there's a little edge that you feel every time when typing or pressing them. A very poor design. If you're looking for real protection against anything harder than dirt, water, etc., not worth it.

The product description clearly says these will work with an RX680 or a 550EX II flash for the Canon 5d3, but there is no way that they will. They are not correct. You don't attach them and slide on their little retaining clips, you stick 'em on!It's like putting stickers on something then slapping it down. I was so disappointed in this. Now to start over from square one I have to find another adapter, which will also cost more money.

Got this because it was cheap. First of all, the cord is not long enough to even put my computer at an angle. On top if that, when I try and angle it, nothing makes contact, so only one side can work. Definately a waste of money.

I bought this product in mid November. Worked fine when you put a flash drive on it, but the next day it is dead. No power,nothing, no light. Doesn't matter what usb port or hard drives, it doesn't work. I'm returning it. Stay away. If they are still around buy something from NewEgg. But be sure to check that before you plug anything in. The item may not fail after one week, and the company is very nice to work with.

The story of the rise and fall of an amazing man who loved to sing, dance and play. I especially like that Billy was able to come out looking great after his surgery. This guy had a tremendous gift that unfortunately would be passed on only with many health problems. I'm sure he will touch your life in some way. He is missed. God Bless you Rick!
So many places to store that are not on your fridge. This allows you to put whatever type of beverage it may be. A good idea for those who love and drink tea.
My sons IPhone 5 did not receive any protection from this case.
Easy quick replacement for my old filter. Works as it is supposed to. I am impressed with this product and will purchase another if needed. It was also not expensive!!!!

This book was written as a journal entry, or diary-this is not my favorite. It seems like most of the dialogue comes from a man's voice--to be fair, I have read works by women authors with similar, more masculine approaches to their writing. Many times, it just feels that I'm being told what someone else thinks than seeing things through both character's eyes for me. The overall theme in this story was good though.
After waiting over three weeks, finally received 2 days ago. Neither side works, which means unless you use your fingers to remove back cover it's useless. Do NOT waste time or money as i did.
Works great, looks great too. Seems to be tough enough, fits well. A good price and it came quickly. Very satisfied.

I can't stress how disappointed in this album. All tracks are very bad remixes from the original versions that sound horrible! The only good song on here is "You Look Good In My Shirt" otherwise your money is wasted unless you want to listen to people with terrible voices.

When her husband dies, she is left with nothing aside from debts from his large art collection. This is only the beginning for her. A new man arrives in town. His name is Matthew McCade. She has never met him, except by chance at work, but he comes along while she's working because his uncle owns the house.

I have an Acer Aspire 5610b. The battery is about 1.5 times as thick on the right side (maybe 1/8") so when sitting with it open in my lap (or almost laying flat against something), the power cord will not allow a connection. Also, one of two batteries has stopped working within a little over six weeks. My initial thought was that this thing wasn't making good contact between it's charging prongs and laptop port, but then after removing it, i saw why they couldn't connect properly.
Good price. Has been in use now for several years. No complaints. Would definitely order again. Used on a 2006 Chevy Blazer ZJ.
It's a little smaller than what I was expecting but it is still pretty. I've been getting compliments on it!

This was a gift for me. Not worth the money you get it for. I bought one like this at Toys R Us with all of the accessories and games for $15 dollars. This is the only game that comes with it. It has an extra controller, so if your child loses it they don't have to buy one, but as far as the camera goes, it's not good. It's basically just a toy camera! The pictures are blurred, which isn't good, since its supposed to take decent pictures.

I was never able to successfully mount this device. There were no instructions or troubleshooting guides, despite claims in the product description that there would be. The card reader itself is of very poor quality. Also, it's made entirely from plastic, not metal. For those who want a small USB 2.0 flash memory, but don't necessarily need it attached to your computer, this might save them money and frustration. I'm giving my copy away as soon as the manufacturer fixes these issues or sells me something equivalent.

It really helps to make a big pot of coffee at the first crack. The only issue is the filter holder does not fit well and you must keep adjusting it. However, this is a minor issue. I have always used a French Press so I'm use to that. This works great. It doesn't take up much space either. Just what I needed. And, you don't need paper filters.

this is very good. I am a big fan of the old shows and it brings me some good memories. thanks Amazon for helping to maintain my childhood on prime time. no complaints from me...just love the classic show..:) :-) :)

We had an inexpensive "throw away' water station before, with very poor quality parts. That was until we got these. Well worth it! Solid construction, nice and heavy, easy assembly. What they need is more design options for watering options.

I like the features of this product, and it takes nice long videos, but mine broke about 4 months after purchasing. The camera died while in use. Don't buy it. Pay a little more to get one that will last. Just didn't work long. It was used only once a week. We bought our first Lorex cam last summer from Walmart for around 40 bucks - worked great until last Christmas when we took it with us on vacation.

The batteries are not good as Sony brand. They don't hold charge long enough to even use them after fully charging. If you just want cheap replacements then they may work for you. Just know there were times when I had to use the regular OEM batteries.

A friend of mine has this CD and said "it was so good I had to get it". I heard one song from him the other day, just in time for Christmas - a bit like Neil Diamond on valium. The arrangements are great, the musicianship excellent. It's nice to see them playing with an electric guitar rather than some pedal steel or banjo. Buy it! Even if you're not into bluegrass music, you will still love it. If your friends don't like it, tell 'em what they're missing.

Just what was needed this summer. I have my own deck & it's nice to sit outside in the sun instead of inside. It took a while before it got hot enough for all 4 children to be comfortable but they finally were and didn't want out. They can see me from the pool area and say hi when we are out for lunch. Seems sturdy so far. Also like that even with being on an island it is waterproof.
Item worked well. Price good. Fit as it should. It will take some time for the rain season to start here in Ohio.
Very happy with product.

The item I received was defective to the point that it could not get any power at all. I'm returning it for a refund. The light on this item appeared dim when plugged in. After switching USB ports, Windows failed to recognize anything connected via USB.
Not very good - cheap plastic-like feel to it. The whole thing feels so cheap. I would spend a little more and get something worth while. And I know you'll only pay me once though. ;-)

Purchased as used - it is perfect, works for me just fine, the only downside or negatives i could find are that there isn't many available cases out yet that fit with it, although plenty were made before they got in stock.

i love this product, the picture really shows how nice it actually is. It looks very elegant and would be easy to clean if needed.

The instructions for making baby blankets are completely out of date, having been published by Goodwill, not Eeyore. Some suggestions include using your fingers as a blanket, which was never accepted when I got married over twenty years ago.

I really liked the story. It was very good. The action is fantastic and kept me reading until late into the night. What bothers me, which might be specific to my purchase, is that there were a few spots where there were sentences missing some letters. These are small problems but they do bother me.

After reading several good reviews on this, we selected one of them. We have found that this works well if you use a remote extender (we purchased a Panasonic model) about 1/2 mile from the repeater. That's the place where reception is most affected by interference.

This is an excellent product when you use in the oven. It makes it possible to cook casseroles and other dishes that take a long time to bake. And my favorite baked bean recipe turns out even more delicious using this pan. I put some water in each cup just before adding baking soda, which eliminates clumping, and then add my batter. It bakes up perfectly all around - no big globs of liquid left over. The pan heats evenly also, without getting hot spots anywhere.

This product did not show much of a "scents" when using it. It smelled like regular soap! I would never buy this again! In addition, the package was completely destroyed. Not as good a book - in my opion. The idea is interesting but the story line didn't really hold any interest for me. It was very predictable.

I had a great little vacuum for about 10 years but it finally died. My boyfriend bought me a Christmas tree, but not one album or DVD. So this will go perfectly along with it!. And now I've been able to get around the house listening to these amazing songs! :)

This was not a waste of time or money. The story kept me interested page after page, and in this economy, as I'm aware, it's important to read well if you want to succeed. I found the book engaging enough that when it ended last night, on day 4, I felt like having just had a coffee. Well done..

This book was interesting and informative! I love how the author incorporated real history into it. I'm so inspired by the characters in this story! How strong women were! I would definitely recommend!It took me a while to get through it because I had trouble following all of her names with the historical information. But, overall, good book! :)

I used this drive less than an hour before it completely broke. After that brief use the USB connection would not acknowledge anything. There was almost no vibration when inserting it into my laptop, there is a slight humm in the plastic housing as well. All of this with very low use. My laptop cannot properly power on without this unit plugged in. Obviously it's just poorly made. I'm sending mine back for a refund. Do yourself some favor, spend your money elsewhere. Or better yet, move to another manufacturer.

I love this juicer!! I've had it for over a year now and it's still going strong. The only real complaint that I'm hearing from people is the noise. As far as loud, if you want it to be quiet, plug in your own speakers. It's noisy but easy on my lungs :) When using it outside, though, make sure that all windows are closed because the thing will produce some wind noise. You can put so much juice into one batch of veggies with 2 lemons or 1 lemon.
Don't buy this. It's cheap junk. Mine doesn't work at all. This junk cost $7. At least that's what you can get.

They were not as expected. I bought them to wear them on a cruise in January - thought the colors would be great and they werent. I wore them, then found it hard to tell what color is what. So returned them. Very disappointing.
The cups are just really big. If you love tea these will work great. Don't expect to use with any other cup but tumbler. My friend used hers as coasters! They did come in on time though.

This is the worst book on personal finance that I have ever read. I would recommend this book to those with no economics background! Nothing new here. Buy Michael Lewis' books instead. The advice given by Mr. Kiyosaki are similar in nature but much superior.
Not for a small dog. They last longer, have more color options. But they might be OK if the medium was a little bit bigger for my puppy.

It was a good read, but not one of my favorite from this author. If you like a sweet story that leaves you feeling happy about the characters then it's for you, I personally am looking to read more from this author and hope another book will be in there. ;)
Exactly as it should be!!!!
This would probably be a better product if I could put down the paper to print it with. Not as easy to use and messy because you have to cut off your own page in order to print.

This works with my Keurig K-cup coffee brewer, but does make weak brew due to size being reduced. Does allow for stronger cup though. Also holds 36 standard cups. I don't drink more than 12 cups at one sitting, so this seems ideal.
i thought this would last forever considering it's only $7 for two dollars of plastic, but within ONE WEEK both tabs were broken rendering them completely useless.

The game is a good way to enjoy some of the classics like Monopoly. It's fun and allows for better strategic planning which results in longer lasting play. I love it but wish there were more than three houses per round instead of only two. Also, would work well with up to 8-players. I'd recommend it.

I was very dissapointed. Not only are the colors not at all what you see on screen, they don't even fit right to begin with! They were pretty and my sister loved them, but had I known that she would have ordered a different set. You can find better sheets for cheaper!
I have just started listening to this music and it is great! This should be considered a classic in the future. Great sound quality.......highly recommended!

We gave this book to my 3 children ages 12 to 7 and they loved it. It was very funny with little lessons in each page. They really like how the pictures have a color theme. Very creative! It's definitely worth buying!

This product does not do what it says - which has to be some kind of scam... I would return it, but it's too late. Do NOT waste your money on this product! If you are looking for something that ACTUALLY WORKS; go with a Dr. Scholl product. They work great!!

I have been using this product for a few months now with no problems. Great product. Use it in my car and home chargers. Have recommended to others who purchase these. Works great and price is great. Good service by Amazon as always shipped fast.

There is no way to screw this into our ceiling without a separate adapter. Don't waste your money on this. Get something that just plugs and unplugs. This will don'thing but cause problems. DO NOT BUY.

I just finished listening to this whole album. All you have left is to sit back and say what an outstanding album it is, and feel better about yourself in the process. At two hours long (which for me, means one heck of alot), you're going to forget very quickly that every song on here could easily fit onto a single cd. And no, I don't want any more music from these guys but all their other albums.
Good for when I needed a more portable option. Can mount with the base on or off very easily. Does not come off. Sturdy enough.

I was surprised this didn't come to mind. The audio and video are not even close to HD quality. It is a total rip off. I've seen better in grade school productions. This also happened with part three.
I have never written any item review before.
Purchased as a gift in December 2011. I've not heard anything negative from my mom or dad about it.

I got this for a friend and she hasn't used it since the day I gave it. She said that it does not keep things hot enough. I don't know how to tell if it's too small but you would think for $90 they could've made a bigger thermos.

It sounded like it would be interesting, but was not. The book starts with a murder at an old friends house just as a new friend turns up one day. They are joined by the new guy who seems to be having too much fun. By accident or design they end up in more trouble than ever. A great cast of characters makes for lots of laugh-out-loud moments and many of them seem real people you'd want to know.

The only good thing I can say is it's really cute and would make a great gift for any little girl. Unfortunately mine arrived broken so my review might not be accurate on the item. It did come in its own package though.

i saw this movie when it originally came out and wanted to see again as I enjoyed it so much. Very entertaining, the end kinda leaves you hanging though?? It is a must see-movie!!! Highly Recommended!!:)

It doesn't stay connected or charge my phone. It's a waste of time and money but i guess thats what you get for cheap. I hope the next one stays connected. If not, I"ll be asking for a refund again. No stars at all! Very disappointing, was looking forward to having it! =/. Hopefully someone can fix it in their review.

I will make sure to read all of the 5 star reviews before buying anything this seller sells. These batteries are total crap. Do not buy, they suck. They last about half as long as a real Nikon OEM battery.

Also, my old adapter, while being much more compact, didn't get hot as soon as it's plugged in. It may just be defective, or maybe this model was designed to break fairly quickly. Either way I'm disappointed. :(

This case is nothing more than a skin for an iphone 4. Nothing more, nowhere less. You can pay $20 on eBay for anything that would be as functional. As said before, don't waste your money. I've had mine since early December & it's already showing signs of discoloration.

As per my order history:1 - Received the battery as ordered2 - Plugged in charger plugged into an outlet3 - Turned on camera and immediately it said that "charging is not supported for this item." The charge status didn't change.4 - Changed batteries back to original Panasonic battery/charger5 - Placed new batter pack in6 -Took a picture with flash ON & OFF while pressing the shutter button.

After searching for weeks to find a vacuum that would do the job, I ended up with this one. This is my fourth canister vacuum. And by far, it does much better at getting pet hair and debris out of carpet than either other previous ones did. The big disadvantage is how loud it is. It's very noisy. The noise level can't be ignored. If there's some sort of "air vent" somewhere near it, it's probably doing nothing. Also, if you don't empty it, every little bit helps.

They worked well for one month but with a puppy that bites things they probably aren't made to withstand him chewing and chewing. Also my dog's mouth is too small so it was kind of painful she didn't like them as much because her teeth were trying to pop out from behind the bandanas.

As a lover of this book for years I would say it's great if the content is as well organized and written but to me it just wasn't what i was expecting from such an important figure. There are other biographies out there that do a better job explaining some aspects about his life and times so you may want to hold off on buying this one until you know which version you're looking for. It doesn't tell all there is.

If you love the sound of these speakers, you'll be very happy with this purchase! For me personally, I like a little more "clean" sounding. I'd give them 5 stars if they were just slightly larger for my tastes. These were made to put on your desk and use only occasionally, which is fine, by me, but there are reviews that said something about them being loud, even when used indoors. Not only is very easy to install by just using the simple template (template.png). But the item itself feels solid on wall, has adjustable shelves which actually are pretty helpful when putting bottles in. However, do have 2 minor complaints.

This product is a joke! The quality of this product, even with all the extra features and software, looks like it was created in someone's basement. I sent it back right away. What makes me suspicious though is that I'm not the only one who has received defective products from Amazon. When you consider how much these players cost, they should work correctly. My wife purchased the player for me, so we could see movies on trips. From what I've seen, everything works great, as long as you're lucky.

I was excited to get an mp3 player like my friends have... but mine started having problems within a couple of weeks so i returned it and got a refund. You can buy these in stores which i did when it stopped working. the only reason you would want this is for people who are on their phone all day then have access to internet or music at work. Otherwise it's not worth spending money on. :(

This was my daughters favorite when we were little girls (it's how she learned to walk). Now that we're grown, she finds these songs just as fun now (she said "it's a bit slow but at least they're singing!" We sang them along with her every day for months afterwards.
Great price, great fit, and easy to clean. Just a hair too short for the entire top of my SUV, but I can buy some additional hooks at any hardware store so that won't be an issue.

It was one of the best Christmas presents I have ever received. My grandsons were able to use it with little adult supervision because they love it so much. They loved using it. Good for any age group - great exercise.

This is a great cd from the first time I have listened to it. The songs are great. What can you say about someone with such talent. Great CD that you will love! It does not get any better than this. BUY IT! Thank You!

I bought this case for my Canon Power shot S2IS, a very small digital camera. The description says it is the "smallest," but that was not true at all. This unit barely fits in that tiny case, so if you were to buy it for an S2IS you better have no bigger than a 5 or 6 year-old compact camera? If so, get something else. You can fit your camera & all its attachments inside but it's hard work getting them out of the case.

No matter what you do this protector will create bubbles that won't go away. After placing all 3 sheets as instructed nothing works on any part of screen. The company has tried to help over phone but doesn't seem to work. Do yourself a favor and pay $23 for an Invisible Shield instead.

I ordered these earphones in February and was excited to get them. They sounded really great -- clear sound with good bass - but when the first one failed after two months, Amazon didn't replace it. It took them three weeks and many phone calls before they finally sent a replacement. The replacement pair lasted five months. When it failed, Amazon's support department asked me to send back, again at my expense. Finally, amazon refunded me, minus $18. This is very poor service from Amazon.

This book is in the same vein of many other self-help books that include a little bit spirituality and more into making money. I found it to be interesting enough, but not enough depth for me. It was nice at times when you feel like you've been on an extended vacation with no place or people where you're at. You don't get attached too much to any particular character which makes this easy to put down, if that's your thing.

A little bit bigger than my phone not snug fit on the phone, just falls off in you hand. It did come from Hong Kong but that doesn't bother me. The company could have done better by including what is pictured, a clear protector film so your phone's screen would be free of finger prints.

It's not a bad product, just doesn't fit the tablet I have. The seller was good to deal with so at least that's one positive. If you have an Acer A500 - this will NOT fit. Be careful when ordering. Maybe they should change it on their website and/or put "Not recommended for A500s" in big bold letters! At any rate, it's going back and we haven't decided if we're going to get the exact same case in another color.

Good cover that brings memories back. It was delivered in excellent condition at a very reasonable cost as well. I'd recommend it!
Best priced, best designed screen protector to date. Easy application, no bubbles, and a little time for you get used to removing the final tabs.
great quality...looks like picture. my son wears it everyday for dance class..even sometimes at church. super comfortable...love it.. recommend buying!!.

Interesting story. It had an unexpected ending. Made you wish there could actually still be. Good historical fiction. Read it.
It could be easier to use but it works. The quality of the glass is good, I am very satisfied with this product.

We read an excerpt of the book and liked it but not as much I was hoping. The author is a young writer and she writes well. You really don't learn enough about someone before you know them much. In this case, we need to see more character details than just her parents and their jobs. They seem like good people. She also tells me she's thinking of writing more books. So it's possible that there will be more. This novel could have been done better.

If you're familiar with the author's previous work, You Should Be Married and Why Women Love it I highly recommend reading that book first. The premise here is about what women (and men... in general) love most (sex). There are a couple of laughs and one hot sexual scene (but not enough to keep this book/series from being considered erotic) - nothing really original or groundbreaking but still fun.

I was looking for a product that would enhance the performance of my aging Bose speakers, and did some research before finally purchasing this pair. For about $200, it is an excellent bargain. The sound quality in general has improved dramatically -- these headphones are not quite as full bodied sounding (the bass does NOT produce as much sound), but they do more than enough to make them worth considering even though they're priced relatively highly.
We thought this product was good at first but after using the products for a while we now don't notice any difference. Not sure if I would recommend it to family and friends.

These were purchased to replace a broken power adapter. When plugged in they don't even blink an LED. Completely useless. If this happened once, wouldn't be worth returning, but more than one time seems to mean something isn't right. Will never go through CyberGuys again.

This product is okay, not great. The main problem I have with it are the small pieces of plastic hanging off it. Just a couple more centimeters in width and that would be an issue. But at least it's lightweight so that's something. It definitely needs improvement. Maybe make them larger or thicker for better protection. If possible, put some cardboard inside to add cushioning on those corners. Then you might get away from having any sharp plastic! Otherwise its OK. It's just not worth anything more.
Good product! It looks very nice in the kitchen. Easy to put together, well packed. The wood is finished nicely and it was packaged well. Highly recommended! Thanks Amazon!
Great bag. If you want something lightweight yet sturdy for an everyday bag, then look elsewhere.

If you love your dogs this is the perfect thing to give them! My husband likes to keep on eye it so he will be eating his breakfast in bed now! I don't recommend this book. Its more for kids under age 10, but my son read it in a day and was bored with the book very quick. He is 10. It's good from that perspective. Nothing like the other two books by her where he saves people. At least they are a little exciting. It isn't horrible though.

I have a Toshiba 15.6" laptop that fits perfectly in this bag. However, you CANNOT put the power cord for the Laptop in the bag while it is inside your carry case, as others will not allow that to be done. This leaves only one option, placing the cord out of site and just carrying the case by itself. That means there isn't much padding, so if it's dropped too hard things aren't protected.

The charger is a huge disappointment!1. It doesn't put out as much voltage the way that it should, and it's not always possible to get any results when using it.2. It's bulky compared with other chargers I've used. Also, I had hoped that for an induction charger, the plug would just lay down behind things, but instead you have to twist it around each time you want to use it.

What a great, simple little device! It holds my iPod Nano perfectly. My phone fits and I can fit it in there so it's super handy! Great price for such an incredibly useful item. A must have if you're into running.

Don't waste your money! This seems like a product that has been photocopied and pasted onto an original copy. The pages are very pale white with several different types of text. Nothing is black or grey.

Since receiving my 2nd bag from Amazon I've been really pleased. The chicken has lots more flavor and seems slightly darker than the first bag. Although I'm not 100% sure how much, I'll probably be buying more. Also noticed recently was an issue mentioned by another reviewer.
I love these bottles. They work really well while out and about. So much better then the plastic ones that I tried out. Plus they are not expensive!

The story was an OK one to watch on a snowy and freezing day outside. Not as spectacular or fun to view as, say, Lord of the Rings - Return of the King. However, it does help pass time.

The book is one of the most amazing stories that I have ever read and it gave me a much deeper appreciation for what my grandmother went through. She did not come home from WWII as an old woman but rose to her own self confidence and had many dreams of being an author. It has always been said in our family that no matter how rough your life is, you will be able to get through it!! Our faith helped us keep going.

I really did not like this novel. The description had the potential to be good. However, it just doesn't deliver. Not sure what happened here. It starts out slow, and a little boring, but then takes off with some good action. Then you get to have fun in exotic locations (I hope....). But the ending is sooo predicatble, its almost insulting that no one else got it. Very unsatisfying! This author seems to be trying for something big on her next book.

This book was a bit disappointing in that the characters did not show true feelings towards one another. That just didn't ring true. The two leads went from bad to worse and I finally tired of reading about how much hot sex they had. It only makes you hope for something else - like real love.

This book was an absolute disappointment. A waste of money. Don't believe me? Read what the top reviewer says in her review section. She basically sums up my experience. I'm glad this one is free with Prime shipping- I'll be deleting it from my kindle fire and getting some good reading for free: "The Complete Idiot's Guide to Creating a Healthy Emotion-Free Life." 
 Rating: 1.

Was having trouble with my dog throwing up from stomach problems, this was the only thing that would work. However, my two Pomeranians are 11 years old and I have not noticed any difference. Well written, easy to read. Interesting book on an interesting subject. This is my only review, so I'll let you know that this will be my last one.

One thing about movies is that they make a lot of noise and no one seems to mind. In the case of The Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes, we all did. This item looked great, however, once I received it, it became extremely dirty. Also, there was an obvious mark on the comforter at one end.
i got this item because its small, compact, very simple and..well easy enough for anyone who wants it...

I ordered this book because the description said "paperback cover", but it is actually paper cover. The photo shows a beautiful blue cover with bright color. All I've got here are dark gray pages. If you're looking for a nice soft bound book, you'll have to look elsewhere. This isn't worth $27. I'll probably order books from somewhere else that won't be advertised as used when they are. I'm pretty disappointed. It wasn't cheap enough for me not to return.
It was great. The only downside is that in a very cold winter wind it blew over with the top of my truck sticking out more than I wanted but otherwise it's pretty cool.
I purchased this specifically because it didn't have a handle. The description said dishwasher safe but when you put some water in, the top handle gets hot.

A lot of reviews said this was going to be a great movie so I couldn't wait for it to arrive in the mail. When one finally did arrive,I sat down and put on an old worn out VHS tape copy hoping that all would work out. Unfortunately I'm getting tired if doing that. The story line is good but that's about it. It wasn't what I like seeing when watching these type of movies though. Some people may really enjoy them. They sure weren't my best choice.
These bulbs are great.

This book is not about making money so much as it is a whodunit. It is poorly written, boring, and just plain dull. I finished the book, but only because I kept thinking something would happen to get me interested. If you are looking for some good, realistic advice on business, read "Rich Dad, Poor Dad," instead. The difference in those books was night and day. I'm embarrassed by this book. It's really too bad. Mr.

Not very pleased with this product. The first one I received didn't turn on, so for the second one, it would not even power up. I'm returning them both...at least Amazon is easy to do this. It took only 2 days from ordering until they arrive....Thanks Amazon!! They don't even deserve a star!!!

I bought this unit for my girlfriend for Christmas. Since she has a Honda Civic it had the perfect fit in her car. However, while we were driving down the highway on Dec 21st (about 20 mi.) it was raining out and she kept taking the Garmen. The weather radio showed up but didn't work. We decided to stop at various rest areas along way and there went our garmin. It turned on, then off again. This happened about 7 times... before she finally gave up.

My wife and I gave up on the author early on. The writing reads like a high school student's creative project. Not enough character development and plot was just an excuse to go back in time while he describes what our heroine is feeling. And then there are some major editing issues. This will be my first "freebie...I shouldn't' buy it! Too much 'filler' material not developed well. It could've gone a lot better...

The book was in excellent condition and I received it within the allotted time frame. Thank goodness because it's my daughters bible study book. They just don't seem to like it, perhaps they are not old enough yet. May get a better response next time. Thanks, Judy Ann Walker

This is nothing you need unless you're doing light duty to start with. It's all cheap plastic and I don't even know if it's strong enough for that. The key chain is also pretty cheap. My daughter always brings her tea sets wherever she goes. She loves being able to fill them up just like mommy when in restaurants.

They really have ruined it. I'm glad I got this book when it was free. What a disappointment. All the main characters, even John Carter, seem shallow and unlikable. The story line is too predictable. If you want good sci-fi, try Gene Wolfe, but don't be fooled by Michael Swanwick's reputation.

This is a fantastic item. It does it all!! You can charge any of your USB-chargeable devices. I am happy that the adapter will fit almost all products using USB (cameras, phone etc).One very minor complaint is one small hole is cut in the tip so you can`t plug other devices and to open it up with out taking off theprotective cap. But overall it`s great. I use mine for my phone, camera, GPS as well as external HDD.
I haven't used it yet, but the delivery on its arrival was very good. It's a handy tool to have in ones car or home. I just need enough time to use it.

I was so disappointed in this book because my 9 year old son asked me to read it over a weekend and said the same things that other reviewers have said. For instance, on pg 11 he quotes an anonymous girl as being "so pretty". Really? That sounds like someone who has no idea what "cool" or "in" are, but that's another issue. On p. 5 there is a picture of two girls with blue hair and blue eyes holding hands.

I find the information here very helpful. The author gives a good summary of how you should prepare for an exam. However, he lacks one thing. It is completely lacking in detail. For instance,he describes two scenarios on different exams with no particular detail or discussion. If you go back and review each exam question after reviewing this book it looks like you were doing most of them. But then when all was said and done, many parts didn't even apply to my test.

This product works flawlessly with my Windows XP and OS X - just plug it in a USB port or use the included software. The print quality is very good and I am quite satisfied at this price. I've been using refilled cartridges for about 2 years now from various sources but found that most of the time, ink dries up within 1-2 weeks time when you refill them. These re-manufactured cartridges are great to buy, they don't leak as far as I'm aware and work perfectly.

My wife has read all of DeMille books since they were first released and have loved them all. I too had the same experience with "The Lion's Game" This was a complete waste of time in which to read. If he doesn't do these novels right we will not buy another book by him. We will wait until his next one comes out. Very disappointing.

No wonder the title is misleading. This CD and DVD only covers a short period of time in their lives. They don't talk about what happened to them after leaving this cult. One reviewer stated that she had become depressed while she was going through it. I am sorry, but anyone who has depression knows first hand how painful it can be. It takes years for many people even to get over mental illness and/or substance abuse.

I'm sure they are great headphones, but the product I got was defective. The sound went out on one side when plugged into my Sony MP3 player, and then stopped working altogether. Very disappointing! Sending back.

This book was horrible! The first chapter starts off good and has great charachter development. I thought the rest of the book would be like it. The second chapter is great. And don't even get me started on why they were planning on going at all, except for the fact it's easy money. Just very un-likable.

The second time I charged the original battery it swelled up like a balloon. Did not hold charge well at all. It never quite got to 100% charge. Very bad experience for me. Going back today and buying an original.

A good read if you are looking for a light sci-fi read. The book is well-written, and the characters believable. I would recommend this to all my friend who enjoy Sci-Fi, but want something that has some depth. All in all, it was worth reading. :)
I don't know why it would cost $7.00 to charge $2.99 for this item.....If you want my money I'd be glad to....

i thought that the book was going to be more interesting like its title...butthe writing is extremely dry and boring.at one point of time, it makes no sense what author is talking about or doing because it's obviously written by someone with a serious lack of experience.i'm not sure if this guy ever got around to finishing his own book.but there are many other books out there- none worth wasting your time on.

Nice book, the only thing I didn't like about it was that each time a new topic came up throughout the first 30 pages or so we learned more than needed and it wasn't very interesting. It also gets a little boring around page 100 but does pick up. If you think you're going to take pictures of every bird in a local neighborhood, buy several books on your own first, this book is an okay one for that.

Purchased this cable to run from the back of my house (where there's little electrical wire) down the basement stairwell and on a ladder to connect it (upstairs) with our wireless router. This is my first attempt at a fish food based diet in about 20 years, although I fed them frozen raw fish. My cats now never eat the flakes and gobble down this wonderful food. The shipping was fast. I bought this to replace an old filter that was in our humidifier and works great. As good as the one we replaced. The price is great too. We haven't changed it yet but plan on trying soon. Our water has not changed.

This toy is very cheap. You can't really turn on the music unless you put a lot of pressure and hold it down with your finger. My daughter doesn't even use this much. I bought an expensive one to replace it...don't waste your money!

It is quite a disappointing book, with no actual plot whatsoever. The first book in the series, The Last Saint, was much better. Even so, I can honestly tell you that, despite my disappointment here, reading the third will not be any easier than before. I'm still using these two weeks later, and I have to say...one set is STILL working perfectly, no problems at all, despite constant use. Just like everything else with Amazon, I am amazed how much i can get in one shipment. I always seem to need a few of these things since they are so handy... This book is a must read for anyone into the business of the auto industry or the rise in fuel prices. The author does an excellent job documenting almost everything that was done with GM(GM) since it began to make decisions about how fast and on what basis they would produce cars. Everything went from slow growth at the start to aggressive expansion during most of GM's. The downside however comes from where things are going now as gas prices keep rising much higher than expected.
It was okay. I think it is just the way she writes. If you like her style of writing then this book is for you.

They gave up on trying to hold a charge when they were too old. My mom got them at Best Buy around the time we did. She said even that Best buy would not take care of these anymore. This book tells of a boy who loses everything from his beloved mother to the things he loved in life. His father is killed by a drunk driver. He must keep up his family and himself together until money can be obtained for the funeral. The author has an interesting way with words that I will most likely reread. It was also very sad at times, but showed how important it is when you love someone. Good job! And yes, I'd read another one if there were one.

This book was too technical for me. I'm still seeking a better introductory text that gives the average person something to get started on. It seemed to me this wasn't it. The author tends toward academic sounding writing. That does not mean it's bad, mind you - just didn't keep my attention because of what it looked like. I also wanted more hands-on information and tips. Maybe if I'd read the entire book, I'll have different thoughts. As is, I found little help or new ideas in this book. 
 Rating: 2.

I am one of those rare people that actually went to church before ever seeing Jon. My grandmother introduced me to the Holy Spirit, and I have always thought he was a man after my own heart. I have been a very loyal Amazon shopper for years. Recently I bought an HP laptop, with the hope of saving on ink, but boy I ended up having to spend much more!!! This is a very strange movie. If you're just into the supernatural and love to read about ghosts then this movie may be enjoyable for you. I was hoping it would explain how spirits can communicate with living people though. Instead of saying "They come in your dreams you know when they do" it says basically that everything happens according to plan. This movie talks more about how demons inhabit our world now than ever. I bought this album as a Christmas gift for my brother. He enjoys it. It's really nice to have some of these songs available on CD.

I have read so many of her books they all start with the same plot and then get better as you go but this book was terrible. It dragged on for almost 600 pages about nothing. I'm very happy with my new Hoover WindTunnel V Rewind Bagless Vacuum Cleaner!! The price was better than all the other brands and models on the market! It is an excellent value for the money.

This book was a disappointment, but not because I disliked the author. The story is great and deserves 5 stars, as does his writing. However, there were so many editing errors that it detracted from my enjoyment. In several places I've encountered sentences with two or more separate words incorrectly written in quotation marks, missing spaces between words, incorrect use of proper nouns, etc. All are easily corrected, which should have been done before publishing this novel... but, alas, not.

I am a very visual learner and have to read the steps carefully in order not to mess something up. As you proceed along with building it becomes clearer. Nice size, great price but the first time I touched it, it cracked at one of its corners. I'm sure this won't happen to everyone, but be careful with that part. The plastic is fairly strong and thick, so you shouldn't have any problems taking care of it.

Excellent product. Easy to use. Great for the price. My husband loves it. We did not realize how easy it is until we bought one. It has been a year and very sturdy. He is on his fourth one due to abuse. Would highly recommend.

I wish this thing did the job a little bit better. I'm not quite sure if my puppy was just being an idiot, but sometimes she would jump up on either side of me in order to get out and then lay down again.
