Anyway, after about 2 weeks using this, now she's fine.

This book was written in the 70's by a man who knows his stuff, which is a rare find nowadays. The problem with it is that he relies too much on anecdotal stories and anecdotical sources to support his hypothesis. It feels like reading someone's blog, not science. Also, some of the anecdotes don't make any sense unless you can explain away how they happened.

I think it's a great book, but the kindle version leaves a lot to be desired. I was looking forward more than what it delivered. When in the book there are several pages of white text with large black print and one page has no color. The color part is hard for me because my husband suffers from macular degeneration. It's very difficult reading this book on Kindle. I've purchased Kindle versions before that didn't have those problems where there's not enough detail.

I don't know if this is common with adapters or not, but here you are talking about a brand new adapter, plugging it in and all of a sudden NOTHING WORKS. The light flashes, the laptop gives an error message, nothing. And since it's not worth spending shipping charges just to ship back (and at that point, what refund do they offer since your card wasn't charged correctly?) so instead I lost a couple bucks, now what? A better adapter would cost more on ebay than these did.

First and formost, I have owned two of these. The first one lasted 4 years, it was getting a bit fuzzy so we decided to buy another for my mother. Great product for a really good price at less than half (shipping included). Fit like a well fitting glove, and is as advertised.
I bought two of these, one didn't even work. What more can i say. Buy something else.

I am happy with my purchase of this product. It works well and fits in the slot just fine as indicated by other reviewers. There are no frills or fancy buttons to push. We do get a lot of heat but it has not bothered us at all. You can tell you have hot water going on without turning off either your faucet OR the unit. This is my second one.

This would be the greatest thing if only it didn't leak. We have used these for years without problem, so we assumed there must not be a defective batch. WRONG! The first time I ordered these, they leaked badly. I've had to make sure that all 6 bottles are upright when filled so as to avoid leaking. There is no way I'd put anything but water in them -- even using two tops. That was why I bought them, and they don't really work well from this angle.

I had some issues with a set previously but these were easily exchanged/replaced. My only complaint is no other reviews for this. The sound in general was noticeably better on these. It might just be personal preference though.

It lasted 10 minutes and the zipper broke. The leather is too stiff to slide your hand in. I love amazon - would not buy this bag if it weren't a replacement for my previous one. What a great collection of songs. I find it to be relaxing and yet upbeat. It's amazing how many wonderful songs come from Ireland in the USA.

This does what its supposed to. Fast. Easy install. Great speed. Looks clean. Seems like a nice unit. Worth the money. Only reason to knock off 1 star was price. Its much higher than other SSD's out there.

A great buy though for anyone that wants better tasting coffee!

For those of us who like the original version by Frank Sinatra, this is a must. i thought wow what a great book it was.my little sister really loves this book. she enjoys the book as we do and will probably be reading more again.

this isn't rocket science to follow the directions for assembly. The product itself seems OK, but i had some trouble getting a solid connection, and i don't feel confident that it will hold up if anything goes wrong. I'm not going to use it, it's too unstable when the door is closed.

I've had this mixer at least 8 years but I am not a heavy duty user as many other reviewers would recommend, maybe 4 times per month usually. It's ok to read but for a book about dog training it didn't seem like there was a lot of specific info or guidance. There is one very simple sentence that helped train my dog, and then it's the same things every week. Glad I bought it used. Good luck if you buy new. But this was helpful in some ways. I have just finished the book. It is boring, and it isn't even well developed. Many parts are very unrealistic. I've seen this kind of situation on TV or in movies. Very disappointing!!!! My other half who reads all sorts has said she enjoyed it...but I'm afraid we don't agree about this. She says there were many holes here to fill that weren't there.. We both like mystery stories, which this book was, but a lot happened, then nothing happened.

the first time I watched this film, I was extremely disappointed.. so for about 2 years, every Halloween after that one and after, they still released this movie as if people thought nobody had bought it to see it. This is probably their lowest rated film of all time. It just doesn't do anything right. It makes zero sense, the dialogue is, at best, terrible, and there's an absolutely no plot, nothing even remotely interesting, it's a complete waste of time, you'll be wasting your money.

I thought that some of his stories were going to be about what it would be like if you met God, but really are just stories from random people. He also gives several stories on why he writes and doesn't write, but I'm not sure there's any real answer behind it.

I have read a few of this author's prior and in my view her other books are better than this one. The main female character is annoying, the plot line doesn't move forward, it's like watching someone's daytime soap opera. It's about as well written or compelling as an episode or two from the original Sex In the House. Save your money on these type books. Read Ann Rule's books! A much more engaging, fun read. My recommendation would be buy the series instead but don't waste too many dollars.

I am a big fan of Anne Rice's but this is my least favorite book by her. It didn't seem real. If you are looking for vampires that sparkle, dance, and fight then read Twilight. I'm more interested in vampiric things like the night hunters, The Night Watch, or even vampire books about people with superpowers. This was too real to me. Vampires who walk around acting all cool with their piercings & tattoos would never be on TV or on magazine covers.

The price of this item was very good, but when I received it, it's just a cheap case. I had to cut all the opening so that it fits my phone better. At least, that's what it looks like in photo. This case is not good for camera protection as it does not fit well enough and when the lens needs cleaning it's a mess because you have no other means at your disposal, plus this foam pad was never glued very well at all on any side which leaves an impression so that removing it requires taking care or tearing it.

This film is one of the worst movies I've ever seen but if you are into this genre, then it really doesn't matter. The reason being that there's no plot to speak of, there seems to be absolutely nothing happening at all, and you'll probably get lost within five minutes flat. While I understand how it's marketed as a 'cult classic', that's just not true. Most people who like this kind of thing won't enjoy it. However, I'm sure some love it.

This is not the same as what I had in a home school classroom, and should have been described that way. But it was needed for our Sunday School class so there were NO complaints. We just used different words than we would today. The service came very fast at no extra charge.

When we decided to update the look in our dining room, it was necessary to replace some larger plain dinner plates for serving company. These were a little smaller but fit nicely on two small table settings. Also perfect size for fruit and veggie soup bowls. They're easy to wash up, too.

I purchased it and never got around to using it. Waste of money, now on Amazon looking for a better one. It didn't help me at all. It's not the best as shown in the picture. I'd recommend sticking with regular ice packs. Not this one! It's okay, but you should get more bang for your buck or higher end.

This is a great product! The product has all the ingredients described in the ingredients. I love it, and would recommend it to any one who wants to maintain healthy. It's also very easy on your budget. Thanks for allowing this to be sold. Thanks!

Having owned this laptop for several months now, one has to say that it's an okay computer. When you're working with computers all day, you definitely want a machine that can handle some video editing, photo processing, and music playback. My Dell Inspiron 5330s was the first computer I ever had when it came out, nearly ten years ago, and my current Compaq Presario CQ60 is the second computer I've owned.

Very nice and very useful. My only criticism is that I wish the top was wider. We use them every day for lunch and love them. They save you a ton of food compared to reusable containers, too. Would definitely buy again. If they were larger though, then I'd give it 5 stars. Highly recommended. I'm ordering two more because we are using ours so often.

I've tried a few different flavors of Crystal Light water in various sizes and this is by far my favorite flavor. It tastes like water with carbonation added to it but without any weird or unpleasant aftertaste. Also, because the beverage is packaged in a bottle, you can take some on an airplane or leave them at your desk (without worrying about leakage).
The characters are enjoyable to follow and you can connect with all their struggles. You start not liking them right away but just need time for that character developement.

This is not a CD you can use to listen to as it does NOT have the original recordings. It was poorly mastered and sounds like an old AM radio. One of these days I should just send them back but they are so cheap there probably wouldn't cost much at all. Just my opinion. Would somebody please re-issue this with the ORIGINAL recordings? Please do it! The music has been remastered from vinyl records that sound even better now! Thanks! If anyone knows why this doesn't happen, let me know.

i was very disappointed in this book which was to be a gift for my daughter. She had bought a similar story from you and she said it was wonderful. I didn't want her old version of the story, so I went down your site after not finding it, only to find that it too is a good story. Please put that one back on line. It has wonderful artwork as well. thank you. Judy McWilliams

The product looked great at the beginning and it made a terrible noise as soon as I tried to use it. I've only used it maybe 6 times total. Now when using it, it's actually spitting out water... It sucks. If you like wasting your money buy this!! DO NOT BUY! You will be dissapointed too soon.

I purchased the book after reading other reviews. If you're expecting more than a list of places you'll hear about then DON'T buy this book. It's really not that impressive. It seems like they are listing things such as, "In order for everyone who wants to know what you need to know, here is what I have found out". That doesn't seem very helpful. Maybe it would be ok if your in another country, but from Australia or New Zealand etc. it's useless.
This cover does not stand up, if put in landscape position as designed. My wife uses her tablet alot, she only works with it in one or two different positions.

Have used this for years and found it to be a great product. It is easy on the hands,also helps with finger joints, would highly recommend! Good price from amazong as in stores here are double or triple that amount. Will continue buying thru Amaxon!!

The product looks good on the picture and has a reasonable price.but it is not working at all. I tried many cable which i have bought in US.The problem is that the converter does not make any connection to my monitor,even though both adapter are connected correctly. It makes you wonder after all this about quality control for such item. It's really disappointing when we buy something with expensive price tag as this. I'm going back my original HDMI adapter..

Like all books of a similar nature the only way to tell whether it's good is to read it - then go back and see what you missed. This work had me saying "yeah, right" but I know now that there are two more in this particular genre. Not a bad author at all, just not my cup of tea.
The movie is great! but the download sucks! It goes way too fast & then pauses for a minute or two & stops mid stream. Horrible experience. Would love to have access directly on my kindle...

I ordered these on 11/22/12 and received them within two days of placing my order. Upon opening the bottles they looked like oil had spilled everywhere. This was not disclosed in the product description or as an indication that the bottle contents may be somewhat contaminated. We placed a simple order to test out some new items for her family but once received, we found several very poor quality. There were one type which smelled funny ( like kerosene ) others seemed unrecognizable.
Okay game. You gotta beat all the enemies for a good ending. Otherwise I would have thrown it out my window.
The item worked great.

The maps look really cheap in color. Don't know if they are supposed to, since this was not clear from the picture, but after looking through them once, all the colors looked pretty much washed out, even on my PC monitor.

Purchased this book months ago, opened it to find that the inside was folded completely in, like if a child printed out the pages of an art sketchbook. I'm not happy with my purchase. When I emailed the seller, he/she replied saying "sorry we dont provide those books" So it's been over 2 weeks and no answer. I've tried numerous times asking for a replacement or refund.....NO RESPONSE!!! This is unprofessional....
Product received was all plastic and did not contain the small package of seeds as pictured. Would be nice if we were able to return it due to false advertising.
This is a great travel journal with good pictures. It's small enough to use as your passport on those occasions when you need an address information from home to work.
A series of short disjointed tales. No character development at all. Boring. Poorly written. Did no thing but ramble on. Would never recommend this book.
A bit too heavy and bulky. Has everything you need except the charger with a USB cord. Well worth it for travel.
There was very little that was useful and rather depressing on how bad government has become.
this is the same as a few others. nothing wrong with it, but its still cheap. not much out there like that anymore. thanks
I thought it ended too abruptly - there are some really interesting characters in this story that were left hanging. Hopefully the 2nd book will be forthcoming soon!

The item arrived promptly. It is not the color advertised nor does it look like picuture. Very disappointed at this purchase, should have ordered a diffferent one. I sent an email asking to return it. Hope i will be notified of my options. Disappointed. And it cost too much for these type things. Wish they would give you credit with only half return. Don't remember if I even received the refund, as I sent them by email.

It works the way you expect it to. I use this for washing and waxing my truck on a regular basis. It's easy to clean using soap or even toothpaste with no mess like some other brands of soap/car wash products. This kit has everything to get started. I'm happy with it.
This vacuum cleaner looks great. It has plenty power.
This is the perfect way to watch our games from anywhere.. We use it all over our living room and have had no issues with it. Great value... you can't go wrong for what we paid... Thanks :)
This does wonders to clean up your digestive tract.
My son wanted this game.
This is perfect size of cable.

I was going to buy this printer for my home and had been working on it since Thanksgiving. Well I'm still waiting now over two months later. They said they would ship the parts next day as per their usual standard. To date, 2/14 no part has come. It's not worth purchasing anything from them at all anymore. My opinion is that companies should have better customer service especially when something like a defective product takes 2 weeks.
Bought 4 of these, 2 are fine. The others have no sound and the charge lights flash as it should. If you don't care that they won't work buy them, otherwise, find another option.

I was a big fan of the series when it first came out and bought the book right away. Having read all 5 so far, not only have I lost interest in what is being done, but I'm left with questions about why each book wasn't longer than 100 pages or more. There are 3 more books to write before completing this one, if I remember correctly, which will take several weeks at least.

This is a poor quality product. It broke the second time I used it and I'm not sure if that's because I had it too tight or not. The metal part detached and one of the handles busted off. Save your money.
My daughter is going to use this for art and craft work, she loved it. I would recommend it to others. Thanks :)

This is a good book and I have enjoyed the first three in this series. The main character, Emma, seems to be developing some very interesting powers. They also seem like they are heading towards becoming something magical. Unfortunately for me that was not the case for me with this book. In the last few pages she seemed almost too mature for her age, no matter what he thought of her. Not so sure it fits with who Emma is. So much potential but lost it there.

I gave each of these to my daughter individually but the lids did not fit properly. In order for them to work, they had to be put in upside down, although that doesn't seem very practical when you have a toddler throwing things around and no way to fix them. The design itself is nice but the quality makes it extremely hard to use. I'm probably going to keep buying refills. For now at $6, I'll just buy refills from elsewhere. Don't waste your money.

I loved this when it was fresh out of the tube, but not even a week later, it's flat and dull. This product is NOT worth the price. I'm definitely going to try another brand next time, as most reviews were positive. Not only do they smell like coconut, they're also great for massages. My search continues.

The first 2 days of using this, with no problems. But now the air is leaking out and there doesn't seem like a way to fix it- just won't buy another one. Waste of money. Wish I'd bought an electrical cord. Now I'm going to.

For those interested in a detailed overview of the history and development (of the) various forms of Christianity, then these are books worth reading. I thought they were great while reading them. The discussion is quite thorough at times -- particularly for someone such as myself learning Catholicism for the first time. Unfortunately, there's so much repetition that it becomes somewhat overwhelming when wading through all the information about each topic. However, that's just my subjective opinion. I've read this book several times, with different perspectives throughout its pages.

This is my favorite perfume! A co-worker at work told me he had tried it once, smelled good, but didn't like it, then purchased her own bottle. It smells great. I'd definitely buy this perfume again! Not sure why it's called "woodsy" though. I get the feeling that its not meant for a man if you ask me..

First impressions - very good quality and seems very durable as long as its not used every day by an active kid. Buttons seem well made but with care should last many years. Light function could be improved on which has only three levels.

This machine is really good, but not without some problems. While the noise it makes does a lot to mask other noises, our cats definitely do enjoy this thing. It also helps keep them calm, which in turn, brings us much peace of mind. However, sometimes you need your hands free for something else -- like getting the cat out from between the mattresses.

For an "official authorization," this one is not very good. My college instructor required it for a research course, as did my fellow students and I who took it. There were errors in the book even before we had studied most of it; there was, for example, a question that stated "How many pieces can be shown to lie at an angle between 45 and 60?". Um, the only piece you have right angles 60 apart was supposed to look like half a square.

I had read the book and thought that it was very well written but couldn't put my finger on just how bad the book was. So many grammatical errors… words missing, grammar issues everywhere,too predictable, not enough mystery or suspense. It reads like a first draft. The ending was horrible.... it just ended. This author really needs to get someone over there who knows English.

These don't work at all. When my computer tries to detect an audio device the product does nothing, which makes them completely useless as advertised. This is in no way due to their faults: both units malfunctioned in exactly the same way.

I'm new to this, so all may be fine now. But it just does NOT go out after setting it! Only if there was a complete lack of ambient temperature - then yes, I'll set it. So, what's this about? Maybe as I get into more details, I'll update. Meanwhile, don't buy one for yourself.
This is a great product.

This book didn't seem to contain anything new or exciting about the subject of marriage. The whole premise has been written before by a variety of authors. My main objection was that she constantly compared her own behavior and life with other people's lives. It got really tiresome, especially after awhile because it felt like there were too many instances in which this happened. Also, she did not explain things well, as far as, say, what we need to do when we find out that our marriage is ending.

This case is super cute and my daughter loved it the only problem we have with this product would be you actually can't charge your phone using that side of case..there are no openings in those directions for charging. Other then that.. Very Cute!

I bought this for a small dog (about 12 lbs) to keep him occupied while I'm at work. When he started using it, the collar felt tight and wasn't allowing him full freedom of movement, but now we have been wearing it regularly since getting it two weeks ago. He has calmed down so much that he actually lies down. We just got one size up from recommended sizing on our other dog (12 pounds). If nothing else, I will buy again.

I have used this for years, and cannot tolerate it now. Too strong. My local grocer sold it. What a disappointment. Why did they change the formula?? Don't waste your money. UPDATE- 11/25/2011This product is now being marketed under the name Neuro Natural brand but has changed back to Clorox. That means that as far as I am concerned their new formula has not been reformulated.
I have only used it a few times so far and plan to eventually use it. It has not let me down at all. Good deal for the price.

I purchased the book in hopes to find out some information on my dog's behavior. Unfortunately, the method mentioned by the author was not helpful unless you were a total novice at training your dog. The tone of her writing is very condescending-it sounded like she had just gotten out of an English class and couldn't get beyond that first "lesson." Some readers may find this helpful... but for us, we found it offensive.
Too many people involved in some kind of trouble. A waste of time. No surprise ending. Just way too drawn out.
Not as good as the others, and it was quite predictable. If you want a light beach read, get it, otherwise pick up one of her earlier books. Just don't read this in public or you'll regret it...

This heater looks beautiful and has been doing a very nice job heating the room for two months now. I have noticed one thing to be aware of which is that because it's made out of glass it can get scratched fairly easily. If you're ordering it, you should keep this in mind. It's not enough to make me return it. It really doesn't bother me, but just something worth knowing. Great purchase!! The price was great, but even more impressive about how quickly it shipped after being ordered.
The story was boring & repetitive. There was no real emotion involved. Too many characters. All seemed rather bland. And it ended abruptly.

This is one of my fav songs it has a good beat and nice lyrics. The whole cd doesn't dissapoint. You can listen to in the car with no problems what so ever. I never listened to R&B music until this album came out it's very cool!!!

These are some of the worst I've ever tried. The adhesive just doesn't stick to anything, even when using a hair dryer. We bought them for my kids' party loot bags, but there were no instructions or idea as how much extra tape was needed so I ended up throwing away 1/3 the bags! Not worth it at all in our book. I'll see if they sell those separately! Yuck! Buyer beware!!! It would have been nice too be able know what each number meant...
The quality is good for this price.

I am a fan of the series for years. This is another weak entry in that long line of movies with little to no story line. As usual, Johnny Depp was excellent as ever, but the poor story, bad script, even worse acting, made every scene boring. If this wasn't on my video shelf, it would be out from under me!! My advice: Don't waste your money unless you are dying for an addiction and need something, anything. Otherwise, check online or wait for it at Blockbuster.
Poor parents make poor food.

The author presents a lot of facts that will keep you reading, and it was easy to read through the book. It's mostly about those from China trying to find a job in this country. There isn't much detail with respect to any specific area except maybe some restaurants but otherwise most information is on places all over China. It seems that there were many places included where Chinese would have wanted work, so I assume they did apply at all.

I'm very disappointed with this product! I purchased a set that was listed on my Amazon Wish List in December, 2012, from BuyItNow.com. It arrived at the end of May. Two weeks later after installing it and waiting for rain showers, another unit began leaking water by one wall of each shower. This has continued through to now, July 2013. The other two units remain dry. Buyer beware, these products will only last about 9 months max. Don't waste your money purchasing anything like this.

Excellent product with really good quality picture and a lot of features. Bought both the DW-950A model TV + Panasonic plasma... but in different rooms so didn't need both. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it's not totally intuitive. You can plug your ipod through its auxiliary out - that's great...

This is not even a book. I finished it simply because I've been invested more than reading anything else. The book does provide good insight to the current legal climate regarding this particular topic, but as far as quality goes, it's quite lacking. This should have sold as a pamphlet or booklet.
I love the cover of this movie, especially at Halloween time. It could be too scary to watch with small kids. Still a great classic!

Just got my copy in the mail this morning and am going to return it as soon as possible. The song quality is very poor compared with past albums of his by far. I know he put a lot into the recording process on these cd's but its definitely not worth the cost. There are many other artists out there who can produce real country music that you would think we all listen to. This release does NOT belong in any country.

This book is a great study aid. The pages have colorful stickers to help us identify our favorite fruits and veggies, it fits in my purse making it easy to carry if necessary. My only complaint would be that the tabs on some of them are not attached correctly leading me to question how long they will last. Overall it's very useful, though I didn't buy it online because when comparing prices its more expensive here. But overall if you're looking for something fun, this may work.

What the title does not really tell you is it's ALL about Mark Twain and nothing else. It's mostly just short bits from books he wrote. I feel this book is being marketed at people who think "Mark Twain" will teach them something. Not so much.
Best product that I have found to keep my fish from dying. They all swim and breathe well at levels much higher than with other products.

I have tried these before and this batch has a taste of plastic no matter how much you try to cut back. You cannot take them apart to see what is left after each sip. This was the first time ever that i had this problem with an Amazon purchase so it must be some issue. Will not buy these again. Too bad. They were great for about 1 or 2 weeks. Not at all like before. Maybe we are used to. Good Luck!

The movie "A Dog's Purpose" was great! Unfortunately this one is not, to its credit. We ordered it as a Christmas gift for our dogs. When opened, the case came apart almost immediately. Our dogs were happy we found it, but soon lost interest since I am not sure they even want to... get it. Don't order these! If you are considering this, do think twice. Not good! What could have been a great family movie, turned out terrible.

While the story is good and I like reading new authors who write, it should be noted that they probably had better editors. Many typos or incorrect wording made me have to flip back a couple of pages when re-reading. Overall, for such an inexpensive book, not bad.
These sheets were very nice.

I had been planning a trip to the Galapagos Islands, and this guide was required reading by the tour group guide. The guide is thorough, providing information of interest and useful for all travelers traveling among islands, but the format of this book severely detracts from any pleasure of seeing them. There's an interactive CD-ROM provided which allows you to see photos that were previously in the book, but not the whole trip. Additionally, there are many grammatical or spelling errors.

This thing works perfect and it's very accurate. You just add food ingredients on a plate measure with your eyes closed but don't drink while measuring because it'll take you another 5 minutes to be able to do that.
I used the adapter for a trip overseas. It worked fine, but its size and short length make it awkward to use when plugged in directly if you have more than one adapter. Be aware of that!
A light but entertaining story with good character development and a nice story. This was more enjoyable than some of Mr. Turtledove's other work. Well worth reading.

This book did not have much helpful info. It was basically about getting a horse to do anything. She had way too many tips on how to train your horse. There are ways in which all three children can learn. I found myself skipping over those parts because the information was nothing new. Not worth buying.

These were great speakers until the power button stopped working. We tried to use it with batteries but that wasn't going well either. Now it's just a blue flash light and that's about it. I am very dissapointed in this product especially since my kids are so excited when we pulled out their new earbuds. I'm returning mine, even though there isn't any kind of warranty on it. DON'T BUY THIS ITEM!!!
After doing extensive research and reading reviews on numerous products, I decided to buy this particular wireless system. I'm very happy with it.

This set has been a very welcome addition to our living space. I was looking for something that wasn't an eyesore or took up counter space, and also wanted them at the right height so they would be easily accessible. The only thing keeping me from giving these 5 stars is just how large it is--even when using the little cup holder, there's no way you can fit multiple cups in it. As long as you're not running out of room on either side, though, it's completely worth buying.

Not the best but definitely not bad. The concept was good and it had moments where I wanted to know how they would get out of all this mess. It did take me one day to finish so for that, I'm thankful. No cliffhanger endings. Would have been nice to find some new twist or something that caught our attention. Maybe just one more bad guy in it. Also, it's kind of short - only about 100 pages. It's probably a pretty good idea for an adult book.

This book would have done better in a shorter format such as 500 pages. Not recommended. The story line was good but too lengthy and drawn out. I kept thinking the writing seemed to be written by someone with limited English skills. There were numerous errors that made it hard to follow. At one point we got the names wrong - then again there is no way this could happen twice. Don't waste your time unless you like long drawn-out stories and endless descriptive passages. Not my style.
This product is quite expensive for what you get, even at the cheapest price one can get - it's more like a disposable product. I also agree that it does not remove all odors completely.

I'm still very mad that they would try sell this thing for $49.99. As much as the video game itself is awesome...This one isn't worth it. I love all of the Metal Gear games and how the stories really tie into each other. And when you finally get to play a character it plays through only 1 part of that character's story. The main game took about 2 hours by itself. The cut scenes after that.

My daughter used this book for a class and so we have it at home. I was amazed he really wanted it. I know my son read other books now but not in english. The colors are pretty but hard to read. Maybe if it were bigger type would be better. Overall good price. No scratches on the inside of book. Good seller too. Shipped quickly. Thanks

Batteries never worked right from day. The company was willing to take them back, but would not pay shipping charges. It cost me over $20 dollars in all for an item that doesn't work. No more purchases with this provider. Buyer beware. They only send new items if you want them. All reconditioned batteries. You should receive new. 
 Rating: 1.
Well written,easy to digest, and good ideas...would recommend this book. Thanks for making such an informative book available. Have fun reading it.

This product does not work with the iPod Touch 4G. The ad shows that it does. No where on the package or the packaging is this stated. If you have purchased a touch 4G and need an accessory to convert your dock into charging, this will NOT do. You must be able to plug in another cable which doesn't come standard when purchasing one of these ipod docks. Amazon needs to clarify what products support the docking station feature, especially since other reviewers mentioned it.
If you've grown up with this product, then you'll know why my review of 8 oz. for only $1.29 makes perfect sense. I'll be back to buy more! Great price and great product.
I think its a fantastic device and easy to operate with good instructions. I got mine on time as was promised. Thanks so much?
I did not enjoy this read as much as a lot of the other books in this series. A little short on character development and length. Good mystery but could be developed so much more.

The product works great but there are two things that bothered me with this product. First the screen protector gets scratched really easily I had my on for just a day and it already has scratches to it. Second is while taking pics or video it's hard due to the reflection of your phone's screen. It would be ok in certain situations such as outdoors or when you're not trying too take pictures it may work well. Not saying anything negative about the protection part only the picture quality.

I've been using this brand since I first heard about how great there customer service is. First off, what a refreshing experience dealing with these guys. Great product, excellent price, super fast shipping. I had some issues and called them to find the right solution for me. Their agent told me that if my product didn't work, they would refund me, no questions asked. Not even shipping costs! You are receiving absolutely top notch products.
The remote started working right away after I programmed it. It was less expensive than what Harley wanted also. Great price. Fast delivery. Highly recommended!!! :) :) :D
The product was not very easy to use, the pictures are hard and not so clear in low light situations. I would not buy this product. Not a good deal.

I bought two of these units as a Christmas gift for my daughter, who had asked extensively if a new one would be available. We liked the fact that there were 4 different size brew sizes and many other useful features. This unit has worked perfectly each time we have visited to make it brewable. My daughter just loves it. Great features include easy clean-up, temperature control, programmable timing etc. Would buy again (and have).
I use these batteries to make sure my camera functions properly. The battery works great and is just as good as the ones you buy in stores. Good buy!

If you like reading about self absorbed characters this isn't the book for you. I will not be recommending it. The writer is one to watch and if there are other books of his worth reading give it a shot but check out what you're buying. Not some "greatest hits" crap. I'm sure he has some redeeming qualities however it's hard to root for. Sorry author. It's been an agonizing 2 months having waited till now only to want my 2.99 back.
It seems to work ok but its a little bit of a hassle.
The book was not what I thought it could be. It was a good price if we didn't have so many other books to choose from. Not my first choice of books.

As reported this is sold by someone who had tried to pawn the DVD over for $2. This poor excuse of an item arrived in its packaging all ripped up. That being said amazon does return them for full credit. Thank goodness for Amazon they do stand behind their products. A lesson learned from Amazon.

When I bought this printer and it worked, I was happy with the speed and print quality. However, when mine quit working, HP support indicated that there is no way to reset it. This means you have spend hours on phone trying to get someone who can fix a problem only for the person you're speaking with or having them walk us through many things we already tried. They said they won't do anything to take back defective equipment except replace the part.

This movie was really cool. It had everything I look for in a movie!!! Great characters all with great personalities. Awesome action scene. A good balance between comedy and drama. An awesome ending that just left you speechless. If your looking for an incredible movie to watch then this is the one I'd recomend.

This piece would not work on my Dell computer- a D2720n running Windows 7.. I sent email for assistance about returning it. However, none was given as far as I am concerned. My mistake. It will be returned.

I have had this case for about a week now and it looked beautiful when new. But the design has rubbed off in lots of different places including where you open the stand. It looks terrible now. Also, once i snapped my phone into place as usual, even with only minor movement, not one but both parts came apart from each other.
This router died within 3 months of purchase. I don't recommend this product. The speed is ok when it works, but for $89 what should you expect? Very disappointed. It is just a bad design.
it was not what I thought or ordered but ok for the money.........
I did not like the book. It was very boring. The character were undeveloped. The storyline just seems to have gone on and on.

This is a good product. I used some in place of the original one that came with my grill, and it seems to be functioning just fine. Price was excellent. Installation instructions a little confusing, but once I got past those, installation went very smooth. I've used this brand before on other grill installations (had someone else do it for me), so I'm familiar how they go on. Just be SURE when replacing anything - make sure you take measurements first or pay me later ;)   Rating: 4.

This was one of my favorite Christmas movies when I was a kid. My children loved it and now our grandchildren. There is probably not that much action in the beginning but as you get into it, it's very entertaining. It reminds me more of Tom Sawyer by Charles Dickens. If your kids like Charlie and Lola, you'll love this movie.
The story started out well for an erotic novel and got more interesting until the end. It just became a book of sex then love story. So I am in no hurry to read any more. Sorry!

I would read this book again. It was entertaining and easy to read. Some of the information was incorrect such as he referred to two different types of horses when referring his son who owned a Quarter Horse.

I have just received this product and tried it for 30 minutes. I got up to take a quick shower but then the machine started going crazy. It was vibrating terribly all over my body in some places right out of the box. The whole thing seemed cheaply made, very flimsy construction so i think it's too expensive even considering its price - I should return it. There is no way I'll keep it, there are plenty of other products on Amazon that give you many results with less money.
great product. very fast charger.

very pretty and easy to use.

This book is a terrible rip-off and completely unauthorized. The cover shows a lot of cool old photos - it should have been changed to one that has some images in there. Also, the quality of writing isn't very good. I'm surprised Penguin didn't ask for more money from this poor knock-off author.

This book came highly recommended, but it did give me some food for thought. However, if you are looking for a scientific treatment of life in space, this is probably not going to provide it. As has been pointed out by other reviewers, this book is not so much "about" the Titanic as it is an account of events surrounding her sinking. There are no photographs in any format but there is a good selection from letters and diaries that might be found on the internet. The only reason I can fathom for omitting photos or videos would have to do with space considerations since they were obviously taken before this book was made available.

I bought the kindle version of this book and returned it. The graphics are so small on my 7 inch screen that it is nearly impossible to use when reading a book. Also, the maps included in one section, which was labeled "topology" didn't exist - for example "the map of the eastern seaboard.
