This is the first time i have gotten a bad item from Amazon. So far, all I had to go through was the return process. However, I am returning this product for a refund. The CD arrived cracked, but there are two tracks that are ok. One has skips throughout them. The cover looked very used. I'm sure it wasn't used previously. If you purchase this, make sure you test it. Mine doesn't deserve one star. It might be OK when played in an LP player, which usually does not skip.
Really like having this cordless phone. Works great over our entire home...and even in out backyard on the patio with no interference.

The box is nice, its heavy, but the hinges are too short, and it's a little crooked in some places where you can see it could possibly break. Maybe if they would make them better quality, then I'd have given it 2 stars. I don't think the hinge problems affect all cases, though. Even so, when the lid closes properly, this thing will get your glasses scratched up or dented on the back. It looks nice now, but there's nothing that says "you get what you pay for". It's cheap, cheap plastic.

My original order arrived broken in half, the metal hooks were cracked and broken. I sent it back for a replacement, hoping that was just an isolated incident. It came packed well with no signs of being mishandled. The replacement one came out of the box already damaged. Just from normal handling during unpacking I discovered that about half the bars had cracked. It's not hard to see when things are made out of plastic like this unless you first cut them up before putting the glass together.

I received this battery from Amazon.com before it arrived here in Mexico. With the first recharge after 2 weeks of use, which gave me 5 hours using Firefox to check email, write letters, and browse the net. After my fourth charge, however, 3 days later, not even an hour on any program, but with a full screen view, all went downhill, fast. In 2 weeks, 10 times, at 90% power, I've gone thru three cycles charging it, then I'm done, so no new battery. This is a bad product.

This product performed as expected, and was delivered within only a couple of days with standard shipping. However, the item I received did not have any markings on it showing that it's actually a Toshiba battery. After charging this battery fully, I've been using it for about three weeks, so I'm still unsure if that's what makes it function properly. Overall, since it's such an inexpensive battery, I'd say it's worth taking into consideration.

I'm not sure if the product is as good or worse than a lot of others. I did get this free with an order so I have no complaints. It's kind of weird though. The package doesn't say who makes it and there are no reviews anywhere. If you look at some other stuff like this, it's usually either on Amazon selling for $30-50 depending on how old they are. I will keep taking it. Like most things, when results do come, I'll update this. For now...three stars.

You don't really get a sense of the main character's personality. Very easy read. Would have liked more substance to it. Overall very predictable ending but I like her style so give it a try. Not my favorite by far.

Although the author does take you inside of his life and what he had to go through. A bit far fetched for me. Maybe she can write about where they have moved to. Just my opinion. Good luck on your future work. Keep writing please but give us some things that we don't suspect.

The product did not work. It never charged and i cant use it for my GPS on the car. I do need a new one :(.sorry but that doesn't happen. Sorry so much.. this is my first bad review... maybe it's just me though. And if u have to pay shipping there are plenty of other places online thatl ship cheaper even with shipping too.... just look around! I'm very unhappy at the moment because now i dont know whats going happen next.
This little booklet isn't very well written.

I gave this book a 3.5 star review because it felt like I really wanted to know how the characters went on. Unfortunately, I couldn't get past all of the grammatical errors that would drive me crazy if there weren't at least 2 or 3 in every chapter. Some sentences just didn't make sense and I'd have to read over them multiple times before they made sense. Also some words with two letters ended up ending together which meant it was kinda weird having both ends saying "the" instead of "he".
Ok, so here's the skinning.
i do alot of outdoor stuff around the house and it works great for my needs and price its a good deal!!
Nice heavy quality glassware.
the story line is lame and they have no redeeming qualities. it was just a bunch of kids being loud in school. i read this book before my son could appreciate life at all. he did not get it.

I can't understand the glowing reviews for this product. It doesn't even work well, the ice ball is very small and you have to be perfectly aligned with your teeth and mouth in order to suck it up. Save your money folks, pass on this one -- if anything works like a normal Sonicare toothbrush then get it. Otherwise avoid it.

Just recently went from the original iPhone 5S I bought just like this new case. Great case but it is not built to a high standard, especially for $60. The plastic piece which keeps in together your outer bumper broke within 3 weeks of normal use. Still going strong but would no longer cover the corners as well - only part that was covered. It still does protect my phone though. Really wish they would make these cases with some form of better quality than plastic.
There's enough great live songs online for free.
My daughter absolutely loved this.

While this book was an easy read and interesting in the details, I feel that a lot of the information could be found online for free. Some things were new to me but it felt like they just skimmed past some important details. Maybe that is true or maybe not. So much detail can make up for little substance (believe me).

I chose this book because it was free, read the first chapter then skipped ahead a couple of chapters. If you are into stories about sex, and men chasing women for their money, as long as they get their HEA, than give this story a try. I'm not sure why people would be like that or find it enjoyable, but I do feel bad for anyone who did go through it.
Great product, very sturdy and well constructed. The grips were perfect -- not too big or small. Very sharp knife. I'm buying one (or two) more as presents now that I've been using it.

Really enjoyed the story, even though she chose not to go public, she's obviously written many books, it's clear in her writing style. I've read all 3 books and have ordered book 4. Worth every minute waiting on shipping..
i was expecting something different based upon other reviews.

I enjoyed this book. It was a fun easy read and the characters were funny. And it is an original plot that had me entertained. My only complaint about this book would be it needs more background information on what the title means. Not so much in detail either, just enough. Other than that, it's really good. Just like all of his other books. If you want something to light up your day pick up The Devil Wears Prada. It's hilarious, cute and quick read. 
 Rating: 4.

As the title suggests, if you buy this for your kid and don't realize it until after they've left home, they're probably going to get very upset when they see that it's nothing like in the photo (It's not blue at all!)

This product did not work. I used it exactly as instructed. It was in the water for about an hour and never even worked once. We still have frogs in our pool. Do yourself a favor don't buy this. The only way that we were able to get all of them out went through lots of cleaning but after two weeks every pool had some frogs. If you are trying to kill roaches do what we did. Buy a bottle of liquid steel or something else. That actually worked.

The book reads like an action movie. It was very well written. If you are interested in this area it is a must read. You won't be disappointed and if you're not you'll want to be. I look forward to the sequel. Highly recommend.

We just received the item today and were so excited to have it in our bathroom. I filled it up as the instructions said, hung it, then turned on one of two fans that we purchased at a big box store. They both ran for 5 minutes then stopped turning. All they do is oscillate. I've been looking into buying an electrical timer switch but now that I think about it, you shouldn't need to.
I read the reviews on here before buying, so I can help anyone else who might buy this. Most of these are only partial transcripts from tapes, where they did make it into print.

A truly awful waste of my time!Don't take this book seriously if you are even slightly religious. The story line is predictable and there were many plot holes - not worth even 99c, let alone 3 or 4! It was free, so I didn't mind too much but, don't bother. My time can't be wasted. :D

This was a good movie, but it lacked a lot of the originality that I thought would have been present and had its own feel with something missing in it. It kept my attention even though some parts were hard to follow. Its got a very important message behind it, though. You can learn from just the same bad experiences as the main character did.

I am used to the "normal" size mouse and was having trouble using my new mouse. After some research, it seemed that people are complaining of this same issue so you cannot blame Microsoft for a bad design. The design makes use very difficult, because on almost every browser is uses small windows (tabs) which requires scrolling as if in a wheel or scroll bar. Also, even though there seems like no vertical resolution increase, overall screen gets much smaller.

The game may be fun for adults but the controls were really unresponsive, even in a fast moving game with bad controls. I was bummed about that. It seemed like just one more mindless shooter for us to play and not as creative an experience. As if that wasn't bad enough they kept sending me prompts telling me how much money I've earned or lost so I know when I'm doing well, what my score is doing, etc. This seems like it needs some improvement.

The book is okay. It does not have the details that I was looking for though it did help me fill in some blanks when using certain apps. Very basic and basic. Some things seemed a bit off as well, like how to search your Kindle library or finding specific books. Overall worth $3 but no more than that. Nothing out of depth. Just basic info.

This CD contains almost all of his old hits in concert. He's a legend and continues to entertain the world after so many years on this planet. His talent is beyond belief. A must have. Love it all. God bless you Paul.

This is a well-written short story that shows why horror was so popular in its day. It might seem dated and silly now, but back then it still gripped the imagination...well, not really my imagination, more of a desire to know what did happen. There are some grammatical errors with this title, which makes me wonder if it's just my copy, or perhaps I'm having trouble reading this, since the errors were there before I read it. The storyline is very good.

I bought this to put my Garmin Nuvi 2730 on the dash of a 2013 Honda Pilot. It installed fairly easily, but I found that the base unit didn't really stick well when wet. After only two weeks it fell off and was lost. Fortunately for me, while the Garmin still works, it now sticks pretty solidly without any tape. In short, these are much cheaper than most holders - even including installation costs.

the seller was great, it came sooner than i expectedand that is really important.however my problems were with this dvd. yes it plays good when its on but if you dont like silent films then dont get this, because every second of it was completely censored!!!! so all in All i would give them a five star, they are very helpfull. However beware of buying a censored version for sure. I recommend watching from a different source such as amazon.
It's easy to assemble and works well. It isn't fancy, but it does the job for what I needed. The price was reasonable, so there you go!
Good but little too short could of been longer story line.

I had seen these before and liked them a lot, so when they went on sale, I got them, but found that most don't turn off or on, have poor range (I tested with 2 tv's), sound quality, etc. If it sounds great, guess what, its junk. My set were returned within 3 days. Don't waste your time unless you just really want to play around with setting the IR remote in whatever room you're in, like at a distance from them.

I bought one of these before they were all gone and only used it about a dozen times until the belt snapped. The new one looks identical - but didn't last any more than that. It got clogged, was stuck at some point or other with what seemed like hair in it from my cat trying to groom himself. So much for grooming him now that we're on an annual schedule. I've tried fixing it, unplugging & cleaning it.
The song itself really expresses how wonderful life is. It's been such an amazing thing watching these kids grow up with incredible talents. They will go far!!!

The cable from my laptop to the TV works fine. I have also tried with a new computer that has optical output and it worked fine too. This adapter did not work for me, at all. It should clearly be stated in the details when buying an adapter. And there was no indication of this on either page as far as i could see. It is worth paying another $4 or $5 bucks so you can use your regular stereo speakers instead of those awful ones this company makes. 
 Rating: 1.
At this price point these should be good earphones. These broke after only a couple months of use. Very disappointing.

This was the first time I tried the "easy to read" style of diet cookbooks and for me, it's a big drawback. The book is very small so when you have pages turned to look something up, it is difficult to read because light from my Kindle Reader would make any page hard to read. It seemed like if there were different colors on each page, then maybe these would be easier to read, but they didn't do this either.
Not really for me I'm sure. I needed more technical detail on how to do certain things. Good basic info. Very short read.

I enjoyed the stories and found them to be entertaining. Some are definitely better than others, hence only 3 stars. I'll have a look at other titles by this author though in future. Recommended for reading around Christmas time.

I received the product with no problems and it seemed to work well at first. However, after only a few months there seems to be very little charge left. It was expensive for such an inferior product. If you want something that will last longer, choose another brand.

My vet recommended this for my dog, who has chronic hip problems associated with her breed. She had started hobbling and was constantly taking ibuprofen to try to alleviate the pain in her joints. After being on Zymox, I saw an immediate improvement and have continued to use it now 4 years later. It is also excellent - just be careful of how much you give your dog!

The case and belt clip are not that great. As a result, its been dropped once in over two years of ownership. That should tell you something about the quality. There is no protection for any part on my phone. If there were this thing could be used as an "elite" type protective case. Too bad, really disappointed. Get something better like OtterBox instead. Its just easier.

Great battery. Does a great job recharging my phone. Only thing that could be better is if it charged faster. Overall its an amazing product. You will have more than enough power for your phone or tablet.
This novel reminds me so much of an episode from Stargate SG-1. So many great possibilities with such an amazingly powerful plot.

I like a little romance in my books. Not as much sex. This book is not it. It was to graphic for me. Also at that point it felt more of an old fashioned romantic love story. When two people fell totally in each other. He even helped her run into the bathroom because she came out when he got her?! Seriously!? That guy really needed some therapy. No no no! Just no. You don't just give your heart away.
Best way I've found to hold my pots on my granite counter. Sticks well by itself. Does have just two adhesive circles in one section.

This book had a couple of pretty funny moments, but overall, if you are trying to decide whether or not you should get the book, DON'T GET IT. It might be okay, but... Just so much swearing? That was really unnecessary. The fact that he keeps referring back and saying things like, "yeah, they were all kinda hot for me actually" about every character is just plain annoying. I mean he's basically telling you what it's going to be.

The worst piece of work I tried to read. Poorly written, boring and no real sense even at the very end for this reader. Wish i hadn't wasted my time or money. This is not a book that should be read but if one is determined to have an extremely light read, perhaps it would entertain you. But, do yourself a favor, save your eyes from what I just wrote, stop reading any books with the words, "Fifty Shades Trilogy..
This is one of the best series I have ever seen. It portrays very true to life experiences which makes it even more interesting.

There is great information on the book and in some ways a good intro and reference for someone who has never used an Android phone before. It doesn't go into deep details - more like the typical introductory text I might read. The photos are poor quality (some black out areas throughout which really reduces their capability). Unfortunately all this makes reading it very difficult as there was barely any explanation of how to use specific features. This isn't a guide book at all.

I love the color and thought this would be perfect. It is too small for one person and my son doesn't feel comfortable in his chair at all. We haven't tried to wash it yet, but I'm not sure if we will.... If you have room in your kitchen for a chair, then look elsewhere. Don't even bother with this, unless you're an elephant. The seat cushion feels more like plastic than rubber, so you should expect that. It's fine though, it's made of really good quality.

Having read his other books ("The Other Side" series), this one was disappointing. While the descriptions of life on the island were interesting as part of a story, it did not provide sufficient material to actually move me through its contents.
This product is just as I hoped. It protects well, and fits perfect on my phone. Great price for something like this.

It was a good value but the item had to be replaced as it did not last very long then completely broke down and cannot used any more...... I would recommend buying your own instead of these cheaply made chargers because they don't last. If you choose to buy this charger make sure you check it frequently or it's may die on you. It's just cheap junk....... Go ahead.... order one. I'm looking for something like that now.........

Although it looks like a nice little product, I could do without the loud motor noise that is emitted. The unit would work fine if you didn't need to listen for it. It also is not very loud. I did test the suction power though by using my hand vacuum cleaner with which I got good results. All in all, I'd say its worth $17 as long as you don't mind being aware of sound when vacuuming.
It just didn't taste good for me. Maybe because I am new to the whole green tea drinking stuff but it wasn't good.

I enjoyed this story for the most part. My complaint is that too much time was taken developing characters. Each character had a different voice. The ending seemed rushed and not really necessary. It left me wondering about their lives after the book. All in all it was ok. Interesting plot. Would be 5 stars if done better with the depth of development throughout each character. Still an easy read.
I am not going to say anything about this, because you need to get an album by Tom Waits or somebody (sorry if someone like John Trudell will come into this as well).
Great series. Really enjoyed it.

This might be an alright game, but if you know what I'm talking about, don't spend your money. And if you're going through a long story, then at least try using your mii avatar. It's just too frustrating.

This has so many problems. the screen scratches super easily, I think its one of those plastic screens that gets scratched when you put something on it, but it was just like that. The back comes off..really easy and then it's not a good design. It had more problems than i can count after 3 days of owning it. So in conclusion. BUY A KINDLE FIRE WITH BETTER PRODUCT.
I use it with my MacBook. It is a good value and works great. Have been using about 5 months now.

This product seems to be very high quality and I am happy with the purchase. But it is bigger than a regular mug size. The cover makes you go around in circles just as much on your car windows if that helps any? :)
The author takes a topic I wouldn't normally care about and makes it interesting. Can't wait to read the rest of her books.

Just to give you an idea, I am in my early 20s and have had no previous experience with this kind of thing. I've watched plenty on the subject but never read anything from either side before. I'm not sure how anyone like some reviewers here can claim that what she writes is "well-researched. '" This book was simply written by someone who does know the history of women's rights issues, just a lot more watered down than one would expect.
Have been using this switcher daily since July in place of an old switch on wall mounted TV...very happy so far only had issue once...

This product had great reviews before I bought it, but it didn't seem to live up to the hype. There was no difference in using this with or without it. It took 2 months for me and my mom who has arthritis pain while trying to get rid of some bad knee pains after knee replacement surgery and she never noticed any difference. Not sure if I'm wasting $20 a month on an ineffective product. Maybe will try one other product, maybe not. Don't waste your money.

I am a sucker for any movie with Angelina Jolie. Her acting is always great. She just does the best job of playing multiple roles. However, this remake fell short in my eyes. The original "Die Hard" was also pretty good, but it's been done to death by now. If you are looking for action, then don't look here. It really goes out into uncharted territory and has some interesting parts, BUT if your going in expecting anything more like the original, well it falls short.
Phone can not support 3g at all.

My daughter ordered these "glow stars" and they are NOT glowing. She has been using them as a night light for months to help her fall asleep, but not these. She asked me to return them. :-( Now I need a place where she can bring back the ones that actually work. You make an excellent product guys, with quality materials. This is why you charge so much money. But if you can't put out what we PAY for..

The worst product I've purchased from Amazon. The cord is only 8 inches long and it is NOT a USB A to micro B cord. To give you an idea, the chord barely reaches my arm let alone my computer monitor. At this price, I did not expect top quality product, but to have paid $21 for this, you would think they could put more effort into supplying correct merchandise. Don't even waste your time with this. BUY FROM SOMEONE ELSE! You will get what you're paying for.

The product was returned to Amazon even though it came with a manufacturer's warrenty. It never worked as advertised. Even when plugged in an external speaker, the sound quality wasn't good. Maybe its because the speakers are not good (cheap?). Anyway, I would keep shopping until I found something better.
I like the book, a perfect size to take traveling. It is a great price and well worth reading. I would recommend this book.
I love these pods! They work great.

I have a 2 pound teacup cat. The only problem on this product was that my cat refused to wear it. He did not like it's form or its feel. But the biggest issue is my cats weight. My little guy weighs 7 pounds. He's 14 years old. This is an okay product. There are much better products out there. One of them costs $30. You just need to get your cat's size info. and measure. It will help you choose properly.
Once again an interesting murder mystery set in Scotland.
I was disappointed with this series after finishing A Game For Heiress.

I love how light weight this is. When I dropped my phone, screen broke, however I do believe that happens with any case. If you are looking for protection it's good. And really cute. Came quickly. Very fast delivery. Just wish they would have came different designs.
Not good picture not as expected. It's almost impossible even tho I've read manual how to adjust them. Picture is very blurry.

Just a few minutes ago this review was titled as follows...I am only writing to say THIS IS NOT MY FIRST BOOK BY DONALD McLEAN.When i received the book and opened it, first thing that caught my eye is the front picture of Ronald Reagan in his White House office with the President's picture...That should tell you everything about how i feel about the man!Next i noticed many different quotes were taken out from other books in this book.
I was disappointed because at the site where we bought it, under "features" it said the base had a timer. Well when you get this, there isn't and that's very disappointing.
I've always found books about dogs that are based on facts and statistics interesting because they can help people understand why pets do the things that they do, or in this case, don't do.

I have not finished reading this. All it is, is a book rehash of everything found all along at the Internet. It tells you how to build your own website but does not tell what that means. You can look up tons and more web sites on line free of charge. Save yourself some money and time, dont buy it, borrow if from someone like the library. If she wrote it in 15 pages or even less it would be much better material for you to read.
For my part, i've always found "Forrest Gump" one of those movies that you just can't help getting sucked into.

This book offers some great advice about dealing with grief as a child but the author tries to be too cute and ends up making her characters seem like spoiled brats. The plot is weak at best. By the way, if you're not sure whether this book was written for young adults by looking at the cover, don't bother, my middle school kids aren't even that mean. There are better books out there, stay away from "My Life in Pictures" it's terrible.
I really like this item. Although the shipping took a little longer than it should, my wife still liked it. She loved how stylish it was.

We ordered this for my son so that his ipod would not get scratched when he used it. For the most part its a great product - it's just what we needed. I gave him to me one month ago and it cracked today. I'm very careful with things, but apparently if you aren't delicate and don't have any children using them, these break.....oh well.

A gift my Grandsons loved and has been using it since he got it. I would highly recommend this product to anyone. My grandson watches them over and over. The price was very good also. Thanks for a quality product.

This is my second MDR-V6's I've owned. The first lasted 6 years before the plastic cracked on one side. But I kept them outside in all weather so they didn't seem to matter too much either. So when I picked up this new pair, I just knew that if anything would do it, these would. They're very solidly built, and not at all flimsy like some of Sony's...perhaps there were a few bad ones, but mine came looking perfect unlike another person's review.

I chose this rating because it does not have good suction power. It is easy to clean and handle. It's very light. My previous vacuum was the Hoover WindTunnel Animal Bagged Upright Vacuum, UH70210, which had better suction. Now I won't recommend it. This one isn't as powerful but you can't beat the price for getting a pet hair cleaner. The dust chamber seems to expand everytime i use it, so i'm looking for an accessory container that will make cleaning easier.
It is a great value and performs as expected. Only negative - since it does not have any kind of external switch to change the batteries, you can't keep this one on all the time.
When I saw that it went on sale, I took advantage of it. I'm really liking what she's been cooking up.
i don't know what else can be said about salt. it's so much cheaper in bulk than you ever will get at your local grocer.

This is the only album by this legendary singer not to include songs that are sung in Spanish. It also has many other songs that I had never heard before. The book and extra discs with photos of Chucho were all nice additions as well. Too bad there wasn't a CD included or they would have been perfect. Now we need another excellent biography about him. But maybe he isn't really dead. Hopefully, someday someone can record Chucho.

My son has been drinking this smoothie everyday for about a week now. He seems to be doing great since he started them. I have had no complaints like some other reviewers have. It even smell good coming out the bottle. I hope there are more flavors that they offer in the future. Also all of their products come from small family companies which is hard thing when you see big name food items that use large corporations like NutraBullet. The taste comes directly out his mouth.

this game is one of those you have to pass around as there very few that are worth playing. it has some great themes on it, but like any other review says, the story is.. lacking. I played through 3 times just for random things, and did not enjoy them much. In my opinion, its best buy was a copy of the real game, which costs more then twice as much but comes with at least 20 hours worth. If i really had to, this game would be no wort.
i bought this thing and it did not work, when i tried to fix it, the speaker broke inside it.. so if u buy this, don't take your headphone out of it!

This does the job, and it works well. The only problem is that if you use your phone after it's fully charged, which takes quite a while, it'll kill this power supply pretty quick. There was also an internal short in my unit after several months, leading me to believe I got a lemon. As others have noted, their customer service is excellent, but they will not honor warranty. What we ended up doing at our local electronics store for a replacement charger wasn't bad either.

I purchased this scanner because I've had good experience with their scanners in the past. This thing is useless. It doesn't seem to recognize paper sizes, so you can never select one from your pile of paper, even when scanning multiple pages. Scanning software isn't compatible with Windows 7 64 bit. The other reviewers weren't exaggerating about how bad it is. I'll have my computer shop someone a reliable scanner. At least they'll probably be cheaper.
I have owned this item for a couple of years now and it still performs flawlessly. Great price. A very good product would buy again..

As a fan of the movie I was very disappointed at the poor quality of this DVD. Picture looks like it came right off an old VHS tape. The sound is even worse. If you want to see it, rent it. Don't buy it! I've seen worse quality, but I'd have better luck watching reruns after school. Do yourself and your children a favor, if they get hooked on movies as mine are doing they'll ask for nothing better. There were some funny scenes in these movies, just watch and you'll understand.

The product came in a bag that appeared to have been used, though Amazon said the order was 'new'. The contents were not even packed well. Most of them had come out without any packaging at all. I didn't send back, though. Not worth it... if you don't mind having used items that aren't as new. This was just a really cheaply sold bag. If they still sell it like this, it'd be great, but for now. Pass.

I'm still trying to decide if it's because I actually bought this book or not. Either way it was boring and even for being my fave band The Smiths seem like a very dull band- you may as well save your money on this.... I've enjoyed other books in the world of rock literature that aren't so "pop" just skip over it. Not worth it!

This is not a novel - it is just page after page of dialogue in which the author states his opinions rather than painting scenes to make them interesting. You have no idea what he sees into each other - you are left with only that they want sex. The heroine has no redeeming qualities and even at her best she comes across as a stupid child. I can't understand why this book won any awards. It was just really plain boring.

The author seems to be out of his/her mind with this one. As another reviewer has noted, the book can be summed up in 3 sentences. But you get what you pay for. I got it for free by mistake, but still feel like i wasted my time and money on it. I'm going to keep looking though. Very disappointing. :-( Oh, one more thing, there was no cover page either. So even if they included a cover, someone would have guessed what is inside or where the chapter was.

This is a great album. If you like the whole rap game than this album is an absolute must buy. The production could've been much better but what makes it better are the lyrics. Dre and Eminem take on issues that most would not want to discuss in everyday life such as; race, death, poverty, violence, sexual abuse etc. What I found fascinating about Dre's lyrics was how he made you question your own opinions as well as put himself into the role of both listener and antagonist.

I purchased this with the hopes that it would be an enjoyable experience for my little cat. It turned out to be about 10 minutes of fun and then went right back in it's box. My cat likes toys too, but he is not a crazy mouse hunter. But we did try to entice him around once or twice more so he might want this. The "mouse" only has one small section on his back.

I purchased this DVD because of the good reviews and am very disappointed. The first segment (the one on Yoga for Men) focuses too much on Pilates exercises that if taught properly would be beneficial. After a while you can start to get bored, so then they teach some yoga moves as well as the stretching exercises. However, they're not explained well. The worst part is there are no explanations about why you're doing these stretches.

The idea of this game is good, and the premise good. But so many elements are just poorly done, it really does feel like some random group with little or no experience decided to make a game. For instance, there's a bug that lets you switch characters on the fly mid-game, after you've beaten all nine bosses. You don't need to, but it'll be nice not to. I also hate how sometimes certain areas have an invincible force field, meaning I can't access said area.
Good product. The battery lasts and works well. They are a good value for the price when you consider what you'd pay in store - these were purchased as gifts to replace older models.
It does just as I anticipated. I am happy with the quality and it works well for me. The delivery service was good too, arrived on a timely basis. Recommend this product to anyone looking at it.
This should be more than an $18 speaker system. You will waste time and money.
I like the product but it doesn't hold up. It has a short wire and wires started disconnectioning. You have to be very careful with this wire.
Got this for use during some long car stays at local motel, works as stated.

A very big disappointment. I have seen the movie in VHS & DVD and loved all of them. The book was not written with much thought to accuracy or even keeping characters from film history as possible. It's a pity that this has happened because there were so many more movies based on actual historical events. What really upsets me is that you are going sell books at such astronomical pricing when you're telling story behind movies.

This was my first review and I just want to say it is great, so easy to use you don't need a lot of strength or muscle power just the right amount for small jobs and very sturdy construction I'm pleased with it, would buy again.
After reading through several reviews, there are some mixed reviews. For me, the lock seems just fine.

Do not buy an item that is described in such a way. Read this warning before you buy! For another person who purchased one of these with the understanding it was "like new," read this! Even though the product description says Brand X & Sold by Amazon, there are counterfeits on Amazon selling them as genuine products. Check out my customer photos for proof. [...]

This is the second one of these I've bought in this price range. It does it's job, just wish I could see into it with as much clarity as my prior model did. That's okay, because when I'm at home and I need it, I'll still find another use for it. It's not perfect, but if you don't mind having to adjust or zoom in/out, then get one. If your vision isn't that good and all you want are basic phone features, go ahead & spend a little more.

I picked up this book because the author has always been kind of an obsessionist. Not in spite of his personal faults, but because he is a gifted storyteller and often presents interesting stories on topics that interest him. Unfortunately there are numerous factual errors so much as to be comical - such as describing General Lee saying "Oh, I'm sorry, he was one of my greatest friends.." which turned out to not be completely accurate.
Bought this little fella for our bedroom since I got into bed late one night.
Read reviews - it looks perfect as a basic multimedia player. Unfortunately, after installing the software, Windows won't recognize it's installed.
This is the second one they sent and both quit after a couple of months. Just buy name brand, you get what u pay for.

I had high hopes for this cookbook. The photos aren't particularly impressive and the instructions are often difficult to understand but you get a good sense of what they expect from you. They actually recommend some really tasty recipes that sound fairly easy. And then came my favorite recipe - the sweet potato pie. You definitely wouldn't mess up this one if you're not used or have never cooked with coconut flour.
The product was delivered promptly and I got exactly what I ordered. Works just as good as the original one that came with a laptop
I read this book and it just did not cut it. My only problem was that all of the sex scenes were quite explicit...very hard for me to go along.

I ordered these for my son's 7th birthday. He opened his package first, and was totally thrilled. That night however, when he put them on they were too big. By the morning of June 10th we found out that there is no way to adjust the straps! We had just been ripped off! What a rip off. Don't wast your money. I'm going back to Target today. If you are looking at these, don't order them! Waste of $20 or more dollars!

After reviewing many different brands of blenders, we finally purchased this one. This is our third Cuisinart and love them. The only thing that keeps it from a 5 star rating is the plastic lid does not pop securely onto its rim. Seems as though they need to look into this. Otherwise very pleased.

There was not enough in this book to give it 3 stars. It has some good basics for getting started though. If you have never done much home canning before, get this- lots and lots of different recipes and tips. You'll find out where your pantry stuff needs improvement-it's an easy reference guide.
A very quick read which left me somewhat bored. Did not live up to the hype of a good book. The ending was no surprise.
It's exactly what it's advertised to be.
Perfect - just what I was looking for & the price! So easy to mount my TV with this bracket. Thanks!
I have used these for years and am thrilled with them. It is easy to store in a drawer, saves counter space too.

This is a great item it gives the ability to see what you are walking through when there is snow on the ground. I will not be letting this go into my purse without it. For any person that has walked thru or around snow, would highly recommend it. A must have. Very durable also. Great seller too. Thanks so much.

I needed a place to charge my IPad when traveling in the car. This does an excellent job and looks like it is very well made. It has 2 port design also for charging more than one IPAD at once. My only concern right now is that the charger cord gets extremely hot. Other reviewers have stated this also. That said, after using it, so far no problems. Definitely worth purchasing. Have had less then 1 week. So far, I am happy.

I was very disappointed in the quality of this book. Many of them had writing on which side of the pages they printed. Not one page would turn easily or easily. Some pages were hard to turn. I'm giving each a 1-star rating. My students are excited about doing their reading but now it's time for me and others who bought these books as 'good' to find another vendor so that we can use them. Do not waste your money - buy used at least until you know what's going on.
These were perfect size for my kitchen and would be even better if made in USA (not China). A little pricey but well worth it.
These are terrible protectors! First off, they take ages for them to ship. And when you first put them on its terrible. They scratch so easily. Plus mine came with weird scratches in them.

Did not fit my computer very well did not snap in well. The back cover would come off which could be a good thing as it might help prevent the cracks that were developing on mine from moving around. I also bought a hard case with keyboard for this computer. Which works much better. And cost less too. But if you have an older laptop than mine.. You probably need one of those cases to protect it.
Purchased this and it works great. You can cook the eggs with no problem at all. It takes just a few minutes to boil which helps speed up cooking. I would recommend it.

I recently purchased the Dell laptop that was described as being in a excellent condition with no scratches, dents, or other cosmetic flaws. The one problem when looking at it is that several small scratches are seen on top of the screen, underneath and around it. All together I probably spent close to 600 dollars for my new laptop, so it's very disappointing when I received this item.

There is a hole in the bottom. It doesn't hold water for long. My cats didn't care much about it. I had to put it away and bring their old bowl back. Don't waste your money. Mine was not cheap but this one wasn't worth much. Also you need a special cat food that comes with that. Their dry foods are okay as long as they eat. If your cat eats more than that, it isn't good. You can't just buy generic so go with name brands or do some research online.
They were very cute.

This charger is a complete waste of money! It has the shortest life between charges. In less than a month it stopped working. I would not recommend this to anyone. They could have at least made one in two different sizes. I had to give 1 star, otherwise I wouldn't even write this. Stay away from anything from PowerGen! You WILL just be tossing your money away. Never again! Don't buy it... Go and get a name brand instead. Save yourself a headache!!!

I bought this for my son who used to play drums in his younger days before he was married. He really liked the look of it and couldn't wait until we could take a day trip down south so he could set it up outside. When they were ready he took pictures and sent them out using the motion sensor. After about 2 months later when you turn on both cameras its super easy to setup, connect and, then share it. This is worth every penny that we purchased it.

Not enough action and not very interesting. I do have to say that for some readers this book may hold more interest than it did on my part but really the title caught me off guard. The story starts with a beautiful wife being killed by a psychotic killer who then goes about trying to destroy those around him as he murders every man in sight, no exceptions. As if that's not bad enough, there is the woman of course who's husband has just been murdered and the son who would be dead soon.

I purchased the iriver AFT 300 to replace an older MP3 player (which no longer worked), and am very pleased with it. My previous mp3 was a Creative MuVo X5 (model E280, which works wonderfully well); after many years of hard use, it started having problems. I replaced its battery twice, both times by using replacement batteries from local stores. This new one is much nicer, however, when comparing size with my original unit. The earphones are far more comfortable as well.

The title fits the book very well. It is well written, but mostly because of the subject matter (murder). I am a mystery buff, so maybe it appealed to me. There are probably better works on this subject, however. This was free, so that is why 2 stars. In all fairness, other readers may love it.
This is one of the better coffeemakers, especially for an inexpensive model. It heats up fairly quickly, and it's easy to clean. Overall, I've really enjoyed this coffee maker.

I have been a fan of Kate Bush for quite some time now, and this documentary was filmed in 2007 so it covers her transition from the early days when she would work on an album then take a break until 20011 working as a model (and later becoming more active behind camera). It also includes footage from other times (e.g. 2003 at the height of fame where Madonna worked with her) and things that occurred backstage before music videos came into play.

I haven't done any serious studying for my exam. This will be the first time I've ever sat at a exam after watching a TV show and looking all over this book before I go into each section, trying to find anything. I can almost get through it...
I felt like this book, in its description of how women should dress when traveling overseas and also on vacation, missed out very badly considering China is a place that we all go to.
This product has performed very well.
The product was sent fast. Although I have not tried this yet i am confident it will work well with my camcorder. The price and quality are both very good. Thanks for the service!

I purchased this book specifically for a recipe called "chicken bouillon" in the title, but there is actually no chicken included whatsoever. Instead, what you get are 7 different recipes. One of them, called "Chicken and dumplings" consists entirely of...well...a CHICKEN AND A DOUGHNUPP!To make matters more interesting, several of them have NO FONTANT at all. They just add vegetables to soup. Some require chopping vegetables, some don't.

This is more of a pamphlet than a book. It took only 10 mins to read and I was disappointed as it had such great reviews. The book seems like most other books you might find on the topic, but very short and not worth paying $6 for. There was only 5 tips which basically boiled down to, "You don't know until you're tested!! Don't get in an accident if it's possible," so basically that sums up his entire opinion.
The last chapter left little mystery but plenty on interpretation.

I must start out by saying....If you loved the first two books in this series then don't read this.....The action takes place all over and there is nothing interesting happening to keep me interested. For some reason it seems that each of the three main characters are starting from different places. So much going on so fast they aren't really developed or interesting. They seem more like fantasy world creations with no real life experience attached. It took almost half way through reading for something interesting to happen.

This book gets off and on with no real point or purpose from the beginning, if you pay attention when reading, its ok. The characters are completely shallow cardboard cutouts, they talk like your local high school kids while reading it.

At the beginning of this review, I'm going to try and be as brief as possible, mainly because I don't want to give away anything important about the plot. The novel is narrated in first person, both by Harry himself, but also through a female character named Tess, who was conceived after having an affair with Harry.

I was hoping for something that would hold my laptop a little better. This has no padding at all, which is fine, because the size of my macbook air 11.6'' fits in it. It's just okay though. The straps on it are really thin and feel cheap. For an under $25 sleeve, its okay, but not great by any means. I'd give this 2 stars instead if 4 or 5. Oh, also, there isn't much room for anything else.
Great tool to have in the shop or garage, this works great for cutting out and punching through a lot of material.

I bought this for my son it looked great. He loved it, but only used the mouse pad one time and then he stopped using it. I'm trying to figure out a way of having him replace the whole thing. I hope someone will read this. My biggest complaint is there should be some sort of paperwork with how or when it's supposed to expire. Now they want 40 dollars each if you buy 2.

I received this book to read while commuting on my Bike. To start the story is written in first person from one of two main characters who both live or work in Ireland. The other character is an American (yes, I'm American!) and she works as a freelance journalist, doing "interviews" ( her words) for foreign countries. However, it appears that there are three main countries they must report on.

This review is only for the dvd itself, not the movie. I love this movie, and have waited years to be able to replace my damaged one, so please don't waste your money on this horrible version of "A Christmas Carol." There are 2 problems with it:1) The black bars that prevent you from seeing all parts is awful. They go across both sides but there also are a few bars in the middle.

My son loves these. He only doesn't play with them so they don't last very long but we find that it helps to break them down and put it away a few days before bedtime as the first thing he does is bite on these things :)

I have long used other Klean Kanteen bottles and like them. The newer bottle leaks from the top of lid. This leak will dry up on its own within a day, but there is no way to completely eliminate this problem. If you buy one be sure that all seals are tight. Not only does this product have an annoying problem with leakage,also the bottle cap has not been redesigned as well or correctly for those of us who use these on our cars.

After buying and reading this book, it became clear that the author is more interested in getting attention than providing information about her subject. In short, she offers up some pretty weak opinions with no supporting material whatsoever.

This book sucks. The author was in love with himself and decided to create a fantasy world that had all these amazing things in it. In fact we have the equivalent of something like this where characters say or think what are thought to be fantastic things. I bought this thinking it would give me some cool ideas for my future writing but none whatsoever. If you read this just turn on your radio then go back to work and call an uncle or something. That's better.

This is a fine little product. It was very difficult to find this model and I am glad that the vendor fulfilled my order with prompt shipping so the item would be delivered for Christmas. Great seller. Thank you.

The quality of music is outstanding, but it doesn't start playing the next track until it's half way through a track. There must be some type of glitch with that. It's not like I'm missing something or my computer can handle it. It just won't finish what it started doing, and I had to restart every time for it. I've listened to dozens if not hundreds of CD's in 2 months, and this one was certainly the worst. I'd recommend passing on this:(
First I'd like to say - this item is an absolute must if you are shopping in Amazon.com.

I bought this product for a computer at home. One of them went in fast enough, but then another one was way off. The computer won't recognize it, so can't use it. Can't return it because it came from China with no invoice or receipt. Do yourself a favor - skip these.
Good book. It kept me in suspense wondering what happens next. It's a short read as I can't wait to read the next one ….

i tried the product on a few different phones (samsung) and it's difficult to get the shield clean enough so no bubbles. In order not to, you just have to deal with lots of air bubbles that get caught when installing shield. It was frustrating because there were many streaks left after cleaning the screen. They did give me 2 protectors but I gave them away to another one due to their inability to clear lint with included cloth.

I love my Samsung Chromebook. Everything about it is great except a few things - but these are minor. Pros:1) Battery life (when you have access to WiFi).2) The keyboard and trackpad. Very nice. It makes typing very easy. Not for everyone though. Takes some getting used to.3) Great screen. Beautiful resolution. Perfect size screen with good viewing angles. And the touch of color that this screen has really puts new colors in perspective.4) Fast as heck.

It's a very good album. It doesn't seem like it was written for an entire album but instead just a few tracks. Most of them are pretty good. The first track is my favorite, I guess it's because the whole song speaks about this thing she had to do... But anyways, that song alone makes me buy it.
I got what was described and works great. it fits right into space where i had no extra power cord. happy with it. its worth buying if you are using your lenovo machine as part of an HTPC.

This book really didn't help me in the least since you have to go through a whole series of questions first. It would be fine if it were all one question, but unfortunately that is NOT it. I felt extremely confused and frustrated trying to answer this question correctly. It's a very easy book. The only way for someone with even some experience or basic computer knowledge at all could do well on this. I think it's quite an awful book, don't waste your money unless you're getting it free.
As we had hoped, this pillow is perfect for our bedroom. It appears just a little larger than what it really size, but still works great for keeping my husband comfortable.
Great read. The author brings us back to how hard it must be to deal with family members who are on drugs. We all know what addiction did for my family.

This product is cheaply made. I don't expect it to last long. But for the price I'll not worry about it. I bought a cheaper one at walmart that has lasted me 3 years with no problems. You get what you pay for. Save your money. :)

I bought this thinking it'd be a better alternative to the more pricey brands. It lasted only about two weeks. Even when it worked, there's something wrong with it. There is constant static and popping. When it's on, you can see the light behind my TV from underneath. The volume doesn't turn up very high at all.

Works as described...have this in our guest room that has white walls and these are a great touch. They work well to create ambiance on the bed. Easy install... just open two of them up by a thin strip between bed frame and box spring then screw it into place. Will order more for other rooms.
I've purchased this adapter for 3 months; just yesterday, while plugged into our charger, an arc split from one side about 5 inches long down.
This is the third installment of this movie. And I must say that it isn't my favorite, maybe because in some scenes i like to see Matt Damon getting punched or shot. But overall it's alright.

I purchased two sets of these to be used as replacement earbuds. The first package stopped working after about three months, and the second set developed a problem with one side not playing any sound. Very disappointing. You get what you pay for.

This was a fun book to read. I really liked the characters in this book. My favorite line from this book, " You never know when it's time for you be old and gray. The sooner you'll experience that beautiful moment with your friends around you, will make it worth it.". It made me think of my own youth years but would have loved sharing the story with little ones. There are great moments throughout the story. It's definitely one I'll reread over again.

I bought this and after charging one of my batteries, it will no longer take a charge so it is useless now. It was working great until then. Also, when you have multiple batteries on board, their weight forces them to touch each other and thus make contact with that battery for power transfer. For me, all four batteries are touching at every connect. As far as the light goes, it's okay without being blinding. It provides several useful settings.

When I put in some time at the local library, I decided for something to fill my time. I didn't need it that much, but if you want an inexpensive book about this topic, I'd look with a microscope first. It's not very well-written. The writing is stiff and lacks charm. Also, there's no indication or discussion of "historical documents."
This case comes highly recommend from others.
They are OK, but not near as good at keeping my dogs clean within 24 hours. Also when they get dirty, don't expect them back looking nice after washing.

I have two of these cameras and it took over six hours to get them online. If you intend on using the web interface, forget it. It's one hour drive from home, another is around an hour, so if you're in a pinch for time (like when I'm at my parents or working away from a computer), go with this. Otherwise, you might as well just hook up your camera directly (again, it's not hard wired in) to wherever and use their free app.

The plot makes sense, but the character development was lacking. I felt like they hardly talked to each other at all. And it didn't seem clear who this person is supposed to be. Was she a woman? A teenager? What's her name, please? I'm going back and reading another of his books because he kept me interested all throughout this. But that being said, I'd actually reread some parts to see if I'd missed something, which I'll have to do now. The concept for the story sounded intriguing though.
The book came in good time and looks just as described.it is a nice addition to my son's other Legos sets.

Well, it's been well over a year since I purchased this CD as well as the follow up - which we both hated so much. We like to listen while driving but have never actually found one track that made it into my head. What was she thinking? Even in an age of "rap music" there are people without talent. Do not buy this-stick with hip-hop and rap. It's good music plain and simple.

This is a very cute toy, but our cat loves it no more than the day we got it, not only does he pull himself up to sit on top of it, I find him chewing holes in it. He still likes when my daughter plays with him, and has tried several times at opening his own little zippers, which are all chewed up. We don't know why, maybe they were too hard for him...
It looks like they never got around to fixing this one. Apparently it's not an uncommon problem because other photographers have reported this.

This is a great value and it works very well. It took me 3 minutes to learn how the camera operates! Just set it up, put your memory card in, press the button once, make sure everything works. No complicated instructions. A lot easier than some others.
Very good item, my grandson can't wait until christmas day to get this item out of its box & into play. Shipping was fast and on time.

I bought this book under the impression that it would contain a lot of recipes on making and serving healthy meals. While there are certainly some healthy meals in it, most seem to be for fast food or processed food. There is plenty about how much better these foods taste than other forms of food, but rarely does the author give any specifics as to what kind of cooking you'd like with such recipes, if any. The pictures all take up half your page at once, and many appear very small.

This is the most irritating book I've read in a long time. I kept reading, hoping to find something about some deep religious feeling or thought but nothing. It's not even all that well written and not interesting. The writing style was odd with its lack of punctuation, run-on sentences (a lot!) and, worst of all, complete disregard for proper tense usage. Very sloppy writing, although it appears like an amateur. If there were no plot, this novel would be pretty darn bad.
For being cheap it's a good quality. I've had it for 1 year now and there's no problems. Very pretty and shiny.

This product is fantastic. I bought it for home use as opposed to my work laptop. My lap got a bit warm, not burn but, on the verge of getting hot. With this cooler, while using my laptop at 100% power usage, It dropped down to around 45%!!! Its so cold out that im in heaven. My friends have even commented about how amazing its looks. And I've actually had some jealous comments from friends, and they can't believe you can get such cooling capability for less than $30.

I bought this item for my husband. He had another on a larger scale. It broke and he could not find another. So when we were at our local mall his was stolen so this is just what he needed. Great service and great product. We are very happy with it :) Thank you! Happy husband! :-)
This is a good movie that I enjoyed and recommend. Nothing wrong with it but nothing really great either. I've seen a few movies like this one. Well done to try something different.
This is my second Wii. I wish they would not take sooooo long putting games out because these things are really fun (and cheap).

I didn't realize how many people complained about the handle getting loose until after it was delivered. So now it's really not so bad but if you're going to be using on a regular basis you'll want to get some superglue. Otherwise this thing is awesome. The weight of the scoop fits perfectly in my hand. If anyone knows what super glue is please comment & tell me. :)
This is by far the best screwdriver i ever seen its heavy duty very well made and comes apart which was what i love most about it.

Very cheap looking with flimsy cardboard that folds for card storage. Will not hold a few photos or cards without falling apart. Not worth the cost of shipping. Look at other options, not these. I would send it back, but it's too bulky to fit into box. Won't be buying anything from this company again. And if you are lucky and receive what they advertise.....that's also junk. I tried using extra double sided tape which was helpful...just didn't look too good. Would like my money back.
The product was exactly what I expected and looks wonderful on our deck. Nice color to it, just makes it look a little more exotic! Would recommend this item.

Our family uses this blender every morning for smoothies. We had trouble finding it locally so was glad that Amazon carried it. It operates great without the bulky handle you find on most kitchen appliances. Makes excellent smoothies quickly and easily.
This was my first memory foam mattress that I bought on Amazon.
Sound quality awesome. Easy to use.

Don't buy. I bought 3 bags of these and within 2 days all had holes on the sides from normal use. It is not worth it especially for heavy pots. Go to HD - they're cheaper and they have much bigger sacks and you can just put more of whatever in there without having as many holes. My kids use them too. It's unfortunate though. Very cute but too expensive with so may hole problems. I'm going back to walmart.
After taking for less than 2 weeks, was sick with chest pains. This is my 1st week so hope everything turns around.

I had a small amount of trouble applying it as per the instructions on the packaging. But then again, it's just some clear plastic sheeting and my phone case fits over it, so no sweat. I'm hoping it'll protect against scratches for a long, long time.

It's not the best, but it's pretty good. The writing is great and some songs are really awesome. The movie isn't nearly as good though. But all in all, its decent. I would reccomend it if your a fan of twilight.
I have another book that shows the same pictures so maybe this one uses different pictures. But the descriptions were too specific for my needs, and it was a big disappointment!

It didn't work at all on our Toshiba Thrive Tablet/10.1, so we had to keep it plugged in whenever needed. I am disappointed with my purchase, but thankfully the seller was very polite and will refund me fully. If this item isn't for your particular tablet, or brand of device, you may have better luck than us.

I was very excited to receive this set as it matches our stainless steel appliances. However, they are made in China, don't hold heat or cold very well, and can be difficult to clean. It would be better if they were manufactured here, because all items seem to have "China" stamped on them. Too bad, because, otherwise, the size is fine, color matches most appliances, and the shape looks good. As of now, I'm still looking for a non-breakable dishwasher, which is what I've ended up with.
I love this stuff! This is the only lotion that doesn't leave a residue after applying. It smells great too! Highly recommended!

The CD starts with the first track, the only one I liked on this record, a tribute to Ray Davies; it has not aged well. The two other songs have some charm but overall, I can't help thinking that these were recorded in someone's back garden. Do they think we want to spend money for something like this? In any case, I'll never buy an album by them again. And their records are generally poor compared to the quality of music available now. A pity.
Our puppy has plenty of room inside.
i ordered the disc and instead of that we got a copy with no cover. how can you do that. the cover came in a plastic case was in shape just doesnt look great to give away as you cant even see it.
This track sucks.

This is the second battery charger I bought as a Christmas present, that came from Amazon, after one purchased before for my son. His was still working. The first charger, received in July, broke apart and wouldn't charge anymore. Just found out two days ago they discontinued it without warning. It took quite some time to find the exact replacement charger. Too bad, really liked it. One of these days, will purchase an actual Nikon product, or go back to buying batteries.

I was looking for a book like this one, The Ultimate Guide to Natural Healing and how you can incorporate elements in life that align with healing principles, etc. That said, Dr. Weil is highly respected in natural medicine field so it took me awhile but the title made me hopeful since I thought perhaps other authors would have more than just one or two chapters on each subject. Nope, not the case here. In fact most concepts are repeated over many pages.
For the price of an additional item not worth it.

The book was good for what it is but at the beginning there were times that I felt as though I should be a teenager again. Some things seemed real to me (why does Jake think everything revolves around his weight? Where did Jake's parents die and what did his father do?) But even after all these years, this kind of thing doesn't stay dead in my memory. The way it's written is very unique and somewhat makes you wonder if he really lived life back then.

Although the story line is good, not enough was said about the characters themselves. There were very few pages devoted to their back stories. Many of us like more detail on what we are reading about. If it doesn't take too long and they aren't being killed off as much there could be another book without all this time consuming back-story. It feels choppy because it's chopped up into so many sections. I hope part three can fill out some background info. This wasn't my favorite series.
Too many bad words for my taste. Story was okay but language totally needs to be cleaned up. I probably won't buy anymore in this series if he keeps up this attitude.
It fits very well with my Samsung galaxy 10.1 tablet. And price was great. I think it came with stylus pen which is a plus. Very happy about my choice. :) Thank you.

It's really hard to find good looking aprons for girls that aren't 'cheesy'. The fit is perfect, and I know my niece will LOVE it. HOWEVER, there was a small tear when we took it out of the packaging. I'm not sure if this had anything to do with shipping, or not. Either way, it'll get tossed as soon as she washes it, no big deal though. She can use hers like any other.

The book is good in that it focuses on all the facets of being an artist. Great ideas, helpful tips, and simple but thorough explanations. Just one complaint - It wasn't even proof read!
